10:91: Aaal-'aana Wa-qad 'asaita qablu Wa-kunta minal mufsideen
10:92: Falyawma nunajjeeka bibadanika litakoona liman khalfaka Aayah; Wa-inna kaseeran minan naasi 'an aayaatinaa laghaafiloon
10:93: Wa-laqad bawwa'naa Baneee Israaa'eela mubawwa 'a sidqinw Wa-razaqnaahum minat taiyibaati fa-makhtalafoo hattaa jaaa'ahmul 'ilm; inna Rabbaka yaqdee bainahum Yawmal Qiyaamati feemaa kaanoo feehi yakhtalifoon
10:94: Fa-in kunta fee shakkin mimmaaa anzalnaaa ilaika fas'alil lazeena yaqra'oonal Kitaaba min qablik; laqad jaaa'akal haqqu mir Rabbika fa-laa takoonanna minal mumtareen
10:95: Wa-laa takoonanna minal lazeena kazzaboo bi-Aayaatil laahi fatakoona minal khaasireen
10:96: Innal lazeena haqqat 'alaihim Kalimatu Rabbika laa yu'minoon
10:97: Wa-law jaaa'at-hum kullu Aayatin hattaa yarawul 'azaabal aleem
10:98: Falaw-laa kaanat qaryatun aamanat fa-nafa'ahaaa eemaanuhaaa illaa qawma Yoonusa lammaaa aamanoo kashafnaa 'anhum 'azaabal khizyi fil hayaatid dunyaa Wa-matta'naahum ilaa heen
10:99: Wa-law shaaa'a Rabbuka la-aamana man fil ardi kulluhum jamee'aa; afa-anta tukrihun naasa hattaa yakoonoo mu'mineen
10:100: Wa-maa kaana linafsin an tu'mina illaa bi-iznil laah; Wa-yaj'alur rijsa 'alal lazeena laa ya'qiloon
10:101: Qulin zuroo maazaa fissamaawaati wal ard; Wa-maa tughnil Aayaatu wannuzuru 'an qawmil laa yu'minoon
10:102: Fahal yantaziroona illaa misla ayyaamil lazeena khalaw min qablihim; qul fantazirooo innee ma'akum minal muntazireen
10:103: Thumma nunajjee Rusulana wallazeena aamanoo; kazaalika haqqan 'alainaa nunjil mu'mineen
10:104: Qul yaaa-ayyuhan naasu in kuntum fee shakk-in min deenee fa-laa a'budul lazeena ta'budoona min doonil laahi Wa-laakin a'budul laahal lazee yatawaffaakum Wa-umirtu an akoona minal mu'mineen
10:105: Wa-an aqim wajhaka liddeeni Haneefanw Wa-laa takoonanna minal mushrikeen
10:106: Wa-laa tad'u min doonil laahi maa laa yanfa'uka Wa-laa yadurruk; fa-in fa'alta fa-innaka izam minaz zaalimeen
10:107: Wa-ien yamsaskal laahu bidurrin falaa kaashifa lahoo illaa hoo;wa iny yuridka bikhairin falaa raaadda lifadlih; yuseebu bihee many yashaaa'u min 'ibaadih; Wa-huwal Ghafoorur Raheem
10:108: Qul yaaa-ayyuhan naasu qad jaaa'akumul haqqu mir Rabbikum; famanih tadaa fa-innamaa yahtadee li-nafsih; Wa-man dalla fa-innamaa yadillu 'alaihaa; Wa-maaa ana 'alaikum bi-wakeel
10:109: Wattabi' maa yoohaaa ilaika wasbir hattaa yahkumal laah; Wa-Huwa khairul haakimeen
11:1: Alif-Laaam-Raa; Kitaabun uhkimat Aayaatuhoo summa fussilat mil ladun Hakeemin Khabeer
11:2: Allaa ta'budooo illal laah; innanee lakum minhu nazeerunw Wa-basheer
11:3: Wa-anis taghfiroo Rabbakum summa toobooo ilaihi yumatti'kum mataa'an hasanan ilaaa ajalim musammanw Wa-yu'ti kulla zee fadlin fadlahoo Wa-in tawallaw fa-inneee akhaafu 'alaikum 'azaaba Yawmin Kabeer
11:4: Ilal laahi marji'ukum Wa-Huwa 'alaa kulli shai'in Qadeer
11:5: Alaa innahum yasnoona sudoorahum liyastakhfoo minh; alaa heena yastaghshoona siyaabahum ya'lamu maa yusirroona Wa-maa yu'linoon; innahoo 'aleemun bizaatis sudoor
11:6: Wa-maa min daaabbatin fil ardi illaa 'alal laahi rizquhaa Wa-ya'lamu mustaqarrahaa Wa-mustawda'ahaa; kullun fee Kitaabim Mubeen
11:7: Wa-Huwal lazee khalaqas samaawaati wal-arda fee sittati aiyaaminw Wa-kaana 'Arshuhoo alal maaa'i liyabluwakum aiyyukum ahsanu 'amalaa; Wa-la'in qulta innakum mab'oosoona min ba'dil mawti la-yaqoolannal lazeena kafaroo in haazaaa illaa sihrum mubeen
11:8: Wala'in akharnaa 'anhumul 'azaaba ilaaa ummatim ma'doodatil la-yaqoolunna maa yahbisuh; alaa yawma ya'teehim laisa masroofan 'anhum Wa-haaqa bihim maa kaanoo bihee yastahzi'oon
11:9: Wa-la'in azaqnal insaana minnaa rahmatan summa naza'naahaa minhu, innahoo laya'oosun kafoor
11:10: Wala'in azaqnaahu na'maaa'a ba'da darraaa'a massat-hu la-yaqoolanna zahabas saiyiaatu 'anneee; innahoo lafarihun fakhoor
11:11: Illal lazeena sabaroo Wa-'amilus saalihaati ulaaa'ika lahum maghfiratunw Wa-ajrun kabeer
11:12: Fala'allaka taarikum ba'da maa yoohaaa ilaika Wa-daaa'iqum bihee sadruka aien yaqooloo law-laaa unzila 'alaihi kanzun aw jaaa'a ma'ahoo malak; innamaa anta nazeer; wallaahu 'alaa kulli shai'inw wakeel
11:13: Am yaqooloonaf taraahu qul faatoo bi'ashri Suwarim mislihee muftarayaatinw wad'oo manis tata'tum min doonil laahi in kuntum saadiqeen
11:14: Fa-il-lam yastajeeboo lakum fa'lamooo annamaaa unzilla bi'ilmil laahi Wa-al laaa ilaaha illaa Huwa fahal antum muslimoon
11:15: Man kaana yureedul hayaatad dunyaa zeenatahaa nuwaffi ilaihim a'maa-lahum feehaa Wa-hum feehaa laa yubkhasoon
11:16: Ulaaa'ikal lazeena laisa lahum fil Aakhirati illan Naaru Wa-habita maa sana'oo feehaa Wa-baatilum maa kaanoo ya'maloon
11:17: Afaman kaana 'ala baiyyinatim mir Rabbihee Wa-yatloohu shaahidum minhu Wa-min qablihee Kitaabu Moosaaa imaamanw Wa-rahmah; ulaaa-'ika yu'minoona bih; Wa-main yakfur bihee minal Ahzaabi fan-naaru maw'iduh; falaa taku fee miryatim minh; innahul haqqu mir Rabbika Wa-laakinna aksaran naasi laa yu'minoon
11:18: Wa-man azlamu mimmanif taraa 'alal laahi kazibaa; ulaaa'ika yu'radoona 'alaa Rabbihim Wa-yaqoolul ashhaa duhaaa'ulaaa'il lazeena kazaboo 'alaa Rabbihim; alaa la'natul laahi alaz zaalimeen
11:19: Allazeena yasuddoona 'an sabeelil laahi Wa-yabghoonahaa 'iwajanw Wa-hum bil Aakhiratihum kaafiroon
11:20: Ulaaa'ika lam yakoonoo mu'jizeena fil ardi Wa-maa kaana lahum min doonil laahi min awliyaaa'; yudaa'afu lahumul 'azaab; maa kaanoo yastatee'oonas sam'a Wa-maa kaanoo yubsiroon
11:21: Ulaaa'ikal lazeena khasirooo anfusahum Wa-dalla 'anhum maa kaanoo yaftaroon
11:22: Laa jarama annahum fil Aakhirati humul akhsaroon
11:23: Innal lazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaati Wa-akhbatooo ilaa Rabbihim ulaaa'ika Ashaabul Jannati hum feehaa khaalidoon
11:24: Masalul fareeqaini kal-a'maa wal-asammi walbaseeri wassamee'; hal yastawiyaani masalaa; afalaa tazakkaroon
11:25: Wa-laqad arsalnaa Noohan ilaa qawmihee innee lakum nazeerum mubeen
11:26: Al laa ta'budooo illal laaha inneee akhaafu 'alaikum 'azaaba Yawmin aleem
11:27: Faqaalal mala-ul lazeena kafaroo min qawmihee ma naraaka illaa basharam mislanaa Wa-maa naraakat taba'aka illal lazeena hum araazilunaa baadiyar raayi Wa-maa naraa lakum 'alainaa min fadlim bal nazunnukum kaazibeen
11:28: Qaala yaa-qawmi ara'aitum in kuntu 'alaa baiyyinatim mir Rabbee Wa-aataanee rahmatam min 'indihee fa'um-miyat 'alaikum anulzimuku-moohaa Wa-antum lahaa kaarihoon
11:29: Wa-yaa-qawmi laaa as'alukum 'alaihi maalan in ajriya illaa 'alal laah; Wa-maaa ana bitaaridil lazeena aamanoo; innahum mulaaqoo Rabbihim Wa-laakinneee araakum qawman tajhaloon
11:30: Wa-yaa-qawmi main yansurunee minal laahi in tarattuhum; afalaa tazak-karoon
11:31: Wa-laa aqoolu lakum 'indee khazaa'inul laahi Wa-laaa a'lamul ghaiba Wa-laa aqoolu inee malakunw Wa-laaa aqoolu lillazeena tazdareee a'yunukum lai yu'tiyahumul laahu khairan Allaahu a'lamu bimaa feee anfusihim innee izal laminaz zaalimeen
11:32: Qaaloo yaa-Noohu qad jaadaltanaa fa-aksarta jidaalanaa faatinaa bimaa ta'idunaaa in kunta minas saadiqeen
11:33: Qaala innamaa yaateekum bihil laahu in shaaa'a Wa-maaa antum bimu'jizeen
11:34: Wa-laa yanfa'ukum nusheee in arattu an ansaha lakum in kaanal laahu yureedu aien yughwi-yakum; Huwa Rabbukum Wa-ilaihi turja'oon
11:35: Am yaqooloonaf taraahu qul inif taraituhoo fa'alaiya ijraamee Wa-ana bareee'um mimmaa tujrimoon
11:36: Wa oohiya ilaa Noohin annahoo lany-yu'mina min qawmika illaa man qad aamana falaa tabta'is bimaa kaanoo yaf'aloon
11:37: Wasna'il fulka bi-a'yuninaa Wa-wahyinaa Wa-laa tukhaa-tibnee fil lazeena zalamoo; innahum mughraqoon
11:38: Wa-yasna'ul fulka Wa-kullamaa marra 'alaihi mala'um min qawmihee sakhiroo minh; qaala in taskharoo minnaa fa-innaa naskharu minkum kamaa taskharoon
11:39: Fasawfa ta'lamoona mai ya'teehi 'azaabuny yukhzeehi Wa-yahillu 'alaihi 'azaabun muqeem
11:40: Hattaaa izaa jaaa'a amrunaa Wa-faarat tannooru qulnah mil feehaa min kullin zawjainis naini Wa-ahlaka illaa man sabaqa 'alaihil qawlu Wa-man aaman; Wa-maaa aamana ma'ahooo illaa qaleel
11:41: Wa-qaalar kaboo feehaa bismil laahi majraihaa Wa-mursaahaa; inna Rabbee la-Ghafoorur Raheem
11:42: Wa-hiya tajree bihim fee mawjin kaljibaali Wa-naadaa Noohunib nahoo Wa-kaana fee ma'zilien yaa-bunai yarkam ma'anaa Wa-laa takum ma'al kaafireen
11:43: Qaala sa-aaweee ilaa jabalien ya'simunee minal maaa'; qaala laa 'aasimal yawma min amril laahi illaa mar rahim; Wa-haala bainahumal mawju fakaana minal mughraqeen
11:44: Wa-qeela yaaa ardubla'ee maaa'aki Wa-yaa-samaaa'u aqli'ee Wa-gheedal maaa'u Wa-qudiyal amru wastawat 'alal joodiyyi Wa-qeela bu'dal lilqawmiz zaalimeen
11:45: Wa naadaa noohur Rabbahoo faqaala Rabbi innabnee min ahlee Wa-inna wa'dakal haqqu Wa-Anta ahkamul haakimeen
11:46: Qaala yaa-Noohu innahoo laisa min ahlika innahoo 'amalun ghairu saalihin falaa tas'alni maa laisa laka bihee 'ilmun inneee a'izuka an takoona minal jaahileen
11:47: Qaala rabbi inneee a'oozu bika an as'alaka maa laisa lee bihee 'ilmunw Wa-illaa taghfir lee Wa-tarhamneee akum minal khaasireen
11:48: Qeela yaa-Noohuh bit bisalaamim minnaa Wa-barakaatin 'alaika Wa-'alaaa umamim mimmam ma'ak; Wa-umamun sanumatti'uhum summa yamassuhum minaa 'azaabun aleem
11:49: Tilka min ambaaa'il ghaibi nooheehaaa ilaika maa kunta ta'lamuhaaaa anta Wa-laa qawmuka min qabli haazaa fasbir innal 'aaqibata lilmuttaqeen
11:50: Wa-ilaa 'aadin akhaahum Hoodaa; qaala yaa-qawmi' budul laaha maa lakum min ilaahin ghairuhooo in antum illaa muftaroon
11:51: Yaa-qawmi laaa as'alukum 'alaihi ajran in ajriya illaa 'alal lazee fataranee; afalaa ta'qiloon
11:52: Wa-yaa-qawmis taghfiroo Rabbakum summa toobooo ilaihi yursilis samaaa'a 'alaikum midraaranw Wa-yazidkum quwwatan ilaa quwwatikum Wa-laa tatawallaw mujrimeen
11:53: Qaaloo yaa-Hoodu maa ji'tanaa bibaiyinatinw Wa-maa nahnu bitaarikeee aalihatinaa 'an qawlika Wa-maa nahnu laka bimu'mineen
11:54: In naqoolu illa' taraaka ba'du aalihatinaa bisooo'; qaala inneee ushhidul laaha wash-hadooo annee bareee'um mimmaa tushrikoon
11:55: Min doonihee fakeedoonee jamee'an summa laa tunziroon
11:56: Innee tawakkaltu 'alal laahi Rabbee Wa-Rabbikum; maa min daaabbatin illaa Huwa aakhizum binaasiyatihaa; inna Rabbee 'alaa Siraatim mustaqeem
11:57: Fa-in tawallaw faqad ablaghtukum maaa ursiltu biheee ilaikum; Wa-yastakhlifu Rabbee qawman ghairakum Wa-laa tadur-roonahoo shai'aa; inna Rabbee 'alaa kulli shai'in Hafeez
11:58: Wa-lammaa jaaa'a amrunaa naj-jainaa Hoodanw wallazeena aamanoo ma'ahoo birahmatim minnaa Wa-naj-jainaahum min 'azaabin ghaleez
11:59: Wa-tilka 'aad, jahadoo bi-Aayaati Rabbihim Wa-'asaw Rusulahoo wattaba'ooo amra kulli jabbaarin 'aneed
11:60: Wa-utbi'oo fee haazihid dunyaa la'natanw Wa-Yawmal Qiyaamah; alaaa inna 'Aadan kafaroo Rabbahum; alaa bu'dal li-'Aadin qawmin Hood
11:61: Wa-ilaa Samooda akhaahum Saalihaa; qaala yaa-qawmi' budul laaha maa lakum min ilaahim ghairuhoo Huwa ansha-akum minal ardi wasta'-marakum feehaa fastaghfiroohu summa toobooo ilaih; inna Rabbee Qareebum Mujeeb
11:62: Qaaloo yaa-Saalihu qad kunta feenaa marjuwwan qabla haazaaa atanhaanaaa an na'bu-da maa ya'budu aabaaa'unaa Wa-innanaa lafee shakkim mimmaa tad'oonaaa ilaihi mureeb
11:63: Qaala yaa-qawmi ara'aytum in kuntu 'alaa baiyinatim mir Rabbee Wa-aataanee minhu rahmatan famai yansurunee minal laahi in 'asaituhoo famaa tazeedoonanee ghaira takhseer
11:64: Wa-yaa-qawmi haazihee naaqatul laahi lakum aayatan fazaroohaa taakul feee ardil laahi Wa-laa tamassoohaa bisooo'in fa-yaakhuzakum azaabun qareeb
11:65: Fa-'aqaroohaa faqaala tamatta'oo fee daarikum salaasata aiy-yaamin zaalika wa'dun ghairu makzoob
11:66: Falammaa jaaa'a amrunaa najjainaa Saalihanw wal-lazeena aamanoo ma'ahoo birahmatim minnaa Wa-min khizyi Yawmi'iz inna Rabbaka Huwal Qawiyyul 'Azeez
11:67: Wa-akhazal lazeena zalamus saihatu fa-asbahoo fee diyaarihim jaasimeen
11:68: Ka-al lam yaghnaw feehaaa; alaaa inna Samooda kafaroo Rabbahum; alaa bu'dal li-Samood
11:69: Wa-laqad jaaa'at Rusulunaaa Ibraaheema bilbushraa qaaloo salaaman qaala salaamun famaa labisa an jaaa'a bi'ij-lin haneez
11:70: Falammaa ra-aaa aidiyahum laa tasilu ilaihi nakirahum Wa-awjasa minhum kheefah; qaaloo laa takhaf innaaa ursilnaaa ilaa qawmi Loot
11:71: Wamra-atuhoo qaaa'imatun fadahikat fabashsharnaahaa bi-Iss-haaqa Wa-minw waraaa'i Iss-haaqa Ya'qoob
11:72: Qaalat yaa-wailataaa 'aalidu Wa-ana 'ajoozunw Wa-haaza ba'lee shaikhan inna haazaa lashai'un 'ajeeb
11:73: Qaalooo ata'jabeena min amril laahi rahmatul laahi Wa-barakaatuhoo 'alaikum Ahlal Bayt; innahoo Hameedun Majeed
11:74: Falammaa zahaba an Ibraaheemar raw'u Wa-jaaa'at hul-bushraaa yujaadilunaa fee qawmi Loot
11:76: Yaaa-Ibraaheemu a'rid 'an haazaaa innahoo qad jaaa'a amru Rabbika Wa-innahum aateehim 'azaabun ghairun mardood
11:77: Wa-lammaa jaaa'at Rusulunaa Lootan seee'a bihim Wa-daaqa bihim zar'anw Wa-qaala haazaa yawmun 'aseeb
11:78: Wa-jaaa'ahoo qawmuhoo yuhra'oona ilaihi Wa-min qablu kaanoo ya'maloonas saiyyiaat; qaala yaa-qawmi haaa'ulaaa'i banaatee hunna atharu lakum fattaqul laaha Wa-laa tukhzooni fee daifee alaisa minkum rajulur rasheed
11:79: Qaaloo laqad 'alimta maa lanaa fee banaatika min haqq, Wa-innaka lata'lamu maa nureed
11:80: Qaala law anna lee bikum quwwatan aw aaweee ilaa ruknin shadeed
11:81: Qaaloo yaa-Lootu innaa Rusulu Rabbika lain yasiloo ilaika fa-asri bi-ahlika biqit-'im minal laili Wa-laa yaltafit minkum ahadun illam ra-ataka innahoo museebuhaa maaa asaabahum; inna maw'i-dahumus subh; alaisas subhu biqareeb
11:82: Falammaa jaaa'a amrunaa ja'alnaa 'aaliyahaa saafilahaa Wa-amtamaa 'alaihaa hijaaratam min sijjeelim mandood
11:83: Musawwamatan 'inda Rabbik; Wa-maa hiya minaz zaalimena biba'eed
11:84: Wa-ilaa Madyana akhaahum Shu'aibaa; qaala yaa-qawmi' budul laaha maa lakum min ilaahin ghairuhoo Wa-laa tanqusul mikyaala walmeezaan; inneee araakum bikhairinw Wa-innee akhaafu 'alaikum 'azaaba Yawmim muheet
11:85: Wa-yaa-qawmi awful mikyaala walmeezaana bilqisti Wa-laa tabkhasun naasa ashyaaa'ahum Wa-laa ta'saw fil ardi mufsideen
11:86: Baqiyyatul laahi khairul lakum in kuntum mu'mineen; Wa-maa ana 'alaikum bihafeez
11:87: Qaaloo yaa-Shu'aybu 'a-salaatuka ta'muruka an natruka maa ya'budu aabaaa'unaaa aw an naf'ala feee amwaalinaa maa nashaaa'oo innaka la-antal haleemur rasheed
11:88: Qaala yaa qawmi ara'aitum in kuntu 'alaa baiyinatim mir Rabbee Wa-razaqanee minhu rizqan hasanaa; Wa-maaa ureedu an ukhaalifakum ilaa maaa anhaakum 'anh; in ureedu illal islaaha mastata't; Wa-maa tawfeeqeee illaa billaah; 'alaihi tawakkaltu Wa-ilaihi uneeb
11:89: Wa-yaa-qawmi laa yajri-mannakum shiqaaqeee aien yuseebakum mislu maaa asaaba qawma Noohin aw qawma Hoodin aw qawma Saalih; Wa-maa qawmu Lootim minkum biba'eed
11:90: Wastaghfiroo Rabbakum summa toobooo ilaih; inna Rabbee Raheemunw Wadood
11:91: Qaaloo yaa-Shu'aibu maa nafqahu kaseeram mimmaa taqoolu Wa-innaa lanaraaka feenaa da'eefanw Wa-law-laa rahtuka larajamnaaka Wa-maaa anta 'alainaa bi'azeez
11:92: Qaala yaa-qawmi arahteee a'azzu 'alaikum minal laahi wattakhaztumoohu waraaa'akum zihriyyan inna Rabbee bimaa ta'maloona muheet
11:93: Wa-yaa-qawmi' maloo 'alaa makaanatikum innee 'aamilun sawfa ta'lamoona many ya'teehi 'azaabuny yukhzeehi Wa-man huwa kaazib; wartaqibooo innnee ma'akum raqeeb
11:94: Wa-lammaa jaaa'a amrunaa najjainaa shu'aibanw wal-lazeena aamanoo ma'ahoo birahmatim minnaa Wa-akhazatil lazeena zalamus saihatu fa-asbahoo fee diyaarihim jaasimeen
11:95: Ka-al lam yaghnaw feehaaa; alaa bu'dal li-Madyana Kamaa ba'idat Samood
11:96: Wa-laqad arsalnaa Moosaa bi-Aayaatinaa Wa-sultaanim mubeen
11:97: Ilaa Fir'awna Wa-mala'ihee fattaba'ooo amra Fir'awna Wa-maaa amru Fir'awna birasheed
11:98: Yaqdumu qawmahoo Yawmal Qiyaamati fa-awrada-humun Naara Wa-bi'sal wirdul mawrood
11:99: Wa-utbi'oo fee haazihee la'natanw Wa-Yawmal Qiyaamah; bi'sar rifdul marfood
11:100: Zaalika min ambaaa'il quraa naqussuhoo 'alaika minhaa qaaa'imunw Wa-haseed
11:101: Wa-maa zalamnaahum Wa-laakin zalamooo anfusahum famaaa aghnat 'anhum aalihatuhumul latee yad'oona min doonil laahi min shai'il lammaa jaaa'a amru Rabbika Wa-maa zaadoohum ghaira tatbeeb
11:102: Wa-kazaalika akhzu Rabbika izaaa akhazal quraa Wa-hiya zaalimah; inna akhzahooo aleemun shadeed
11:103: Inna fee zaalika la-aayatal liman khaafa 'azaabal Aakhirah; zaalika Yawmum majmoo'ul lahun naasu Wa-zaalika Yawmum mashhood
11:105: Yawma yaati laa takallamu nafsun illaa bi-iznih; faminhum shaqiyyunw Wa-sa'eed
11:106: Fa-ammal lazeena shaqoo fafin Naari lahum feehaa zafeerunw Wa-shaheeq
11:107: Khaalideena feehaa maa daamatis samaawaatu wal-ardu illaa maa shaaa'a Rabbuk; inna Rabbaka fa'-'aalul limaa yureed
11:108: Wa-ammal lazeena su'idoo fafil Jannati khaalideena feehaa maa daamatis samaawaatu wal-ardu illaa maa shaaa'a Rabbuk; ataaa'an ghaira majzooz
11:109: Falaa taku fee miryatim mimmmaa ya'budu haaa'ulaaa'; maa ya'budoona illaa kamaa ya'budu aabaaa'uhum min qabl; Wa-innaa lamuwaf-foohum naseebahum ghaira manqoos
11:110: Wa-laqad aatainaa Moosal Kitaaba fakhtulifa feeh; Wa-law-laa Kalimatun sabaqat mir Rabbika laqudiya bainahum; Wa-innahum lafee shakkim minhu mureeb
11:111: Wa-inna kullal lammaa la-yuwaffiyannahum Rabbuka a'maalahum; innahoo bimaa ya'maloona Khabeer
11:112: Fastaqim kamaaa umirta Wa-man taaba ma'aka Wa-laa tatghaw; innahoo bimaa ta'maloona Baseer
11:113: Wa-laa tarkanooo ilal lazeena zalamoo fatamassa-kumun Naaru Wa-maa lakum min doonil laahi min awliyaaa'a summa laa tunsaroon
11:114: Wa-aqimis Salaata tarafayin nahaari Wa-zulafam minal layl; innal hasanaati yuzhibnas saiyi-aat; zaalika zikraa liz-zaakireen
11:115: Wasbir fa-innal laaha laa yudee'u ajral muhsineen
11:116: Falaw-laa kaana minal qurooni min qablikum ooloo baqiyyatiny yanhawna 'anil fasaadi fil ardi illaa qaleelam mimman anjainaa minhum; wattaba'al lazeena zalamoo maaa utrifoo feehi Wa-kaanoo mujrimeen
11:117: Wa-maa kaana Rabbuka liyuhlikal quraa bizulminw Wa-ahluhaa muslihoon
11:118: Wa-law shaaa'a Rabbuka laja'al annnaasa ummatanw waa-hidatanw Wa-laa yazaaloona mukhtalifeen
11:119: Illaa mar rahima Rabbuk; Wa-lizaalika khalaqahum; Wa-tammat Kalimatu Rabbika la-amla'ana Jahannama minal jinnati wannnaasi ajma'een
11:120: Wa-kullan naqussu 'alaika min ambaaa'ir Rusuli maa nusabbitu bihee fu'aadak; Wa-jaaa'aka fee haazihil haqqu Wa-maw'izatunw Wa-zikraa lilmu'-mineen
11:121: Wa-qul lillazeena laa yu'minoo na'maloo 'alaa makaanatikum innaa 'aamiloon
11:123: Wa-lillaahi ghaibus samaawaati wal-ardi Wa-ilaihi yurja'ul amru kulluhoo fa'bud-hu Wa-tawakkal 'alaih; Wa-maa Rabbuka bighaafilin 'ammaa ta'maloon
12:3: Nahnu naqussu 'alaika ahsanal qasasi bimaaa awhainaaa ilaika haazal quraana Wa-in kunta min qablihee laminal ghaafileen
12:4: Iz qaala Yoosufu li-abeehi yaaa-abati innee ra-aytu ahada 'ashara kawkabanw wash-shamsa walqamara ra-aytuhum lee saajideen
12:5: Qaala yaa-bunaiya laa taqsus ru'yaaka 'alaaa ikhwatika fayakeedoo laka kaidaa; innash Shaitaana lil-insaani 'aduwwum mubeen
12:6: Wa-kazaalika yajtabeeka rabbuka Wa-yu'allimuka min ta'weelil ahaadeesi Wa-yutimmu ni'matahoo 'alaika Wa-'alaaa Aali Ya'qooba kamaaa atammahaa 'alaaa abawaika min qablu Ibraaheema Wa-Ishaaq; inna Rabbaka 'Aleemun hakeem
12:7: Laqad kaana fee Yoosufa Wa-ikhwatiheee Aayaatul lissaaa'ileen
12:8: Iz qaaloo la-Yoosufu Wa-akhoohu ahabbu ilaaa Abeenaa minnaa Wa-nahnu 'usbatun; inna abaanaa lafee dalaalim mubeen
12:9: Uqtuloo Yoosufa awitra hoohu ardany yakhlu lakum wajhu abeekum Wa-takoonoo mim ba'dihee qawman saaliheen
12:10: Qaalaa qaaa'ilum minhum laa taqtuloo Yoosufa Wa-alqoohu fee ghayaabatil jubbi yaltaqithu badus sai-yaarati in kuntum faa-'ileen
12:11: Qaaloo yaaa-abaanaa maa laka laa ta'mannaa 'alaa Yoosufa Wa-innaa lahoo lanaa-sihoon
12:12: Arsillhu ma'anaa ghadany yarta'wa yal'ab Wa-innaa lahoo lahaafizoon
12:13: Qaala innee la-yahzununeee an tazhaboo bihee Wa-akhaafu any ya'kulahuz zi'bu Wa-antum 'anhu ghaafiloon
12:14: Qaaloo la-in akalahuz zi'bu Wa-nahnu 'usbatun innaaa izal lakhaasiroon
12:15: Falammaa zahaboo bihee Wa-ajma'ooo aien yaj'aloohu fee ghayaabatil jubb; Wa-awhainaaa ilaihi latunabbi-'annahum bi-amrihim haaza Wa-hum laa yash'uroon
12:17: Qaaloo yaaa-abaanaaa innaa zahabnaa nastabiqu Wa-taraknaa Yoosufa 'inda mataa'inaa fa-akhalahuz zi'b, Wa-maaa anta bimu'minil lanaa Wa-law kunnaa saadiqeen
12:18: Wa-jaaa'oo 'alaa qameesi-hee bidamin kazib qaala bal sawwalat lakum anfusukum amraa; fasabrun jameel; wallaahul musta'aanu 'alaa maa tasifoon
12:19: Wa-jaaa'at saiyyaaratun fa-arsaloo waaridahum fa-adlaa dalwah; qaala yaa-bushraa haaza ghulaam; Wa-asarroohu bi-daa'ah; wallaahu 'aleemum bimaa ya'maloon
12:20: Wa-sharawhu bisamanim bakhsin daraahima ma'doo-datinw Wa-kaanoo feehi minaz zaahideen
12:21: Wa-qaalal lazish taraahu mim Misra limra atiheee akrimee maswaahu 'asaaa any-yanfa'anaaa aw nattakhizahoo waladaa; Wa-kazaalika mak-kannaa li-Yoosufa fil ardi Wa-linu'allimahoo min ta'weelil ahaadees; wallaahu ghaalibun 'alaaa amrihee Wa-laakinna aksaran naasi laa ya'lamoon
12:22: Wa-lammaa balagha ashuddahooo aatainaahu hukmanw Wa-'ilmaa; Wa-kazaa-lika najzil muhsineen
12:23: Wa-raawadat-hul latee huwa fee baitihaa 'an nafsihee Wa-ghallaqatil abwaaba Wa-qaalat haita lak; qaala ma'aazal laahi innahoo rabbeee ahsana maswaay; innahoo laa yuflihuz zaalimoon
12:24: Wa-laqad hammat bihee Wa-hamma bihaa law-laaa ar ra-aa burhaana rabbih; kazaalika linasrifa 'anhu sooo'a walfa-hshaaa'; innahoo min 'ibaadi-nal mukhlaseen
12:25: Wastabaqal baaba Wa-qaddat qameesahoo min duburinw Wa-alfayaa saiyidahaa ladal baab; qaalat maa jazaaa'u man araada bi ahlika sooo'an illaaa any-yusjana aw azaabun 'aleem
12:26: Qaala hiya raawadatnee 'an nafsee Wa-shahida shaahidum min ahlihaa in kaana qameesuhoo qudda min qubulin fasadaqat Wa-huwa minal kaazibeen
12:27: Wa-in kaana qameesuhoo qudda min duburin fakazabat Wa-huwa minas saadiqeen
12:28: Falammaa ra-aa qamee-sahoo qudda min duburin qaala innahoo min kaidikunna inna kaidakunna 'azeem
12:29: Yoosufu a'rid 'an haaza wastaghfiree li-zanbiki innaki kunti minal khaati'een
12:30: Wa-qaala niswatun fil madeenatim ra-atul 'Azeezi turaawidu fataahaa 'an nafsihee qad shaghafahaa hubbaa; innaa lana-raahaa fee dalaalim mubeen
12:31: Falammaa sami'at bimak-rihinna arsalat ilaihinna Wa-a'tadat lahunna muttaka-anw Wa-aatat kulla waahidatim min-hunna sikkeenanw Wa-qaala-tikh ruj 'alaihinna falammaa ra-aynahooo akbarnahoo Wa-qatta'na aydiyahunna Wa-qulna haasha lillaahi maa haaza basharaa; in haazaaa illaa malakun kareem
12:32: Qaalat fazaalikunnal lazee lumtunnanee feeh; Wa-laqad raawattuhoo 'an nafsihee fasta'sam; Wa-la'il lam yaf'al maaa aamuruhoo la-yusjananna Wa-la-yakoonam minas saaghireen
12:33: Qaala rabbis sijnu ahabbu ilaiyya mimma yad'oo-naneee 'ilaihi Wa-illaa tasrif 'annee kaidahunna asbu ilaihinna Wa-akum minal jaahileen
12:34: Fastajaaba lahoo rabbuhoo fasarafa 'anhu kaidahunn; innahoo huwas Samee'ul 'Aleem
12:35: Summa badaa lahum min ba'di maa ra-awul Aayaati layasjununnahoo hatta heen
12:36: Wa-dakhala ma'a hussijna fata-yaan; qaala ahaduhumaaa inneee araaneee a'siru khamranw Wa-qaalal aakharu inneee araaneee ahmilu fawqa ra'see khubzan ta'kulut tairu minhu; nabbi'naa bi-ta'weelih; innaa naraaka minal muhsineen
12:37: Qaala laa ya'teekumaa ta'aamun turzaqaaniheee illaa nabba'tukumaa bi-ta'weelihee; qabla aien ya'ti-yakumaa; zaalikumaa mimmaa 'allamanee rabbee; innee taraktu millata qawmil laa yu'minoona billaahi wahum bil-aakhirati hum kaafiroon
12:38: Wattaba'tu millata aabaaa'eee Ibraaheema Wa-Iss-haaqa Wa-Ya'qoob; maa kaana lanaaa an nushrika billaahi min shai'; zaalika min fadlil laahi 'alainaa Wa-'alan naasi Wa-laakinna aksaran naasi laa yashkuroon
12:39: Yaa-saahibayis sijni 'a-arbaabum mutafarriqoona khayrun amil laahul waahidul qahhaar
12:40: Maa ta'budoona min doonihee illaaa asmaaa'an sam maitumoohaaa antum Wa-aabaaa'ukum maaa anzalal laahu bihaa min sultan; inilhukmu illaa lillaah; amara allaa ta'budooo illaaa iyyaah; zaalikad deenul qaiyimu Wa-laakinna aksaran naasi laa ya'lamoon
12:41: Yaa-saahibayis sijni ammaaa ahadukumaa fa-yasqee rabbahoo khamranw Wa-ammal aakharu fa-yuslabu fata'kulut tairu mir ra'sih; qudiyal amrul lazee feehi tastaftiyaan
12:42: Wa-qaala lillazee zanna annahoo najim minhumaz kurnee 'inda rabbika fa-ansaahush Shaitaanu zikra Rabbihee falabisa fis sijni bid'a sineen
12:43: Wa-qaalal maliku inneee araa sab'a baqaraatin simaanien ya'kuluhunna sab'un 'ijaafunw Wa-sab'a sumbulaatin khudrinw Wa-ukhara yaabisaat; yaaa-ayyuhal mala-u aftoonee fee ru'yaaya in kuntum lirru'yaa ta'buroon
12:44: Qaalooo adghaasu ahlaa-minw Wa-maa nahnu bi-ta'weelil ahlaami bi'aalimeen
12:45: Wa-qaalal lazee najaa minhumaa waddakara ba'da ummatin ana unabbi'ukum bi-ta'weelihee fa-arsiloon
12:46: Yoosufu ayyuhas siddeequ aftinaa fee sab'i baqaraatin simaaniny ya'kuluhunna sab'un 'ijaafunw Wa-sabi'i sumbulaatin khudrinw Wa-ukhara yaabisaatil la'alleee arji'u ilan naasi la'allahum ya'lamoon
12:47: Qaala tazra'oona sab'a sineena da-aban famaa hasattum fazaroohu fee sumbu-liheee illaa qaleelam mimmaa ta'kuloon
12:48: Thumma ya'tee mim ba'di zaalika sab'un shidaaduny ya'kulna maa qaddamtum lahunna illaa qaleelam mimma tuhsinoon
12:49: Thumma ya'tee mim ba'di zalika 'aamun feehi yughaa-sun naasu Wa-feehi ya'siroon
12:50: Wa-qaalal maliku 'toonee bihee falammaa jaaa'ahur rasoolu qaalar ji ilaa rabbika fas'alhu maa baalun niswatil laatee qatta'na aydiyahunn; inna Rabbee bikaidihinna 'Aleem
12:51: Qaala maa khatbukunna iz raawattunna Yoosufa 'an nafsih; qulna haasha lillaahi maa 'alimnaa 'alaihi min sooo'; qaalatim ra-atul 'Azeezil 'aana hashasal haqq, ana raawat-tuhoo 'an nafsihee Wa-innahoo laminas saadiqeen
12:52: Zaalika liya'lama annee lam akhunhu bilghaibi Wa-annal laaha laa yahdee kaidal khaaa'ineen
12:53: Wa-maa ubarri'u nafsee; innan nafsa la-ammaaratum bissooo'i illaa maa rahima Rabbee; inna Rabbee Ghafoorur Raheem
12:54: Wa-qaalal maliku' toonee biheee astakhlishu linafsee falammaa kallamahoo qaala innakal yawma ladainaa makeenun ameen
12:56: Wa-kazaalika makkannaa li-Yoosufa fil ardi yatabawwa'u minhaa haisu yashaaaa'; nuseebu birahmatinaa man nashaaa'u Wa-laa nudee'u ajral muhsineen
12:57: Wa-la-ajrul Aakhirati khairul lillazeena aamanoo Wa-kaanoo yattaqoon
12:58: Wa-jaaa'a ikhwatu Yoosufa fadakhaloo 'alaihi fa'arafahum Wa-hum lahoo munkiroon
12:59: Wa-lammaa jahhazahum bijahaazihim qaala' toonee bi-akhil lakum min abeekum; alaa tarawna anneee oofil kaila Wa-ana khairul munzileen
12:60: Fa-il lam taatoonee bihee falaa kaila lakum 'indee Wa-laa taqraboon
12:62: Wa-qaala lifityaanihij 'aloo bidaa'atahum fee rihaalihim la'allahum ya'rifoonahaaa izan qalabooo ilaaa ahlihim la'allahum yarji'oon
12:63: Falammaa raja'ooo ilaaa abeehim qaaloo yaaa-abaanaa muni'a minnal kailu fa-arsil ma'anaaa akhaanaa naktal Wa-innaa lahoo lahaafizoon
12:64: Qaala hal aamanukum 'alaihi illaa kamaa amintukum 'alaaa akheehi min qabl; fal-laahu khairun haafizanw Wa-Huwa arhamur Raahimeen
12:65: Wa-lammaa fatahoo mataa-'ahum wajadoo bidaa'atahum ruddat ilaihim qaaloo yaaa-abaanaa maa nabghee; haazihee bida-'atunaa ruddat ilainaa Wa-nameeru ahlanaa Wa-nahfazu akhaanaa Wa-nazdaadu kaila ba'eer; zaalika kailuien yaseer
12:66: Qaala lan ursilahoo ma'akum hattaa tu'tooni mawsiqam minal laahis lataa-tunnanee biheee illaaa aien yuhaata bikum falammaaa aatawhu mawsiqahum qaalal laahu 'alaa maa naqoolu Wakeel
12:67: Wa-qaala yaa-baniyya laa tadkhuloo mim baabinw waa-hidinw wadkhuloo min abwaabim mutafarriqah; Wa-maaa ughnee 'ankum minal laahi min shai'in; inil hukmu illaa lillaahi 'alaihi tawakkaltu Wa-'alaihi fal-yatawakkalil Mutawakkiloon
12:68: Wa-lammaa dakhaloo min haisu amarahum aboohum maa kaana yughnee 'anhum minal laahi min shai'in illaa haajatan fee nafsi Ya'qooba qadaahaa; Wa-innahoo lazoo 'ilmil limaa 'allamnaahu Wa-laakinna aksaran naasi laa ya'lamoon
12:69: Wa-lammaa dakhaloo 'alaa Yoosufa aawaaa ilaihi akhaahu qaala inneee ana akhooka falaa tabta'is bimaa kaanoo ya'maloon
12:70: Falammaa jahhazahum bijahaazihim ja'alas siqaayata fee rahli akheehi summa azzana mu'azzinun ayyatuhal 'eeru innakum lasaariqoon
12:72: Qaaloo nafqidu suwaa'al maliki Wa-liman jaaa'a bihee himlu ba'eerinw Wa-ana bihee za'eem
12:73: Qaaloo tallaahi laqad 'alimtum maa ji'na linufsida fil ardi Wa-maa kunnaa saariqeen
12:74: Qaaloo famaa jazaaa'u-hooo in kuntum kaazibeen
12:75: Qaaloo jazaaa'uhoo manw wujida fee rahlihee fahuwa jazaaa'uh; kazaalika najziz zaalimeen
12:76: Fabada-a bi-aw'iyatihim qabla wi'aaa'i akheehi summas takhrajahaa minw wi-'aaa'i akheeh; kazaalika kidnaa li-Yoosuf; maa kaana liyaakhuza akhaahu fee deenil maliki illaaa aien yashaaa'al laah; narfa'u darajaatim man nashaaa'; Wa-fawqa kulli zee 'ilmin 'Aleem
12:77: Qaaloo ien yasriq faqad saraqa akhul lahoo min qabl; fa-asarrahaa Yoosufu fee nafsihee Wa-lam yubdihaa lahum; qaala antum sharrum makaananw wallaahu a'lamu bimaa tasifoon
12:78: Qaaloo yaaa-ayyuhal 'Azeezu inna lahooo aban shaikhan kabeeran fakhuz ahadanaa makaanahoo innaa naraaka minal muhsineen
12:79: Qaala ma'aazal laahi an naakhuza illaa manw wajadnaa mataa'anaa 'indahoo innaaa izal lazaalimoon
12:80: Falammas tay'asoo minhu khalasoo najiyyan qaala kabeeruhum alam ta'lamoon anna abaakum qad akhaza 'alaikum mawsiqam minal laahi Wa-min qablu maa farrattum fee Yoosufa falan abrahal arda hattaa yaazana leee abeee aw yahkumal laahu lee Wa-huwa khairul haakimeen
12:81: Irji'ooo ilaaa abeekum faqooloo yaaa-abaanaaa innab naka saraq; Wa-maa shahidnaaa illaa bimaa 'alimnaa Wa-maa kunnaa lilghaibi haafizeen
12:82: Was'alil qaryatal latee kunnaa feehaa wal'eeral lateee aqbalnaa feehaa Wa-innaa lasaadiqoon
12:83: Qaala bal sawwalat lakum anfusukum amran fasabrun jameelun 'asal laahu aien yaa-tiyanee bihim jamee'aa; innahoo Huwal 'Aleemul Hakeem
12:84: Wa-tawallaa 'anhum Wa-qaala yaaa-asafaa 'alaa Yoosufa wabyaddat 'aynaahu minal huzni fahuwa kazeem
12:85: Qaaloo tallaahi tafta'u tazkuru Yoosufa hattaa takoona haradan aw takoona minal haalikeen
12:86: Qaala innamaaa ashkoo bassee Wa-huzneee ilal laahi Wa-a'lamu minal laahi maa laa ta'lamoon
12:87: Yaa-baniyyaz haboo fatahassasoo mien Yoosufa Wa-akheehi Wa-laa tai'asoo mir rawhil laahi innahoo laa yai'asu mir rawhil laahi illal qawmul kaafiroon
12:88: Falammaa dakhaloo 'alaihi qaaloo yaaa-ayyuhal 'Azeezu massanaa Wa-ahlanad durru Wa-ji'naa bibidaa 'timmuzjaatin fa-awfi lanal kaila Wa-tasaddaq 'alainaa innal laaha yajzil mutasaddiqeen
12:89: Qaala hal 'alimtum maa fa'altum bi-Yoosufa Wa-akheehi iz antum jaahiloon
12:90: Qaaloo 'a-innaka la-anta Yoosufu qaala ana Yoosufu Wa-haazaaa akhee qad mannal laahu 'alainaa innahoo mai yattaqi Wa-yasbir fa-innal laaha laa yudee'u ajral muhsineen
12:91: Qaaloo tallaahi laqad aasarakal laahu 'alainaa Wa-in kunnaa lakhaati'een
12:92: Qaala laa tasreeba 'alaikumul yawma yaghfirul laahu lakum Wa-Huwa arhamur raahimeen
12:93: Izhaboo biqameesee haazaa fa-alqoohu 'alaa wajhi abee yaati baseeranw waatoonee bi-ahlikum ajma'een
12:94: Wa-lammaa fasalatil 'eeru qaala aboohum innee la-ajidu reeha Yoosufa law-laaa an tufannidoon
12:95: Qaaloo tallaahi innaka lafee dalaalikal qadeem
12:96: Falammaaa an jaaa' albasheeru alqaahu 'alaa wajhihee fartadda baseeran qaala alam aqul lakum inneee a'lamu minal laahi maa laa ta'lamoon
12:97: Qaaloo yaaa-abaanas taghfir lanaa zunoo-banaaa innaa kunnaa khaati'een
12:98: Qaala sawfa astaghfiru lakum Rabbeee innahoo Huwal Ghafoorur Raheem
12:99: Falammaa dakhaloo 'alaa Yoosufa aawaaa ilaihi abayaihi Wa-qaalad khuloo Misra in shaaa' al-laahu aamineen
12:100: Wa-raf'a abawaihi 'alal 'arshi Wa-kharroo lahoo sujjadaa; Wa-qaala yaaa-abati haaza taaweelu ru'yaaya min qablu qad ja'alahaa Rabbee haqqaa; Wa-qad ahsana beee iz akhrajanee minas sijni Wa-jaaa'a bikum minal badwi mim ba'di an nazaghash Shaitaanu bainee Wa-baina ikhwatee; inna Rabbee lateeful limaa yashaaa'; innahoo Huwal 'Aleemul Hakeem
12:101: Rabbi qad aataitanee minal mulki Wa-'allamtanee min taaweelil ahaadees; faati-ras samaawaati wal-ardi Anta waliyyee fid dunyaa wal-Aakhirati tawaffanee muslimanw Wa-alhiqnee bissaaliheen
12:102: Zaalika min ambaaa'il ghaibi nooheehi ilaika Wa-maa kunta ladaihim iz ajma'ooo amrahum Wa-hum yamkuroon
12:103: Wa-maa aksarun naasi Wa-law harasta bimu'mineen
12:104: Wa-maa tas'aluhum 'alaihi min ajr; in huwa illaa zikrul lil'aalameen
12:105: Wa-ka-ayyim min Aayatin fis samaawaati wal-ardi yamurroona 'alaihaa Wa-hum 'anhaa mu'ridoon
12:106: Wa-maa yu'minu aksaru-hum billaahi illaa Wa-hum mushrikoon
12:107: Afa-aminooo an taatiya-hum ghaashiyatum min 'azaabil laahi aw taatiyahumus Saa'atu baghtatanw Wa-hum laa yash'uroon
12:108: Qul haazihee sabeeleee ad'ooo ilal laah; 'alaa baseera-tin ana Wa-manit taba'anee Wa-Subhaanal laahi Wa-maaa ana minal mushrikeen
12:109: Wa-maaa arsalnaa min qablika illaa rijaalan nooheee ilaihim min ahlil quraa; afalam yaseeroo fil ardi fa-yanzuroo kaifa kaana 'aaqibatul lazeena min qablihim; Wa-la-Daarul Aakhirati Khairul lillazeenat taqaw; afalaa ta'qiloon
12:110: Hattaaa izas tai'asar Rusulu Wa-zannooo annahum qad kuziboo jaaa'ahum nas-runaa fanujjiya man nashaaa'u Wa-laa yuraddu baasunna 'anil qawmil mujrimeen
12:111: Laqad kaana fee qasasihim 'ibratul li-ulil albaab; maa kaana hadeesany yuftaraa Wa-laakin tasdeeqal lazee baina yadihi Wa-tafseela kulli shai'inw Wa-hudanw Wa-rahmatal liqawmien yu'minoon
13:1: Alif-Laaam-Meeem-Raa; tilka Aayaatul Kitaab; wallazee unzila ilaika mir Rabbikal haqqu Wa-laakinna aksaran naasi laa yu'minoon
13:2: Allaahul lazee raf'as samaawaati bighairi 'amadin tarawnahaa summas tawaa 'alal 'Arshi Wa-sakhkharash shamsa walqamara kulluny yajree li-ajalim musammaa; yudabbirul amra yufassilil Aayaati la'allakum biliqaaa'i Rabbikum tooqinoon
13:3: Wa-Huwal lazee maddal arda Wa-ja'ala feehaa rawaasiya Wa-anhaaraa; Wa-min kullis samaraati ja'ala feehaa zawjainis naini Yughshil lailan nahaar; inna fee zaalika la-aayaatil liqawmien yatafakkaroon
13:4: Wa-fil ardi qita'um muta-jaawiraatunw Wa-jannaatum min a'naabinw Wa-zar'unw Wa-nakheelun sinwaanunw Wa-ghairu sinwaanien yusqaa bimaaa'inw waahid; Wa-nufaddilu ba'dahaa 'alaa ba'din fil ukul; inna fee zaalika la-aayaatil liqawmien ya'qiloon
13:5: Wa-in ta'jab fa'ajabun qawluhum 'a-izaa kunna turaaban 'a-inna lafee khalqin jadeed; ulaaa-'ikal lazeena kafaroo bi-Rabbihim Wa-ulaaa'ikal aghlaalu feee a'naaqihim Wa-ulaaa'ika As-haabun Naari hum feehaa khaalidoon
13:6: Wa-yasta'jiloonaka bis-saiyi'ati qablal hasanati Wa-qad khalat min qablihimul masulaat; Wa-inna Rabbaka lazoo maghfiratil linnaasi 'alaa zulmihim Wa-inna Rabbaka lashadeedul 'iqaab
13:7: Wa-yaqoolul lazeena kafaroo law-laaa unzila 'alaihi Aayatum mir Rabbih; innamaaa anta munzirunw Wa-likulli qawmin haad
13:8: Allaahu ya'lamu maa tahmilu kullu unsaa Wa-maa tagheedul arhaamu Wa-maa tazdaad, Wa-kullu shai'in 'indahoo bimiqdaar
13:10: Sawaaa'um minkum man asarral qawla Wa-man jahara bihee Wa-man huwa mustakhfim billaili Wa-saaribum binnahaar
13:11: Lahoo mu'aqqibaatum mim baini yadaihi Wa-min khalfihee yahfazoonahoo min amril laah; innal laaha laa yughaiyyiru maa biqawmin hattaa yughaiyiroo maa bianfusihim; Wa-izaaa araadal laahu biqawmin sooo'an falaa maradda lah; Wa-maa lahum min doonihee minw waal
13:12: Huwal lazee yureekumul barqa khawfanw Wa-tama'anw Wa-yunshi'us sahaabas siqaal
13:13: Wa-yusabbihur ra'du bihamdihee walmalaaa'ikatu min kheefatihee Wa-yursilus sawaa'iqa fa-yuseebu bihaa mai yashaaa'u Wa-hum yujaadiloona fil laahi Wa-Huwa shadeedul mihaal
13:14: Lahoo da'watul haqq; wallazeena yad'oona min doonihee laa yastajeeboona lahum bishai'in illaa kabaasiti kaffaihi ilal maaa'i liyablugha faahu Wa-maa huwa bibaalighih; Wa-maa du'aaa'ul kaafireena illaa fee dalaal
13:15: Wa-lillaahi yasjudu man fis samaawaati wal-ardi taw-'anw Wa-karhanw Wa-zilaaluhum bilghuduwwi wal-aasaal
13:16: Qul mar Rabbus samaawaati wal-ard; qulil laah; qul afattakhaztum min dooniheee awliyaaa'a laa yamlikoona li-anfusihim naf'anw Wa-laa darraa; qul hal yastawil a'maa wal-baseeru am hal tastawiz zulumaatu wannoor; am ja'aloo lillaahi shurakaaa'a khalaqoo kakhalqihee fatashaa-bahal khalqu 'alaihim; qulil laahu Khaaliqu kulli shai'inw Wa-Huwal Waahidul Qahhar
13:17: Anzala minas samaaa'i maaa'an fasaalat awdiyatum biqadarihaa fahtamalas sailu zabadar raabiyaa; Wa-mimmmaa yooqidoona 'alaihi fin naarib tighaaa'a bilyatin aw mataa'in zabadum misluh; kazaalika yadribul laahul haqqa wal-baatil; fa-ammaz zabadu fa-yazhabu jufaaa'aa; Wa-ammaa maa yanfa'un naasa fa-yamkusu fil ard; kazaalika yadribul laahul amsaal
13:18: Lillazeenas tajaaboo lirabbihimul husnaa; wallazeena lam yastajeeboo lahoo law anna lahum maa fil ardi jamee'anw Wa-mislahoo ma'ahoo laftadaw bih; ulaaa'ika lahum sooo'ul hisaab; Wa-ma'waahum Jahannamu Wa-bi'sal mihaad
13:19: Afamai ya'lamu annamaaa unzila ilaika mir Rabbikal haqqu kaman huwa a'maa; innamaa yatazakkaru ulul albaab
13:20: Allazeena yoofoona bi'ahdil laahi Wa-laa yanqu-doonal meesaaq
13:21: Wallazeena yasiloona maaa amaral laahu bihee an yoosala Wa-yakhshawna Rabbahum Wa-yakhaafoona sooo'al hisaab
13:22: Wallazeena sabarub tighaaa'a Wajhi Rabbihim Wa-aqaamus Salaata Wa-anfaqoo mimmaa razaqnaahum sirranw Wa-'alaaniyatanw Wa-yadra'oona bilhasanatis saiyi'ata ulaaa'ika lahum 'uqbad daar
13:23: Jannaatu 'adnien yadkhu-loonahaa Wa-man salaha min aabaaa'ihim Wa-azwaajihim Wa-zurriyyaatihim walmalaaa'i-katu yadkhuloona 'alaihim min kulli baab
13:25: Wallazeena yanqudoona 'Ahdal laahi mim ba'di meesaaqihee Wa-yaqta'oona maaa amaral laahu biheee ai yoosala Wa-yufsidoona fil ardi ulaaa'ika lahumul la'natu Wa-lahum sooo'ud daar
13:26: Allaahu yabsutur rizqa limai yashaaa'u Wa-yaqdir; Wa-farihoo bilhayaatid dunyaa Wa-mal hayaatud dunya fil Aakhirati illaa mataa'
13:27: Wa-yaqoolul lazeena kafaroo law-laaa unzila 'alaihi Aayatum mir Rabbih; qul innal laaha yudillu maien yashaa'u Wa-yahdeee ilaihi man anaab
13:28: Allazeena aamanoo Wa-tatma'innu quloobuhum bizikril laah; alaa bizikril laahi tatma'innul quloob
13:29: Allazeena aamanoo Wa-a'amilus saalihaati toobaa lahum Wa-husnu ma-aab
13:30: Kazaalika arsalnaaka feee ummatin qad khalat min qablihaaa umamul litatluwa 'alaihimul lazeee awhainaaa ilaika Wa-hum yakfuroona bir-Rahmaaan; qul Huwa Rabbee laaa ilaaha illaa Huwa 'alaihi tawakkaltu Wa-ilaihi mataab
13:31: Wa-law anna Quraanan suyyirat bihil jibaalu aw qutti'at bihil ardu aw kullima bihil mawtaa; bal lillaahil amru jamee'aa; afalam yai'asil lazeena aamanooo al law yashaaa 'ullaahu lahadan naasa jamee'aa; Wa-laa yazaalul lazeena kafaroo tuseebuhum bimaa sana'oo qaari'atun aw tahullu qareebam min daarihim hatta ya'tiya wa'dul laah; innal laaha laa yukhliful mee'aad
13:32: Wa-laqadis tuhzi'a bi-Rusulim min qablika fa-amlaitu lillazeena kafaroo summa akhaztuhum fakaifa kaana 'iqaab
13:33: Afaman Huwa qaaa'imun 'alaa kulli nafsim bimaa kasabat; Wa-ja'aloo illlaahi shurakaaa'a qul samoohum; am tunabbi'oona-hoo bimaa laa ya'lamu fil ardi; am bizaahirim minal qawl; bal zuyyina lillazeena kafaroo makruhum Wa-suddoo 'anis sabeel; Wa-mai yudlilil laaahu famaa lahoo min haad;
13:34: Lahum 'azaabun fil hayaatid dunyaa Wa-la'azaabul Aakhirati ashaaq, Wa-maa lahum minal laahi min waaq
13:35: Masalul Jannatil latee wu'idal muttaqoona tajree min tahtihal anhaaru ukuluhaa daaa'imunw Wa-zilluhaa; tilka uqbal lazeenat taqaw Wa-'uqbal kafireenan Naar
13:36: Wallazeena aatainaa-humul Kitaaba yafrahoona bimaa unzila ilaika Wa-minal Ahzaabi mai yunkiru ba'dah; qul innamaa umirtu an a'budal laaha Wa-laaa ushrika bih; ilaihi ad'oo Wa-ilaihi maab
13:37: Wa-kazaalika anzalnaahu hukman 'Arabiyyaa; Wa-la'init taba'ta ahwaaa-'ahum ba'da-maa jaaa'aka minal 'ilmi maa laka minal laahi minw waliyinw Wa-laa waaq
13:38: Wa-laqad arsalnaa Rusulam min qablika Wa-ja'alnaa lahum azwaajanw Wa-zurriyyah; Wa-maa kaana lirasoolin aien ya'tiya bi-aayatin illaa bi-iznil laah; likulli ajalin kitaab
13:39: Yamhul laahu maa yashaaa'u Wa-yusbitu Wa-'indahooo ummul Kitaab
13:40: Wa-im maa nurriyannaka ba'dal lazee na'iduhum aw nata-waffayannaka fa-innamaa 'alaikal balaaghu Wa-'alainal hisaab
13:41: Awalam yaraw annaa na'til arda nanqusuhaa min atraafihaa; wallaahu yahkumu laa mu'aqqiba lihukmih; Wa-Huwa saree'ul hisaab
13:42: Wa-qad makaral lazeena min qablihim falillaahil makru jamee'aa; ya'lamu maa taksibu kullu nafs; Wa-sa-ya'lamul kuffaaru liman 'uqbad daar
13:43: Wa-yaqoolul lazeena kafaroo lasta mursalaa; qul kafaa billaahi shaheedam bainee Wa-bainakum Wa-man 'indahoo 'ilmul Kitaab
14:1: Alif-Laaam-Raa; Kitaabun anzalnaahu ilaika litukhrijan naasa minaz zulumaati ilan noori bi-izni Rabbihim ilaa siraatil 'Azeezil Hameed
14:2: Allaahil lazee lahoo maa fis samaawaati Wa-maa fill ard; Wa-wailul lilkaafireena min 'azaabin shadeed
14:3: Allazeena yastahibboo-nal hayaatad dunyaa 'alal aakhirati Wa-yasuddoona 'ansabeelil laahi Wa-yabghoonahaa 'iwajaa; ulaaa 'ika fee dalaalin ba'eed
14:4: Wa-maaa arsalnaa mir Rasoolin illaa bilisaani qawmihee liyubaiyina lahum fa-yudillul laahu mai yashaaa'u Wa-yahdee mai yashaaa'; Wa-Huwal 'Azeezul Hakeem
14:5: Wa-laqad arsalnaa Moosaa bi-Aayaatinaa an akhrij qawmaka minaz zulumaati ilan noori Wa-zak-kirhum bi-ayyaamil laah; inna fee zaalika la-aayaatil likulli sabbaarin shakoor
14:6: Wa-iz qaala Moosaa liqawmihiz kuroo ni'matal laahi 'alaikum iz anjaakum min Aali Fir'awna yasoomoo-nakum sooo'al 'azaabi Wa-yuzabbihoona abnaaa'akum Wa-yastahyoona nisaaa'akum; Wa-fee zaalikum balaaa'un mir Rabbikum 'azeem
14:7: Wa-iz ta-azzana Rabbukum la'in shakartum la-azeedannakum Wa-la'in kafartum inna 'azaabee lashadeed
14:8: Wa-qaala Moosaaa in takfurooo antum Wa-man fil ardi jamee'an fa-innal laaha la-Ghaniyyun Hameed
14:9: Alam ya'tikum naba'ul lazeena min qablikum qawmi Noohinw Wa-'Aadinw Wa-Samood, wallazeena mim ba'dihim; laa ya'lamuhum illallaah; jaaa'at hum Rusuluhum bilbaiyinaati faraddooo aydiyahum feee afwaahihim Wa-qaalooo innaa kafarnaa bimaaa ursiltum bihee Wa-innaa lafee shakkim mimmaa tad'oonanaaa ilaihi mureeb
14:10: Qaalat Rusuluhum afil laahi shakkun faatiris samaawaati wal-ardi yad'ookum liyaghfira lakum min zunoobikum Wa-yu'akhirakum ilaaa ajalin musammaa; qaaloo in antum illaa basharum mislunaa tureedoona an tasuddoonaa 'ammaa kaana ya'budu aabaaa'unaa fa'toonaa bi-sultaanin mubeen
14:11: Qaalat lahum Rusuluhum in nahnu illaa basharum mislukum Wa-laakinnal laaha yamunnu 'alaa maien yashaaa'u min 'ibaadihee Wa-maa kaana lanaaa an na'tiyakum bisul-taanin illaa bi-iznil laah; Wa-'alal laahi falyatawakkalil mu'minoon
14:12: Wa-maa lanaa allaa natawakkala 'alal laahi Wa-qad hadaanaa subulanaa; Wa-lanasbiranna 'alaa maaa aazaitumoonaa; Wa-'alal laahi falyatawakkalil mutawakkiloon
14:13: Wa-qaalal lazeena kafaroo li-Rusulihim lanukhrijanna-kum min aardinaaa aw la-ta'oodunna fee millatinaa fa-awhaaa ilaihim Rabbuhum lanuhlikannaz zaalimeen
14:14: Wa-lanuskinan-nakumul arda min ba'dihim; zaalika liman khaafa maqaamee Wa-khaafa wa'eed
14:16: Minw waraaa'ihee jahannamu Wa-yusqaa min maaa'in sadeed
14:17: Yatajarra'uhoo Wa-laa yakaadu yuseeghuhoo Wa-ya'teehil mawtu min kulli makaaninw Wa-maa huwa bimaiyitinw Wa-minw waraaa'ihee 'azaabun ghaleez
14:18: Masalul lazeena kafaroo bi-Rabbihim; a'maaluhum karamaadinish taddat bihir reehu fee yawmin 'aasifin; laa yaqdiroona mimmaa kasaboo 'alaa shai'; zaalika huwad dalaalul ba'eed
14:19: Alam tara annal laaha khalaqas samaawaati wal-arda bilhaqq; iny yasha yuzhibkum Wa-ya'ti bikhalqin jadeed
14:21: Wa-barazoo lillaahi jamee'an faqaalad du'afaaa'u lil-lazeenas takbarooo innaa kunnaa lakum taba'an fahal antum mughnoona 'annaa min 'azaabil laahi min shai'; qaaloo law hadaanal laahu la-hadaynaakum sawaaa'un 'alainaaa ajazi'naa am sabarnaa maa lanaa min mahees
14:22: Wa-qaalash Shaitaanu lammaa qudiyal amru innal laaha wa'adakum wa'dal haqqi Wa-wa'attukum fa-akhlaftukum Wa-maa kaana liya 'alaikum min sultaanin illaaa an da'awtukum fastajabtum lee falaa taloomoonee Wa-loomooo anfusakum maaa ana bimusrikhikum Wa-maaa antum bimusrikhiyya innee kafartu bimaaa ashraktumooni min qabl; innaz zaalimeena lahum azaabun aleem
14:23: Wa-udkhilal lazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaati Jannaatin tajree min tahtihal anhaaru khaalideena feehaa bi-izni Rabbihim tahiyyatuhum feeha salaam
14:24: Alam tara kaifa darabal laahu masalan kalimatan taiyibatan kashajaratin taiyibatin asluhaa saabitunw Wa-far'uhaa fis samaaa'
14:25: Tu'teee ukulahaa kulla heenim bi-izni Rabbihaa; Wa-yadribul laahul amsaala linnaasi la'allahum yatazak-karoon
14:26: Wa-masalu kalimatin khabeesatin kashajaratin khabee-satinij tussat min fawqil ardi maa lahaa min qaraar
14:27: Yusabbitul laahul lazeena aamanoo bilqawlis saabiti fil hayaatid dunyaa Wa-fil Aakhirati Wa-yudillul laahuz zaalimeen; Wa-yaf'alul laahu maa yashaaa'
14:28: Alam tara ilal lazeena baddaloo ni'matal laahi kufranw Wa-ahalloo qawmahum daaral bawaar
14:30: Wa-ja'aloo lillaahi andaadal liyudilloo 'an sabeelih; qul tamatta'oo fa-innaa maseerakum ilan Naar
14:31: Qul li'ibaadiyal lazeena aamanoo yuqeemus Salaata Wa-yunfiqoo mimmaa razaqnaahum sirranw Wa-'alaaniyatam min qabli any yaatiya Yawmul laa bai'un feehi Wa-laa khilaal
14:32: Allaahul lazee khalaqas samaawaati wal-arda Wa-anzala minas samaaa'i maaa'an faakhraja bihee minas samaraati rizqal lakum Wa-sakhkhara lakumul fulka litajriya fil bahri bi-amrihee Wa-sakhkhara lakumul anhaar
14:33: Wa-sakhkhara lakumush shamsa walqamara daaa'ibaini Wa-sakhkhara lakumul laila wannahaar
14:34: Wa-aataakum min kulli maa sa-altumooh; Wa-in ta'uddoo ni'matal laahi laa tuhsoohaa; innal insaana lazaloo-mun kaffaar
14:35: Wa-iz qaala Ibraaheemu Rabbij 'al haazal balada aaminanw wajnubnee Wa-baniyya an na'budal asnaam
14:36: Rabbi innahunna adlalna kaseeram minan naasi faman tabi'anee fa-innahoo minnee Wa-man 'asaanee fa-innaka Ghafoorur Raheem
14:37: Rabbanaaa inneee askantu min zurriyyatee biwaadin ghairi zee zar'in 'inda Baitikal Muharrami Rabbanaa liyuqeemus Salaata faj'al af'idatam minan naasi tahweee ilaihim warzuqhum minas samaraati la'allahum yashkuroon
14:38: Rabbanaaa innaka ta'lamu maa nukhfee Wa-maa nu'lin; Wa-maa yakhfaa 'alal laahi min shai'in fil ardi Wa-laa fis samaaa'
14:39: Alhamdu lillaahil lazee wahaba lee 'alal kibari Ismaa'eela Wa-Ishaaq; inna Rabbee lasamee'ud du'aaa
14:40: Rabbij 'alnee muqeemas Salaati Wa-min zurriyyatee Rabbanaa Wa-taqabbal du'aaa'
14:41: Rabbanagh fir lee Wa-liwaalidaiya Wa-lilmu'mineena Yawma yaqoomul hisaab
14:42: Wa-laa tahsabannal laaha ghaafilan 'ammaa ya'maluz zaalimoon; innamaa yu'akh-khiruhum li-Yawmin tashkhasu feehil absaar
14:43: Muhti'eena muqni'ee ru'oosihim laa yartaddu ilaihim tarfuhum Wa-af'idatuhum hawaaa'
14:44: Wa-anzirin naasa Yawma yaateehimul 'azaabu fa-yaqoolul lazeena zalamoo Rabbanaaa akhkhirnaaa ilaaa ajalin qareebin nujib da'wataka Wa-nattabi-'ir Rusul; awalam takoonooo aqsamtum min qablu maa lakum min zawaal
14:45: Wa-sakantum fee masaakinil lazeena zalamooo anfusahum Wa-tabaiyana lakum kaifa fa'alnaa bihim Wa-darabnaa lakumul amsaal
14:46: Wa-qad makaroo makrahum Wa-'indal laahi makruhum Wa-in kaana makruhum litazoola minhul jibaal
14:47: Falaa tahsabannal laaha mukhlifa wa'dihee Rusulah; innal laaha 'azeezun zun tiqaam
14:48: Yawma tubaddalul ardu ghairal ardi wassamaawaatu Wa-barazoo lillaahil Waahidil Qahhaar
14:49: Wa-taral mujrimeena Yawma'izim muqarraneena filas faad
14:50: Saraabeeluhum min qatiraaninw Wa-taghshaa wujoohahumun Naar
14:51: Liyajziyal laahu kulla nafsim maa kasabat; innal laaha saree'ul hisaab
14:52: Haaza balaaghul linnaasi Wa-liyunzaroo bihee Wa-liya'lamooo annamaa Huwa Illaahunw Waahidunw Wa-liyaz-zakkara ulul albaab
15:1: Alif-Laaam-Raa; tilka Aayaatul Kitaabi Wa-Qur-aa-nim Mubeen
15:2: Rubamaa yawaddul lazeena kafaroo law kaanoo muslimeen
15:3: Zarhum yaakuloo Wa-yatamatta'oo Wa-yulhihimul amalu fasawfa ya'lamoon
15:4: Wa-maaa ahlaknaa min qaryatin illaa Wa-lahaa kitaabum ma'loom
15:5: Maa tasbiqu min ummatin ajalahaa Wa-maa yastaakhiroon
15:6: Wa-qaaloo yaaa-aiyuhal lazee nuzzila 'alaihiz Zikru innaka lamajnoon
15:7: Law maa taateenaa bil-malaaa'ikati in kunta minas saadiqeen
15:8: Maa nunazzilul malaaa'i-kata illaa bilhaqqi Wa-maa kaanooo izam munzareen
15:9: Innaa Nahnu nazalnaz Zikra Wa-Innaa lahoo lahaa-fizoon
15:10: Wa-laqad arsalnaa min qablika fee shiya'il awwaleen
15:11: Wa-maa yaateehim mir Rasoolin illaa kaanoo bihee yastahzi'oon
15:13: Laa yu'minoona bihee Wa-qad khalat sunnatul awwaleen
15:14: Wa-law fatahnaa 'alaihim baabam minas samaaa'i fazaloo feehi ya'rujoon
15:15: Laqaaloo innamaa sukkirat absaarunaa bal nahnu qawmum mashooroon
15:16: Wa-laqad ja'alnaa fis samaaa'i buroojanw Wa-zaiyannaahaa linnaazireen
15:18: Illaa manis taraqas sam'a fa-atba'ahoo shihaabum mubeen
15:19: Wal-arda madadnaahaa Wa-alqainaa feehaa rawaasiya Wa-ambatnaa feehaa min kulli shai'im mawzoon
15:20: Wa-ja'alnaa lakum feehaa ma'aayisha Wa-mal lastum lahoo biraaziqeen
15:21: Wa-im min shai'in illaa 'indanaa khazaaa-'inuhoo Wa-maa nunazziluhooo illaa biqadarim ma'loom
15:22: Wa-arsalnar riyaaha la-waaqiha fa-anzalnaa minas samaaa'i maaa'an fa-asqai-naakumoohu Wa-maaa antum lahoo bikhaazineen
15:23: Wa-innnaa la-nahnu nuhyee Wa-numeetu Wa-nahnul waarisoon
15:25: Wa-inna Rabbaka Huwa yahshuruhum; innahoo Hakeemun 'Aleem
15:26: Wa-laqad khalaqnal insaana min salsaalim min hama-im masnoon
15:27: Waljaaanna khalaqnaahu min qablu min naaris samoom
15:28: Wa-iz qaala Rabbuka lilmalaaa'-ikati innee khaaliqum basharam min salsaalim min hama-im masnoon
15:29: Fa-izaa sawwaituhoo Wa-nafakhtu feehi mir roohee faqa'oo lahoo saajideen
15:31: Illaaa ibleesa abaaa ai yakoona ma'as saajideen
15:32: Qaala yaaa-Ibleesu maa laka allaa takoona ma'as saajideen
15:33: Qaala lam akul li-asjuda libasharin khalaqtahoo min salsaalim min hama-im masnoon
15:36: Qaala Rabbi fa-anzirneee ilaa Yawmi yub'asoon
15:39: Qaala Rabbi bimaaa aghwaitanee la-uzayyin-anna lahum fil ardi Wa-la-ughwiyan-nahum ajma'een
15:42: Inna 'ibaadee laisa laka 'alaihim sultaanun illaa manit taba'aka minal ghaaween
15:44: Lahaa sab'atu abwaab; likulli baabim minhum juz'um maqsoom
15:47: Wa-naza'naa ma fee sudoorihim min ghillin ikhwaanan 'alaa sururim mutaqaabileen
15:48: Laa yamas-suhum feehaa nasabunw Wa-maa hum minhaa bimukhrajeen
15:52: Iz dakhaloo 'alaihi faqaaloo salaaman qaala innaa minkum wajiloon
15:53: Qaaloo la tawjal innaa nubashshiruka bighulaamin 'aleem
15:54: Qaala abashshartumoonee 'alaaa am massaniyal kibaru fabima tubashshiroon
15:55: Qaaloo bashsharnaaka bilhaqqi falaa takum minal qaaniteen
15:56: Qaala Wa-mai yaqnatu mir rahmati Rabbiheee illad daaaloon
15:58: Qaaloo innaaa ursilnaaa ilaa qawmim mujrimeen
15:59: Illaaa Aala Loot; innaa lamunajjoohum ajma'een
15:60: Illam ra-atahoo qaddarnaaa innahaa laminal ghaabireen
15:63: Qaaloo bal ji'naaka bimaa kaanoo feehi yamtaroon
15:65: Fa-asri bi-ahlika biqit'im minal laili wattabi' adbaarahum Wa-laa yaltafit minkum ahadunw wamdoo haisu tu'maroon
15:66: Wa-qadainaaa ilaihi zaalikal amra anna daabira haaa'ulaaa'i maqtoo'um musbiheen
15:68: Qaala inna haaa'ulaaa'i daifee falaa tafdahoon
15:71: Qaala haaa'ulaaa'i banaateee in kuntum faa'ileen
15:74: Faja'alnaa 'aaliyahaa saafilahaa Wa-amtamaa 'alaihim hijaaratam min sijjeel
15:82: Wa-kaanoo yanhitoona minal jibaali buyootan aamineen
15:85: Wa-maa khalaqnas samaawaati wal-arda Wa-maa bainahumaaa illaa bilhaqq; Wa-innas Saa'ata la-aatiyatun fasfahis safhal jameel
15:87: Wa-laqad aatainaaka sab'am minal masaanee wal-Qur-aanal 'Azeem
15:88: Laa tamuddanna 'ainaika ilaa maa matta-'naa biheee azwaajam minhum Wa-laa tahzan 'alaihim wakhfid janaahaka lilmu-'mineen
15:94: Fasda' bimaa tu'maru Wa-a'rid anil mushrikeen
15:96: Allazeena yaj'aloona ma'al laahi ilaahan aakhar; fasawfa ya'lamoon
15:97: Wa-laqad na'lamu annaka yadeequ sadruka bimaa yaqooloon
15:98: Fasbbih bihamdi Rabbika Wa-kum minas saajideen
16:1: Ataaa amrul laahi falaa tasta'jilooh; Subhaanahoo Wa-Ta'aalaa 'ammaa yushrikoon
16:2: Yunazzilul malaaa-'ikata birroohi min amrihee 'alaa mai yashaaa'u min 'ibaadiheee an anzirooo annahoo laaa ilaaha illaaa ana fattaqoon
16:3: Khalaqas samaawaati wal-arda bilhaqq; Ta'aalaa 'ammaa yushrikoon
16:4: Khalaqal insaana min nutfatin fa-izaa huwa khaseemum mubeen
16:5: Wal-an-'amaa khalaqahaa; lakum feehaa dif'unw Wa-manaafi'u Wa-minhaa taakuloon
16:6: Wa-lakum feehaa jamaalun heena tureehoona Wa-heena tasrahoon
16:7: Wa-tahmilu asqaalakum ilaa baladil lam takoonoo baaligheehi illaa bishiqqil anfus; inna Rabbakum la-Ra'oofur Raheem
16:8: Walkhaila wal-bighaala wal-hameera litarkaboohaa Wa-zeenah; Wa-yakhluqu maa laa ta'lamoon
16:9: Wa-'alal laahi qasdus sabeeli Wa-minhaa jaaa'ir; Wa-law shaaa'a lahadaakum ajma'een
16:10: Huwal lazeee anzala minas samaaa'i maaa'al lakum minhu sharaabunw Wa-minhu shajarun feehi tuseemoon
16:11: Yumbitu lakum bihiz zar'a wazzaitoona wanna-kheela wal-a'naaba Wa-min kullis samaraat, inna fee zaalika la-Aayatal liqawminy yatafakkaroon
16:12: Wa-sakkhkhara lakumul laila wannahaara wash-shamsa walqamara wannujoomu musakhkharaatum bi-amrih; inna fee zaalika la-Aayaatil liqawminy ya'qiloon
16:13: Wa-maa zara-a lakum fil ardi mukhtalifan alwaanuh; inna fee zaalika la-Aayatal liqawminy yazakkaroon
16:14: Wa-Huwal lazee sakhkharal bahra litaakuloo minhu lahman tariyyanw Wa-tastakhrijoo minhu hilyatan talbasoonahaa Wa-taral fulka mawaakhira feehi Wa-litabtaghoo min fadlihee Wa-la'allakum tashkuroon
16:15: Wa-alqaa fil ardi rawaasiya an tameeda bikum Wa-anhaaranw Wa-sublulal la-'allakum tahtadoon
16:17: Afamany yakhluqu kamal laa yakhluq; afalaa tazak-karoon
16:18: Wa-in ta'uddoo ni'matal laahi laa tuhsoohaa; innal laaha la-Ghafoorur Raheem
16:19: Wallaahu ya'lamu maa tusirroona Wa-maa tu'linoon
16:20: Wallazeena yad'oona min doonil laahi laa yakhluqoona shai'anw Wa-hum yukhlaqoon
16:21: Amwaatun ghairu ahyaaa'inw Wa-maa yash'uroona aiyaana yub'asoon
16:22: Illahukum Ilaahunw Waahid; fallazeena laa yu'minoona bil-Aakhirati quloobuhum munkiratunw Wa-hum mustakbiroon
16:23: Laa jarama annal laaha ya'lamu maa yusirrona Wa-ma yu'linoon; innahoo laa yuhibbul mustakbireen
16:24: Wa-izaa qeela lahum maazaaa anzala Rabbukum qaaloo asaateerul awwaleen
16:25: Liyahmilooo awzaarahum kaamilatany Yawmal Qiyaamati Wa-min awzaaril lazeena yudilloonahum bighairi 'ilm; alaa saaa'a maa yaziroon
16:26: Qad makaral lazeena min qablihim fa-atal laahu bunyaa-nahum minal qawaa'idi fakharra 'alaihimus saqfu min fawqihim Wa-ataahumul 'azaabu min haisu laa yash'uroon
16:27: Summa Yawmal Qiyaamati yukhzeehim Wa-yaqoolu aina shurakaaa'iyal lazeena kuntum tushaaaqqoona feehim; qaalal lazeena ootul 'ilma innal khizyal Yawma wassooo'a 'alal kaafireen
16:28: Allazeena tatawaf-faahu-mul malaaa'ikatu zaalimeee anfusihim fa-alqawus salama maa kunnaa na'malu min sooo'; balaaa innal laaha 'aleemum bimaa kuntum ta'maloon
16:29: Fadkhulooo abwaaba jahannama khaalideena feeha falabi'sa maswal mutakab-bireen
16:30: Wa-qeela lillazeenat taqaw maazaaa anzala Rabbukum; qaaloo khairaa; lillazeena ahsanoo fee haazihid dunyaa hasanah; Wa-la-Daarul Aakhirati khair; Wa-lani'ma daarul muttaqeen
16:31: Jannaatu 'Adniny yadkhuloonahaa tajree min tahtihal anhaaru lahum feehaa maa yashaaa'oon; kazaalika yajzil laahul muttaqeen
16:32: Allazeena tatawaf-faahumul malaaa'ikatu taiyibeena yaqooloona salaamun 'alai-kumud khulul Jannata bimaa kuntum ta'maloon
16:33: Hal yanzuroona illaaa an taatiyahumul malaaa'ikatu aw yaatiya amru Rabbik; kazaalika fa'alal lazeena min qablihim; Wa-maa zalamahumul laahu Wa-laakin kaanoo anfusahum yazlimoon
16:34: Fa-asaabahum saiyi-aatu maa 'amiloo Wa-haaqa bihim maa kaano bihee yastahzi'oon
16:35: Wa-qaalal lazeena ashrakoo law shaaa'al laahu ma 'abadnaa min doonihee min shai'in nahnu Wa-laaa aabaaa'unaa Wa-laa harramnaa min doonihee min shai'; kazaalika fa'alal lazeena min qablihim fahal 'alar Rusuli illal balaaghul mubeen
16:36: Wa-laqad ba'asnaa fee kulli ummatir Rasoolan ani' budul laaha wajtanibut Taaghoota faminhum man hadal laahu Wa-minhum man haqqat 'alaihid dalaalah; faseeroo fil ardi fanzuroo kaifa kaana 'aaqibatul mukazzibeen
16:37: In tahris 'alaa hudaahum fa-innal laaha laa yahdee mai yudillu Wa-maa lahum min naasireen
16:38: Wa-aqsamoo billaahi jahda aimaanihim laa yab'asul laahu mai yamoot; balaa wa'dan 'alaihi haqqanw Wa-laakinna aksaran naasi laa ya'lamoon
16:39: Liyubaiyina lahumul lazee yakhtalifoona feehi Wa-liya'lamal lazeena kafarooo annahum kaanoo kaazibeen
16:40: Innamaa qawlunaa lishay'in izaa aradnaahu an naqoola lahoo kun fa-yakoon
16:41: Wallazeena haajaroo fil laahi mim ba'di maa zulimoo lanubawwi'-annahum fid dunyaa hasanatanw Wa-la-ajrul Aakhirati akbar; law kaanoo ya'lamoon
16:43: Wa-maaa arsalnaa min qablika illaa rijaalan nooheee ilaihim; fas'alooo ahlaz zikri in kuntum laa ta'lamoon
16:44: Bilbaiyinaati waz-Zubur; Wa-anzalnaaa ilaikaz Zikra litubaiyina linnaasi maa nuzzila ilaihim Wa-la'allahum yatafakkaroon
16:45: Afa-aminal lazeena makarus saiyi-aati ai yakhsifal laahu bihimul arda aw yaaa-tiyahumul 'azaabu min haisu laa yash'uroon
16:46: Aw yaakhuzahum fee taqallubihim famaa hum bi-mu'jizeen
16:47: Aw yaakhuzahum 'alaa takhawwuf; fa-inna Rabbakum la-Ra'oofur Raheem
16:48: Awa-lam yaraw ilaa maa khalaqal laahu min shai'iny yatafaiya'u zilaaluhoo 'anil yameeni washshamaaa'-ili sujjadal lillaahi Wa-hum daakhiroon
16:49: Wa-lillaahi yasjudu maa fis samaawaati Wa-maa fil ardi min daaabbatinw walma-laaa'ikatu Wa-hum laa yastakbiroon
16:50: yakhaafoona Rabbahum min fawqihim Wa-yaf'aloona maa yu'maroon
16:51: Wa-qaalal laahu laa tatta-khizooo ilaahainis naini innamaa Huwa Ilaahunw Waahid; fa-iyyaaya farhaboon
16:52: Wa-lahoo maa fis samaawaati wal-ardi Wa-lahud deenu waasibaa; afaghairal laahi tattaqoon
16:53: Wa-maa bikum min ni'matin faminal laahi summa izaa massakumud durru fa-ilaihi taj'aroon
16:54: Summaa izaa kashafad durra 'ankum izaa fareequm minkum bi-Rabbihim yushrikoon
16:55: Liyakfuroo bimaa aatainaahum; fatamatta'oo, faswfa ta'lamoon
16:56: Wa-yaj'aloona limaa laa ya'lamoona naseebam mimmaa razaqnnaahum; tallaahi latus'alunaa 'ammaa kuntum taftaroon
16:57: Wa-yaj'aloona lillaahil banaati Subhaanahoo Wa-lahum maa yashtahoon
16:58: Wa-izaa bushshira ahaduhum bil-unsaa zalla wajhuhoo muswaddanw Wa-huwa kazeem
16:59: yatawaaraa minal qawmi min sooo'i maa bushshira bih; a-yumsikuhoo 'alaa hoonin am yadussuhoo fit turaab; alaa saaa'a maa yahkumoon
16:60: Lillazeena laa yu'minoona bil-Aakhirati masalus saw'i Wa-lillaahil masalul a'laa; Wa-Huwal 'Azeezul Hakeem
16:61: Wa-law yu'aakhizul laahun naasa bizulminhim maa taraka 'alaihaa min daaabbatinw Wa-laakiny yu'akhkhiruhum ilaaa ajalim musamman fa-izaa jaaa'a ajaluhum laa yastaakhiroona saa'atanw Wa-laa yastaqdimoon
16:62: Wa-yaj'aloona lillaahi maa yakrahoona Wa-tasifu alsinatuhumul kaziba anna lahumul husnaa laa jarama anna lahumun Naara Wa-annahum mufratoon
16:63: Tallaahi laqad arsalnaaa ilaaa umamim min qablika fazayyana lahumush Shaitaanu a'maalahum fahuwa waliyyuhumul yawma Wa-lahum 'azaabun aleem
16:64: Wa-maaa anzalnaa 'alaikal Kitaaba illaa litubaiyina lahumul lazikh talafoo feehi Wa-hudanw Wa-rahmatal liqawminy yu'minoon
16:65: Wallaahu anzala minas samaaa'i maaa'an fa-ahyaa bihil arda ba'da mawtihaa; inna fee zaalika la-aayatal liqaw-miny yasma'oon
16:66: Wa-inna lakum fil an'aami la'ibrah; nusqeekum mimmmaa fee butoonihee mim baini farsinw Wa-damil labanann khaalisan saaa'ighallish shaaribeen
16:67: Wa-min samaraatin nakheeli wal-a'nnaabi tattakhizoona minhu sakaranw Wa-rizqann hasanaa; inna fee zaalika la-Aayatal liqawmien ya'qiloon
16:68: Wa-awhaa Rabbuka ilan nahli anit takhizee minal jabaali buyootanw Wa-minash shajari Wa-mimmaa ya'rishoon
16:69: Summma kulee min kullis samaraati faslukee subula Rabbiki zululaa; yakhruju mim butoonihaa sharaabum mukh-talifun alwaanuhoo feehi shifaaa'ul linnaas, innna fee zaalika la-Aayatal liqawmien yatafakkaroon
16:70: Wallaahu khalaqakum suma tatawaffaakum; Wa-minkum maien yuradu ilaaa arzalil 'umuri likai laa ya'lama ba'da 'ilmin shai'aa; innal laaha 'Aleemun Qadeer
16:71: Wallaahu faddala ba'dakum 'alaa ba'din fir rizq; famal lazeena fuddiloo biraaaddee rizqihim 'alaa maa malakat aimaanuhum fahum feehi sawaaa'; afabini'matil laahi yajhadoon
16:72: Wallaahu ja'ala lakum min anfusikum azwaajanw Wa-ja'ala lakum min azwaajikum baneena Wa-hafadatanw Wa-razaqakum minat taiyyibaat; afabil-baatili yu'minoona Wa-bini'matil laahi hum yakkfuroon
16:73: Wa-ya'budoona min doonil laahi maa laa yamliku lahum rizqam minas samaawaati wal-ardi shai'anw Wa-laa yastatee'oon
16:74: Falaa tadriboo lillaahil amsaal; innal laaha ya'lamu Wa-antum laa ta'lamoon
16:75: Darabal laahu masalan 'abdam mammlookal laa yaqdiru 'alaa shai'inw Wa-mar razaqnaahu mminnaa rizqan hasanan fahuwa yunfiqu minhu sirranw Wa-jahra; hal yasta-woon; alhamdu lillaah; bal aksaruhum laa ya'lamoon
16:76: Wa-darabal laahu masalar rajulaini ahaduhumaaa abkamu laa yaqdiru 'alaa shai'inw Wa-huwa kallun 'alaa mawlaahu ainamaa yuwajjihhu laa yaati bikhairin hal yastawee huwa Wa-maien yaamuru bil'adli Wa-huwa 'alaa Siraatim Mustaqeem
16:77: Wa-lillaahi ghaibus samaawaati wal-ard; Wa-maaa amrus Saa'ati illaa kalamhil basari aw huwa aqrab; innal laaha 'alaaa kulli shai'in Qadeer
16:78: Wallaahu akhrajakum mim butooni ummahaatikum laa ta'lamoona shai'anw Wa-ja'ala lakumus sam'a wal-absaara wal-af'idata la'allakum tashkuroon
16:79: Alam yaraw ilat tairi musakhkharaatin fee jawwis samaaa'i maa yumsikuhunna illal laah; inna fee zaalika la-Aayaatil liqawminy yu'minoon
16:80: Wallaahu ja'ala lakum mim buyootikum sakananw Wa-ja'ala lakum min juloodil an'aami buyootan tastakhif-foonahaa yawma za'nikum Wa-yawma iqaamatikum Wa-min aswaafihaa Wa-awbaarihaa Wa-ash'aarihaaa asaasanw Wa-mataa'an ilaa heen
16:81: Wallaahu ja'ala lakum mimmaa khalaqa zilaalanw Wa-ja'ala lakum minal jibaali aknaananw Wa-ja'ala lakum saraabeela taqeekumul harra Wa-saraabeela taqeekum baasakum; kazaalika yutimmu ni'matahoo alaikum la'allakum tuslimoon
16:83: Ya'rifoona ni'matal laahi summa yunkiroonahaa Wa-aksaruhumul kaafiroon
16:84: Wa-yawma nab'asu min kulli ummatin shaheedan summa laa yu'zanu lillazeena kafaroo Wa-laa hum yusta'taboon
16:85: Wa-izaa ra al-lazeena zalamul 'azaaba falaa yukhaf-fafu 'anhum Wa-laa hum yunzaroon
16:86: Wa-izaa ra al-lazeena ashrakoo shurakaaa'ahum qaaloo Rabbana haaa'ulaaa'i shurakaaa'unal lazeena kunnaa nad'oo min doonika fa-alqaw ilaihimul qawla innakum lakaaziboon
16:87: Wa-alqaw ilal laahi yawma'izinis salama Wa-dalla 'anhum maa kaanoo yaftaroon
16:88: Allazeena kafaroo Wa-saddoo 'an sabeelil laahi zidnaahum 'azaaban fawqal 'azaabi bimaa kaanoo yufsidoon
16:89: Wa-yawma nab'asu fee kulli ummmatin shaheedan 'alaihim min anfusihim Wa-ji'naa bika shaheedan 'alaa haaa'ulaaa'; Wa-nazzalnaa 'alaikal Kitaaba tibyaanal likulli shai'inw Wa-hudanw Wa-rahmatanw Wa-bushraa lilmuslimeen
16:90: Innal laaha ya'muru bil-'adli wal-ihsaani Wa-eetaaa'i zil qurbaa Wa-yanhaa 'anil fahshaaa'i wal-munkari walbagh-i' ya'izukum la'allakum tazakkaroon
16:91: Wa-awfoo bi-Ahdil laahi izaa 'aahattum Wa-laa tanqudul aimaana ba'da tawkeedihaa Wa-qad ja'altumul laaha 'alaikum kafeelaa; innal laaha ya'lamu maa taf'aloon
16:92: Wa-laa takoonoo kallatee naqadat ghazlahaa mim ba'di quwwatin ankaasaa; tattakhizoona aimaanakum dakhlalam bainakum an takoona ummatun hiya arbaa min ummah; innnamaa yablookumul laahu bih; Wa-la-yubaiyyinanna lakum yawmal Qiyaamati maa kuntum feehi takhtalifoon
16:93: Wa-law shaaa'al laahu laja'alakum ummmatanw waahidatanw Wa-laakien yudillu maien yashaaa'u Wa-yahdee maien yashaaa'; Wa-latus'alunna 'ammaa kuntum ta'maloon
16:94: Wa-laa tattakhizooo aimaanakum dakhalam bainakum fatazilla qadamum ba'da subootihaa Wa-tazooqus sooo'a bimmaa sadattum 'an sabeelil laahi Wa-lakum 'azaabun 'azeem
16:95: Wa-laa tashtaroo bi-'ahdil laahi samanan qaleelaa; innamaa 'indal laahi huwa khairul lakum in kuntum ta'lamoon
16:96: maa 'indakum yanfadu Wa-maa 'indal laahi baaq; Wa-lanajziyannal lazeena sabarooo ajjrahum bi-ahsani maa kaanoo ya'maloon
16:97: Man 'amila saaliham min zakarin aw unsaa Wa-huwa mu'minun falanuhyiyannahoo hayaatan taiiyibatanw Wa-lanajzi-yannnahum ajrahum bi-ahsani maa kaanoo ya'maloon
16:98: Fa-izaa qara-tal Quraana fasta'iz billaahi minashh Shai-taanir rajeem
16:99: Innahoo laisa lahoo sultaanun 'alal lazeena aamanoo Wa-'alaa Rabbihim yatawakkaloon
16:100: Innnamaa sultaanuhoo 'alal lazeena yatawallawnahoo wallazeena hum bihee mushrikoon
16:101: Wa-izaa baddalnaaa Aayatam makaana Aayatinw wal-laahu a'lamu bimaa yunazzilu qaalooo innamaa anta muftar; bal aksaruhum laa ya'lamoon
16:102: Qul nazzalahoo Roohul Qudusi mir Rabbika bilhaqqi liyusabbital lazeena aamanoo Wa-hudanw Wa-bushraa lilmuslimeen
16:103: Wa-laqad na'lamu annahum yaqooloona innamaa yu'allimuhoo bashar; lisaanul lazee yulhidoona ilaihi a'ja-miyyunw Wa-haaza lisaanun 'Arabiyyum mubeen
16:104: Innal lazeena laa yu'minoona bi-Aayaatil laahi laa yahdehimul laahu Wa-lahum 'azaabun aleem
16:105: Innamaa yaftaril kazibal lazeena laa yu'minoona bi-Aayaatil laahi Wa-ulaaa'ika humul kaaziboon
16:106: Man kafara billaahi mim ba'di eemaanihee illaa man ukriha Wa-qalbuhoo mutmma'innum bil-eemaani Wa-laakim man sharaha bilkufri sadran fa'alaihim ghadabum minal laahi Wa-lahum 'azaabun 'azeem
16:107: Zaalika bi-annahumus tahabbul hayaatad dunyaa 'alal Aakhirati Wa-annal laaha laa yahdil qawmal kaafireen
16:108: Ulaaa'ikal lazeena taba'al laahu 'alaa quloobihim Wa-sam'ihim Wa-absaarihim Wa-ulaaa'ika humul ghaafiloon
16:109: Laa jarama annnahum fil Aakhirati humul khassiroon
16:110: Summa inna Rabbaka lillazeena haajaroo mim ba'dimaa futinoo summma jaahadoo Wa-sabaroo inna Rabbaka mim ba'dihaa la Ghafoorur Raheem
16:111: Yawma taatee kullu nafsin tujaadilu 'an nafsihaa Wa-tuwaffaa kullu nafsim maa 'amilat Wa-hum laa yuzlamoon
16:112: Wa-darabal laahu masalan qaryatan kaanat aaminatam mutma'innataien yaaateehaa rizquhaa raghadam min kulli makaanin fakafarat bi-an'umil laahi fa-azaaqahal laahu libaasal joo'i walkhawfi bimaa kaanoo yasna'oon
16:113: Wa-laqad jaaa'ahum Rasoolum minhum fakazzaboohu fa-akhazahumul 'azaabu Wa-hum zaalimoon
16:114: Fakuloo mimmaa razaqa-kumul laahu halaalan taiyyibanw washkuroo ni'matal laahi in kuntum iyyaahu ta'budoon
16:115: Innamaa harama 'alai-kumul maitata waddama Wa-lahmal khinzeeri Wa-maaa uhilla lighairil laahi bihee famanid turra ghaira baaghinw Wa-laa 'aadin fa-innal laaha Ghafoorur Raheem
16:116: Wa-laa taqooloo limaa tasifu alsinatukumul kaziba haaza halaalunw Wa-haazaa haraamul litaftaroo 'alal laahil kazib; innal lazeena yaftaroona 'alal laahil kaziba laa yuflihoon
16:118: Wa-'alal lazeena haadoo harramnaa ma qasasnaa 'alaika min qablu Wa-maa zalamanaahum Wa-laakin kaanoo anfusahum yazlimoon
16:119: Summma inna Rabbaka lillazeena 'amilus sooo'a bijahaalatin summa taaboo mim ba'di zaaalika Wa-aslahoo inna Rabbaka mim ba'dihaa la-Ghafoorur Raheem
16:120: Inna Ibraaheema kaana ummatan qaanital lillaahi Haneefanw Wa-lam yaku minal mushrikeen
16:121: Shaakiral li-an'umih; ijtabaahu Wa-hadaahu ilaa Siraatim Mustaqeem
16:122: Wa-aatainaahu fid dunyaa hasanah; Wa-innahoo fil Aakhirati laminas saaliheen
16:123: Summma awhainaa ilaika anit tabi' Millata Ibraaheema haneefaa; Wa-maa kaana minal mushrikeen
16:124: Innnamaa ju'ilas Sabtu 'alal lazeenakhtalafoo feeh; Wa-inna Rabbaka la yahkumu bainahum Yawmal Qiyaamati feemaa kaanoo feehi yakhtalifoon
16:125: Ud'u ilaa sabeeli Rabbika bilhikmati walmaw-'izatil hasanati Wa-jaadilhum billatee hiya ahsan; inna Rabbaka huwa a'almu biman dalla 'an sabeelihee Wa-Huwa a'lamu bilmuhtadeen
16:126: Wa-in 'aaqabtum fa'aaqiboo bimisli maa 'ooqibtum bihee Wa-la'in sabartum lahuwa khairul lissaabireen
16:127: Wasbir Wa-maa sabruka illaa billaah; Wa-laa tahzan 'alaihim Wa-laa taku fee daiqim mimmaa yamkuroon
16:128: Innal laaha ma'al lazeenat taqaw wal-lazeena hum muhsinoon
17:1: Subhaanal lazeee asraa bi'abdihee lailam minal Masjidil Haraami ilal Masjidil Aqsal lazee baaraknaa haw-lahoo linuriyahoo min aayaatinaa; innahoo Huwas Samee'ul Baseer
17:2: Wa-aatainaa Moosal Kitaaba Wa-ja'alnaahu hudal liBaneee Israaa'eel; allaa tat-takhizoo min doonee wakeelaa.
17:3: Zurriyyata man hamalnaa ma'a Nooh innahoo kaana 'abdan shakooraa
17:4: Wa qadainaaa ilaa Baneee Israaa'eela fil Kitaabi latufsidunna fil ardi marratain; Wa-lata'lunna'uluwwan kabeeraa
17:5: Fa-izaa jaaa'a wa'du oolaahumaa ba'asnaaa 'alykum 'ibaadal lanaaa ulee baasin shadeedin fajaasoo khilaalad diyaar; Wa-kaana wa'dam maf'oolaa
17:6: Summa radadnaa lakumul karrata 'alaihim Wa-amdad-naakum-bi amwaalinuw Wa-baneen; Wa-ja'alnaakum aksara nafeeraa
17:7: In ahsantum ahsantum li-anfusikum Wa-in asaatum falahaa; fa-izaa jaaa'a wa'dul aakhirati liyasooo'oo wujoo-hakum Wa-liyadkhulul masjida kamaa dakhaloohu awwala marratinw Wa-liyutabbiroo maa a'law tatbeera
17:8: Asaa rabbukum aien yarhamakum; Wa-in 'uttum 'udnaa; Wa-ja'alnaa jahannama lilkaafireena haseera
17:9: Inna haazal Quraana yahdee lillatee hiya aqwamu Wa-yubashshirul mu'mineenal lazeena ya'maloonas saalihaati anna lahum ajran kabeeraa
17:10: Wa-annal lazeena laa yu'minoona bil-aakhirati a'tadnaa lahum 'azaaban aleemaa
17:11: Wa-yad'ul insaanu bishsharri du'aaa-'ahoo bilkhayr; Wa-kaanal insaanu 'ajoola
17:12: Wa-ja'alnal laila wannahaara Aayatayni famahawnaaa Aayatal laili Wa-ja'alnaaa Aayatan nahaari mubsiratal litabtaghoo fadlam mir Rabbikum Wa-lita'lamoo 'adadas sineena walhisaab; Wa-kulla shai'in fassalnaahu tafseelaa
17:13: Wa-kulla insaanin alzamnaahu taaa'irahoo fee 'unuqihee Wa-nukhriji lahoo Yawmal Qiyaamati kitaabany yalqaahu manshooraa
17:14: Iqra kitaabaka kafaa bi-nafsikal Yawma 'alaika haseebaa
17:15: Manih tadaa fa-innamaa yahtadee linafsihee Wa-man dalla fa-innamaa yadillu 'alaihaa; Wa-laa taziru waaziratunw wizra ukhraa; Wa-maa kunnaa mu'azzibeena hatta nab'asa Rasoola
17:16: Wa-izaaa aradnaaa an nuhlika qaryatan amarnaa mutrafeehaa fafasaqoo feehaa fahaqqa 'alaihal qawlu fadammarnaahaa tadmeeraa
17:17: Wa-kam ahlaknaa minal qurooni min ba'di Nooh; Wa-kafaa bi-Rabbika bizunoobi 'ibaadihee Khabeeram Baseeraa
17:18: Man kaana yureedul 'aajilata 'ajjalnaa lahoo feehaa maa nashaaa'u liman nureedu summa ja'alnaa lahoo Jahannama yaslaahaa mazmoomammad hooraa
17:19: Wa-man araadal Aakhirata Wa-sa'aa lahaa sa'yahaa Wa-huwa mu'minun fa-ulaaa'ika kaana sa'yuhum mashkooraa
17:20: Kullan numiddu haaa-'ulaaa'i Wa-haaa'ulaaa'i min 'ataaa'i rabbik; Wa-maa kaana 'ataaa'u rabbika mahzooraa
17:21: Unzur kaifa faddalnaa ba'dahum 'alaa ba'd; Wa-lal-Aakhiratu akbaru darajaatinw Wa-akbaru tafdeelaa
17:22: Laa taj'al ma'al laahi ilaahan aakhara fataq'uda mazoomam makhzoolaa
17:23: Wa qadaa Rabbuka allaa ta'budooo illaaa iyyaahu Wa-bilwaalidaini ihsaanaa; immaa yablughanna 'indakal kibara ahaduhumaaa aw kilaahumaa falaa taqul lahumaaa uffinw Wa-laa tanharhumaa Wa-qullahumaa qawlan kareemaa
17:24: Wakhfid lahumaa janaahaz zulli minar rahmati Wa-qur Rabbir hamhumaa kamaa rabbayaanee sagheera
17:25: Rabbukum a'lamu bimaa fee nufoosikum; in takoonoo saaliheena fa-innahoo kaana lil-awwaabeena Ghafoooraa
17:26: Wa-aati zal qurbaa haqqahoo walmiskeena wabnas sabeeli Wa-laa tubazzir tabzeeraa
17:27: Innal mubazzireena kaanoo ikhwaanash shayaateeni Wa-kaanash shaytaanu li-Rabbihee kafooraa
17:28: Wa-immaa tu'ridanna 'anhum ubtighaaa'a rahmatim mir rabbika tarjoohaa faqul lahum qawlam maisooraa
17:29: Wa-laa taj'al yadaka maghloolatan ilaa 'unuqika Wa-laa tabsut-haa kullal basti fataq'uda maloomam mahsooraa
17:30: Inna Rabbaka yabsutur rizqa limaien yashaaa'u Wa-yaqdir; innahoo kaana bi'ibaadihee Khabeeran Baseera
17:31: Wa-laa taqtulooo awlaadakum khashyata imlaaqin nahnu narzuquhum Wa-iyyaakum; inna qatlahum kaana khit-'an kabeeraa
17:32: Wa-laa taqrabuz zinaaa innahoo kaana faahishatanw Wa-saaa'a sabeelaa
17:33: Wa-laa taqtulun nafsal latee harramal laahu illaa bilhaqq; Wa-man qutila mazlooman faqad ja'alnaa liwaliyyihee sultaanan falaa yusrif fil qatli innahoo kaana mansooraa
17:34: Wa-laa taqraboo maalal yateemi illaa billatee hiya ahsanu hattaa yablugha ashuddah; Wa-awfoo bil'ahd, innal 'ahda kaana mas'oolaa
17:35: Wa-awful kaila izaa kiltum Wa-zinoo bilqistaasil mustaqeem; zaalika khairunw Wa-ahsanu ta'weelaa
17:36: Wa-laa taqfu maa laisa laka bihee 'ilm; innas sam'a walbasara walfu'aada kullu ulaaa'ika kaana 'anhu mas'oolaa
17:37: Wa-laa tamshi fil ardi marahan innaka lan takhriqal arda Wa-lan tablughal jibaala toola
17:38: Kullu zaalika kaana sayyi'uhoo inda Rabbika makroohaa
17:39: Zaalika mimmaaa awhaaa ilaika Rabbuka minal hikmah; Wa-laa taj'al ma'al laahi ilaahan aakhara fatulqaa fee Jahannama maloomammad hooraa
17:40: Afa-asfaakum rabbukum bilbaneena wattakhaza minal malaaa'ikati inaasaa; innakum lataqooloona qawlan 'azeema
17:41: Wa-laqad sarrafnaa fee haazal Quraani liyazzakkaroo Wa-maa yazeeduhum illaa nufooraa
17:42: Qul law kaana ma'ahooo aalihatun kamaa yaqooloona izal labtaghaw ilaa zil 'Arshi Sabeela
17:44: Tusabbihu lahus samaawaatus sab'u wal-ardu Wa-man feehinn; Wa-im min shai'in illaa yusabbihu bihamdihee Wa-laakil laa tafqahoona tasbeehahum; innahoo kaana Haleeman Ghafooraa
17:45: Wa-izaa qara'-tal Quraana ja'alnaa bainaka Wa-bainal lazeena laa yu'minoona bil-aakhirati hijaabam mastooraa
17:46: Wa-ja'alnaa 'alaa quloo-bihim akinnatan any yafqahoohu Wa-feee aazaanihim waqraa; Wa-izaa zakarta Rabbaka fil Quraani wahdahoo wallaw 'alaaa adbaarihim nufooraa
17:47: Nahnu a'lamu bimaa yastami'oona biheee iz yastami'oona ilaika Wa-iz hum najwaaa iz yaqooluz zaalimoona in tattabi'oona illaa rajulam mas-hooraa
17:48: Unzur kaifa daraboo lakal amsaala fadalloo falaa yastatee'oona sabeelaa
17:49: Wa-qaalooo 'a-izaa kunnaa 'izaamanw Wa-rufaatan 'a-innaa lamab'oosoona khalqan jadeedaa
17:51: Aw khalqam mimmaa yakburu fee sudoorikum; fasa-yaqooloona maien yu'eedunaa qulil lazee fatarakum awwala marrah; fasa yunghidoona ilaika ru'oosahum Wa-yaqooloona mataahoo; qul 'asaaa any yakoona qareeba
17:52: Yawma yad'ookum fatastajeeboona bihamdihee Wa-tazunnoona il labistum illaa qaleela
17:53: Wa-qul li'ibaadee yaqoolul latee hiya ahsan; innash shaitaana yanzaghu bainahum; innash shaitaana kaana lil-insaani 'aduwwam mubeenaa
17:54: Rabbukum a'lamu bikum iny yasha' yarhamkum aw iny yasha' yu'azzibkum; Wa-maaa arsalnaaka 'alaihim wakeelaa
17:55: Wa-Rabbuka a'lamu biman fis samaawaati wal-ard; Wa-laqad faddalnaa ba'dan Nabiyyeena 'alaa ba'dinw Wa-aatainaaa Daawooda Zabooraa
17:56: Qulid 'ul lazeena za'amtum min doonihee falaa yamlikoona kashfad durri 'ankum Wa-laa tahweelaa
17:57: Ulaaa'ikal lazeena yad'oona yabtaghoona ilaa Rabbihimul waseelata ayyuhum aqrabu Wa-yarjoona rahmatahoo Wa-yakhaafoona 'azaabah; inna 'azaaba rabbika kaana mahzooraa
17:58: Wa-in min qaryatin illaa Nahnu muhlikoohaa qabla Yawmil Qiyaamati aw mu'az-ziboohaa 'azaaban shadeedaa; kaana zaalika fil Kitaabi mastooraa
17:59: Wa-maa mana'anaaa an nursila bil-aayaati illaaa an kazzaba bihal awwaloon; Wa-aatainaa Samoodan naaqata mubsiratan fazalamoo bihaa; Wa-maa nursilu bil-aayaati illaa takhweefaa
17:60: Wa-iz qulnaa laka inna rabbaka ahaata binnaas; Wa-maa ja'alnar ru'yal lateee arainaaka illaa fitnatal linnaasi washshajaratal mal'oonata fil quraan; Wa-nukhaw-wifuhum famaa yazeeduhum illa tughyaanan kabeeraa
17:61: Wa-iz qulnaa lilma-laaa'ikatis judoo li-Aadama fasajadooo illaaa Ibleesa qaala 'a-asjudu liman khalaqta teena
17:62: Qaala ara'aytaka haazal lazee karramta 'alaiya la'in akhartani ilaa Yawmil Qiyaamati la-ahtanikanna zurriyyatahooo illaa qaleelaa
17:63: Qaalaz hab faman tabi'aka minhum fa-inna Jahannama jazaaa'ukum jazaaa'am mawfooraa
17:64: Wastafziz manis tata'ta minhum bisawtika Wa-ajlib 'alaihim bikhailika Wa-rajilika Wa-shaarik-hum fil amwaali wal-awlaadi Wa-'idhum; Wa-maa ya'iduhumush Shaitaanu illaa ghurooraa
17:65: Inna 'ibaadee laisa laka 'alaihim sultaan; Wa-kafaa bi-Rabbika Wakeelaa
17:66: Rabbukumul lazee yuzjee lakumul fulka fil bahri litabtaghoo min fadlih; innahoo kaana bikum Raheemaa
17:67: Wa-izaa massakumud durru fil bahri dalla man tad'oona illaaa iyyaahu falammaa najjaakum ilal barri a'radtum; Wa-kaanal insaanu kafooraa
17:68: Afa-amintum aien yakhsifa bikum jaanibal barri aw yursila 'alaikum haasiban summa laa tajidoo lakum wakeelaa
17:69: Am amintum aien yu'eedakum feehi taaratan ukhraa fa-yursila 'alaikum qaasifam minar reehi fa-yugh-riqakum bimaa kafartum summa laa tajidoo lakum 'alainaa bihee tabee'aa
17:70: Wa-laqad karramnaa Baneee aadama Wa-hamalnaahum fil barri walbahri Wa-razaqnaahum minat taiyibaati Wa-faddalnaahum 'alaa kaseerim mimman khalaqnaa tafdeelaa
17:71: Yawma nad'oo kulla unaasim bi-imaamihim faman ootiya kitaabahoo bi-yameenihee fa-ulaaa'ika yaqra'oona kitaabahum Wa-laa yuzlamoona fateelaa
17:72: Wa-man kaana fee haaziheee a'maa fahuwa fil aakhirati a'maa Wa-adallu sabeelaa
17:73: Wa-in kaadoo la-yaftinoonaka 'anil lazeee awhainaaa ilaika litaftariya 'alainaaa ghairahoo Wa-izallat takhazooka khaleelaa
17:74: Wa-law-laaa an sabbatnaaka laqad kitta tarkanu ilaihim shai'an qaleela
17:75: Izal la-azaqnaaka di'fal hayaati Wa-di'fal mamaati summa laa tajidu laka 'alainaa naseeraa
17:76: Wa-in kaadoo la-yastafizzoonaka minal ardi liyukhri-jooka minhaa Wa-izal laa yalbasoona khilaafaka illaa qaleelaa
17:77: Sunnata man qad arsalnaa qablaka mir Rusulinaa Wa-laa tajidu lisunnatinaa tahweelaa
17:78: Aqimis Salaata liduloo-kish shamsi ilaa ghasaqil laili Wa-quraanal Fajri inna quraa-nal Fajri kaana mashhoodaa
17:79: Wa-minal laili fatahajjad bihee naafilatal laka 'asaaa any yab'asaka Rabbuka Maqaamam Mahmoodaa
17:80: Wa-qur Rabbi adkhilnee mudkhala sidqinw Wa-akhrijnee mukhraja sidqinw waj'al lee mil ladunka sultaanan naseeraa
17:81: Wa-qul jaaa'al haqqu Wa-zahaqal baatil; innal baatila kaana zahooqaa
17:82: Wa-nunazzilu minal quraani maa huwa shifaaa'unw Wa-rahmatullil mu'mineena Wa-laa yazeeduz zaalimeena illaa khasaaraa
17:83: Wa-izaaa an'amnaa 'alal insaani a'rada Wa-na-aa bijaani-bihee Wa-izaa massahush sharru kaana ya'oosaa
17:84: Qul kulluny ya'malu 'alaa shaakilatihee fa-rabbukum a'lamu biman huwa ahdaa sabeelaa
17:85: Wa-yas'aloonaka 'anir rooh; qulir roohu min amri rabbee Wa-maaa ooteetum minal 'ilmi illaa qaleelaa
17:86: Wa-la'in shi'naa lanaz-habanna billazeee awhainaaa ilaika summa laa tajidu laka bihee 'alainaa wakeelaa
17:87: Illaa rahmatam mir Rabbik; inna fadlahoo kaana 'alaika kabeeraa
17:88: Qul la'inij tama'atil insu waljinnu 'alaaa aien ya'too bimisli haazal quraani laa ya'toona bimislihee Wa-law kaana ba'duhum liba-'din zaheeraa
17:89: Wa-laqad sarrafnaa linnaasi fee haazal quraani min kulli masalin fa-abaaa aksarun naasi illaa kufooraa
17:90: Wa-qaaloo lan nu'mina laka hattaa tafjura lanaa minal ardi yamboo'aa
17:91: Aw takoona laka jannatum min nakheelinw Wa-'inabin fatufajjiral anhaara khilaalahaa tafjeeraa
17:92: Aw tusqitas samaaa'a kamaa za'amta 'alainaa kisafan aw ta'tiya billaahi wal-malaaa'ikati qabeelaa
17:93: Aw yakoona laka baitum min zukhrufin aw tarqaa fis samaaa'i Wa-lan nu'mina liruqiyyika hatta tunazzila 'alainaa kitaaban naqra'uh; qul Subhaana Rabbee hal kuntu illaa basharar Rasoolaa
17:94: Wa-maa mana'an naasa any yu'minooo iz jaaa'ahumul hudaaa illaaa an qaalooo aba'asal laahu basharar Rasoolaa
17:95: Qul law kaana fil ardi malaaa-'ikatuien yamshoona mutma'in-neena lanazzalnaa 'alaihim minas samaaa'i malakar Rasoolaa
17:96: Qul kafaa billaahi shaheedam bainee Wa-bainakum; innahoo kaana bi'ibaadihee Khabeeram Baseeraa
17:97: Wa-maien yahdil laahu fahuwal muhtad; Wa-mai yudlil falan tajida lahum awliyaaa'a min doonih; Wa-nahshuruhum Yawmal Qiyaamati 'alaa wujoohihim umyanw Wa-bukmanw Wa-summaa; ma'waahum Jahannamu kullamaa khabat zidnaahum sa'eeraa
17:98: Zaalika jazaa'uhum bi-annahum kafaroo bi-aayaatinaa Wa-qaalooo 'a-izaa kunnaa 'izaamanw Wa-rufaatan 'a-innaa la-mab'oosoona khalqan jadeedaa
17:99: Awalam yaraw annal laahal lazee khalaqas samaawaati wal-arda qaadirun 'alaaa aien yakhluqa mislahum Wa-ja'ala lahum ajalal laa raiba fee; fa-abaz zaalimoona illaa kufooraa
17:100: Qul law antum tamlikoona khazaaa'ina rahmati Rabbeee izal la-amsaktum khash-yatal infaaq; Wa-kaanal insaanu qatooraa
17:101: Wa-laqad aatainaa Moosaa tis'a Aayaatim baiyyinaatin fas'al Baneee Israaa'eela iz jaaa'ahum faqaala lahoo Fir'awnu inee la-azunnuka yaa-Moosaa mas-hooraa
17:102: Qaala laqad 'alimta maaa anzala haaa'ulaaa'i illaa Rabbus samaawaati wal-ardi basaaa'ira Wa-innee la-azun-nuka yaa-Fir'awnu masbooraa
