17:103: Fa-araada aien yastafizzahum minal ardi fa-aghraqnaahu Wa-mam ma'ahoo jamee'aa
17:104: Wa-qulnaa min ba'dihee li-Baneee Israaa'eelas kunul arda fa-izaa jaaa'a wa'dul aakhirati ji'naa bikum lafeefaa
17:105: Wa-bilhaqqi anzalnaahu Wa-bilhaqqi nazal; Wa-maaa arsalnaaka illaa mubash-shiranw Wa-nazeeraa
17:106: Wa-quraanan faraqnaahu litaqra-ahoo 'alan naasi 'alaa muksinw Wa-nazzalnaahu tanzeelaa
17:107: Qul aaminoo biheee aw laa tu'minoo; innal lazeena ootul 'ilma min qabliheee izaa yutlaa 'alaihim yakhirroona lil-azqaani sujjadaa
17:108: Wa-yaqooloona Subhaana Rabbinaaa in kaana wa'du Rabbinaa lamaf'oolaa
17:110: Qulid 'ul laaha awid 'ur Rahmaana ayyam maa tad'oo falahul asmaaa'ul Husnaa; Wa-laa tajhar bi-Salaatika Wa-laa tukhaafit bihaa wabtaghi baina zaalika sabeela
17:111: Wa-qulil hamdu lillaahil lazee lam yattakhiz waladanw Wa-lam yakul lahoo shareekun fil mulki Wa-lam yakul lahoo waliyyum minaz zulli Wa-kabbirhu takbeeraa
18:1: Alhamdu lillaahil lazeee anzala 'alaa 'abdihil kitaaba Wa-lam yaj'al lahoo 'iwajaa
18:2: Qaiyimal liyunzira ba'asan shadeedam mil ladunhu Wa-yubashshiral mu'mineenal lazeena ya'maloonas saalihaati anna lahum ajran hasanaa
18:4: Wa-yunziral lazeena qaalut takhazal laahu waladaa
18:5: Maa lahum bihee min 'ilminw Wa-laa li-aabaaa'ihim; kaburat kalimatan takhruju min afwaahihim; iny yaqooloona illaa kazibaa
18:6: Fala'allaka baakhi'un nafsaka 'alaaa aasaarihim il lam yu'minoo bihaazal hadeesi asafaa
18:7: Innaa ja'alnaa ma 'alal ardi zeenatal lahaa linabluwahum ayyuhum ahsanu 'amalaa
18:9: Am hasibta anna Ashaabal Kahfi war-Raqeemi kaanoo min Aayaatinaa 'ajabaa
18:10: Iz awal fityatu ilal Kahfi faqaaloo Rabbanaaa aatinaa mil ladunka rahmatanw Wa-haiyi' lanaa min amrinaa rashadaa
18:12: Summa ba'asnaahum lina'lama ayyul hizbaini ahsaa limaa labisooo amadaa
18:13: Nahnu naqussu 'alaika naba-ahum bilhaqq; innahum fityatun aamanoo bi-Rabbihim Wa-zidnaahum hudaa
18:14: Wa-rabatnaa 'alaa quloo-bihim iz qaamoo faqaaloo Rabbunaa Rabbus samaawaati wal-ardi lan nad'uwa min dooniheee ilaahal laqad qulnaaa izan shatataa
18:15: Haaa'ulaaa'i qawmunat takhazoo min dooniheee aalihatal law laa yaatoona 'alaihim bisultaanim baiyin; faman azlamu mimmaniftaraa 'alal laahi kazibaa
18:16: Wa-izi'tazal tumoohum Wa-maa ya'budoona illal laaha faawooo ilal kahfi yanshur lakum Rabbukum mir rahmatihee Wa-yuhaiyi' lakum min amrikum mirfaqa
18:17: Wa-tarash shamsa izaa tala'at tazaawaru 'an kahfihim zaatal yameeni Wa-izaa gharabat taqriduhum zaatash shimaali Wa-hum fee fajwatim minh; zaalika min Aayaatil laah; maien yahdil laahu fahuwal muhtad, Wa-maien yudlil falan tajida lahoo waliyyam murshidaa
18:18: Wa-tahsabuhum ayqaazanw Wa-hum ruqood; Wa-nuqallibuhum zaatal yameeni Wa-zaatash shimaali Wa-kalbuhum baasitun ziraa'ayhi bilwaseed; lawit tala'ta 'alaihim la-wallaita minhum firaaranw Wa-lamuli'ta minhum rubaa
18:19: Wa-kazaalika ba'asnaahum liyatasaaa'aloo bainahum; qaala qaaa'ilum minhum kam labistum qaaloo labisnaa yawman aw ba'da yawm; qaaloo Rabbukum a'lamu bimaa labistum fab'asooo ahadakum biwariqikum haazihee ilal madeenati falyanzur ayyuhaaa azkaa ta'aaman falyaatikum birizqim minhu walyatalattaf Wa-laa yush'iranna bikum ahadaa
18:20: Innahum ien yazharoo 'alaikum yarjumookum aw yu'eedookum fee millatihim Wa-lan tuflihooo izan abadaa
18:21: Wa-kazaalika a'sarnaa 'alaihim liya'lamooo anna wa'dal laahi haqqunw Wa-annas Saa'ata laa raiba feehaa iz yatanaaza'oona bainahum amrahum faqaalub noo 'alaihim bunyaanaa; Rabbuhum a'lamu bihim; qaalal lazeena ghalaboo 'alaaa amrihim lanat-takhizanna 'alaihim masjidaa
18:22: Sa-yaqooloona salaasatur raabi'uhum kalbuhum Wa-yaqooloona khamsatun saadisuhum kalbuhum rajmam bilghaib; Wa-yaqooloona sab'atunw Wa-saaminuhum kalbuhum; qur Rabbeee a'lamu bi'iddatihim maa ya'lamuhum illaa qaleel; falaa tumaari feehim illaa miraaa'an zaahiranw Wa-laa tastafti feehim minhum ahadaa
18:23: Wa-laa taqoolanna lishai'in innee faa'ilun zaalika ghadaa
18:24: Illaaa aien yashaaa'al laah; wazkur Rabbaka izaa naseeta Wa-qul 'asaaa any yahdiyani Rabbee li-aqraba min haazaa rashadaa
18:25: Wa-labisoo fee kahfihim salaasa mi'atin sineena wazdaadoo tis'aa
18:26: Qulil laahu a'lamu bimaa labisoo lahoo ghaibus samaawaati wal-ardi absir bihee Wa-asmi'; maa lahum min doonihee minw waliyyinw Wa-laa yushriku fee hukmihee ahadaa
18:27: Watlu maaa oohiya ilaika min Kitaabi Rabbika laa mubaddila li-Kalimaatihee Wa-lan tajida min doonihee multahadaa
18:28: Wasbir nafsaka ma'al lazeena yad'oona Rabbahum bilghadaati wal'ashiyyi yureedoona Wajhahoo Wa-laa ta'du 'aynaaka 'anhum tureedu zeenatal hayaatid dunyaa Wa-laa tuti' man aghfalnaa qalbahoo 'an zikrinaa wattaba'a hawaahu Wa-kaana amruhoo furutaa
18:29: Wa-qulil haqqu mir Rabbikum faman shaaa'a falyu'minw Wa-man shaaa'a falyakfur; innaaa a'tadnaa lizzaalimeena Naaran ahaata bihim suraadiquhaa; Wa-ien yastagheesoo yughaasoo bimaaa'in kalmuhli yashwil wujooh' bi'sash sharaab; Wa-saaa'at murtafaqaa
18:30: Innal lazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaati innaa laa nudee'u ajra man ahsana 'amalaa
18:31: Ulaaa'ika lahum Jannaatu 'Adnin tajree min tahtihimul anhaaru yuhallawna feehaa min asaawira min zahabinw Wa-yalbasoona siyaaban khudram min sundusinw Wa-istabraqim muttaki'eena feehaa 'alal araaa'ik; ni'mas sawaab; Wa-hasunat murtafaqaa
18:32: Wadrib lahum masalar rajulaini ja'alnaa li-ahadihimaa jannataini min a'naabinw Wa-hafafnaahumaa binakhilinw Wa-ja'alnaa bainahumaa zar'aa
18:33: Kiltal jannataini aatat ukulahaa Wa-lam tazlim minhu shai'anw Wa-fajjarnaa khi-laalahumaa naharaa
18:34: Wa-kaana lahoo samarun faqaala lisaahibihee Wa-huwa yuhaawiruhoo ana aksaru minka maalanw Wa-a'azzu nafaraa
18:35: Wa-dakhala jannatahoo Wa-huwa zaalimul linafsihee qaala maaa azunnu an tabeeda haaziheee abadaa
18:36: Wa-maaa azunnus Saa'ata qaaa'imatanw Wa-la'ir rudittu ilaa Rabbee la-ajidanna khairam minhaa munqalabaa
18:37: Qaala lahoo saahibuhoo Wa-huwa yuhaawiruhooo akafarta billazee khalaqaka min turaabin summa min nutfatin summa sawwaaka rajulaa
18:38: Laakinaa Huwal laahu Rabbee Wa-laa ushriku bi-Rabbeee ahadaa
18:39: Wa-law-laaa iz dakhalta jannataka qulta maa shaaa'al laahu laa quwwata illaa billaah; in tarani ana aqalla minka maalanw Wa-waladaa
18:40: Fa'asaa Rabeee aien yu'tiyani khairam min jannatika Wa-yursila 'alaihaa husbaanam minas samaaa'i fatusbiha sa'eedan zalaqaa
18:41: Aw yusbiha maaa'uhaaa ghawran falan tastatee'a lahoo talabaa
18:42: Wa-uheeta bisamarihee faasbaha yuqallibu kaffaihi 'alaa maaa anfaqa feehaa Wa-hiya khaawiyatun 'alaa 'urooshihaa Wa-yaqoolu yaalaitanee lam ushrik bi-Rabbeee ahadaa
18:43: Wa-lam takul lahoo fi'atuien yansuroonahoo min doonil laahi Wa-maa kaana muntasiraa
18:44: Hunaalikal walaayatu lillaahil haqq; huwa khairun sawaabanw Wa-khairun 'uqbaa
18:45: Wadrib lahum masalal hayaatid dunyaa kamaaa'in anzalnaahu minas samaaa'i fakhtalata bihee nabaatul ardi fa-asbaha hasheeman tazroo-hur riyaah; Wa-kaanal laahu 'alaa kulli shai'im muqtadiraa
18:46: Almaalu walbanoona zeenatul hayaatid dunya wal-baaqiyaatus saalihaatu khairun 'inda Rabbika sawaabanw Wa-khairun amalaa
18:47: Wa-yawma nusaiyirul jibaala Wa-taral arda baariza-tanw Wa-hasharnaahum falam nughaadir minhum ahadaa
18:48: Wa 'uridoo 'alaa Rabbika saffaa, laqad ji'tumoonaa kamaa khalaqnaakum awala marrah; bal za'amtum allannaj'ala lakum maw'idaa
18:49: Wa-wudi'al kitaabu fataral mujrimeena mushfiqeena mimmaa feehi Wa-yaqooloona yaa-wailatanaa maa lihaazal kitaabi laa yughaadiru saghee-ratanw Wa-laa kabeeratan illaaa ahsaahaa; Wa-wajadoo maa 'amiloo haadiraa; Wa-laa yazlimu Rabbuka ahadaa
18:50: Wa-iz qulnaa lilma-laaa'ikatis judoo li-Aadama fasajadooo illaaa Ibleesa kaana minal jinni fafasaqa 'an amri Rabbih; afatattakhizoonahoo Wa-zurriyatahooo awliyaaa'a min doonee Wa-hum lakum 'aduww; bi'sa lizzaalimeena badalaa
18:51: Maaa ash-hattuhum khalqas samaawaati wal-ardi Wa-laa khalqa anfusihim Wa-maa kuntu muttakhizal mudilleena 'adudaa
18:52: Wa-Yawma yaqoolu naadoo shurakaaa'i yal-lazeena za'amtum fada'awhum falam yastajeeboo lahum Wa-ja'alnaa bainahum maw-biqaa
18:53: Wa-ra al-mujrimoonan Naara fazannooo annahum muwaaqi'oohaa Wa-lam yajidoo 'anhaa masrifaa
18:54: Wa-laqad sarrafnaa fee haazal quraani linnaasi min kulli masal; Wa-kaanal insaanu aksara shai'in jadalaa
18:55: Wa-maa mana'an naasa any yu'minooo iz jaaa'ahumul hudaa Wa-yastaghfiroo Rabbahum illaaa an taatiyahum sunnatul awwaleena aw yaatiyahumul 'azaabu qubulaa
18:56: Wa-maa nursilul mursaleena illaa mubashshireena Wa-munzireen; Wa-yujaadilul lazeena kafaroo bilbaatili liyudhidoo bihil haqqa wattakhazooo Aayaatee Wa-maaa unziroo huzuwaa
18:57: Wa-man azlamu mimman zukkira bi-ayaati Rabbihee fa-a'rada 'anhaa Wa-nasiya maa qaddamat yadaah; innaa ja'alnaa 'alaa quloobihim akinnatan any yafqahoohu Wa-feee aazaanihim waqraa; Wa-in tad'uhum ilal hudaa falany yahtadooo izan abadaa
18:58: Wa-Rabbukal Ghafooru zur rahmati law yu'aakhi-zuhum bimaa kasaboo la'ajala lahumul 'azaab; bal lahum maw'idul laien yajidoo min doonihee maw'ilaa
18:59: Wa-tilkal quraaa ahlak-nahum lammaa zulamoo Wa-ja'alnaa limahlikihim maw'idaa
18:60: Wa-iz qaalaa Moosaa lifataahu laaa abrahu hattaaa ablugha majma'al bahrayni aw amdiya huqubaa
18:61: Falammaa balaghaa majma'a bainihimaa nasiyaa hootahumaa fattakhaza sabeelahoo fil bahri sarabaa
18:62: Falammaa jaawazaa qaala lifataahu aatinaa ghadaaa'anaa laqad laqeena min safarinaa haazaa nasabaa
18:63: Qaala ara'ayta iz awainaaa ilas sakhrati fa-innee naseetul hoota Wa-maaa ansaaneehu illash Shaitaanu an azkurah; wattakhaza sabeelahoo fil bahri 'ajabaa
18:64: Qaala zaalika maa kunnaa nabghi; fartaddaa 'alaa aasaari-him-maa qasasaa
18:65: Fa-wajadaa 'abdam min 'ibaadinaaa aatainaahu Rahmatam min 'indinaa Wa-'allamnaahu mil ladunnaa 'ilmaa
18:66: Qaala lahoo Moosaa hal attabi'uka 'alaaa an tu'allimani mimmaa 'ullimta rushdaa
18:67: Qaalaa innaka lan tastatee'a ma'iya sabraa
18:68: Wa-kaifa tasbiru 'alaa maa lam tuhit bihee khubraa
18:69: Qaala satajiduneee in shaa 'al-laahu saabiranw Wa-laaa a'see laka amraa
18:70: Qaala fa-init taba'tanee falaa tas'alnee 'an shai'in hattaaa uhdisa laka minhu zikraa
18:71: Fantalaqaa hattaaa izaa rakibaa fis safeenati kharaqahaa qaala akharaqtahaa litughriqa ahlahaa laqad ji'ta shai'an imraa
18:72: Qaala alam aqul innaka lan tastatee'a ma'iya sabraa
18:73: Qaala laa tu'aakhiznee bimaa naseetu Wa-laa turhiqnee min amree 'usraa
18:74: Fantalaqaa hattaa izaa laqiyaa ghulaaman faqatalahoo qaala aqatalta nafsan zakiy-yatam bighairi nafs; laqad ji'ta shai'an nukraa
18:75: Qaala alam aqul laka innaka lan tastatee'a ma'iya sabraa
18:76: Qaala in sa-altuka 'an shai'im ba'dahaa falaa tusaahibnee qad balaghta mil ladunnee 'uzraa
18:77: Fantalaqaa hattaaa izaaa atayaaa ahla qaryatinis tat'amaaa ahlahaa fa-abaw any yudaiyifoohumaa fawajadaa feehaa jidaarany yureedu any yanqadda fa-aqaamah; qaala law shi'ta lattakhazta 'alaihi ajraa
18:78: Qaala haazaa firaaqu bainee Wa-bainik; sa-unabi-'uka bitaaweeli maa lam tastati' 'alaihi sabraa
18:79: Ammas safeenatu fakaanat limasaakeena ya'maloona fil bahri fa-arattu an a'eebahaa Wa-kaana waraaa'-ahum malikuien yaakhuzu kulla safeenatin ghasbaa
18:80: Wa-aammal ghulaamu fakaana abawaahu mu'minaini fakhasheenaaa aien yurhiqa-humaa tughyaananw Wa-kufraa
18:81: Faradnaa aien yubdila-humaa Rabbuhumaa khairam minhu zakaatanw Wa-aqraba ruhmaa
18:82: Wa-ammal jidaaru fakaana lighulaamaini yateemaini fil madeenati Wa-kaana tahtahoo kanzul lahumaa Wa-kaana aboohumaa saalihan fa-araada Rabbuka any yablughaaa ashuddahumaa Wa-yastakhrijaa kanzahumaa rahmatam mir Rabbik; Wa-maa fa'altuhoo 'an amree; zaalika taaweelu maa lam tasti' 'alaihi sabra
18:83: Wa-yas'aloonaka 'an Zil Qarnaini qul sa-atloo 'alaikum minhu zikraa
18:84: Innaa makkannaa lahoo fil ardi Wa-aatainaahu min kulli shai'in sababaa
18:86: Hattaaa izaa balagha maghribash shamsi wajadahaaa taghrubu fee 'aynin hami'a-tinw Wa-wajada 'indahaa qawmaa; qulnaa yaa-Zal Qarnaini immaaa an tu'az-ziba Wa-immaaa an tattakhiza feehim husnaa
18:87: Qaala amma man zalama fasawfa nu'azzibuhoo summa yuraddu ilaa Rabbihee fa-yu-'azzibuhoo azaaban nukraa
18:88: Wa-ammaa man aamana Wa-'amila saalihan falahoo jazaaa'anil husnaa Wa-sanaqoolu lahoo min amrinaa yusraa
18:90: Hattaaa izaa balagha matli'ash shamsi wajdahaa tatlu'u alaa qawmil lam naj'al lahum min doonihaa sitraa
18:91: Kazaalika Wa-qad ahatnaa bimaa ladaihi khubraa
18:93: Hattaaa izaa balagha bainas saddaini wajada min doonihimaa qawmal laa yakaa-doona yafqahoona qawlaa
18:94: Qaaloo yaa-Zal qarnaini inna Yaajooja Wa-Maajooja mufsidoona fil ardi fahal naj'alu laka kharjan 'alaaa an taj'ala bainanaa Wa-bainahum saddaa
18:95: Qaala maa makkannee feehi Rabbee khairun fa-a'eenoonee biquwwatin aj'al bainakum Wa-bainahum radmaa
18:96: Aatoonee zubaral hadeed, hattaaa izaa saawaa bainas sadafaini qaalan fukhoo hattaaa izaa ja'alahoo naaran qaala aatooneee ufrigh 'alaihi qitraa
18:97: Famas taa'ooo aien yazharoohu Wa-mas tataa'oo lahoo naqbaa
18:98: Qaala haaza rahmatum mir Rabbee fa-izaa jaaa'a wa'du Rabbee ja'alahoo dakkaaa'a; Wa-kaana; Wa-du Rabbee haqqaa
18:99: Wa-taraknaa ba'dahum Yawma'izien yamooju fee ba'dinw Wa-nufikha fis Soori fajama'naahum jam'aa
18:101: Allazeena kaanat a'yunuhum fee ghitaaa'in 'an zikree Wa-kaanoo la yastatee'oona sam'aa
18:102: Afahasibal lazeena kafarooo aien yattakhizoo 'ibaadee min dooneee awliyaaa'; innaaa a'tadnaa jahannama lil-kaafireena nuzulaa
18:104: Allazeena dalla sa'yuhum fil hayaatid dunyaa Wa-hum yahsaboona annahum yuhsinoona sun'aa
18:105: Ulaaa'ikal lazeena kafaroo bi-aayaati Rabbihim Wa-liqaaa'ihee fahabitat a'maaluhum falaa nuqeemu lahum Yawmal Qiyaamati waznaa
18:106: Zaalika jazaaa'uhum jahannamu bimaa kafaroo wattakhazooo Aayaatee Wa-Rusulee huzuwaa
18:107: Innal lazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaati kaanat lahum Jannaatul Firdawsi nuzulaa
18:109: Qul law kaanal bahru midaadal li-kalimaati Rabbee lanafidal bahru qabla an tanfada Kalimaatu Rabbee Wa-law ji'naa bimislihee madadaa
18:110: Qul innamaaa ana basharum mislukum yoohaaa ilaiya annamaa ilaahukum Ilaahunw Waahid; faman kaana yarjoo liqaaa'a Rabbihee falya'mal 'amalan saalihanw Wa-laa yushrik bi'ibaadati Rabbiheee ahadaa
19:4: Qaala Rabbi innee wahanal 'azmu minnee washta-'alar ra'su shaibanw Wa-lam akun bidu'aaa'ika Rabbi shaqiyyaa
19:5: Wa-innee khiftul mawaaliya minw waraaa'ee Wa-kaanat imra atee 'aqiran fa-hablee mil ladunka waliyyaa
19:6: Yarisunee Wa-yarisu min aali Ya'qoob, waj'alhu Rabbi radiyya
19:7: Yaa-Zakariyyaaa innaa nubashshiruka bi-ghulaamin ismuhoo Yahyaa lam naj'al lahoo min qablu samiyyaa
19:8: Qaala Rabbi annaa yakoonu lee ghulaamunw Wa-kaanat imra-atee 'aaqiranw Wa-qad balaghtu minal kibari 'itiyyaa
19:9: Qaala kazaalika qaala Rabbuka huwa 'alaiya haiyinunw Wa-qad khalaqtuka min qablu Wa-lam taku shai'aa
19:10: Qaala Rabbij 'al leee Aayah; qaala Aayatuka allaa tukalliman naasa salaasa layaalin sawiyyaa
19:11: Fakharaja 'alaa qawmihee minal mihraabi fa-awhaaa ilaihim an sabbihoo bukratanw Wa-'ashiyyaa
19:12: Yaa-Yahyaa khuzil Kitaaba biquwwatinw Wa-aatainaahul hukma sabiyyaa
19:13: Wa-hanaanam mil ladunnaa Wa-zakaatanw Wa-kaana taqiyyaa
19:15: Wa-salaamun 'alaihi yawma wulida Wa-yawma yamootu Wa-yawma yub'asu haiyyaa
19:16: Wazkur fil Kitaabi Maryma; izin tabazat min ahlihaa makaanan sharqiyyaa
19:17: Fattakhazat min doonihim hijaaban fa-arsalnaaa ilaihaa roohanaa fatamassala lahaa basharan sawiyyaa
19:18: Qaalat inneee a'oozu bir-Rahmaani minka in kunta taqiyyaa
19:19: Qaala innamaa ana rasoolu Rabbiki li-ahaba laki ghulaaman zakiyyaa
19:20: Qaalat anna yakoonu lee ghulaamunw Wa-lam yamsasnee bashrunw Wa-lam aku baghiyyaa
19:21: Qaala kazaaliki qaala Rabbuki huwa 'alaiya haiyyimunw Wa-linaj-'alahooo Aayatal linnaasi Wa-rahmatam minnaa; Wa-kaana amram maqdiyyaa
19:23: Fa-ajaaa-'ahal makhaadu ilaa jiz'in nakhlati qaalat yaa-laitanee mittu qabla haazaa Wa-kuntu nasyam mansiyyaa
19:24: Fanaadaahaa min tahtihaaa allaa tahzanee qad ja'ala Rabbuki tahtaki sariyyaa
19:25: Wa-huzzeee ilaiki bijiz-'in nakhlati tusaaqit 'alaiki rutaban janiyyaa
19:26: Fakulee washrabee Wa-qarree 'ainaa; fa-immaa tarayinnna minal bashari ahadan faqooleee innee nazartu lir-Rahmaani sawman falan ukallimal yawma insiyyaa
19:27: Fa-atat bihee qawmahaa tahmiluhoo qaaloo yaa-Maryamoo laqad ji'ti shai'an fariyyaa
19:28: Yaaa-ukhta Haaroona maa kaana abooki mra'a saw'inw Wa-maa kaanat ummuki baghiyyaa
19:29: Fa-ashaarat ilaih; qaaloo kaifa nukallimu man kaana fil mahdi sabiyyaa
19:30: Qaala innee 'abdul laahi aataaniyal Kitaaba Wa-ja'alanee Nabiyyaa
19:31: Wa-ja'alanee mubaarakan aina maa kuntu Wa-awsaanee bis-Salaati waz-Zakaati maa dumtu haiyaa
19:32: Wa-barram biwaalidatee Wa-lam yaj'alnee jabbaaran shaqiyyaa
19:33: Wassalaamu 'alaiya yawma wulidtu Wa-yawma amootu Wa-yawma ub'asu haiyaa
19:34: Zaalika 'Eesab nu Maryama; qawlal haqqil lazee feehi yamtaroon
19:35: Maa kaana lillaahi aien yattakhiza minw waladin Subhaanah; izaa qadaaa amran fa-innamaa yaqoolu lahoo kun fa-yakoon
19:36: Wa-innal laaha Rabbee Wa-Rabbukum fa'budooh; haazaa Siraatum Mustaqeem
19:37: Fakhtalafal ahzaabu min bainihim fawailul lillazeena kafaroo min mashhadi Yawmin 'azeem
19:38: Asmi' bihim Wa-absir Yawma ya'toonanaa laakiniz zaalimoonal yawma fee dalaalin mubeen
19:39: Wa-anzirhum Yawmal hasrati iz qudiyal amr; Wa-hum fee ghaflatinw Wa-hum laa yu'minoon
19:40: Innaa nahnu narisul arda Wa-man 'alaihaa Wa-ilainaa yurja'oon
19:41: Wazkur fil Kitaabi Ibraaheem; innahoo kaana siddeeqan Nabiyyaa
19:42: Iz qaala li-abeehi yaaa-abati lima ta'budu maa laa yasma'u Wa-laa yubsiru Wa-laa yughnee 'anka shai'aa
19:43: Yaaa-abati innee qad jaaa'anee minal 'ilmi maa lam ya'tika fattabi'neee ahdika siraatan Sawiyyaa
19:44: Yaaa-abati laa ta'budish Shaitaan; innash Shaitaana kaana lir-Rahmaani 'asiyyaa
19:45: Yaaa-abati innee akhaafu aien yamassaka 'azaabum minar Rahmaani fatakoona lish-Shaitaani waliyyaa
19:46: Qaala araaghibun anta 'an aalihatee yaaa-Ibraaheemu la-'il lam tantahi la-arjumannaka wahjurnee maliyyaa
19:47: Qaala salaamun 'alaika sa-astaghfiru laka Rabbeee innahoo kaana bee hafiyyaa
19:48: Wa-a'tazilukum Wa-maa tad'oona min doonil laahi Wa-ad'oo Rabbee 'asaaa allaaa akoona bidu'aaa'i Rabbee shaqiyyaa
19:49: Fa-lam ma'tazalahum Wa-maa ya'budoona min doonil laahi wahabnaa lahoo is-haaqa Wa-ya'qoob; Wa-kullan ja'alnaa Nabiyyaa
19:50: Wa wahabnaa lahum mirrahmatinaa Wa-ja'alnaa lahum lisaana sidqin 'aliyyaa
19:51: Wazkur fil Kitaabi Moosaaa; innahoo kaana mukhlasanw Wa-kaana Rasoolan Nabiyyaa
19:52: Wa-naadainaahu min jaanibit Tooril aimani Wa-qarrabnaahu najiyyaa
19:53: Wa-wahabnaa lahoo mir rahmatinaaa akhaahu Haaroona Nabiyyaa
19:54: Wazkur fil Kitaabi ismaa'eel; innahoo kaana saadiqal wa'di Wa-kaana Rasoolan Nabiyyaa
19:55: Wa-kaana ya'muru ahlahoo bis-Salaati waz-zakaati Wa-kaana 'inda Rabbihee mardiyyaa
19:56: Wazkur fil Kitaabi Idrees; innahoo kaana siddeeqan Nabiyyaa
19:58: Ulaaa'ikal lazeena an'amal laahu 'alaihim minan Nabiyyeena min zurriyyati Aadama Wa-mimman hamalnaa ma'a Noohinw Wa-min zurriyyati Ibraaheema Wa-Israaa'eela Wa-mimman hadainaa wajta-bainaaa; izaa tutlaa 'alaihim Aayaatur Rahmaani kharroo sujjadanw Wa-bukiyyaa
19:59: Fakhalafa min ba'dihim khalfun adaa'us Salaata wattaba'ush shahawaati fasawfa yalqawna ghaiyyaa
19:60: Illaa man taaba Wa-aamana Wa-'amila saalihan fa-ulaaa'ika yadkhuloonal jannata Wa-laa yuzlamoona shai'aa
19:61: Jannaati 'adninil latee wa'adar Rahmaanu ibaadahoo bilghaib; innahoo kaana wa'duhoo ma'tiyyaa
19:62: Laa yasma'oona feehaa laghwan illaa salaamaa; Wa-lahum rizquhum feehaa bukratanw Wa-'ashiyyaa
19:63: Tilkal jannatul latee noorisu min 'ibaadinaa man kaana taqiyyaa
19:64: Wa-maa natanazzalu illaa bi-amri Rabbika lahoo maa baina aideenaa Wa-maa khalfanaa Wa-maa baina zaalik; Wa-maa kaana Rabbuka nasiyyaa
19:65: Rabbus samaawaati wal-ardi Wa-maa bainahumaa fa'bud-hu wastabir li'ibaadatih; hal ta'lamu lahoo samiyyaa
19:66: Wa-yaqoolul insaanu 'a-izaa maa mittu lasawfa ukhraju haiyaa
19:67: A-Wa-laa yazkurul insaanu annaa khalaqnaahu min qablu Wa-lam yaku shai'aa
19:68: Fawa-Rabbika lanahshu-rannahum wash-shayaateena summa lanuhdirannahum hawla jahannama jisiyyaa
19:69: Summa lanan-zi'anna min kulli shee'atin aiyuhum ashaddu 'alar Rahmaani 'itiyyaa
19:70: Summa lanahnu a'lamu billazeena hum awlaa bihaa siliyyaa
19:71: Wa-in minkum illaa waariduhaa; kaana 'alaa Rabbika hatmam maqdiyyaa
19:72: Summa nunajjil lazeenat taqaw Wa-nazaruz zaalimeena feehaa jisiyyaa
19:73: Wa-izaa tutlaa 'alaihim Aayaatunaa baiyinaatin qaalal lazeena kafaroo lillazeena aamanooo aiyul fareeqaini khairum maqaamanw Wa-ahsanu nadiyyaa
19:74: Wa-kam ahlaknaa qablahum min qarnin hum ahsanu asaasanw Wa-ri'yaa
19:75: Qul man kaana fid da-laalati falyamdud lahur Rahmaanu maddaa; hattaaa izaa ra-aw maa yoo'adoona immal 'azaaba Wa-immas Saa'ata fasa-ya'lamoona man huwa sharrum makaananw Wa-ad'afu jundaa
19:76: Wa-yazeedul laahul lazeenah tadaw hudaa; wal-baaqiyaatus saalihaatu khairun 'inda Rabbika sawaabanw Wa-khairum maraddaa
19:77: Afara'aytal lazee kafara bi-Aayaatinaa Wa-qaala la-oota-yanna maalanw Wa-waladaa
19:79: Kallaa; sanaktubu maa yaqoolu Wa-namuddu lahoo minal 'azaabi maddaa
19:81: Wattakhazoo min doonil laahi aalihatal liyakoonoo lahum 'izzaa
19:83: Alam tara annaaa arsalnash Shayaateena 'alal kaafireena ta'uzzuhum azzaa
19:84: Falaa ta'jal alaihim innamaa na-'uddu lahum 'addaa
19:85: Yawma nahshurul muttaqeena ilar Rahmaani wafdaa
19:87: Laa yamlikoonash shafaa'ata illaa manit takhaza 'indar Rahmaani 'ahdaa
19:90: Takaadus samaawaatu yatafattarna minhu Wa-tanshaq qul-ardu Wa-takhirrul jibaalu haddaa
19:92: Wa-maa yambaghee li-Rahmaani aien yattakhiza waladaa
19:93: In kullu man fis samaawaati wal-ardi illaaa aatir Rahmaani 'abdaa
19:96: Innal lazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaati sa-yaj'alu lahumur Rahmaanu wuddaa
19:97: Fa-innamaa yassarnaahu bilisaanika litubashshira bihil muttaqeena Wa-tunzira bihee qawmal luddaa
19:98: Wa-kam ahlaknaa qabla-hum min qarnin hal tuhissu minhum min ahadin aw tasma'u lahum rikzaa
20:6: Lahoo maa fis samaawaati Wa-maa fil ardi Wa-maa bainahumaa Wa-maa tahtas saraa
20:7: Wa-in tajhar bilqawli fainnahoo ya'lamus sirra Wa-akhfaa
20:8: Allaahu laaa ilaaha illaa huwa lahul asmaa'ul husnaa
20:10: Iz ra-aa naaran faqaala li-ahlihim kusooo inneee aanastu naaral la'alleee aateekum minhaa biqabasin aw ajidu 'alan naari hudaa
20:12: Inneee Ana Rabbuka fakhla' na'laika innaka bilwaadil muqaddasi Tuwaa
20:14: Innaneee Anal laahu laaa ilaaha illaa Ana fa'budnee Wa-aqimis salaata lizikree
20:15: Innas Saa'ata aatiyatun akaadu ukhfeehaa litujzaa kullu nafsin bimaa tas'aa
20:16: Falaa yasuddannaka 'anhaa mal laa yu'minu bihaa wattaba'a hawaahu fatardaa
20:18: Qaala hiya 'asaaya atawakka'u alaihaa Wa-ahushshu bihaa 'alaa ghanamee Wa-liya feehaa ma-aaribu ukhraa
20:21: Qaala khuzhaa Wa-laa ta-khaf sanu'eeduhaa seeratahal oolaa
20:22: Wadmum yadaka ilaa janaahika takhruj baidaaa'a min ghairi sooo'in Aayatan ukhraa
20:38: Iz awhainaaa ilaaa ummika maa yoohaaa
20:39: Ani qzifeehi fit Taabooti fa-qzifeehi fil yammi fal-yul-qihil yammu bis-saahili ya'khuzhu 'aduwwul lee Wa-'aduwwul lah; Wa-alqaitu 'alaika mahabbatan minnee Wa-litusna'a 'alaa 'ainee
20:40: Iz tamsheee ukhtuka fataqoolu hal adullukum 'alaa maien yakfuluhoo faraja-'naaka ilaaa ummika kai taqarra 'ainuhaa Wa-laa tahzan; Wa-qatalta nafsan fanajjainaaka minal ghammi Wa-fatannaaka futoonaa; falabista sineena feee ahli Madyana summa ji'ta 'alaa qadarien yaa-Moosa
20:42: Izhab anta Wa-akhooka bi-Aayaatee Wa-laa taniyaa fee zikree
20:44: Faqoolaa lahoo qawlal laiyinal la-allahoo yatazakkkaru 'aw yakhshaa
20:45: Qaalaa Rabbanaaa innanaa nakhaafu aien yafruta 'alainaaa aw ai yatghaa
20:46: Qaala laa takhaafaaa innanee ma'akumaa asma'u Wa-araa
20:47: Faatiyaahu faqoolaaa innaa Rasoolaa Rabbika fa-arsil ma'anaa Banee Israaa'eela Wa-laa tu'azzibhum qad ji'naaka bi-Aayatim mir Rabbika wassa-laamu 'alaa manit taba'al hudaa
20:48: Innaa qad oohiya ilainaaa annnal 'azaaba 'alaa man kaz-zaba Wa-tawalla
20:50: Qaala Rabbunal lazeee a'taa kulla shai'in khalqahoo summa hadaa
20:52: Qaala 'ilmuhaa 'inda Rabee fee kitaab, laa yadillu Rabbee Wa-laa yansaa
20:53: Allazee ja'ala lakumul arda mahdanw Wa-salaka lakum feehaa subulanw Wa-anzala minas samaaa'i maaa'an fa-akhrajnaa biheee azwaajam min nabaatin shatta
20:54: Kuloo war'aw an'aamakum; inna fee zaalika la-Aayaatil li-ulin nuhaa
20:55: Minhaa khalaqnaakum Wa-feehaa nu'eedukum Wa-minhaa nukhrijukum taaratan ukhraa
20:56: Wa-laqad arainaahu Aayaatinaa kullahaa fakaz-zaba Wa-abaa
20:57: Qaala aji'tanaa litukhri-janaa min ardinaa bisihrika yaa-Moosa
20:58: Falanaatiyannaka bisihrim mislihee faj'al bainanaa Wa-bainaka maw'idal laa nukhlifuhoo nahnu Wa-laaa anta makaanan suwaa
20:59: Qaala maw'idukum yawmuz zeenati Wa-ai yuhsharan naasu duhaa
20:60: Fatawallaa Fir'awnu fajjama'a kaidahoo summa ataa
20:61: Qaala lahum Moosaa wailakum laa taftaroo 'alal laahi kaziban fa-yus-hitakum bi-'azaab, Wa-qad khaaba manif taraa
20:63: Qaalooo in haaazaani lasaahiraani yureedaani aien yukhrijaakum min ardikum bisihrihimaa Wa-yazhabaa bitareeqatikumul muslaa
20:64: Fa-ajmi'oo kaidakum summa' too saffaa; Wa-qad aflahal yawma manis ta'laa
20:65: Qaaloo yaa-Moosaaa immaaa an tulqiya Wa-immaaa an nakoona awala man alqaa
20:66: Qaala bal alqoo fa-izaa hibaaluhum Wa-'isiyyuhum yukhaiyalu ilaihi min sihrihim annahaa tas'aa
20:68: Qulnaa laa takhaf innaka antal a'laa
20:69: Wa-alqi maa fee yamee-nika talqaf maa sana'oo; innamaa sana'oo kaidu saahir; Wa-laa yuflihus saahiru haisu ataa
20:70: Fa-ulqiyas saharatu sujjadan qaalooo aamannaa bi-Rabbi Haaroona Wa-Moosa
20:71: Qaala aamantum lahoo qabla an aazana lakum; innahoo lakabeerukumul lazee 'allama-kumus sihra fala-uqatti'anna aidiyakum Wa-arjulakum min khilaafinw Wa-la-usallibannakum fee juzoo'in nakhli Wa-lata'lamunna aiyunaaa ashaddu 'azaabanw Wa-abqaa
20:72: Qaaloo lan nu'siraka 'alaa maa jaaa'anaa minal baiyinaati wallazee fataranaa faqdi maaa anta qaad; innamaa taqdee haazihil hayaatad dunyaa
20:73: Innaaa aamannaa bi-Rabbinaa liyaghfira lanaa khataayaanaa Wa-maaa akrahtanaa 'alaihi minas sihr; wallaahu khairunw Wa-abqaa
20:74: Innahoo mai ya'ti Rabbahoo mujriman fa-inna lahoo Jahannama laa yamootu feehaa Wa-laa yahyaa
20:75: Wa-main ya'tihee mu'minan qad 'amilas saalihaati fa-ulaaa'ika lahumud darajaatul 'ulaa
20:76: Jannaatu 'Adnin tajree min tahtihal anhaaru khaalideena feehaa; Wa-zaalika jazaaa'u man tazakka
20:77: Wa-laqad awhainaaa ilaa Moosaaa an asri bi'ibaadee fadrib lahum tareeqan fil bahri yabasal laa takhaafu darakanw Wa-laa takhshaa
20:78: Fa-atba'ahum Fir'awnu bijunoodihee faghashiyahum minal yammmi maa ghashi-yahum
20:80: Yaa-Baneee Israaa'eela qad anjainaakum min 'aduw-wikum Wa-wa'adnaakum jaanibat Tooril aimana Wa-nazzalnaa 'alaikumul Manna was-Salwaa
20:81: Kuloo min taiyibaati maa razaqnaakum Wa-laa tatghaw feehi fa-yahilla 'alaikum ghadabee Wa-mai yahlil 'alaihi ghadabee faqad hawaa
20:82: Wa-innee la-Ghaffaarul liman taaba Wa-aamana Wa-'amila saalihan summah tadaa
20:84: Qaala hum ulaaa'i 'alaaa asaree Wa-'ajiltu ilaika Rabbi litardaa
20:85: Qaala fa-innaa qad fatannaa qawmaka mim ba'dika Wa-adallahumus Saamiriyy
20:86: Faraja'a Moosaaa ilaa qawmihee ghadbaana asifaa; qaala yaa-qawmi alam ya'idkum Rabbukum wa'dan hasanaa; afataala 'alaikumul 'ahdu am arattum ai yahilla 'alaikum ghadabum mir Rabbikum fa-akhlaftum maw'idee
20:87: Qaaloo maaa akhlafnaa maw'idaka bimalkinna Wa-laakinna hummilnaaa awzaaram min zeenatil qawmi faqazafnaahaa fakazaalika alqas Saamiriyy
20:88: Fa-akhraja lahum 'ijlan jasadal lahoo khuwaarun faqaaloo haazaaa ilaahukum Wa-ilaahu Moosaa fanasee
20:89: Afalaa yarawna allaa yarji'u ilaihim qawlanw Wa-laa yamliku lahum darranw Wa-laa naf'aa
20:90: Wa-laqad qaala lahum Haaroonu min qablu yaa-qawmi innamaa futintum bihee Wa-inna Rabbakumur Rahmaanu fattabi'oonee Wa-atee'ooo amree
20:91: Qaaloo lan nabraha 'alaihi 'aakifeena hattaa yarji'a ilainaa Moosaa
20:92: Qaala Yaa-Haaroonu maa mana-'aka iz ra-aitahum dallooo
20:94: Qaala yabna'umma laa ta'khuz bi-lihyatee Wa-laa bi-ra'see innee khasheetu an taqoola farraqta baina Baneee Israaa'eela Wa-lam tarqub qawlee
20:96: Qaala basurtu bimaa lam yabsuroo bihee faqabadtu qabdatam min asarir Rasooli fanabaztuhaa Wa-kazaalika sawwalat lee nafsee
20:97: Qaala fazhab fa-inna laka fil hayaati an taqoola laa misaasa Wa-inna laka maw'idal lan tukhlafahoo wanzur ilaaa ilaahikal lazee zalta 'alaihi 'aakifaa; la-nuharriqannahoo thumma la-nansifannahoo fil yammi nasfaa
20:98: Innamaaa ilaahu-kumul laahul lazee laa ilaaha illaa Hoo; wasi'a kulla shai'in ilmaa
20:99: Kazaalika naqussu 'alaika min anbaaa'i maa qad sabaq; Wa-qad aatainaaka mil ladunnaa Zikraa
20:100: Man a'rada 'anhu, fa-innahoo yahmilu Yawmal Qiyaamati wizraa
20:101: Khaalideena feehi Wa-saaa'a lahum Yawmal Qiyaamati himlaa
20:102: Yawma yunfakhu fissoori Wa-nahshurul mujrimeena Yawma 'izin zurqaa
20:104: nahnu a'lamu bimaa yaqooloona iz yaqoolu amsaluhum tareeqatan il labistum illaa yawmaa
20:105: Wa-yas'aloonaka 'anil jibaali faqul yansifuhaa Rabbee nasfaa
20:108: Yawma-izien yattabi'oonad daa'iya laa 'iwaja lahoo Wa-khasha'atil aswaatu lir-Rahmaani falaa tasma'u illaa hamsaa
20:109: Yawma-'izil laa tanfa'ush shafaa'atu illaa man azina lahur Rahmaanu Wa-radiya lahoo qawlaa
20:110: Ya'lamu maa bainaa aideehim Wa-maa khalfahum Wa-laa yuheetoona bihee 'ilmaa
20:111: Wa-'anatil wujoohu lil-Haiiyil Qaiyoomi Wa-qad khaaba man hamala zulmaa
20:112: Wa-main ya'mal minas saalihaati Wa-huwa mu'minun falaa yakhaafu zulmanw Wa-laa hadmaa
20:113: Wa-kazaalika anzalnaahu Qur-aanan 'Arabiyyanw Wa-sarrafnaa fee-hi minal wa'eedi la'allahum yattaqoona aw yuhdisu lahum zikraa
20:114: Fata'aalal laahul Malikul Haqq; Wa-laa ta'jal bil-Quraani min qabli aien yuqdaaa ilaika wahyuhoo Wa-qur Rabbi zidnee 'ilmaa
20:115: Wa-laqad 'ahidnaaa ilaaa Aadama min qablu fanasiya Wa-lam najid lahoo 'azmaa
20:116: Wa-iz qulnaa lilma-laaa'ikatis judoo li-Aadama fasajadooo illaaa Ibleesa; abaa
20:117: Faqulnaa yaaa-Aadamu inna haazaa 'aduwwul laka Wa-lizawjika falaa yukhrijan-nakumaa minal Jannati fatashqaa
20:118: Innaa laka allaa tajoo'a feeha Wa-laa ta'raa
20:119: Wa-annaka laa tazma'u feehaa Wa-laa tadhaa
20:120: Fa-waswasa ilaihish Shaitaanu qaala yaaa-Aadamu hal adulluka 'alaa shajaratil khuldi Wa-mulkil laa yablaa
20:121: Fa-akalaa minhaa fabadat lahumaa saw-aatuhumaa Wa-tafiqaa yakhsifaani 'alaihimaa minw waraqil jannah; Wa-'asaaa Aadamu Rabbahoo faghawaa
20:123: Qaalah bita minhaa jamee'am ba'dukum liba'din 'aduww; fa-immaa ya'tiyannakum minnee hudan famanit taba'a hudaaya falaa yadillu Wa-laa yashqaa
20:124: Wa-man a'rada 'an Zikree fa-inna lahoo ma'eeshatan dankanw Wa-nahshuruhoo Yawmal Qiyaamati a'maa
20:125: Qaala Rabbi lima hashar-tanee a'maa Wa-qad kuntu baseeraa
20:126: Qaala kazaalika atatka Aayaatunaa fanaseetahaa Wa-kazaalikal Yawma tunsaa
20:127: Wa-kazaalika najzee man asrafa Wa-lam yu'min bi-Aayaati Rabbih; Wa-la'azaabul Aakhirati ashaddu Wa-abqaa
20:128: Afalam yahdi lahum kam ahlaknaa qablahum minal qurooni yamshoona fee masaakinihim; inna fee zaalika la-Aayaatil li-ulin nuhaa
20:129: Wa-law-laa Kalimatun sabaqat mir Rabbika lakaana lizaamanw Wa-'ajalun musammaa
20:130: Fasbir 'alaa maa yaqooloona Wa-sabbih bihamdi Rabbika qabla tuloo'ish shamsi Wa-qabla ghuroobihaa Wa-min aanaaa'il laili fasabbih Wa-atraafan nahaari la-'allaka tardaa
20:131: Wa-laa tamuddanna 'ainaika ilaa ma matta'na biheee azwajam minhum zahratal hayaatid dunya linaftinahum feeh; Wa-rizqu Rabbika khairunw Wa-abqaa
20:132: Wa'mur ahlaka bis-Salaati wastabir 'alaihaa laa nas'aluka rizqaa; nahnu narzuquk; wal-'aaqibatu littaqwaa
20:133: Wa-qaaloo law-laa ya'teenaa bi-aayatin mir Rabbih; awa-lam ta'tihim baiyyinatu maa fis suhufil oolaa
20:134: Wa-law annaaa ahlaknaahum bi-'azaabin min qablihee laqaaloo Rabbanaa law-laaa arsalta ilainaa Rasoolan fanattabi'a Aayaatika min qabli an nazilla Wa-nakhzaa
20:135: Qul kullum mutarabbisun fa-tarabbasoo fa-sa-ta'lamoona man Ashaabus Siraatis Sawiyyi Wa-manih tadaa
21:1: Iqtaraba linnaasi hisaabuhum Wa-hum fee ghaflatim mu'ridoon
21:2: Maa ya'teehim min zikrim mir Rabbihim muhdasin illas tama'oohu Wa-hum yal'aboon
21:3: Laahiyatan quloobuhum; Wa-asarrun najwal lazeena zalamoo hal haazaaa illaa basharum mislukum 'afa-ta'toonas sihra Wa-antum tubsiroon
21:4: Qaala Rabbee ya'lamul qawla fis samaaa'i wal-ardi Wa-Huwas Samee'ul 'Aleem
21:5: Bal qaalooo adghaasu ahlaamin bal iftaraahu bal huwa shaa'irun fal-ya'tinaa bi-Aayatin kamaa ursilal awwaloon
21:6: Maaa aaamanat qablahum min qaryatin ahlaknaahaa a-fahum yu'minoon
21:7: Wa-maaa arsalnaa qablaka illaa rijaalan nooheee ilaihim fas'aloo ahlaz zikri in kuntum laa ta'lamoon
21:8: Wa-maa ja'alnaahum jasadal laa ya'kuloonat ta'aama Wa-maa kaanoo khaalideen
21:9: Summa sadaqnaa-humul wa'da fa-anjainaahum Wa-man nashaaa'u Wa-ahlaknal musrifeen
21:10: Laqad anzalnaaa ilaikum Kitaaban feehi zikrukum afalaa ta'qiloon
21:11: Wa-kam qasamnaa min qaryatin kaanat zaalimatanw Wa-ansha'-naa ba'dahaa qawman aakhareen
21:12: Falammaaa ahassoo ba'sanaaa izaa hum minhaa yarkudoon
21:13: Laa tarkudoo warji'ooo ilaa maaa utriftum feehi Wa-masaakinikum la'allakum tus'aloon
21:15: Famaa zaalat tilka da'waahum hattaa ja'alnaahum haseedan khaamideen
21:16: Wa-maa khalaqnas samaaa'a wal-arda Wa-maa bainahumaa laa'ibeen
21:17: Law aradnaaa an nattakhiza lahwal lat-takhaznaahu mil ladunnaaa in kunnaa faa'ileen
21:18: Bal naqzifu bilhaqqi 'alal baatili fa-yadmaghuhoo fa-izaa huwa zaahiq; Wa-lakumul wailu mimmaa tasifoon
21:19: Wa-lahoo man fis samaawaati wal-ard; Wa-man 'indahoo laa yastakbiroona 'an 'ibaada-tihee Wa-laa yastahsiroon
21:21: Amit takhazooo aalihatam minal ardi hum yunshiroon
21:22: Law kaana feehimaaa aalihatun illal laahu lafasadataa; fa-Subhaanal laahi Rabbil 'Arshi 'ammaa yasifoon
21:24: Amit takhazoo min doonihee aalihatan qul haatoo burhaanakum haaza zikru mam ma'iya Wa-zikru man qablee; bal aksaruhum laa ya'lamoonal haqqa fahum mu'ridoon
21:25: Wa-maaa arsalnaa min qablika mir Rasoolin illaa nooheee ilaihi annahoo laaa ilaaha illaaa Ana fa'budoon
21:26: Wa-qaalut takhazar Rahmaanu waladaa; Subhaanahu bal 'ibaadum mukramoon
21:27: Laa yasbiqoonahoo bil-qawli Wa-hum bi-amrihee ya'maloon
21:28: Ya'lamu maa baina aideehim Wa-maa khalfahum Wa-laa yashfa'oona illaa limanir tadaa Wa-hum min khash-yatihee mushfiqoon
21:29: Wa-main yaqul minhum inneee ilaahum min doonihee fazaalika najzeehi Jahannam; kazaalika najziz zaalimeen
21:30: Awalam yaral lazeena kafarooo annas samaawaati wal-arda kaanataa ratqan fafataqnaa-humaa Wa-ja'alnaa minal maaa'i kulla shai'in haiyin afalaa yu'minoon
21:31: Wa-ja'alnaa fil ardi rawaasiya an tameeda bihim Wa-ja'alnaa feehaa fijaajan subulal la'allahum yahtadoon
21:32: Wa-ja'alnas samaaa'a saqfam mahfoozanw Wa-hum 'an Aayaatihaa mu'ridoon
21:33: Wa-Huwal lazee khalaqal laila wannahaara washshamsa wal-qamara kullun fee falakiny yasbahoon
21:34: Wa-maa ja'alnaa libasharim min qablikal khuld; afa immitta fahumul khaalidoon
21:35: Kullu nafsin zaaa'iqatul mawt; Wa-nablookum bi-sharri walkhairi fitnatanw Wa-ilainaa turja'oon
21:36: Wa-izaa ra-aakal lazeena kafarooo ien yattakhizoonaka illa huzuwan; ahaazal lazee yazkuru aalihatakum Wa-hum bi-zikrir Rahmaani hum kaafiroon
21:37: Khuliqal insaanu min 'ajal; sa-ureekum Aayaatee falaa tasta'jiloon
21:38: Wa-yaqooloona mataa haazal wa'du in kuntum saadiqeen
21:39: Law ya'lamul lazeena kafaroo heena laa yakuffoona 'anw wujoohihimun Naara Wa-laa 'an zuhoorihim Wa-laa hum yunsaroon
21:40: Bal ta'teehim baghtatan fatabhatuhum falaa yastatee'oona raddahaa Wa-laa hum yunzaroon
21:41: Wa-laqadis tuhzi'a bi-Rusulim min qablika fahaaqa billazeena sakhiroo minhum maa kaanoo bihee yastahzi'oon
21:42: Qul main yakla-'ukum billaili wannahaari minar Rahmaan; bal hum 'an zikri Rabbihim mu'ridoon
21:43: Am lahum aalihatun tamna'uhum min dooninaa; laa yastatee'oona nasra anfusihim Wa-laa hum minna yus-haboon
21:44: Bal matta'naa haaa'ulaaa'i Wa-aabaaa'ahum hattaa taala 'alaihimul 'umur; afalaa yarawna anna na'til arda nanqusuhaa min atraafihaa; afahumul ghaaliboon
21:45: Qul innamaaa unzirukum bilwahyi; Wa-laa yasma'us summud du'aaa-'a izaa maa yunzaroon
21:46: Wa-la'in massat-hum nafhatun min 'azaabi Rabbika la-yaqoolunna yaawailanaaa innnaa kunnaa zaalimeen
21:47: Wa-nada'ul mawaazeenal qista li-Yawmil Qiyaamati falaa tuzlamu nafsun shai'aa; Wa-in kaana misqaala habbatim min khardalin atainaa bihaa; Wa-kafaa binaa haasibeen
21:48: Wa-laqad aatainaa Moosa Wa-haaroonal Furqaana Wa-diyaa'anw Wa-zikral lilmuttaqeen
21:49: Allazeena yakhshawna Rabbahum bilghaibi Wa-hum minas Saa'ati mushfiqoon
21:50: Wa-haazaa Zikrum Mubaarakun anzalnaah; afa-antum lahoo munkiroon
21:51: Wa-laqad aatainaaa Ibraaheema rushdahoo min qablu Wa-kunnaa bihee 'aalimeen
21:52: Iz qaala li-abeehi Wa-qawmihee maa haazihit tamaaseelul lateee antum lahaa 'aakifoon
21:54: Qaala laqad kuntum antum Wa-aabaaa'ukum fee dalaalin mubeen
21:55: Qaalooo aji'tanaa bil-haqqi am anta minal laa'ibeen
21:56: Qaala bar Rabbukum Rabbus samaawaati wal-ardil lazee fatarahunna Wa-ana 'alaa zaalikum minash shaahideen
21:57: Wa-tallaahi la-akeedanna asnaamakum ba'da an tuwalloo mudbireen
21:58: Faja'alahum juzaazan illaa kabeeral lahum la'allahum ilaihi yarji'oon
21:59: Qaaloo man fa'ala haazaa bi-aalihatinaaa innahoo laminaz zaalimeen
21:60: Qaaloo sami'naa fatany yazkuruhum yuqaalu lahooo ibraaheem
21:61: Qaaloo fa'too bihee 'alaaa a'yunin naasi la'allahum yash-hadoon
21:63: Qaala bal fa'alahoo kabeeruhum haazaa fas'aloohum in kaanoo yantiqoon
21:64: Faraja'ooo ilaaa anfusihim faqaalooo innakum antumuz zaalimoon
21:65: Summa nukisoo 'alaa ru'oosihim laqad 'alimta maa haaa'ulaaa'i yantiqoon
21:66: Qaala afata'budoona min doonil laahi maa laa yanfa'ukum shai'anw Wa-laa yadurrukum
21:67: Uffil lakum Wa-limaa ta'budoona min doonil laah; afalaa ta'qiloon
21:68: Qaaloo harriqoohu wansurooo aalihatakum in kuntum faa'ileen
21:69: Qulnaa yaa-naaru koonee bardanw Wa-salaaman 'alaaa Ibraaheem
21:71: Wa-najjainaahu Wa-Lootan ilal ardil latee baaraknaa feehaa lil-'aalameen
21:72: Wa-wahabnaa lahooo Ishaaqa; Wa-Ya'qooba naafilah; Wa-kullan ja'alnaa saaliheen
21:73: Wa-ja'alnaahum a'immataien yahdoona bi-amrinaa Wa-awhainaaa ilaihim fi'lal khairaati Wa-iqaamas Salaati Wa-eetaaa'az Zakaati Wa-kaanoo lanaa 'aabideen
21:74: Wa-Lootan aatainaahu hukmanw Wa-'ilmanw Wa-najjainaahu minal qaryatil latee kaanat ta'malul khabaaa'is; innahum kaanoo qawma saw'in faasiqeen
21:75: Wa-adkhalnaahu fee rahmatinaa innahoo minas saaliheen
21:76: Wa-noohan iz naadaa min qablu fastajabnaa lahoo fanajjainaahu Wa-ahlahoo minal karbil 'azeem
21:77: Wa-nasarnaahu minal qawmil lazeena kazzaboo bi-Aayaatinaa; innahum kaanoo qawma saw'in fa-aghraq-naahum ajma'een
21:78: Wa-Daawooda Wa-Sulaimaana iz yahkumaani fil harsi iz nafashat feehi ghanamul qawmi Wa-kunnaa lihukmihim shaahideen
21:79: Fafahhamnaahaa sulaimaan; Wa-kullan aatainaa hukmanw wa'ilmanw Wa-sakh-kharnaa ma'a Daawoodal jibaala yusabbihna wattayr; Wa-kunnaa faa'ileen
21:80: Wa-'allamanaahu san'ata laboosil lakum lituhsinakum min ba'sikum fahal antum shaakiroon
21:81: Wa-li-Sulaimaanar reeha 'aasifatan tajree bi-amriheee ilal ardil latee baaraknaa feehaa; Wa-kunnaa bikulli shai'in 'aalimeen
21:82: Wa-minash Shayaateeni maien yaghoosoona lahoo Wa-ya'maloona 'amalan doona zaalika Wa-kunna lahum haafizeen
21:83: Wa-Ayyooba iz naadaa Rabbahooo annee massaniyad durru Wa-Anta arhamur raahimeen
21:84: Fastajabnaa lahoo fakashaf-naa maa bihee min durrinw Wa-aatainaahu ahlahoo Wa-mislahum ma'ahum rahmatan min 'indinaa Wa-zikraa lil'aabideen
21:85: Wa-Ismaa'eela Wa-Idreesa Wa-Zal Kifli kullum minas saabireen
21:86: Wa-adkhalnaahum fee rahmatinaa innahum minas saaliheen
21:87: Wa-Zan Nooni iz zahaba mughaadiban fa-zannaa al lan naqdira 'alaihi fanaadaa fiz zulumaati al laaa ilaaha illaaa Anta Subhaanaka innee kuntu minaz zaalimeen
21:88: Fastajabnaa lahoo Wa-najjainaahu minal ghamm; Wa-kazaalika nunjil mu'mineen
21:89: Wa-Zakariyyaaa iz naadaa Rabbahoo Rabbi laa tazarnee fardanw Wa-Anta khairul waariseen
21:90: Fastajabnaa lahoo Wa-wahabnaa lahoo Yahyaa Wa-aslahnaa lahoo zawjah; innahum kaanoo yusaari'oona fil khairaati Wa-yad'oonanaa raghabanw Wa-rahabaa; Wa-kaanoo lanaa khaashi'een
21:91: Wallateee ahsanat farjahaa fanafakhnaa feehaa min roohinaa Wa-ja'alnaahaa wabnahaaa Aayatan lil'aalameen
21:92: Inna haaziheee ummatukum ummatanw waahidatanw Wa-Ana Rabbukum fa'budoon
21:93: Wa-taqatta'ooo amrahum bainahum kullun ilainaaa raaji'oon
21:94: Famaien ya'mal minas saalihaati Wa-huwa mu'minun falaa kufraana lisa'yihee Wa-innaa lahoo kaatiboon
21:95: Wa-haraamun 'alaa qaryatin ahlaknaahaaa annahum laa yarji'oon
21:96: Hattaaa izaa futihat Ya'jooju Wa-Ma'jooju Wa-hum min kulli hadabien yansiloon
21:97: Waqtarabal wa'dul haqqu fa-izaa hiya shaakhisatun absaarul lazeena kafaroo yaawailanaa qad kunna fee ghaflatin min haaza bal kunnaa zaalimeen
21:98: Innakum Wa-maa ta'budoona min doonil laahi hasabu Jahannama antum lahaa waaridoon
21:99: Law kaana haaa'ulaaa'i aalihatan maa waradoohaa Wa-kullun feehaa khaalidoon
21:100: Lahum feehaa zafeerunw Wa-hum feehaa laa yasma'oon
21:101: Innal lazeena sabaqat lahum minnal husnaaa ulaaa'ika 'anhaa mub'adoon
21:102: Laa yasma'oona hasee-sahaa Wa-hum fee mash tahat anfusuhum khaalidoon
21:103: Laa yahzunuhumul faza'ul akbaru Wa-tatalaq-qaahumul malaaa'ikatu haazaa Yawmukumul lazee kuntum too'adoon
21:104: Yawma natwis samaaa'a kataiyis sijilli lilkutub; kamaa bada'naa awwala khalqin nu'eeduh; wa'dan 'alainaa; innaa kunna faa'ileen
21:105: Wa-laqad katabnaa fiz Zaboori min ba'diz zikri annal arda yarisuhaa 'ibaadi-yas saalihoon
21:108: Qul innamaa yoohaa ilaiya annamaaa ilaahukum illaahunw Waahid, fahal antum muslimoon
21:109: Fa-in tawallaw faqul aazantukum 'alaa sawaaa'; Wa-in adreee aqareebun am ba'eedun maa too'adoon
21:110: Innahoo ya'lamul jahra minal qawli Wa-ya'lamu maa taktumoon
21:111: Wa-in adree la'allahoo fitnatul lakum Wa-mataa'un ilaa heen
21:112: Qaala Rabbih kum bil-haqq; Wa-Rabbunar Rahmaa-nul musta'aanu 'alaa maa tasifoon
22:1: Yaaa ayyuhan naasuttaqoo Rabbakum; inna zalzalatas Saa'ati shai'un 'azeem
22:2: Yawma tarawnahaa tazhalu kullu murdi'atin 'ammaaa arda'at Wa-tada'u kullu zaati hamlin hamlahaa Wa-tarannaasa sukaaraa Wa- maa hum bisukaaraa Wa-lakinaa 'azaabal laahi shadeed
22:3: Wa-minan naasi maien yujaadilu fil laahi bighairi 'ilminw Wa-yattabi'u kullaa shaitaanim mareed
22:4: Kutiba 'alaihi annahoo man tawallaahu fa-annahoo yudilluhoo Wa-yahdeehi ilaa 'azaabis sa'eer
22:5: Yaaa-ayyuhan naasu in kuntum fee raibin minal ba'thi fa-innaa khalaqnaakum min turaabin thumma min nutfatin thumma min 'alaqatin thumma min mudghatin mukhallaqatinw Wa-ghairi mukhallaqatin linubaiyina lakum; Wa-nuqirru fil arhaami maa nashaaa'u ilaaa ajalin musamman thumma nukhrijukum tiflan thumma litablughooo ashuddakum Wa-minkum mai yutawaffa Wa-minkum mai yuraddu ilaaa arzalil 'umuri likailaa ya'lama min ba'di 'ilmin shai'aa; Wa-taral arda haamidatan fa-izaaa anzalnaa 'alaihal maaa'ah tazzat Wa-rabat Wa-ambatat min kulli zawjin baheej
22:6: Zaalika bi annal laaha Huwal haqqu Wa-annahoo yuhyil mawtaa Wa-annahoo 'alaakulli shai'in Qadeer
22:7: Wa-annas Saa'ata aatiya tul laa raiba feeha Wa-annal laaha yab'asuman fil quboor
22:8: Wa-minan naasi maien yujaadilu fil laahi bighairi 'ilminw Wa-laa hudanw Wa-laa Kitaabim Muneer
22:9: Saaniya 'itfihee liyudilla 'an sabeelil laahi lahoo fiddun yaa khizyunw Wa-nuzeequhoo Yawmal Qiyaamati azaabal hareeq
22:10: Zaalika bimaa qaddamat yadaaka Wa-annal laaha laisa bizallaamil lil'abeed
22:11: Wa-minan naasi maien ya'budul laaha 'alaa harfin fa-in asaabahoo khairunit maanna bihee Wa-in asaabat-hu fitnatunin qalaba 'alaa wajhihee khasirad dunyaa wal-aakhirah; zaalika huwal khusraanul mubeen
22:12: Yad'oo min doonil laahi maa laa yadurruhoo Wa-maa laa yanfa'uh' zaalika huwad dalaalul ba'ed
22:13: Yad'oo laman darruhooo aqrabu min naf'ih; labi' salmawlaa Wa-labi'sal 'asheer
22:14: Innal laaha yudkhilul lazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaati jannaatin tajree min tahtihal anhaar; innal laaha yaf'alu maa yureed
22:15: Man kaana yazunnu al laien yansurahul laahu fid dunyaa wal-aakhirati fal-yamdud bisababin ilas samaaa'i summal yaqta' falyanzur hal yuzhibanna kaiduhoo maa yagheez
22:16: Wa-kazaalika anzalnaahu aayaatim baiyinaatinw Wa-annal laaha yahdee mai yureed
22:17: Innal lazeena aamanoo wallazeena haadoo was-saabi'eena wan-nasaaraa wal-Majoosa wallazeena ashrakooo innal laaha yafsilu bainahum yawmal qiyaamah; innal laaha 'alaa kulli shai'in shaheed
22:18: Alam tara annal laaha yasjudu lahoo man fis samaawaati Wa-man fil ardi wash-shamsu walqamaru wan-nu-joomu wal-jibaalu wash-shajaru wad-dawaaabbu Wa-kaseerum minan naasi Wa-kaseerun haqqa 'alaihil 'azaab; Wa-maien yuhinil laahu famaa lahoo mim mukrim; innal laaha yaf'alu maa yashaaa
22:19: Haazaani khasmaanikh tasamoo fee Rabbihim fal-lazeena kafaroo qutti'at lahum siyaabum min naar; yusabbu min fawqi ru'oosihimul hameem
22:20: Yusharu bihee maa fee butoonihim waljulood
22:22: Kullamaa araadooo any yakhrujoo minhaa min ghammin u'eedoo feeha Wa-zooqoo 'azaabal hareeq
22:23: Innal laaha yudkhilul lazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaati jannaatin tajree min tahtihal anhaaru yuhallawna feehaa min asaawira min zahabinw Wa-lu'lu'aa; Wa-libaasuhum feehaa hareer
22:24: Wa-hudooo ilat taiyibi minal qawli Wa-hudooo ilaaa siraatil hameed
22:25: Innal lazeena kafaroo Wa-yasuddoona 'an sabeelil laahi wal-Masjidil Haraamil lazee ja'alnaahu linnaasi sawaaa'anil 'aakifu feehi walbaad; Wa-maien yurid feehi bi-ilhaadim bizulmin nuziqhu min 'azaabin aleem
22:26: Wa-iz bawwaanaa li-Ibraaheema makaanal Baiti al laa tushrik bee shai'anw Wa-tahhir Baitiya litaaa'ifeena walqaaa'-imeena warrukka-'is sujood
22:27: Wa-azzin fin naasi bil-Hajji yaatooka rijaalanw Wa-'alaa kulli daamirien yaateena min kulli fajjin 'ameeq
22:28: Li yashhadoo manaafi'a lahum Wa-yazkurus mal laahi feee ayyaamimma'loomaatin 'alaa maa razaqahum mim baheematil an'aami fakuloo minhaa Wa-at'imul baaa'isal faqeer
22:29: Summal yaqdoo tafasahum wal-yoofoo nuzoorahum wal-yattawwafoo bil-Baitil 'Ateeq
22:30: Zaalika Wa-maien yu'azzim hurumaatil laahi fahuwa khairul lahoo 'inda Rabbih; Wa-uhillat lakumul an'aamu illaa maa yutlaa 'alaikum fajtanibur rijsa minal awsaani wajtaniboo qawlaz zoor
22:31: Hunafaaa'a lillaahi ghaira mushrikeena bih; Wa-maien yushrik billaahi faka-annamaa kharra minas samaaa'i fatakh-tafuhut tairu aw tahwee bihir reehu bee makaanin saheeq
22:32: Zaalika Wa-mai yu'azzim sha'aaa'iral laahi fa-innahaa min taqwal quloob
22:33: Lakum feehaa manaafi'u ilaaa ajalim musamman summa mahilluhaaa ilal Baitil 'Ateeq
22:34: Wa-likulli ummatin ja'alnaa mansakal liyazkurus mal laahi 'alaa maa razaqahum mim baheematil an'aam; failaahukum ilaahunw Waahidun falahooo aslimoo; Wa-bashshiril mukhbiteen
22:35: Allazeena izaa zukiral laahu wajilat quloobuhum wassaabireena 'alaa maaa asaabahum walmuqeemis Salaati Wa-mimmaa razaqnaahum yunfiqoon
22:36: Walbudna ja'alnaahaa lakum min sha'aaa'iril laahi lakum feehaa khairun fazkurus mal laahi 'alaihaa sawaaff; fa-izaa wajabat junoobuhaa fakuloo minhaa Wa-at'imul qaani'a walmu'tarr; kazaalika sakhkharnaahaa lakum la'allakum tashkuroon
22:37: Laien yanaalal laaha luhoo-muhaa Wa-laa dimaaa'uhaa Wa-laakiny yanaaluhut taqwaa minkum; kazaalika sakhkharhaa lakum litukabbirul laaha 'alaa ma hadaakum; Wa-bashshirul muhsineen
22:38: Innal laaha yudaafi' 'anil lazeena aamanoo; innal laaha laa yuhibbu kulla khawwaanin kafoor
22:39: Uzina lillazeena yuqaataloona bi-annahum zulimoo; Wa-innal laaha 'alaa nasrihim la-Qaderr
22:40: Allazeena ukhrijoo min diyaarihim bighairi haqqin illaaa any yaqooloo rabbunallaah; Wa-law laa daf'ul laahin naasa ba'dahum biba'dil lahuddimat sawaami'u Wa-biya'unw Wa-salawaatunw Wa-masaajidu yuzkaru feehasmul laahi kaseeraa; Wa-layansurannal laahu mai yansuruh; innal laaha la qawiyyun 'Azeez
22:41: Allazeena im makkan-naahum fil ardi aqaamus Salaata Wa-aatawuz Zakaata Wa-amaroo bilma'roofi Wa-nahaw 'anil munkar; Wa-lillaahi 'aaqibatul umoor
22:42: Wa-ien yukazzibooka faqad kazzabat qablahum qawmu Nooinw Wa-Aadunw Wa-Samood
22:44: Wa-as-haabu Madyana Wa-kuzziba Moosaa fa-amlaitu lilkaafireena summa akhaztuhum fakaifa kaana nakeer
22:45: Faka-ayyim min qaryatin ahlaknaahaa Wa-hiya zaalimatun fahiya khaawiyatun 'alaa 'urooshihaa Wa-bi'rim mu'at-talatinw Wa-qasrim masheed
22:46: Afalam yaseeroo fil ardi fatakoona lahum quloobuien ya'qiloona bihaaa aw aazaanunien yasma'oona bihaa fa-innahaa laa ta'mal absaaru Wa-laakin ta'mal quloobul latee fis sudoor
22:47: Wa-yasta'juloonaka bil'azaabi Wa-lany yukhlifal laahu wa'dah; Wa-inna yawman 'inda Rabbika ka'alfi sanatim mimmaa ta'uddoon
22:48: Wa-ka-ayyim min qaryatin amlaitu lahaa Wa-hiya zaalimatun summa akhaztuhaa Wa-ilaiyal maseer
22:49: Qul yaaa-ayyuhan naasu innamaaa ana lakum nazeerum mubeen
22:50: Fallazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilu saalihaati lahum maghfiratunw Wa-rizqun kareem
22:51: Wallazeena sa'aw feee Aayaatinaa mu'aajizeena ulaaa-ika As-haabul jaheem
22:52: Wa-maaa arsalnaa min qablika mir Rasoolinnw Wa-laa Nabiyyin illaaa izaaa tamannaaa alqash Shaitaanu feee umniy-yatihee fa-yansakhul laahu maa yulqish Shaitaanu summa yuhkimul laahu aayaatih; wallaahu 'Aleemun Hakeem
22:53: Liyaj'ala maa yulqish Shaitaanu fitnatal lillazeena fee quloobihim maradunw walqaasiyati quloobuhum; Wa-innaz zaalimeena lafee shiqaaqim ba'eed
22:54: Wa-liya'lamal lazeena ootul 'ilma annahul haqqu mir Rabbika fa-yu'minoo bihee fatukhbita lahoo quloobuhum; Wa-innal laaha lahaadil lazeena aamanoo ilaa Siraatim Mustaqeem
22:55: Wa-laa yazaalul lazeena kafaroo fee miryatim minhu hattaa taatiyahumus Saa'atu baghtatan aw yaatiyahum 'azaabu Yawmin 'aqeem
22:56: Almulku Yawma'izil lillaahi yahkumu bainahum; fallazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaati fee jannaatin Na'eem
22:57: Wallazeena kafaroo Wa-kazzaboo bi-Aayaatinaa fa-ulaaa'ika lahum 'azaabum muheen
22:58: Wallazeena haajaroo fee sabeelil laahi summa qutilooo aw maatoo la-yarzuqan-nahumul laahu rizqan hasanaa; Wa-innal laaha la-Huwa khairur raaziqeen
22:59: La-yudkhilan-nahum mud-khalaien yardawnah; Wa-innal laaha la-'Aleemun Haleem
22:60: Zaalika Wa-man 'aaqaba bimisli maa 'ooqiba bihee summa bughiya 'alaihi la-yansurannahul laah; innal laaha la-'Afuwwun Ghafoor
22:61: Zaalika bi-annal laaha yoolijul laila fin nahaari Wa-yoolijun nahaara fil laili Wa-annal laaha Samee'um Baseer
22:62: Zaalika bi-annal laaha Huwal haqqu Wa-anna maa yad'oona min doonihee huwal baatilu Wa-annal laaha Huwal 'Aliyyul kabeer
22:63: Alam tara annal laaha anzala minas samaaa'i maaa'an fatusbihul ardu mukhdarrah; innal laaha Lateefun Khabeer
22:64: Lahoo ma fis samaawaati Wa-ma fil ard; Wa-innal laaha la-Huwal Ghaniyyul Hameed
22:65: Alam tara annal laaha sakhkhara lakum maa fil ardi wal-fulka tajree fil bahri bi-amrihee Wa-yumsikus samaaa'a an taqa'a 'alal ardi illaa biiznih; innal laaha binnaasi la-Ra'oofur Raheem
22:66: Wa-Huwal lazee ahyaakum summa yumeetukum summa yuhyeekum; innal insaana la-kafoor
22:67: Likulli ummatin ja'alnaa mansakan hum naasikoohu falaa yunaazi-'unnaka fil amr; wad'u ilaa Rabbika innaka la-'alaa hudan mustaqeem
22:68: Wa-in jaadalooka faqulil laahu a'lamu bimaa ta'maloon
22:69: Allaahu yahkumu bainakum Yawmal Qiyaamati feemaa kuntum feehi takhtalifoon
22:70: Alam ta'lam annal laaha ya'lamu maa fis samaaa'i wal-ard; inna zaalika fee kitaab; inna zaalika 'alal laahi yaseer
22:71: Wa-ya'budoona min doonil laahi maa lam yunazzil bihee sultaananw Wa-maa laisa lahum bihee 'ilm; Wa-maa lizzaalimeena min naseer
22:72: Wa-izaa tutlaa 'laihim Aayaatunaa baiyyinaatin ta'rifu fee wujoohil lazeena kafarul munkara yakaadoona yastoona bil-lazeena yatloona 'alaihim Aayaatinaa; qul afa-unab-bi'ukum bisharrim min zaalikum; an-Naaru Wa-'adahal laahul lazeena kafaroo Wa-bi'sal maseer
22:73: Yaaa-ayyuhan naasu duriba masalun fastami'oo lah; innal lazeena tad'oona min doonil laahi laien yakhluqoo zubaabanw Wa-lawi ijtama'oo lahoo Wa-ien yaslub-humuz zubaabu shai'an laa yastanqizoohu minh; da'ufat taalibu wal-matloob
22:74: Maa qadrul laaha haqqa qadrih; innal laaha la-Qawiyyun 'Azeez
22:75: Allahu yastafee minal malaaa'ikati Rusulanw Wa-minan naas; innal laaha Samee'un Baseer
22:76: Ya'lamu maa baina aydeehim Wa-maa khalfahum; Wa-ilal laahi turja'ul umoor
22:77: Yaaa-ayyuhal lazeena aamanur ka'oo wasjudoo wa'budoo Rabbakum waf'alul khaira la'allakum tuflihoon
22:78: Wa-jaahidoo fil laahi haqqa jihaadih; Huwaj tabaakum Wa-maa ja'ala 'alaikum fid deeni min haraj; Millata abeekum Ibraaheem; Huwa sammaakumul muslimeena min qablu Wa-fee haaza li-yakoonar Rasoolu shaheedan 'alaikum Wa-takoonoo shuhadaaa'a 'alan naas; fa-aqeemus salaata Wa-aatuz zakaata wa'tasimoo billaahi Huwa mawlaakum fani'mal mawlaa Wa-ni'man naseer
23:6: Illaa 'alaaa azwaajihim aw maa malakat aimaanuhum fa-innahum ghairu maloomeen
23:7: Famanib taghaa waraaa'a zaalika fa-ulaaa'ika humul 'aadoon
23:11: Allazeena yarisoonal Firdawsa hum feehaa khaalidoon
23:12: Wa-laqad khalaqnal insaana min sulaalatim min teen
23:13: Summa ja'alnaahu nutfatan fee qaraarim makeen
23:14: Summa khalaqnan nutfata 'alaqatan fakhalaqnal 'alaqata mudghatan fakhalaq-nal mudghata 'izaaman fakasawnal 'izaama lahman summa anshaanaahu khalqan aakhar; fatabaarakal laahu ahsanul khaaliqeen
23:17: Wa-laqad khalaqnaa fawqakum sab'a taraaa'iqa Wa-maa kunnaa 'anil khalqi ghaafileen
23:18: Wa-anzalnaa minas samaaa'i maaa'am biqadarin fa-askannaahu fil ardi Wa-innaa 'alaa zahaabim bihee laqaa-diroon
23:19: Fa-anshaanaa lakum bihee Jannaatim min nakheelinw Wa-a'naab; lakum feehaa fawaakihu kaseeratunw Wa-minhaa taakuloon
23:20: Wa-shajaratan takhruju min Toori Sainaaa'a tambutu bidduhni Wa-sibghil lil-aakileen
23:21: Wa-inna lakum fil an'aami la'ibrah; nusqeekum mimmaa fee butoonihaa Wa-lakum feehaa manaafi'u kaseeratunw Wa-minhaa taakuloon
23:23: Wa-laqad arsalnaa Noohan ilaa qawmihee faqaala yaa qawmi'budul laaha maa lakum min ilahin ghairuhoo afalaa tattaqoon
23:24: Faqaalal mala'ul lazeena kafaroo min qawmihee maa haazaaa illaa basharum mislukum yureedu aien yatafaddala 'alaikum Wa-law shaaa'al laahu la-anzala malaaa'ikatam maa sami'naa bihaazaa feee aabaaa'inal awwaleen
23:25: In huwa illaa rajulum bihee jinnatun fatarabbasoo bihee hattan heen
23:27: Fa-awhainaaa ilaihi anis na'il fulka bi-a'yuninaa Wa-wahyinaa fa-izaa jaaa'a amrunaa Wa-faarat tannooru fasluk feehaa min kullin zawjainis naini Wa-ahlaka illaa man sabaqa 'alaihil qawlu minhum Wa-laa tukhaat-ibnee fil lazeena zalamooo innaahum mughraqoon
23:28: Fa-izas tawaita ata Wa-mam ma'aka 'alal fulki faqulil hamdu lillaahil lazee najjaanaa minal qawmiz zalimeen
23:29: Wa-qur Rabbi anzilnee munzalam mubaarakanw Wa-Anta khairul munzileen
23:30: Inna fee zaalika la-Aayaatinw Wa-in kunnaa lamubtaleen
23:31: Summaa anshaana mim ba'dihim qarnan aakhareen
23:32: Fa-arsalnaa feehim Rasoolam minhum ani 'budul laaha maa lakum min ilaahin ghairuhoo afalaa tattaqoon
23:33: Wa-qaalal mala-u min qawmihil lazeena kafaroo Wa-kazzaboo bi-liqaaa'il Aakhirati Wa-atrafnaahum fil hayaatid dunyaa maa haazaaa illaa basharum mislukum yaakulu mimmaa taakuloona minhu Wa-yashrabu mimmaa tashraboon
23:34: Wa-la'in at'atum basharam mislakum innakum izal lakhaasiroon
23:35: A-Ya'idukum annakum izaa mittum Wa-kuntum turaabanw Wa-izaaman annakum mukhrajoon
23:37: In hiya illaa hayaatunad dunyaa namootu Wa-nahyaa Wa-maa nahnu bimab'ooseen
23:38: In huwa illaa rajulunif taraa 'alal laahi kazibanw Wa-maa nahnuu lahoo bimu'mineen
23:41: Fa-akhazat-humus saihatu bilhaqqi faja'alnaahum ghusaaa'aa; fabu;dal lilqaw-miz zaalimeen
23:42: Summa anshaanaa mim ba'dihim quroonan aakhareen
23:43: Maa tasbiqu min ummatin ajalahaa Wa-maa yastaakhiroon
23:44: Summa arsalnaa Rusulanaa tatraa kulla maa jaaa'a ummatar Rasooluhaa kazzabooh; fa-atba'naa ba'dahum ba'danw Wa-ja'alnaahum ahaadees; fabu'dal liqawmil laa yu'minoon
23:45: Summa arsalnaa Moosaa Wa-akhaahu Haaroona bi-Aayaatinaa Wa-sultaanim mubeen
23:46: Ilaa Fir'awna Wa-mala'ihee fastakbaroo Wa-kaanoo qawman 'aaleen
23:47: Faqaaloo annu'minu libasharaini mislinaa Wa-qawmuhumaa lanaa 'aabidoon
23:49: Wa-laqad aatainaa Moosal Kitaaba la'allahum yahtadoon
23:50: Wa-ja'alnab na Maryama Wa-ummahooo aayatannw Wa-aawainaahumaaa ilaa rabwatin zaati qaraarinw Wa-ma'een
23:51: Yaaa-aiyuhar Rusulu kuloo minat taiyibaati wa'maloo saalihan innee bimaa ta'maloona 'Aleem
23:52: Wa-inna haaziheee ummatukum ummatanw waahidatanw Wa-Ana Rabbukum fattaqoon
23:53: Fataqatta'ooo amrahum bainahum zuburaa; kullu hizbim bimaa ladaihim farihoon
23:55: A-yahsaboona annnamaa numiduhum bihee mim maalinw Wa-baneen
23:56: Nusaari'u lahum fil khairaat; bal laa yash'uroon
23:57: Innal lazeena hum min khashyati Rabbihim mushfiqoon
23:60: Wallazeena yu'toona maaa aataw Wa-quloobuhum wajilatun annahum ilaa Rabbihim raaji'oon
23:61: Ulaaa'ika yusaari'oona fil khairaati Wa-hum lahaa saabiqoon
23:62: Wa-laa nukallifu nafsan illaa wus'ahaa Wa-ladainaa kitaabuny yantiqu bilhaqqi Wa-ahum la yuzlamoon
23:63: Bal quloobuhum fee ghamratim min haazaa Wa-lahum a'maalum min dooni zaalika hum lahaa 'aamiloon
23:64: Hattaaa izaaa akhaznaa mutrafeehim bil'azaabi izaa hum yaj'aroon
23:65: Laa taj'arul yawma innakum minnaa laa tunsaroon
23:66: Qad kaanat Aayaatee tutlaa 'alaikum fakuntum 'alaaa a'qaabikum tankisoon
23:68: Afalam yaddabbarrul qawla am jaaa'ahum maa lam yaati aabaaa'ahumul awwaleen
23:69: Am lam ya'rifoo Rasoolahum fahum lahoo munkiroon
23:70: Am yaqooloona bihee jinnnah; bal jaaa'ahum bilhaqqi Wa-aksaruhum lil-haqqi kaarihoon
23:71: Wa-lawit taba'al haqqu ahwaaa'ahum lafasadatis samaawaatu wal-ardu Wa-man feehinnn; bal atainaahum bizikrihim fahum 'an zikrihim mu'ridoon
23:72: Am tas'aluhum kharjan fakharaaju Rabbika khairunw Wa-Huwa khairur raaziqeen
23:74: Wa-innnal lazeena laa yu'minoona bil-Aakhirati 'anis siraati lanaakiboon
23:75: Wa-law rahimnaahum Wa-kashafnaa maa bihim min durril lalajjoo fee tughyaanihim ya'mahoon
23:76: Wa-laqad akhaznaahum bil'azaabi famas takaanoo li-Rabbihim Wa-maa yatadarra'oon
23:77: Hattaaa izaa fatahnaa 'alaihim baaban zaa 'azaabin shadeedin izaa hum feehi mublisoon
23:78: Wa-Huwal lazeee ansha-a lakumus sam'a wal-absaara wal-af'idah; qaleelam maa tashkuroon
23:79: Wa-Huwal lazee zara-akum fil ardi Wa-ilaihi tuhsharoon
23:80: Wa-Huwal lazee yuhyee Wa-yumeetu Wa-lahukh tilaaful laili wannahaar; afalaa ta'qiloon
23:81: Bal qaaloo misla maa qaalal awwaloon
23:82: Qaalooo 'a-izaa mitnaa Wa-kunnaa turaabanw Wa-'izaaman 'a-innaa lamab-'oosoon
23:83: Laqad wu'idnaa nahnu Wa-aabaaa'unaa haazaa min qablu in haazaaa illaaa asaateerul awwaleen
23:84: Qul limanil ardu Wa-man feehaaa in kuntum ta'lamoon
23:86: Qul mar Rabbus samaawaatis sab'i Wa-Rabbul 'Arshil 'Azeem
23:88: Qul mam bi-yadihee malakootu kulli shai'inw Wa-Huwa yujeeru Wa-laa yujaaru 'alaihi in kuntum ta'lamoon
23:91: Mat takhazal laahu minw waladinw Wa-maa kaana ma'ahoo min ilaah; izal lazahaba kullu ilaahim bimaa khalaqa Wa-la'alaa ba'duhum 'alaa ba'd; Subhaannal laahi 'ammaa yasifoon
23:93: Qur Rabbi immmaa turiyannee maa yoo'adoon
23:94: Rabbi falaa taj'alnee fil qawmiz zaalimeen
23:95: Wa-innaa 'alaaa an nuriyaka maa na'iduhum laqaadiroon
23:96: Idfa' billate hiya ahsanus saiyi'ah; nahnu a'lamu bimaa yasifoon
23:97: Wa-qur Rabbi a'oozu bika min hamazaatish Shayaateen
23:99: Hattaaa izaa jaaa'a ahada-humul mawtu qaala Rabbir ji'oon
23:100: La'alleee a'malu saalihan feemaa taraktu kallaa; innahaa kalimatun huwa qaaa'iluhaa Wa-minw waraaa'ihim barzakhun ilaa Yawmi yub'asoon
23:101: Fa-izaa nufikha fis Soori falaaa ansaaba bainahum yawma'izinw Wa-laa yatasaaa'aloon
23:102: Faman saqulat mawaazee-nuhoo fa-ulaaa'ika humul muflihoon
23:103: Wa-man khaffat mawaa-zeenuhoo fa-ulaaa'ikal lazeena khasiroo 'anfusahum fee Jahannama khaalidoon
23:104: Talfahu wujoohahumun Naaru Wa-hum feehaa kaalihoon
23:105: Alam takun Aayaatee tutlaa 'alaikum fakuntum bihaa tukazziboon
23:106: Qaaloo Rabbanaa ghalabat 'alainaa shiqwatunaa Wa-kunnaa qawman daaalleen
23:107: Rabbanaa akhrijnaa minhaa fa-in 'udnaa fa-innaa zaalimoon
23:109: Innahoo kaana fareequm min 'ibaadee yaqooloona Rabbanaaa aamannaa faghfir lanaa warhamnaa Wa-Anta khairur raahimeen
23:110: Fattakhaztumoohum sikhriyyan hattaaa ansawkum zikree Wa-kuntum minhum tadhakoon
23:111: Inee jazaituhumul Yawma bimaa sabarooo annahum humul faaa'izoon
23:112: Qaala kam labistum fil ardi 'adada sineen
23:113: Qaaloo labisnaa yawman aw ba'da yawmin fas'alil 'aaaddeen
23:114: Qaala il labistum illaa qaleelal law annakum kuntum ta'lamoon
23:115: Afahsibtum annamaa khalaqnaakum 'abasanw Wa-annakum ilainaa laa turja'oon
23:116: Fata'aalal laahul Malikul Haqq; laaa ilaaha illaa Huwa Rabbul 'Arshil Kareem
23:117: Wa-maien yad'u ma'allaahi ilaahan aakhara laa burhaana lahoo bihee fa-inna maa hisaabuhoo 'inda Rabbih; innahoo laa yuflihul kaafiroon
23:118: Wa-qul Rabbigh fir warham Wa-Anta khairur raahimeen
24:1: Sooratun anzalnaahaa Wa-faradnaahaa Wa-anzalnaa feehaaa Aayaatim baiyinaatil la'allakum tazakkaroon
24:2: Azzaaniyatu wazzaanee fajlidoo kulla waahidim minhumaa mi'ata jaldatinw Wa-laa taakhuzkum bihimaa raafatun fee deenil laahi in kuntum tu'minoona billaahi wal-Yawmil Aakhiri wal-yashhad 'azaabahumaa taaa'ifatum minal mu'mineen
24:3: Azzaanee laa yankihu illaa zaaniyatan aw mushrikatanw wazzaaniyatu laa yankihuhaaa illaa zaanin aw mushrik; Wa-hurrima zaalika 'alal mu'mineen
24:4: Wallazeena yarmoonal muhsanaati summa lam yaatoo bi-arba'ati shuhadaaa'a fajlidoohum samaaneena jaldatanw Wa-laa taqbaloo lahum shahaadatan abadaa; Wa-ulaaa'ika humul faasiqoon
24:5: Illal lazeena taaboo mim ba'di zaalika Wa-aslahoo fa-innal laaha Ghafoorur Raheem
24:6: Wallazeena yarmoona azwaajahum Wa-lam yakul lahum shuhadaaa'u illaaa anfusuhum fashahaadatu ahadihim arba'u shahaadaatim billaahi innahoo laminas saadiqeen
24:7: Wal-khaamisatu anna la'natal laahi 'alaihi in kaana minal kaazibeen
24:8: Wa-yadra'u anhal 'azaaba an tashhada arba'a shahaa-daatim billaahi innahoo laminal kaazibeen
24:9: Wal-khaamisata anna ghadabal laahi 'alaihaaa in kaana minas saadiqeen
24:10: Wa-law-laa fadlul laahi 'alaikum Wa-rahmatuhoo Wa-annal laaha Tawwaabun Hakeem
24:11: Innal lazeena jaaa'oo bilifki 'usbatum minkum; laa tahsaboohu sharral lakum bal huwa khairul lakum; likul limri'im minhum mak tasaba minal ism; wallazee tawallaa kibrahoo minhum lahoo 'azaabun 'azeem
24:12: Law-laaa iz sami'tumoohu zannal mu'minoona walmu'minaatu bi-anfusihim khairanw Wa-qaaloo haazaaa ifkum mubeen
24:13: Law-laa jaaa'oo 'alaihi bi-arba'ati shuhadaaa'; fa-iz lam yaatoo bishshuhadaaa'i fa-ulaaa-'ika 'indal laahi humul kaaziboon
24:14: Wa-law-laa fadlul laahi 'alaikum Wa-rahmatuhoo fiddunyaa wal aakhirati lamassakum fee maaa afadtum feehi 'azaabun 'azeem
24:15: Iz talaqqawnahoo bi-alsinatikum Wa-taqooloona bi-afwaahikum maa laisa lakum bihee 'ilmunw Wa-tahsaboo-nahoo haiyinanw Wa-huwa 'indal laahi 'azeem
24:16: Wa-law-laaa iz sami'tu-moohu qultum maa yakoonu lanaaa an natakallama bihaazaa Subhaanaka haaza buhtaanun 'azeem
24:17: Ya'izukumul laahu an ta'oodoo limisliheee abadan in kuntum mu'mineen
24:18: Wa-yubaiyinul laahu lakumul Aayaat; wallaahu 'Aleemun Hakeem
24:19: Innal lazeena yuhibboona an tashee'al faahishatu fil lazeena aamanoo lahum 'azaabun aleemun fid dunyaa wal-Aakhirah; wallaahu ya'lamu Wa-antum laa ta'lamoon
24:20: Wa-law-laa fadlul laahi 'alaikum Wa-rahmatuhoo Wa-annal laaha Ra'oofur Raheem
24:21: Yaaa aiyyuhal lazeena aamanoo laa tattabi'oo khutuwaatish Shaitaan; Wa-many-yattabi' khutuwaatish Shaitaani fa-innahoo yaamuru bilfahshaaa'i walmunkar; Wa-law laa fadlul laahi 'alaikum Wa-rahmatuhoo maa zakaa minkum min ahadin abadanw Wa-laakinnal laaha yuzakkee many-yashaaa'; wallaahu Samee'un 'Aleem
24:22: Wa-laa yaatali ulul fadli minkum wassa'ati ai yu'tooo ulil qurbaa walmasaakeena walmuhaajireena fee sabeelillaahi walya'foo walyasfahoo; alaa tuhibboona aien yaghfiral laahu lakum; wal laahu Ghafoorur Raheem
24:23: Innal lazeena yarmoonal muhsanaatil ghaafilaatil mu'minaati lu'inoo fid dunyaa wal-Aakhirati Wa-lahum 'azaabun 'azeem
24:24: Yawma tashhhadu 'alaihim alsinatuhum Wa-aideehim Wa-arjuluhum bimaa kaanoo ya'maloon
24:25: Yawma'izien yuwaf-feehimul laahu deenahumul haqqa Wa-ya'lamoona annal laaha Huwal Haqqul Mubeen
24:26: Al-khabeesaatu lil-khabeeseena wal-khabeesoona lil-khabeesaati wat-taiyibaatu lit-taiyibeena wat-taiyiboona lit-taiyibaat; ulaaa'ika mubarra'oona mimma yaqooloona lahum maghfiratunw Wa-rizqun kareem
24:27: Yaaa-aiyyuhal lazeena aamanoo laa tadkhuloo buyootan ghaira buyootikum hatta tastaanisoo Wa-tusallimoo 'allaa ahlihaa; zaalikum khairul lakum la'allakum tazakkaroon
24:28: Fa-il lam tajidoo feehaaa ahadan falaa tadkhuloohaa hattaa yu'zana lakum Wa-in qeela lakumur ji'oo farji'oo huwa azkaa lakum; wallaahu bimaa ta'maloona 'Aleem
24:29: Laisa 'alaikum junaahun ann tadkhuloo buyootan ghaira maskoonatin feeha mataa'ul lakum; wallaahu ya'lamu maa tubdoona Wa-maa taktumoon
24:30: Qul lilmu' mineena yaghuuddoo min absaarihim Wa-yahfazoo furoojahum; zaalika azkaa lahum; innallaaha khabeerum bimaa yasna'oon
24:31: Wa qul lilmu'minaati yaghdudna min absaarihinna Wa-yahfazna furoojahunna Wa-laa yubdeena zeenatahunna illaa maa zahara minhaa walyadribna bikhumurihinna 'alaa juyoobihinna Wa-laa yubdeena zeenatahunna illaa libu'oolatihinna aw aabaaa'i hinna aw aabaaa'i bu'oolati hinna aw abnaaa'ihinaa aw abnaaa'i bu'oolatihinnna aw ikhwaanihinnna aw baneee ikhwaanihinna aw banee akhawaatihinna aw nisaaa'i hinna aw maa malakat aimaanuhunna awit taabi'eena ghairi ilil irbati minar rijaali awit tiflillazeena lam yazharoo 'alaa 'awraatin nisaaa'i wala yadribnna bi arjulihinna min zeenatihinn; Wa-toobooo ilallaahi jammee'an aiyuhal mu'minoona la'allakum tuflihoon
24:32: Wa-ankihul ayaamaa minkum was-saaliheena min 'ibaadikum Wa-imaa'kum; ien yakoonoo fuqaraaa'a yughni-himul laahu min fadlih; wal-laahu Waasi'un 'Aleem
24:33: Wal-yasta'fifil lazeena laa yajidoona nikaahan hatta yughniyahumul laahu min fadlih; wallazeena yabtaghoonal kitaaba mimmaa malakat aimaanukum fakaatiboohum in 'alimtum feehim khairanw Wa-aatoohum mim maalil laahil lazeee aataakum; Wa-laa tukrihoo fatayaatikum 'alal bighaaa'i in aradna tahassunal litabtaghoo 'aradal hayaatid dunyaa; Wa-mai yukrihhunna fa-innal laaha mim ba'di ikraahihinna Ghafoorur Raheem
24:34: Wa-laqad anzalnaaa ilaikum Aayaatim mubaiyinaatinw Wa-masalam minnal lazeena khalaw min qablikum Wa-maw'izatal lilmuttaqeen
24:35: Allaahu noorus samaawaati wal-ard; masalu noorihee kamishkaatin feehaa misbaah; almisbaahu fee zujaajatin azzujaajatu ka-annahaa kawkabun durriyyuien yooqadu min shajaratim mubaarakatin zaitoonatil laa shariqiyyatinw Wa-laa gharbiyyatien yakaadu zaituhaa yudeee'u Wa-law lam tamsashu naar; noorun 'alaa noor; yahdil laahu linoorihee mai yashaaa'; Wa-yadribul laahul amsaala linnaas; wallaahu bikulli shai'in Aleem
24:36: Fee buyootin azinal laahu an turfa'a Wa-yuzkara feehas muhoo yusabbihu lahoo feehaa bilghuduwwi wal-aasaal
24:37: Rijaalul laa tulheehim tijaaratunw Wa-laa bai'un 'an zikril laahi Wa-iqaamis Salaati Wa-eetaaa'iz Zakaati yakhaafoona Yawman tataqallabu feehil quloobu wal-absaar
24:38: Liyajziyahumul laahu ahsana maa 'amiloo Wa-yazeedahum min fadlih; wal-laahu yarzuqu maien yashaaa'u bighairi hisaab
24:39: Wallazeena kafarooo a'maaluhum kasaraabim biqee'atien yahsabuhuz zamaanu maaa'an hattaaa izaa jaaa'ahoo lam yajid-hu shai'anw Wa-wajadal laaha 'indahoo fa-waffaahu hisaabah; wallaahu saree'ul hisaab
24:40: Aw kazulumaatin fee bahril lujjiyyiny yaghshaahu mawjun min fawqihee mawjun min fawqihee sahaab; zulumatun ba'duhaa fawqa ba'din izaaa akhraja yadahoo lam yakad yaraahaa Wa-man lam yaj'alil laahu lahoo nooran famaa lahoo min noor
24:41: Alam tara annal laaha yusabbihu lahoo man fissamaawaati wal-ardi wat tairu saaaffaatim kullun qad 'alima Salaatahoo Wa-tasbeehah; wallaahu 'aleemum bimaa yaf'aloon
24:42: Wa-lillaahi mulkus samaawaati wal-ardi Wa-ilal laahil maseer
24:43: Alam tara annal laaha yuzjee sahaaban summa yu'allifu bainahoo summa yaj'aluhoo rukaaman fataral wadqa yakhruju min khilaalihee Wa-yunazzilu minas samaaa'i min jibaalin feehaa mim baradin fa-yuseebu bihee maien yashaaa'u Wa-yasrifuhoo 'am maien yashaaa'u yakaadu sanaa barqihee yazhabu bil-absaar
24:44: Yuqallibul laahul laila wannahaar; inna fee zaalika la'ibratal li-ulil absaar
24:45: Wallaahu khalaqa kulla daaabbatim mim maaa'in faminhum mai yamshee 'alaa batnihee Wa-minhum mai yamshee 'alaa rijlaine Wa-minhum maien yamshee 'alaaa arba'; yakhluqul laahu maa yashaaa'; innal laaha 'alaa kulli shai'in Qadeer
24:46: Laqad anzalnaaa Aayaatim mubaiyinaat; wallaahu yahdee mai yashaaa'u ilaa Siraatim Mustaqeem
24:47: Wa-yaqooloona aamannaa billaahi Wa-bir-Rasooli Wa-ata'naa summa yatawallaa fareequm minhum mim ba'di zaalik; Wa-maaa ulaaa'ika bilmu'mineen
24:48: Wa-izaa du'ooo ilal laahi Wa-Rasoolihee li-yahkuma bainahum izaa fareequm minhum mu'ridoon
24:49: Wa-ien yakul lahumul haqqu yaatooo ilaihi muz'ineen
24:50: Afee quloobihim ma-radun amir taabooo am yakhaafoona aien yaheefal laahu 'alaihim Wa-Rasooluh; bal ulaaa'ika humuz zaalimoon
24:51: Innamaa kaana qawlal mu'mineena izaa du'ooo ilal laahi Wa-Rasoolihee li-yahkuma bainahum ai yaqooloo sami'naa Wa-ata'naa; Wa-ulaaa'ika humul muflihoon
24:52: Wa-maien yuti'il laaha Wa-Rasoolahoo Wa-yakhshal laaha Wa-yattaqhi fa-ulaaa'ika humul faaa'izoon
24:53: Wa-aqsamoo billaahi jahda aimaanihim la'in amartahum la-yakhrujunna qul laa tuqsimoo taa'atum ma'roofah innal laaha khabeerum bimaa ta'maloon
24:54: Qul atee'ul laaha Wa-atee'ur Rasoola fa-in tawallaw fa-innamaa 'alaihi maa hummila Wa-'alaikum maa hummiltum Wa-in tutee'oohu tahtadoo; Wa-maa 'alar Rasooli illal balaaghul mubeen
24:55: Wa'adal laahul lazeena aamanoo minkum Wa-'amilus saalihaati la-yastakh-lifan-nahum fil ardi kamastakh lafal lazeena min qablihim Wa-la-yumakki-nanna lahum deenahumul lazir tadaa lahum Wa-la-yubaddi-lannahum mim ba'di khawfihim amnaa; ya'budoona-nee laa yushrikoona bee shai'aa; Wa-man kafara ba'da zaalika fa-ulaaa'ika humul faasiqoon
24:56: Wa-aqeemus Salaata Wa-aatuz Zakaata Wa-atee'ur Rasoola la'allakum turhamoon
24:57: Laa tahsabannal lazeena kafaroo mu'jizeena fil ard; Wa-maawaahumun Naaru Wa-labi'sal maseer
24:58: Yaaa-aiyyuhal lazeena aamanoo li-yasta'zinkumul lazeena malakat aimaanukum wallazeena lam yablughul huluma minkum salaasa marraat; min qabli Salaatil Fajri Wa-heena tada'oona siyaa-bakum minaz zaheerati Wa-min ba'di Salaatil Ishaaa'; salaasu 'awraatil lakum; laisa 'alaikum Wa-laa 'alaihim junaahun ba'dahunn; tawwaafoona 'alaikum ba'dukum 'alaa ba'd; kazaalika yubaiyyinul laahu lakumul aayaat; wallahu 'Aleemun Hakeem
24:59: Wa-izaa balaghal atfaalu minkumul huluma fal-yasta'zinoo kamas ta'zanal lazeena min qablihim; kazaalika yubaiyinul laahu lakum Aayaatih; wallaahu 'Aleemun Hakeem
24:60: Walqawaa'idu minan nisaaa'il laatee laa yarjoona nikaahan fa-laisa 'alaihinna junaahun aien yada'na siyaabahunna ghaira mutabarrijaatin bi-zeenah; Wa-aien yasta'fif-na khairul lahunn; wallaahu Samee'un 'Aleem
24:61: Laisa 'alal a'maa harajunw Wa-laa 'alal a'raji harajunw Wa-laa 'alal mareedi harajun Wa-laa 'alaa anfusikum 'an ta'kuloo min buyootikum aw buyooti aabaaa'ikum aw buyooti ummahaatikum aw buyooti ikhwaanikum aw buyooti akhawaatikum aw buyooti a'maamikum aw buyooti 'ammaatikum aw buyooti akhwaalikum aw buyooti khaalaatikum aw maa malaktum mafaatihahooo aw sadeeqikum; laisa 'alaikum junaahun 'an ta'kuloo jamee'an aw ashtaata; fa-izaa dakhaltum buyootan fa-sallimoo 'alaaa anfusikum tahiyyatan min 'indil laahi mubaarakatan taiyyibah; kazaalika yubai-yyinul laahu lakumul Aayaati la'allakum ta'qiloon
24:62: Innamal mu'minoonal lazeena aamanoo billaahi Wa-Rasoolihee Wa-izaa kaanoo ma'ahoo 'alaaa amrin jaami'il lam yazhaboo hattaa yasta'zinooh; innal lazeena yasta'zinoonaka ulaaa'ikal lazeena yu'minoona billaahi Wa-Rasoolih; fa-izas ta'zanooka li-ba'di sha'nihim fa'zal liman shi'ta minhum wastaghfir lahumul laah; innal laaha Ghafoorur Raheem
24:63: Laa taj'aloo du'aaa'ar Rasooli bainakum ka-du'aaa'i ba'dikum ba'daa; qad ya'lamul laahul lazeena yatasallaloona minkum liwaazaa; fal-yahzaril lazeena yukhaalifoona 'an amriheee 'an tuseebahum fitnatun aw yuseebahum 'azaabun aleem
24:64: Alaaa inna lillaahi maa fis samaawaati wal-ardi qad ya'lamu maaa antum 'alaihi Wa-Yawma yurja'oona ilaihi fa-yunabbi'uhum bimaa 'amiloo; wallaahu bikulli shai'in 'Aleem
25:1: Tabaarakal lazee nazzalal Furqaana 'alaa 'abdihee li-yakoona lil'aalameena nazeera
25:2: Allazee lahoo mulkus samaawaati wal ardi Wa-lam yattakhiz waladanw Wa-lam yakul lahoo shareekun filmulki Wa-khalaqa kulla shai'in faqaddarahoo taqdeeraa
25:3: Wattakhazoo min dooniheee aalihatal laa yakhluqoona shai'anw Wa-hum yukhlaqoona Wa-laa yamlikoona li-anfusihim darranw Wa-laa naf'anw Wa-laa yamlikoona mawtanw Wa-laa hayaatanw Wa-laa nushooraa
25:4: Wa-qaalal lazeena kafarooo in haazaaa illaaa ifkunif taraahu Wa-a'aanahoo 'alaihi qawmun aakharoona faqad jaaa'oo zulmanw Wa-zooraa
25:5: Wa-qaalooo asaateerul awwaleenak tatabahaa fahiya tumlaa 'alaihi bukratanw Wa-aseelaa
25:6: Qul anzalhul lazee ya'lamus sirra fis samaawaati wal-ard; innahoo kaana Ghafoorar Raheemaa
25:7: Wa-qaaloo maa-li haazar Rasooli ya'kulut ta'aama Wa-yamshee fil aswaaq; law-laaa unzila ilaihi malakun fa-yakoona ma'ahoo nazeeraa
25:8: Aw yulqaaa ilaihi kanzun aw takoonu lahoo jannatuien ya'kulu minhaa; Wa-qaalaz zaalimoona in tattabi'oona illaa rajulan mas-hooraa
25:9: Unzur kaifa daraboo lakal amsaala fadalloo falaa yastatee'oona sabeelaa
25:10: Tabaarakal lazeee in shaaa'a ja'ala laka khairan min zaalika jannaatin tajree min tahtihal anhaaru Wa-yaj'al laka qusooraa
25:11: Bal kazzaboo bis-Saa'ati Wa-a'tadnaa liman kazzaba bis-Saa'ati sa'eeraa
25:12: Izaa ra'at-hum min makaanin ba'eedin sami'oo lahaa taghaiyuzanw Wa-zafeeraa
25:13: Wa-izaaa ulqoo minhaa makaanan daiyyiqam muqar-raneena da'aw hunaalika thuboora
25:14: Laa tad'ul yawma thubooranw waahidanw wad'oo thubooran kaseeraa
25:15: Qul azaalika khairun am Jannatul khuldil latee wu'idal muttaqoon; kaanat lahum jazaaa'anw Wa-maseeraa
25:16: Lahum feehaa maa yashaaa'oona khaalideen; kaana 'alaa Rabbika wa'dan mas'oolaa
25:17: Wa-Yawma yahshuruhum Wa-maa ya'budoona min doonil laahi fa-yaqoolu 'a-antum adlaltum 'ibaadee haaa'ulaaa'i am hum dallus sabeel
25:18: Qaaloo Subhaanaka maa kaana yanbaghee lanaaa an nattakhiza min doonika min awliyaaa'a Wa-laakin matta'tahum Wa-aabaaa'ahum hattaa nasooz zikra Wa-kaanoo qawman booraa
25:19: Faqad kazzabookum bimaa taqooloona famaa tastatee'oona sarfanw Wa-laa nasraa; Wa-many yazlim minkum nuziqhu 'azaaban kabeeraa
25:20: Wa-maaa arsalnaa qablaka minal mursaleena illaaa innahum la-ya'kuloonat ta'aama Wa-yamshoona fil aswaaq; Wa-ja'alnaa ba'dakum liba'din fitnatan atasbiroon; Wa-kaana Rabbuka Baseera
25:21: Wa-qaalal lazeena laa yarjoona liqaaa'anaa law-laaa unzila 'alainal malaaa'ikatu aw naraa Rabbanaa; laqadis takbaroo feee anfusihim Wa-'ataw 'utuwwan kabeeraa
25:22: Yawma yarawnal malaaa-'ikata laa bushraa Yawmaizin lil-mujrimeena Wa-yaqooloona hijran mahjooraa
25:23: Wa qadimnaaa ilaa maa 'amiloo min 'amalin faja'alnaahuhabaaa'an manthooraa
25:24: As-haabul jannati yawma'izin khairun mustaqar-ranw Wa-ahsanu maqeela
25:25: Wa-Yawma tashaqqaqus samaaa'u bilghamaami Wa-nuzzilal malaaa'ikatu tanzeela
25:26: Almulku Yawma'izinil haqqu lir Rahmaan; Wa-kaana Yawman'alal kaafireena 'aseeraa
25:27: Wa-Yawma ya'adduz zaalimu 'alaa yadaihi yaqoolu yaa-laitanit takhaztu ma'ar Rasooli sabeelaa
25:28: Yaa-wailataa laitanee lam attakhiz fulaanan khaleelaa
25:29: Laqad adallanee 'aniz zikri ba'da iz jaaa'anee; Wa-kaanash Shaitaanu lil-insaani khazoolaa
25:30: Wa-qaalar Rasoolu yaa-Rabbi inna qawmit takhazoo haazal Qur'aana mahjooraa
25:31: Wa-kazaalika ja'alnaa likulli Nabiyyin 'aduwwan minal mujrimeen; Wa-kafaa bi-Rabbika haadiyanw Wa-naseeraa
25:32: Wa-qaalal lazeena kafaroo law-laa nuzzila 'alaihil Qur'aanu jumlatanw waahidah; kazaalika linusabbita bihee fu'aadaka Wa-rattalnaahu tarteelaa
25:33: Wa-laa ya'toonaka bi-masalin illaa ji'naaka bilhaqqi Wa-ahsana tafseeraa
25:34: Allazeena yuhsharoona 'alaa wujoohihim ilaa jahannama ulaaa'ika sharrun makaananw Wa-adallu sabeelaa
25:35: Wa-laqad aatainaa Moosal Kitaaba Wa-ja'alnaa ma'ahooo akhaahu Haaroona wazeeraa
25:36: Faqulnaz habaaa ilal qawmil lazeena kazzaboo bi-Aayaatinaa fadammarnaahum tadmeeraa
25:37: Wa-qawma Noohin lammaa kazzabur Rusula aghraqnaahum Wa-ja'alnaahum linnaasi Aayatanw Wa-a'tadnaa lizzaalimeena 'azaaban aleemaa
25:38: Wa-'Aadanw Wa-Samooda Wa-As-haabar Rassi Wa-quroonan baina zaalika katheeraa
25:39: Wa-kullan darabnaa lahul amsaala Wa-kullan tabbarnaa tatbeera
25:40: Wa-laqad ataw 'alal qaryatil lateee umtirat mataras saw'; afalam yakoonoo yarawnahaa; bal kaanoo laa yarjoona nushooraa
25:41: Wa-izaa ra-awka ien yattakhizoonaka illaa huzuwan ahaazal lazee ba'asal laahu Rasoolaa
25:42: In kaada la-yudillunaa 'an aalihatinaa law-laaa an sabarnaa 'alaihaa; Wa-sawfa ya'lamoona heena yarawnal 'azaaba man adallu sabeela
25:43: Ara'aita manit takhaza ilaahahoo hawaahu afa-anta takoonu 'alaihi wakeelaa
25:44: Am tahsabu anna aksarahum yasma'oona aw ya'qiloon; in hum illaa kal-an'aami bal hum adallu sabeelaa
25:45: Alam tara ilaa Rabbika kaifa maddaz zilla Wa-law shaaa'a la-ja'alahoo saakinan thumma ja'alnash shamsa 'alaihi daleelaa
25:47: Wa-Huwal lazee ja'ala lakumul laila libaasanw wannawma subaatanw Wa-ja'alan nahaara nushooraa
25:48: Wa-Huwal lazeee arsalar riyaaha bushran baina yadai rahmatih; Wa-anzalnaa minas samaaa'i maaa'an tahooraa
25:49: Linuhyiya bihee baldatan maitanw-wa nusqiyahoo mimmaa khalaqnaaa an'aamanw Wa-anaasiyya katheeraa
25:50: Wa-laqad sarrafnaahu bainahum li-yazzakkaroo fa-abaaa aksarun naasi illaa kufooraa
25:51: Wa-law shi'naa laba'asnaa fee kulli qaryatin nazeeraa
25:52: Falaa tuti'il kaafireena Wa-jaahidhum bihee jihaadan kabeeraa
25:53: Wa-Huwal lazee marajal bahraini haazaa 'azbun furaatunw Wa-haazaa milhun ujaaj; Wa-ja'ala bainahumaa barzakhanw Wa-hijran mahjooraa
25:54: Wa-Huwal lazee khalaqa minal maaa'i basharan fa-ja'alahoo nasaban Wa-sihraa; Wa-kaana Rabbuka Qadeeraa
25:55: Wa-ya'budoona min doonil laahi maa laa yanfa'uhum Wa-laa yadurruhum; Wa-kaanal kaafiru 'alaa Rabbihee zaheeraa
25:57: Qul maaa as'alukum 'alaihi min ajrin illaa man shaaa'a ai yattakhiza ilaa Rabbihee sabeelaa
25:58: Wa-tawakkal 'alal Haiyil lazee laa yamootu Wa-sabbih bihamdih; Wa-kafaa bihee bizunoobi 'ibaadihee khabeeraa
25:59: Allazee khalaqas samaawaati wal-arda Wa-maa bainahumaa fee sittati aiyaamin thumma stawaa 'alal 'Arsh; ar-Rahmaanu fas'al bihee khabeeraa
25:60: Wa-izaa qeela lahumus judoo lir-Rahmaani qaaloo Wa-mar Rahmaanu 'a-nasjudu limaa ta'murunaa Wa-zaadahum nufooraa
25:61: Tabaarakal lazee ja'ala fis samaaa'i buroojanw Wa-ja'ala feehaa siraajanw Wa-qamaran muneeraa
25:62: Wa-huwal lazee ja'alal laila wannahaara khilfatan liman araada 'any yazzakkara aw araadaa shukooraa
25:63: Wa-'ibaadur Rahmaanil lazeena yamshoona 'alal ardi hawnanw Wa-izaa khaata-bahumul jaahiloona qaaloo salaamaa
25:65: Wallazeena yaqooloona Rabbanas rif 'annaa 'azaaba Jahannama inna 'azaabahaa kaana gharaamaa
25:67: Wallazeena izaaa anfaqoo lam yusrifoo Wa-lam yaqturoo Wa-kaana baina zaalika qawaamaa
25:68: Wallazeena laa yad'oona ma'al laahi ilaahan aakhara Wa-laa yaqtuloonan nafsal latee harramal laahu illaa bilhaqqi Wa-laa yaznoon; Wa-mai yaf'al zaalika yalqa 'athaamaa
25:69: Yudaa'af lahul 'azaabu Yawmal Qiyaamati Wa-yakhlud feehee muhaanaa
25:70: Illaa man taaba Wa-'aamana Wa-'amila 'amalan saalihan fa-ulaaa'ika yubad-dilul laahu saiyyi-aatihim hasanaat; Wa-kaanal laahu Ghafoorar Raheemaa
25:71: Wa-man taaba Wa-'amila saalihan fa-innahoo yatoobu ilal laahi mataabaa
25:72: Wallazeena laa yash-hadoonaz zoora Wa-izaa marroo billaghwi marroo kiraamaa
25:73: Wallazeena izaa zukkiroo bi-Aayaati Rabbihim lam yakhirroo 'alaihaa summanw wa'umyaanaa
25:74: Wallazeena yaqooloona Rabbanaa hab lanaa min azwaajinaa Wa-zurriyaatinaa qurrata a'yuninw waj-'alnaa lilmuttaqeena Imaamaa
