25:75: Ulaaa'ika yujzawnal ghurfata bimaa sabaroo Wa-yulaqqawna feehaa tahiyyatanw Wa-salaamaa
25:77: Qul maa ya'ba'u bikum Rabbee law-laa du'aaa'ukum faqad kazzabtum fasawfa yakoonu lizaamaa
26:3: La'allaka baakhi'un nafsaka allaa yakoonoo mu'mineen
26:4: In nashaa nunazzil 'alaihim minas samaaa'i Aayatan fazallat a'naaquhum lahaa khaadi'een
26:5: Wa-maa yaateehim min zikrim minar Rahmaani muhdasin illaa kaanoo 'anhu mu'rideen
26:6: Faqad kazzaboo fasa-yaateehim ambaaa'u maa kaanoo bihee yastahzi'oon
26:7: Awa-lam yaraw ilal ardi kam ambatnaa feehaa min kulli zawjin kareem
26:8: Inna fee zaalika la-Aayah; Wa-maa kaana aksaruhum mu'mineen
26:10: Wa-iz naadaa Rabbuka Moosaaa ani' til qawmaz zaalimeen
26:12: Qaala Rabbi inneee akhaafu ai yukazziboon
26:13: Wa-yadeequ sadree Wa-laa yantaliqu lisaanee fa-arsil ilaa Haaroon
26:15: Qaala kallaa fazhabaa bi-Aayaatinaaa innaa ma'akum mustami'oon
26:16: Faatiyaa Fir'awna faqoolaaa innaa Rasoolu Rabbil 'aalameen
26:18: Qaala alam nurabbika feenaa waleedanw Wa-labista feenaa min 'umurika sineen
26:19: Wa-fa'alta fa'latakal latee fa'alta Wa-anta minal kaafireen
26:20: Qaala fa'altuhaaa izanw Wa-ana minad daaaleen
26:21: Fafarartu minkum lam-maa khiftukum fawahaba lee Rabbee hukmanw Wa-ja'alanee minal mursaleen
26:22: Wa-tilka ni'matun tamun-nuhaa 'alaiya an 'abbatta Baneee Israaa'eel
26:24: Qaala Rabbus samaawaati wal-ardi Wa-maa bainahumaa in kuntum mooqineen
26:27: Qaala inna Rasoolakumul lazee ursila ilaikum lamajnoon
26:28: Qaala Rabbul mashriqi wal-maghribi Wa-maa baina-humaa in kuntum ta'qiloon
26:29: Qaala la'init takhazta ilaahan ghairee la-aj'alannaka minal masjooneen
26:31: Qaala faati biheee in kunta minas saadiqeen
26:33: Wa-naza'a yadahoo faizaa hiya baidaaa'u linnaa-zireen
26:34: Qaala lilmala-i hawlahooo inna haazaa lasaahirun 'aleem
26:35: Yureedu aien yukhrijakum min ardikum bisihrihee famaazaa taamuroon
26:36: Qaalooo arjih Wa-akhaahu wab'as fil madaaa'ini haashireen
26:40: La'allanaa nattabi'us saharata in kaanoo humul ghaalibeen
26:41: Falammaa jaaa'as saharatu qaaloo li-Fir'awna a'inna lanaa la-ajjran in kunnaa nahnul ghaalibeen
26:42: Qaala na'am Wa-innakum izal laminal muqarrabeen
26:43: Qaala lahum Moosaaa alqoo maaa antum mulqoon
26:44: Fa-alqaw hibaalahum Wa-'isiyyahum Wa-qaaloo bi'izzati Fir'awna innaa lanahnul ghaaliboon
26:45: Fa-alqaa Moosaa 'asaahu fa-izaa hiya talqafu maa yaafikoon
26:49: Qaala aamantum lahoo qabla an aazana lakum innahoo lakabeerukumul lazee 'alla-makumus sihra falasawfa ta'lamoon; la-uqatti'anna aidiyakum Wa-arjulakum min khilaafinw Wa-la-usallibanna-kum ajma'een
26:50: Qaaloo la daira innaaa ilaa Rabbinaa munqalliboon
26:51: Innaa natma'u aien yaghfira lanaa Rabbunna khataa-yaanaaa an kunnaaa awwalal mu'mineen
26:52: Wa-awhainaaa ilaa Moosaaa an asri bi'ibaadeee innakum muttaba'oon
26:61: Falammaa taraaa'al jam'aani qaala as-haabu Moosaaa innaa lamudrakoon
26:62: Qaala kallaaa inna ma'iya Rabbee sa-yahdeen
26:63: Fa-awhainaaa ilaa Moosaaa anid rib bi'asaakal bahra fanfalaqa fakaana kullu firqin kattawdil 'azeem
26:67: Inna fee zaalika la-Aayaah; Wa-maa kaana aksaru-hu mu'mineen
26:70: Iz qaala li-abeehi Wa-qawmihee maa ta'budoon
26:74: Qaaloo bal wajadnaaa aabaaa-'anaa kazaalika yaf'aloon
26:82: Wallazeee atma'u aien yaghfira lee khateee'-atee Yawmad Deen
26:83: Rabbi hab lee hukmanw Wa-alhiqnee bis-saaliheen
26:84: Waj'al lee lisaana sidqin fil aakhireen
26:86: Waghfir li-abeee innahoo kaana mind daalleen
26:88: Yawma laa yanfa'u maalunw Wa-laa banoon
26:89: Illaa man atal laaha biqalbin saleem
26:92: Wa-qeela lahum aina maa kuntum ta'budoon
26:93: Min doonil laahi hal yansuroonakum aw yantasiroon
26:97: Tallaahi in kunnaa lafee dalaalim mubeen
26:102: Falaw anna lanaa karratan fanakoona minal mu'mineen
26:103: Inna fee zaalika la-Aayatanw Wa-maa kaana aksaruhum mu'mineen
26:106: Iz qaala lahum akhoohum Noohun alaa tattaqoon
26:109: Wa-maaa as'alukum 'alaihi min ajrin in ajriya illaa 'alaa Rabbil 'aalameen
26:113: In hisaabuhum illaa 'alaa Rabbee law tash'uroon
26:116: Qaaloo la'il lam tantahi yaa-Noohu latakoonanna minal marjoomeen
26:118: Faftab bainee Wa-bai-nahum fat-hanw Wa-najjinee Wa-mam ma'iya minal mu'mineen
26:119: Fa-anjainaahu Wa-mam ma'ahoo fil fulkil mashhoon
26:121: Inna fee zaalika la-Aayaah; Wa-maa kaana aksaruhum mu'mineen
26:124: Iz qaala lahum akhoohum Hoodun alaa tattaqoon
26:127: Wa-maa as'alukum 'alaihi min ajrin in ajriya illaa 'alaa Rabbil 'aalameen
26:136: Qaaloo sawaaa'un 'alainaaa awa-'azta am lam takum minal waa'izeen
26:139: Fakazzaboohu fa-ahlaknaahum; inna fee zaalika la-aayah; Wa-maa kaana aksaruhum mu'mineen
26:142: Iz qaala lahum akhoohum Saalihun alaa tattaqoon
26:145: Wa-maaa as'alukum 'alaihi min ajrin in ajriya illaa 'alaa Rabbil 'aalameen
26:152: Allazeena yufsidoona fil ardi Wa-laa yuslihoon
26:154: Maaa anta illaa basharum mislunaa faati bi-Aayatin in kunta minas saadiqeen
26:155: Qaala haazihee naaqatul lahaa shirbunw walakum shirbu yawmim ma'loom
26:158: Fa-akhazahumul 'azaab; inna fee zaalika la-Aayah; Wa-maa kaana aksaruhum mu'mineen
26:161: Iz qaala lahum akhoohum Lootun alaa tattaqoon
26:164: Wa-maaa as'alukum 'alaihi min ajrin in ajriya illaa 'alaa Rabbil 'aalameen
26:166: Wa-tazaroona maa khalaqa lakum Rabbukum min azwaajikum; bal antum qawmun 'aadoon
26:167: Qaloo la'il lam tantahi yaa-Lootu latakoonanna minal mukhrajeen
26:174: Inna fee zaalika la-Aayah; Wa-maa kaana aksaruhum mu'mineen
26:177: Iz qaala lahum Shu'aybun alaa tattaqoon
26:180: Wa-maaa as'alukum 'alaihi min ajrin in ajriya illaa 'alaa Rabbil 'aalameen
26:181: Awful kaila Wa-laa takoonoo minal mukhsireen
26:183: Wa-laa tabkhasun naasa ashyaaa-'ahum Wa-laa ta'saw fil ardi mufsideen
26:186: Wa-maaa anta illaa basharum mislunaa Wa-in nazunnuka laminal kaazibeen
26:187: Fa-asqit 'alainaa kisafam minas samaaa'i in kunta minas saadiqeen
26:189: Fakazzaboohu fa-akhazahum 'azaabu Yawmiz zullah; innahoo kaana 'azaaba Yawmin 'Azeem
26:190: Inna fee zaalika la-Aayah; Wa-maa kaana aksaruhum mu'mineen
26:197: Awalam yakul lahum Aayatan ai ya'lamahoo 'ulamaaa'u Baneee Israaa'eel
26:201: Laa yu'minoona bihee hattaa yarawul 'azaabal aleem
26:208: Wa-maaa ahlaknaa min qaryatin illaa lahaa munziroon
26:213: Falaa tad'u ma'al laahi ilaahan aakhara fatakoona minal mu'azzabeen
26:215: Wakhfid janaahaka limanit taba-'aka minal mu'mineen
26:216: Fa-in asawka faqul innee bareee'um mimmmaa ta'maloon
26:225: Alam tara annahum fee kulli waadiny yaheemoon
26:227: Illal lazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaati Wa-zakarul laaha kaseeranw wantasaroo min ba'di maa zulimoo; Wa-saya'lamul lazeena zalamooo aiya munqalabiny yanqaliboon
27:1: Taa-Seeen; tilka Aayaatul Qur-aani Wa-Kitaabim Mubeen
27:3: Allazeena yuqeemoonas Salaata Wa-yu'toonaz Zakaata Wa-hum bil-Aakhirati hum yooqinoon
27:4: Innal lazeena laa yu'minoona bil-Aakhirati zaiyannaa lahum a'maalahum fahum ya'mahoon
27:5: Ulaaa'ikal lazeena lahum sooo'ul 'azaabi Wa-hum fil Aakhirati humul akhsaroon
27:6: Wa-innaka latulaqqal Qur-aana mil ladun Hakeemin 'Aleem
27:7: Iz qaala Moosaa li-ahliheee inneee aanastu naaran saaateekum minhaa bikhabarin aw aateekum bishihaabin qabasil la'allakum tastaloon
27:8: Falammaa jaaa'ahaa noodiya am boorika man fin naari Wa-man hawlahaa Wa-Subhaanal laahi Rabbil 'aalameen
27:10: Wa-alqi 'asaak; falammmaa ra-aahaa tahtazzu ka-annahaa jaaannunw wallaa mudbiranw Wa-lam yu'aqqib; yaa-Moosaa laa takhaf innee laa yakhaafu ladaiyal mursaloon
27:11: Illaa man zalama summa baddala husnam ba'da sooo'in fa-innee Ghafoorur Raheem
27:12: Wa-adkhil yadaka fee jaibika takhruj baidaaa'a min ghairi sooo'in fee tis'i Aayaatin ilaa Fir'awna Wa-qawmih; innahum kaanoo qawman faasiqeen
27:13: Falammaa jaaa'at-hum Aayaatunaa mubsiratan qaaloo haazaa sihrum mubeen
27:14: Wa-jahadoo bihaa wastaiqanat-haaa anfusuhum zulmanw wa-'uluwwaa; fanzur kaifa kaana 'aaqibatul mufsideen
27:15: Wa-laqad aatainaa Daawooda Wa-sulaimaana 'ilmaa; Wa-qaalal hamdu lil-laahil lazee faddalanaa 'alaa kaseerim min 'ibaadihil mu'mineen
27:16: Wa-warisa Sulaimaanu Daawooda Wa-qaala yaaa-aiyuhan naasu 'ullimnaa mantiqat tairi Wa-ooteenaa min kulli shai'in inna haazaa lahuwal fadlul mubeen
27:17: Wa-hushira Sulaimaana junooduhoo minal jinni wal-insi wattairi fahum yooza'oon
27:18: hattaaa izaaa ataw 'alaa waadin namli qaalat namlatuien yaaa-aiyuhan namlud khuloo masaakinakum laa yahtimannakum Sulaimaanu Wa-junooduhoo Wa-hum laa yash'uroon
27:19: Fatabassama daahikam min qawlihaa Wa-qaala Rabbi awzi'nee an ashkura ni'mata-kal lateee an'amta 'alaiyya Wa-'alaa waalidaiyya Wa-an a'mala saalihan tardaahu Wa-adkhilnee birahmatika fee 'ibaadikas saaliheen
27:20: Wa-tafaqqadat taira faqaala maa liya laaa araa al-hudhuda, am kaana minal ghaaa'ibeen
27:21: La-u'azzibanahoo 'azaaban shadeedan aw la-azbahannahoo aw layaatiyannee bisultaanim mubeen
27:22: Famakasa ghaira ba'eedin faqaala ahattu bimaa lam tuhit bihee Wa-ji'tuka min Sabaim binaba-iny yaqeen
27:23: Innee wajattum ra-atan tamlikuhum Wa-ootiyat min kulli shai'inw Wa-lahaa 'arshun 'azeem
27:24: Wajattuhaa Wa-qawmahaa yasjudoona lishshamsi min doonil laahi Wa-zaiyana lahumush Shaitaanu a'maalahum fasaddahum 'anis sabeeli fahum laa yahtadoon
27:25: Allaa yasjudoo lillaahil lazee yukhrijul khab'a fis samaawaati wal-ardi Wa-ya'lamu maa tukhfoona Wa-maa tu'linoon
27:26: Allaahu laaa ilaaha illaa Huwa Rabbul 'Arshil Azeem
27:27: Qaala sananzuru asadaqta am kunta minal kaazibeen
27:28: Izhab bikitaabee haaza fa-alqih ilaihim summma tawalla 'anhum fanzur maazaa yarji'oon
27:29: Qaalat yaaa-aiyyuhal mala'u innee ulqiya ilaiya kitaabun kareem
27:30: Innahoo min Sulaimaana Wa-innahoo bismil laahir Rahmaanir Raheem
27:32: Qaalat yaaa-aiyyuhal mala'u aftoonee fee amree maa kuntu qaati'atan amran hattaa tashhhaddon
27:33: Qaaloo nahnu uloo quwwatinw Wa-uloo baasin shadeed; wal-amru ilaiki fanzuree maazaa taamureen
27:34: Qaalat innal mulooka izaa dakhaloo qaryatan afsadoohaa Wa-ja'alooo a'izzata ahlihaaa azillah; Wa-kazaalika yaf'aloon
27:35: Wa-innee mursilatun ilaihim bihadiyyatin fanaaziratum bima yarji'ul mursaloon
27:36: Falammaa jaaa'a Sulaimaana qaala atumiddoonani bimaalin famaaa aataaniyal laahu khairum mimmmaaa aataakum bal antum bihadiy-yatikum tafrahoon
27:37: Irji' ilaihim falanaatiyan-nahum bijunoodil laa qibala lahum bihaa Wa-lanukhri-jannahum minhaaa azillatanw Wa-hum saaghiroon
27:38: Qaala yaaa-aiyyuhal mala'u aiyyukum yaateenee bi'arshihaa qabla aien yaatoonee muslimeen
27:39: Qaala 'ifreetum minal jinni ana aateeka bihee qabla an taqooma mim maqaamika Wa-innee 'alaihi laqawiyyun ameen
27:40: Qaalal lazee indahoo 'ilmum minal Kitaabi ana aateeka bihee qabla aien yartadda ilaika tarfuk; falammaa ra-aahu mustaqirran 'indahoo qaala haazaa min fadli Rabbee li-yabluwaneee 'a-ashkuru am akfuru Wa-man shakara fa-innamaa yashkuru linafsihee Wa-man kafara fa-inna Rabbee Ghaniyyun Kareem
27:41: Qaala nakkiroo lahaa 'arshahaa nanzur atahtadeee am takoonu minal lazeena laa yahtadoon
27:42: Falammaa jaaa'at qeela ahaakaza 'arshuki qaalat kaanna hoo; Wa-ooteenal 'ilma min qablihaa Wa-kunnaa muslimeen
27:43: Wa-saddahaa maa kaanat ta'budu min doonil laahi innahaa kaanat min qawmin kaafireen
27:44: Qeela lahad khulis sarha falammaa ra-at-hu hasibat-hu lujjatanw Wa-khashafat 'an saaqaihaa; qaala innahoo sarhum mumarradum min qawaareer; qaalat Rabbi innee zalamtu nafsee Wa-aslamtu ma'a Sulaimaana lillaahi Rabbil 'aalameen
27:45: Wa laqad arsalnaaa ilaa Samooda akhaahum Saalihan ani'budul lahha fa-izaa hum fareeqaani yakhtasimoon
27:46: Qaala yaa-qawmi lima tasta'jiloona bissaiyi'ati qablal hasanati law-laa tas-taghfiroonal laaha la'allakum turhamoon
27:47: Qaalut taiyyarnaa bika Wa-bimam ma'ak; qaala taaa'irukum 'indal laahi bal antum qawmun tuftanoon
27:48: Wa-kaana fil madeenati tis'atu rahtien yufsidoona fil ardi Wa-laa yuslihoon
27:49: Qaaloo taqaasamoo billaahi lanubaiyyitannahoo Wa-ahlahoo summaa lanaqoolana liwaliy-yihee maa shahidnaa mahlika ahliee Wa-innaa lasaadiqoon
27:50: Wa-makaroo makranw Wa-makarnaa makranw Wa-hum laa yash'uroon
27:51: Fanzur kaifa kaana 'aaqibatu makrihim annaa dammar-naahum Wa-qawmahum ajma'een
27:52: Fatilka buyootuhum khaa-wiyatam bimaa zalamoo; inna fee zaalika la-Aayatal liqaw-mien ya'lamoon
27:54: Wa-lootan iz qaala liqawmiheee ataatoonal faa-hishata Wa-antum tubsiroon
27:55: A'innakum lataatoonar rijaala shahwatam min doonin nisaaa'; bal antum qawmun tajhaloon
27:56: Famaa kaana jawaaba qawmiheee illaaa an qaalooo akhrijooo aalaa Lootim min qaryatikum innahum unaasuny yatatahharoon
27:57: Fa-anjainaahu Wa-ahlahooo illam ra-atahoo qaddarnaahaa minal ghaabireen
27:59: Qulil hamdu lillaahi Wa-salaamun 'alaa 'ibaadihil lazeenas tafaa; aaallaahu khairun ammmaa yushrikoon
27:60: Amman khalaqas samaawaati wal-arda Wa-anzala lakum minas samaaa'i maaa'an fa-anbatnaa bihee hadaaa'iqa zaata bahjah; maa kaana lakum an tunbitoo shajarahaa; 'a-ilaahun ma'al laah; bal hum qawmuien ya'diloon
27:61: Ammann ja'alal arda qaraaranw Wa-ja'ala khilaalahaaa anhaaranw Wa-ja'ala lahaa rawaasiya Wa-ja'ala bainal bahraini haajizaa; 'a-ilaahun ma' allah; bal aksaruhum laa ya'lamoon
27:62: Ammaien yujeebul mud-tarra izaa da'aahu Wa-yakshifus sooo'a Wa-yaj'alukum khula-faaa'al ardi 'a-ilaahun ma' allaah qaleelan maa tazak-karoon
27:63: Ammaien yahdeekum fee zulumaatil barri wal bahri Wa-maien yursilu riyaaha bushran baina yadai rahmatih; 'a-ilaahun ma'allah; Ta'aalal laahu 'ammaa yushrikoon
27:64: Ammaien yabda'ul khalqa thumma yu'eeduhoo Wa-maien yarzuqukum minas sammaaa'i wal ard; 'a-ilaahun ma'allah; qul haatoo burhaanakum in kuntum saadiqeen
27:65: Qul laa ya'lamu man fis sammaawaati wal-ardil ghaiba illal laah; Wa-maa yash'uroona aiyaana yub'asoon
27:66: Balid daaraka 'ilmuhum fil Aakhirah; bal hum fee shakkin minhaa bal hum minhaa 'amoon
27:67: Wa-qaalal lazeena kafarooo 'a-izaa kunnaa turaabanw Wa-aabaaa'unaaa a'innaa lamukhrajoon
27:68: Laqad wu'idnaa haazaa nahnu Wa-aabaaa'unaa min qablu in haazaaa illaaa asaateerul awwaleen
27:69: Qul seeroo fil ardi fanzuroo kaifa kaana 'aaqibatul mujrimeen
27:70: Wa-laa tahzan 'alaihim Wa-laa takun fee daiqin mimmaa yamkuroon
27:71: Wa-yaqooloona mataa haazal wa'du in kuntum saadiqeen
27:72: Qul 'asaaa aien yakoona radifa lakum ba'dul lazee tasta'jiloon
27:73: Wa-inna Rabbaka lazoo fadlin 'alan naasi Wa-laakinna aksarahum laa yashkuroon
27:74: Wa-inna Rabbaka la-ya'lamu maa tukinnu sudooruhum Wa-maa yu'linoon
27:75: Wa-maa min ghaaa'ibatin fis samaaa'i wal-ardi illaa fee kitaabin mubeen
27:76: Inna haazal Qur-aana yaqussu 'alaa Baneee israaa'eela aksaral lazee hum feehi yakhtalifoon
27:78: Inna Rabbaka yaqdee bainahum bihukmih; Wa-Huwal 'Azeezul 'Aleem
27:80: Innaka laa tusmi'ul mawtaa Wa-laa tusmi'us summad du'aaa izaa wallaw mudbireen
27:81: Wa-maaa anta bihaadil-'umyi 'an dalaalatihim in tusmi'u illaa mai yu'minu bi aayaatinaa fahum muslimoon
27:82: Wa-izaa waqa'al qawlu 'alaihim akhrajnaa lahum daaabbatan minal ardi tukal-limuhum annan naasa kaanoo bi-aayaatinaa laa yooqinoon
27:83: Wa-Yawma nahshuru min kulli ummatin fawjan mimmaien yukazzibu bi-Aayaatinaa fahum yooza'oon
27:84: Hattaaa izaa jaaa'oo qaala akazzabtum bi-Aayaatee Wa-lam tuheetoo bihaa 'ilman ammaazaa kuntum ta'maloon
27:85: Wa-waqa'al qawlu 'alaihim bimaa zalamoo fahum laa yantiqoon
27:86: Alam yaraw annaa ja'alnal laila li-yaskunoo feehi wannahaara mubsiraa; inna fee zaalika la-Aayaatil liqaw-mien yu'minoon
27:87: Wa-Yawma yunfakhu fis Soori fafazi'a man fis samaawaati Wa-man fil ardi illaa man shaaa'al laah; Wa-kullun atawhu daakhireen
27:88: Wa-taral jibaala tahsabuhaa jaamidatanw Wa-hiya tamurru marras sahaab; sun'al laahil lazeee atqana kulla shai'; innahoo khabeerun bimaa taf'aloon
27:89: Man jaaa'a bil-hasanati falahoo khairun minhaa Wa-hum min faza'ien Yawma'izin aaminoon
27:90: Wa-man jaaa'a bissai-yi'ati fakubbat wujoohuhum fin Naari hal tujzawna illaa maa kuntum ta'maloon
27:91: Innamaaa umirtu an a'buda Rabba haazihil baldatil lazee harramahaa Wa-lahoo kullu shai'inw Wa-umirtu an akoona minal muslimeen
27:92: Wa-an atluwal Qur-aana famanih tadaa fa-innamaa yahtadee linafsihee Wa-man dalla faqul innamaaa ana minal munzireen
27:93: Wa-qulil hamdu lillaahi sa-yureekum Aayaatihee fa-ta'rifoonahaa; Wa-maa Rabbuka bighaafilin 'ammaa ta'maloon
28:3: Natloo 'alaika min naba-i Moosaa Wa-Fir'awna bilhaqqi liqawminy yu'miinoon
28:4: Inna Fir'awna 'alaa fil ardi Wa-ja'ala ahlahaa shiya'ai yastad'ifu taaa'ifatam minhum yuzabbihu abnaaa'ahum Wa-yastahyee nisaaa'ahum; innahoo kaana minal mufsideen
28:5: Wa-nureedu an namunna 'alal lazeenas tud'ifoo fil ardi Wa-naj'alahum a'immatanw Wa-naj'alahumul waariseen
28:6: Wa-numakkina lahum fil ardi Wa-nuriya Fir'awna Wa-Haamaana Wa-junoodahumaa minhum maa kaanoo yahzaroon
28:7: Wa-awhainaaa ilaaa ummi Moosaaa an ardi'eehi faizaa khifti 'alaihi fa-alqeehi fil yammi Wa-laa takhaafee Wa-laa tahzaneee innaa raaaddoohu ilaiki Wa-jaa'iloohu minal mursaleen
28:8: Faltaqatahooo Aalu Fir'awna li-yakoona lahum 'aduwwanw Wa-hazanaa; inna Fir'awna Wa-Haamaana Wa-junooda-humaa kaanoo khaati'een
28:9: Wa-qaalatim ra-atu Fir'awna qurratu 'aynil lee Wa-lak; laa taqtuloohu 'asaaa aien yanfa'anaa aw nattakhizahoo waladanw Wa-hum laa yash'uroon
28:10: Wa-asbaha fu'aadu ummi Moosaa faarighan in kaadat latubdee bihee law laaa arrabatnaa 'alaa qalbihaa litakoona minal mu'mineen
28:11: Wa-qaalat li-ukhtihee qusseehi fabasurat bihee 'an junubinw wahum laa yash'uroon
28:12: Wa-harramnaa 'alaihil maraadi'a min qablu faqaalat hal adullukum 'alaaa ahli baitiny yakfuloonahoo lakum Wa-hum lahoo naasihoon
28:13: Faradadnaahu ilaa ummihee kai taqarra 'ainuhaa Wa-laa tahzana Wa-lita'lama anna wa'dal laahi haqqunw Wa-laakinna aksarahum laa ya'lamoon
28:14: Wa-lammaa balagha ashuddahoo wastawaaa aatai-naahu hukmanw Wa-'ilmaa; Wa-kazaalika najzil muhsineen
28:15: Wa-dakhalal madeenata 'alaa heene ghaflatim min ahlihaa fawajada feeha raju-laini yaqtatilaani haazaa min shee'atihee Wa-haaza min 'aduwwihee fastaghaasahul lazee min shee'atihee 'alal lazee min 'aduwwihee fawakazahoo Moosaa faqadaa 'alaihi qaala haaza min 'amalish Shaitaani innahoo 'aduwwum mmudillum mubeen
28:16: Qaala Rabbi innee zalamtu nafsee faghfir lee faghafara lah; innahoo Huwal Ghafoorur Raheem
28:17: Qaala Rabbi bimaaa an'amta 'alaiya falan akoona zaheeral lilmujrimeen
28:18: Fa-asbaha fil madeenati khaaa'ifaien yataraqqabu fa-izal lazis tansarahoo bil-amsi yastasrikhuh; qaala lahoo moosaaa innaka laghawiyyum mubeen
28:19: Falammaaa an araada aien yabtisha billazee huwa 'aduwwul lahumaa qaala yaa-Moosaaa atureedu an taqtulanee kamaa qatalta nafsam bil-amsi in tureedu illaaa an takoona jabbaaram fil ardi Wa-maa tureedu an takoona minal musliheen
28:20: Wa-jaaa'a rajulum min aqsal madeenati yas'aa qaala yaa-Moosaaa innal mala-a yaa-tamiroona bika liyaqtulooka fakhruj innee laka minan naasiheen
28:21: Fakharaja minhaa khaaa 'ifany-yataraqqab; qaala Rabbi najjinee minal qawmiz zaalimeen
28:22: Wa-lammaa tawajjaha tilqaaa'a Madyana qaala 'asaa Rabbeee aien yahdiyanee Sawaaa'as Sabeel
28:23: Wa-lammaa warada maaa'a Madyana wajada 'alaihi ummatam minannaasi yasqoona Wa-wajada min doonihimum ra ataini tazoodaani qaala maa khatubkumaa qaalataa laa nasqee hataa yusdirar ri'aaa'u Wa-aboonaa shaikhun kabeer
28:24: Fasaqaa lahumaa summa tawallaaa ilaz zilli faqaala Rabbi innee limaaa anzalta ilaiya min khairin faqeer
28:25: Fajaaa'at-hu ihdaahumaa tamshee 'alas tihyaaa'in qaalat inna abee yad'ooka li-yajziyaka ajra maa saqaita lanaa; falammaa jaaa'ahoo Wa-qassa 'alaihil qasasa qaala laa takhaf najawta minal qawmiz zaalimeen
28:26: Qaalat ihdaahumaa yaaa abatis taajirhu inna khaira manistaajartal qawiyyul ameen
28:27: Qaala innee ureedu an unkihaka ihdab nataiya haataini 'alaaa an taajuranee samaaniya hijaj; fa-in atmamta 'ashran famin 'indika Wa-maaa ureedu an ashuqqa 'alaik; satajiduneee in shaaa'al laahu minas saaliheen
28:28: Qaala zaalika bainee Wa-bainaka aiyamal ajalaini qadaitu falaa 'udwaana 'alaiya wallaahu 'alaa ma naqoolu Wakeel
28:29: Falammmaa qadaa Moosal ajala Wa-saara bi-ahliheee aanasa min jaanibit Toori naaran qaala li-ahlihim kusooo inneee aanastu naaral la-'alleee aateekum minhaa bikhabarin aw jazwatim minan naari la-'allakum tastaloon
28:30: Falammaaa ataahaa noodiya min shaati'il waadil aimani fil buq'atil muubaarakati minash shajarati aien yaa-Moosaaa inneee Anal laahu Rabbul 'aalameen
28:31: Wa-an alqi 'asaaka falam-maa ra-aahaa tahtazzu ka-annnahaa jaaannunw wallaa mudbiranw Wa-lam yu'aqqib; yaa-Moosaa aqbil Wa-laa takhaf innaka minal aamineen
28:32: Usluk yadaka fee jaibika takhruj baidaaa'a min ghairi sooo'inw wadmum ilaika janaahaka minar rahbi fazaanika burhaanaani mir Rabbika ilaa Fir'awna Wa-mala'ih; innahum kaanoo qawman faasiqeen
28:33: Qaala Rabbi innee qataltu minhum nafsan fa-akhaafu aien yaqtuloon
28:34: Wa-akhee Haaroonu huwa afsahu minnee lisaanan fa-arsilhu ma'iya rid-aien yusaddiquneee innee akhaafu aien yukazziboon
28:35: Qaala sanashuddu 'adudaka bi-akheeka Wa-naj'alu lakumaa sultaanan falaa yasiloona ilaikumaa; bi-Aayaatinaa antumaa Wa-manit taba'akumal ghaaliboon
28:36: Falammaa jaaa'ahum Moosaa bi-Aayaatinaa baiyinaatin qaaloo maa haazaaa illaa sihrum muftaranw Wa-maa sami'naa bihaazaa feee aabaaa'inal awwaleen
28:37: Wa-qaala Moosaa Rabbeee a'alamu biman jaaa'a bilhudaa min 'indihee Wa-man takoonu lahoo 'aaqibatud daari innahoo laa yuflihuz zaalimoon
28:38: Wa-qaala Fir'awnu yaaa-aiyyuhal mala-u maa 'alimtu lakum min ilaahin ghairee fa-awqid lee yaa-Haamaanu 'alatteeni faj'al lee sarhal la'alleee attali'u ilaaa ilaahi Moosaa Wa-innee la azunnuhoo minal kaazibeen
28:39: Wastakbara huwa Wa-junooduhoo fil ardi bighairil haqqi Wa-zannooo annahum ilainaa laa yurja'oon
28:40: Fa-akhaznaahu Wa-junoo-dahoo fanabaznaahum fil yammi fanzur kaifa kaana 'aaqibatuz zaalimeen
28:41: Wa-ja'alnaahum a'immataien yad'oona ilan Naari Wa-Yawmal Qiyaamati laa yunsaroon
28:42: Wa-atba'naahum fee haazihid dunyaa la'natanw Wa-Yawmal Qiyaamati hum minal maqbooheen
28:43: Wa-laqad aatainaa Moosal Kitaaba mim ba'di maaa ahlaknal quroonal oolaa basaaa'ira linnaasi Wa-hudanw Wa-rahmatal la'allahum yata-zakkkaroon
28:44: Wa-maa kunta bijaanibil gharbiyyi iz qadainaaa ilaa Moosal amra Wa-maa kunta minash shaahideen
28:45: Wa-laakinnaa anshaanaa quroonan fatataawala 'alaihimul 'umur; Wa-maa kunta saawiyan feee ahli Madyana tatloo 'alaihim Aayaatinaa Wa-laakinnaa kunnaa mursileen
28:46: Wa-maa kunta bijaanibit Toori iz naadainaa Wa-laakir rahmatam mir Rabbika litunzira qawmam maaa ataahum min nazeerim min qablika la'allahum yatazakkaroon
28:47: Wa-law-laaa an tuseebahum museebatum bimaa qaddamat aideehim fa-yaqooloo Rabbanaa law-laaa arsalta ilainaa Rasoolan fanattabi'a Aayaatika Wa-nakoona minal mu'mineen
28:48: Falammaa jaaa'ahumul haqqu min 'indinaa qaaloo law-laa ootiya misla maaa ootiyaa Moosaa; awalam yakfuroo bimaaa ootiya Moosaa min qablu qaaloo sihraani tazaaharaa Wa-qaalooo innaa bikullin kaafiroon
28:49: Qul faatoo bi-Kitaabim min 'indil laahi huwa ahdaa minhu-maaa attabi'hu in kuntum saadiqeen
28:50: Fa-il lam yastajeeboo laka fa'lam annamaa yattabi'oona ahwaaa'ahum; Wa-man adallu mimmanit taba'a hawaahu bighari hudam minal laah; innal laaha laa yahdil qawmaz zaalimeen
28:51: Wa-laqad wassalnaa lahumul qawla la'allahum yatazakkaroon
28:52: Allazeena aatainaahu-mul Kitaaba min qablihee hum bihee yu'minoon
28:53: Wa-izaa yutlaa 'alaihim qaaloo aamannaa biheee innahul haqqu mir rabbinaaa innaa kunnaa min qablihee muslimeen
28:54: Ulaaa'ika yu'tawna ajrahum marratayni bimaa sabaroo Wa-yadra'oona bil-hasanatis saiyyi'ata Wa-mimmmaa razaq-naahum yunfiqoon
28:55: Wa-izaa sami'ul laghwa a'radoo 'anhu Wa-qaaloo lanaaa a'maalunaa Wa-lakum a'maalukum salaamun 'alaikum laa nabtaghil jaahileen
28:56: Innaka laa tahdee man ahbata Wa-laakinna laaha yahdee maien yashaaa'; Wa-Huwaa 'lamu bilmuhtadeen
28:57: Wa-qaalooo in nattabi'il hudaa ma'aka nutakhattaf min ardinaa; awalam numakkkil lahum haraman aaminany yujbaaa ilaihi samaraatu kulli shai'ir rizqam mil ladunnaa Wa-laakinna aksarahum laa ya'lamoon
28:58: Wa-kam ahlaknaa min qaryatim batirat ma'eeshatahaa fatilka masaakinuhum lam tuskam mim ba'dihim illaa qaleelaa; Wa-kunnaa Nahnul waariseen
28:59: Wa-maa kaana Rabbuka muhlikal quraa hattaa yab'asa feee ummihaa Rasoolany yatloo 'alaihim aayaatina; Wa-maa kunnaa muhlikil quraaa illaa Wa-ahluhaa zaalimoon
28:60: Wa-maaa ooteetum min shai'in famataa'ul hayaatid dunyaa Wa-zeenatuhaa; Wa-maa 'indal laahi khairunw Wa-abqaa; afalaa ta'qiloon
28:61: Afamanw wa'adnaahu wa'dan hasanan fahuwa laaqeehi kamam matta'naahu mataa'al hayaatid dunyaa summa huwa Yawmal Qiyaamati minal muhdareen
28:62: Wa-Yawma yunaadeehim fa-yaqoolu aina shurakaaa-'iyal lazeena kuntum taz'umoon
28:63: Qaalal lazeena haqqa 'alaihimul qawlu Rabbanaa haaa'ulaaa'il lazeena aghwainaa aghwainaahu kamaa ghawainaa tabarraanaaa ilaika maa kaanoo iyyaanaa ya'budoon
28:64: Wa-qeelad 'oo shurakaaa'akum fada'awhum falam yastajeeboo lahum Wa-ra-awul 'azaab; law annahum kaanoo yahtadoon
28:65: Wa-Yawma yunaadeehim fa-yaqoolu maazaaa ajabtumul mursaleen
28:66: Fa'amiyat 'alaihimul ambaaa'u Yawma'izin fahum laa yatasaaa'aloon
28:67: Fa-ammaa man taaba Wa-aamana Wa-'amila saalihan fa'asaaa ai yakoona minal mufliheen
28:68: Wa-Rabbuka yakhuluqu maa yashaaa'u Wa-yakhtaar; maa kaana lahumul khiyarah; Subhannal laahi Wa-Ta'aalaa 'ammmaa yushrikoon
28:69: Wa-Rabbuka ya'lamu maa tukinnu sudooruhum Wa-maa yu'linoon
28:70: Wa-Huwal laahu laaa ilaaha illaa Huwa lahul hamdu fil oolaa wal-Aakhirati Wa-lahul hukmu Wa-ilaihi turja'oon
28:71: Qul ara'aitum in ja'alal laahu 'alaikumul laila sarmadan ilaa Yawmil Qiyaamati man ilaahun ghairul laahi yaa-teekum bidiyaaa'in afalaa tasma'oon
28:72: Qul ara'aitum in ja'alal laahu 'alaikumun nahaara sarmadan ilaa Yawmil Qiyaamati man ilaahun ghairul laahi yaateekum bilailin taskunoona feehi afalaa tubsiroon
28:73: Wa-mir rahmatihee ja'ala lakumul laila wannahaara litaskunoo feehi Wa-litabtaghoo min fadlihee Wa-la'allakum tashkuroon
28:74: Wa-Yawma yunaadeehim fa-yaqoolu aina shurakaaa'iyal lazeena kuntum tazz'umoon
28:75: Wa-naza'naa min kulli ummatin shaheedan faqulnaa haatoo burhaanakum fa'alimooo annal haqqa lillaahi Wa-dalla 'anhum maa kaanoo yaftaroon
28:76: Inna Qaaroona kaana min qawmi Moosaa fabaghaaa 'alaihim Wa-aatainaahu minal kunoozi maaa inna mafaati-hahoo latanooo'u bil'usbati ulil quwwati iz qaala lahoo qawmuhoo laa tafrah innal laahaa laa yuhibbul fariheen
28:77: Wabtaghi feemaaa aataakal laahud Daaral Aakhirata Wa-laa tansa naseebaka minad dunyaa Wa-ahsin kamaaa ahsanal laahu ilaika Wa-laa tabghil fasaada fil ardi innal laaha laa yuhibbul mufsideen
28:78: Qaala innamaaa ootee-tuhoo 'alaa 'ilmin 'indeee; awalam ya'lam annal laaha qad ahlaka min qablihee minal qurooni man huwa ashaddu minhu quwwatanw Wa-aksaru jam'aa; Wa-laa yus'alu 'an zunoobihimul mujrimoon
28:79: Fakharaja 'alaa qawmihee fee zeenatih; qaalal lazeena yureedoonal hayaatad dunyaa yaalaita lanaa misla maaa ootiya Qaaroonu innahoo lazoo hazzin 'azeem
28:80: Wa-qaalal lazeena ootul 'ilma wailakum sawaabul laahi khairul liman aamana Wa-'amila saalihaa; Wa-laa yulaq-qaahaaa illas saabiroon
28:81: Fakhasafnaa bihee Wa-bidaarihil arda famaa kaana laho min fi'atien yansuroo-nahoo min doonil laahi Wa-maa kaana minal muntasireen
28:82: Wa-asbahal lazeena tamannaw makaanahoo bil-amsi yaqooloona waika-annal laaha yabsutur rizqa limaien ya-shaaa'u min 'ibaadihee Wa-yaqdiru law-laaa am mannal laahu 'alainaa lakhasafa binaa waika-annahoo laa yuflihul kaafiroon
28:83: Tilkad Daarul Aakhiratu naj'aluhaa lillazeena laa yureedoona 'uluwwan fil ardi Wa-laa fasaadaa; wal-'aaqibatu lilmuttaqeen
28:84: Man jaaa'a bilhasanati falahoo khairum minhaa Wa-man jaaa'a bissaiyi'ati falaa yujzal lazeena 'amilus saiyiaati illaa maa kaanoo ya'maloon
28:85: Innal azee farada 'alaikal Qur-aana laraaadduka ilaa ma'aad; qur Rabbeee a'lamu man jjaaa'a bil-hudaa Wa-man huwa fee dalaalim mubeen
28:86: Wa-maa kunta tarjooo aien yulqaaa ilaikal Kitaabu illaa rahmatam mir Rabbika falaa takoonanna zaheeral lilkaafireen
28:87: Wa-laa yasuddunnaka 'an Aayaatil laahi ba'da iz unzilat ilaika wad'u ilaa Rabbika Wa-laa takonanna minal mushrikeen
28:88: Wa-laa tad'u ma'al laahi ilaahan aakhar; laaa ilaaha illaa Hoo; kullu shai'in haalikun illaa Wajhah; lahul hukkmu Wa-ilaihi turja'oon
29:2: Ahasiban naasu any yutrakooo any yaqoolooo aamannaa Wa-hum la yuftanoon
29:3: Wa-laqad fatannal lazeena min qablihim fala-ya'lamannal laahul lazeena sadaqoo Wa-la-ya'lamannal kaazibeen
29:4: Am hasibal lazeena ya'maloonas sayyiaati any yasbiqoonaa; saaa'a maa yahkumoon
29:5: Man kaana yarjoo liqaaa 'allaahi fa-inna ajalal laahi laaat; Wa-Huwass Sameeul 'Aleem
29:6: Wa-man jaahada fainnamaa yujaahidu linafsih; innal laaha laghaniyyun 'anil 'aalameen
29:7: Wallazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaati lanukaf-firanna 'anhum saiyiaatihim Wa-lanajziyannahum ahsanal lazee kaanoo ya'maloon
29:8: Wa-wassainal insaana biwaalidaihi husnanw Wa-in jaahadaaka litushrika bee maa laisa laka bihee 'ilmun falaa tuti'humaa; ilaiya marji'ukum fa-unabbi'ukum bimaa kuntum ta'maloon
29:9: Wallazeena aamanoo wa'amilus saalihaati lanudkhilan-nahum fis saaliheen
29:10: Wa-minan naasi maien yaqoolu aamannaa billaahi faizaaa ooziya fil laahi ja'ala fitnatan naasi ka'azaabil laahi Wa-la'in jaaa'a nasrum mir Rabbika la-yaqoolunna innaa kunnaa ma'akum; awa-laisal laahu bi-a'lama bimaa fee sudooril 'aalameen
29:11: Wa-la-ya'lamannal laahul lazeena aamanoo Wa-la-ya'lamannal munaafiqeen
29:12: Wa-qaalal lazeena kafaroo lillazeena aamanut tabi'oo sabeelanaa walnahmil khataayaakum Wa-maa hum bihaamileena min khataa-yaahum min shai'in innahum lakaaziboon
29:13: Wa-la-yahmilunna asqaa-lahum Wa-asqaalam ma'a asqaalihim Wa-la-yus'alunna Yawmal Qiyaamati 'ammaa kaanoo yaftaroon
29:14: Wa-laqad arsalnaa Noohan ilaa qawmihee falabisa feehim alfa sanatin illaa khamseena 'aaman fa-akhazahumut toofaanu Wa-hum zaalimoon
29:15: Fa-anjainaahu Wa-as-haabas safeenati Wa-ja'alnaahaaa Aayatal lil'aalameen
29:16: Wa-Ibraheema iz qaala liqawmihi' budul laaha wattaqoohu zaalikum khayrul lakum in kuntum ta'lamoon
29:17: Innamaa ta'budoona min doonil laahi awsaananw-wa takhluqoona ifkaa; innal lazeena ta'budoona min doonil laahi laa yamlikoona lakum rizqan fabtaghoo 'indal laahir rizqa wa'budoohu washkuroo lahooo ilaihi turja'oon
29:18: Wa-in tukazziboo faqad kazzaba umamum min qablikum Wa-maa' alar Rasooli illal balaaghul mubeen
29:19: Awa-lam yaraw kaifa yubdi'ul laahul khalqa summa yu'eeduh; inna zaalika 'alal laahi yaseer
29:20: Qul seeroo fil ardi fanzuroo kaifa bada'a al-khalqa summal laahu yunshi'-'un nash-atal Aakhirah; innal laaha 'alaa kulli shai'in Qadeer
29:21: Yu'azzibu many yashaaa'u Wa-yarhamu many yashaaa'; Wa-ilaihi tuqlaboon
29:22: Wa-maaa antum bimu'jizeena fil ardi Wa-laa fis samaaa'i Wa-maa lakum min doonil laahi minw waliyyinw Wa-laa naseer
29:23: Wallazeena kafaroo bi-Aayaatil laahi Wa-liqaaa'iheee ulaaa'ika ya'isoo mir rahmatee Wa-ulaaa'ika lahum 'azaabun aleem
29:24: Famaa kaana jawaaba qawmiheee illaaa an qaaluqtuloohu aw harriqoohu fa-anjaahul laahu minan naar; inna fee zaalika la Aayaatil laqawmien yu'minoon
29:25: Wa-qaala innamat takhaz-tum min doonil laahi awsaanam mawaddata bainikum fil hayaatid dunyaa summa Yawmal Qiyaamati yakfuru ba'dukum biba'dinw Wa-yal'anu ba'dukum ba'danw Wa-ma'waakumun Naaru Wa-maa lakum min naasireen
29:26: Fa-aamana lahoo Loot; Wa-qaala innee muhajirun ilaa Rabbee innahoo Huwal 'Azeezul Hakeem
29:27: Wa-wahabnaa lahoo Iss-haaqa Wa-Ya'Qooba Wa-ja'alnaa fee zurriyyatihin Nubuwwata wal-Kitaaba Wa-aatainaahu ajrahoo fid dunyaa Wa-innahoo fil aakhirati laminas saaliheen
29:28: Wa-Lootan iz qaala liqawmiheee innakum ta'toonal faahishata maa sabaqakum bihaa min ahadin minal 'aalameen
29:29: A'innakum la-ta'toonar rijaala Wa-taqta'oonas sabeela Wa-ta'toona fee naadeekumul munkara famaa kaana jawaaba qawmiheee illaaa an qaalu' tinaaa bi'azaabil laahi in kunta minas saadiqeen
29:31: Wa-lammaa jaaa'at Rusulunaaa Ibraaheema bil-bushraa qaalooo innaa muhlikoo ahli haazihil qaryati inna ahlahaa kaanoo zaalimeen
29:32: Qaala inna feeha Lootaa; qaaloo nahnu a'lamu biman feehaa lanunajjjiyannahoo Wa-ahlahooo illam ra-atahoo kaanat minal ghaabireen
29:33: Wa-lammaaa an jaaa'at Rusulunaa Lootan seee'a bihim Wa-daaqa bihim zar'anw Wa-qaaloo laa takhaf Wa-laa tahzan innaa munajjooka Wa-ahlaka illam ra-ataka kaanat minal ghaabireen
29:34: Innaa munziloona 'alaaa ahli haazihil qaryati rijzan minas samaaa'i bimaa kaanoo yafsuqoon
29:35: Wa-laqad taraknaa min-haaa aayatan baiyyinatan liqawmien ya'qiloon
29:36: Wa-ilaa Madyana akhaahum Shu'ayban faqaala yaa-qawmi' budul laaha warjul yawmal aakhira Wa-laa ta'saw fil ardi mufsideen
29:37: Fakazzaboohu fa-akhazat-humur rajfatu fa-asbahoo fee daarihim jaasimeen
29:38: Wa-'Aadanw Wa-Samooda Wa-qad tabaiyana lakum min masaakinihim Wa-zaiyana lahumush Shaitaanu a'maalahum fasaddahum 'anis sabeeli Wa-kaanoo mustabsireen
29:39: Wa-Qaaroona Wa-Fir'awna Wa-haamaana Wa-laqad jaaa'ahum Moosa bilbaiyinaati fastakbaroo fil ardi Wa-maa kaanoo saabiqeen
29:40: Fakullan akhaznaa bi-zanbihee faminhum man arsalnaa 'alaihi haasibaa; Wa-minhum man akhazat-hus saihatu Wa-minhum man khasafnaa bihil arda Wa-minhum man aghraqnaa; Wa-maa kaanal laahu li-yazlimahum Wa-laakin kaanoo anfusahum yazlimoon
29:41: Masalul lazeenat takhazoo min doonil laahi awliyaaa'a kamasalil 'ankaboot, ittakhazat baitaa; Wa-inna awhanal buyooti la-baitul 'ankaboot; law kaanoo ya'lamoon
29:42: Innal laaha ya'lamu maa yad'oona min doonihee min shai'; Wa-Huwal 'Azeezul Hakeem
29:43: Wa-tilkal amsaalu nadribuhaa linnaasi Wa-maa ya'qiluhaaa illal 'aalimoon
29:44: Khalaqal laahus samaawaati wal-arda bilhaqq; inna fee zaalika la-aayatan lil-mu'mineen
29:45: Utlu maaa oohiya ilaika minal Kitaabi Wa-aqimis Salaata innas Salaata tanhaa 'anil fahshaaa'i wal-munkar; Wa-lazikrul laahi akbar; wal-laahu ya'lamu maa tasna'oon
29:46: Wa-laa tujaadilooo Ahlal Kitaabi illaa billatee hiya ahsanu illal lazeena zalamoo minhum Wa-qoolooo aamannaa billazeee unzila ilainaa Wa-unzila ilaikum Wa-illaahunna Wa-illahukum waahidunw-wa nahnu lahoo muslimoon
29:47: Wa-kazaalika anzalnaaa ilaikal Kitaab; fallazeena aatainaahumul kitaaba yu'minoona bihee Wa-min haaa'ulaaa'i many yu'minu bih; Wa-maa yajhadu bi'Aayaatinaa illal kaafiroon
29:48: Wa-maa kunta tatloo min qablihee min kitaabinw Wa-laa takhuttubhoo bi-yameenika izal lartaabal mubtiloon
29:49: Bal huwa aayaatum baiyinaatun fee sudooril lazeena ootul 'ilm; Wa-maa yajhadu bi-aayaatinaa illaz zaalimoon
29:50: Wa-qaaloo law-laaa unzila 'alaihi aayaatum mir Rabbihee qul innamal aayaatu 'indal laahi Wa-innamaaa ana nazeerum mubeen
29:51: Awa-lam yakfihim annaaa anzalnaa 'alaikal kitaaba yutlaa 'alaihim; inna fee zaalika larahmatanw Wa-zikraa liqawmien yu'minoon
29:52: Qul kafaa billaahi bainee Wa-bainakum shaheedaa; ya'lamu maa fis samaawaati wal-ard; wallazeena aamanoo bil-baatili Wa-kafaroo billaahi ulaaa'ika humul khaasiroon
29:53: Wa-yasta'jiloonaka bil'azaab; Wa-law-laaa ajalum musammal lajaaa'ahumul a'zaab; Wa-la-ya'tiannahum baghta-tanw Wa-hum laa yash'uroon
29:54: Yasta'jiloonaka bil'azaab; Wa-inna Jahannama la-muheetatum bil-kaafireen
29:55: Yawma yaghshaahumul 'azaabu min fawqihim Wa-min tahti arjulihim Wa-yaqoolu zooqoo maa kuntum ta'maloon
29:56: Yaa-'ibaadiyal lazeena aamanooo inna ardee waasi-'atun fa-iyyaaya fa'budoon
29:57: Kullu nafsin zaaa'iqatul mawti summa ilainaa turja'oon
29:58: Wallazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaati la-nubawwi-'annahum minal Jannati ghurafan tajree min tahtihal anhaaru khaalideena feehaa; ni'ma ajrul 'aamileen
29:60: Wa-ka-ayyim min daaabbatil laa tahmilu rizqahaa; al-laahu yarzuquhaa Wa-iyyaakum; Wa-Huwas Samee'ul Aleem
29:61: Wa-la'in sa-altahum man khalaqas samaawaati wal-arda Wa-sakhkharash shamsa wal-qamara la-yaqoolunnal laahu fa-anna yu'fakoon
29:62: Allaahu yabsutur rizqa limaien yashaaa'u min 'ibaadihee Wa-yaqdiru lah; innal laaha bikulli shai'in Aleem
29:63: Wa-la'in sa-altahum man nazzala minas samaaa'i maaa'an fa-ahyaa bihil arda min ba'di mawtihaa la-yaqoolunnal laah; qulil hamdu lillah; bal aksaruhum laa ya'qiloon
29:64: Wa-maa haazihil hayaa-tud dunyaaa illaa lahwunw wa-la'ib; Wa-innad Daaral Aakhirata la-hiyal ha-yawaan; law kaano ya'lamoon
29:65: Fa-izaa rakiboo fil fulki da'awul laaha mukhliseena lahud deena falammaa najjaa-hum ilal barri izaa hum yushrikoon
29:66: Li-yakfuroo bimaaa aatainaahum Wa-li-yatamatta'oo fasawfa ya'lamoon
29:67: Awalam yaraw annaa ja'alnaa haraman aaminanw Wa-yutakhattafun naasu min haw-lihim; afabil-baatili yu'minoona Wa-bini'matil laahi yakfuroon
29:68: Wa-man azlamu mimma nif-taraa 'alal laahi kaziban aw kazzaba bilhaqqi lammaa jaaa'ah; alaisa fee jahannama maswal lil-kaafireen
29:69: Wallazeena jaahadoo feenaa lanahdiyannahum subulana; Wa-innal laaha lama'al muhsineen
30:3: Feee adnal ardi Wa-hum mim ba'di ghalabihim sa-yaghliboon
30:4: Fee bid'i sineen; lillaahil amru min qablu Wa-mim ba'd; Wa-yawma'izien yafrahul mu'minoon
30:5: Binasril laa; yansuru maien yashaaa'u Wa-Huwal 'Azeezur Raheem
30:6: Wa'dal laahi laa yukhliful laahu wa'dahoo Wa-laakin-na aksaran naasi laa ya'lamoon
30:7: Ya'lamoona zaahiram minal hayaatid dunya Wa-hum 'anil Aakhirati hum ghaafiloon
30:8: Awalam yatafakkaroo feee anfusihim; maa khalaqal laahus samaawaati wal-arda Wa-maa bainahumaaa illaa bil-haqqi Wa-ajalim musammaa; Wa-inna kaseeram minan naasi biliqaaa'i Rabbihim lakaafiroon
30:9: Awalam yaseeroo fil ardi fa-yanzuroo kaifa kaana 'aaqibatul lazeena min qablihim; kaanooo ashadda minhhum quwwatanw Wa-asaarul arda Wa-'amaroohaaa aksara mimmaa 'amaroohaa Wa-jaaa'athum Rusuluhum bil-baiyyinaati famaa kaanal laahu liyazli-mahum Wa-laakin kaanooo anfusahum yazlimoon
30:10: Summa kaana 'aaqibatal lazeena asaaa'us sooo-aaa an kazzaboo bi-aayaatil laahi Wa-kaanoo bihaa yastahzi'oon
30:11: Allaahu yabda'ul khalqa summa yu'eeduhoo summa ilaihi turja'oon
30:13: Wa-lam yakul lahum min shurakaaa'ihim shufa'aaa'u Wa-kaanoo bishurakaaa'ihim kaafireen
30:15: Fa-ammal lazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaati fahum fee rawdatien yuhbaroon
30:16: Wa-ammal lazeena kafaroo Wa-kazzaboo bi-Aayaatinaa Wa-liqaaa'il Aakhirati faulaaa'ika fil 'azaabi muhdaroon
30:17: Fa-Subhaanal laahi heena tumsoona Wa-heena tusbihoon
30:18: Wa-lahul hamdu fis samaawaati wal-ardi Wa-'ashiyyanw Wa-heena tuzhiroon
30:19: Yukhrijul haiyya minal maiyyiti Wa-yukhrijul maiyyita minal haiyyi Wa-yuhyil arda ba'da mawtihaa; Wa-kazaalika tukhrajoon
30:20: Wa-min Aayaatiheee an khalaqakum min turaabin summa izaaa antum basharun tantashiroon
30:21: Wa-min Aayaatiheee an khalaqa lakum min anfusikum azwaajal litaskunooo ilaihaa Wa-ja'ala bainakum mawad-datanw Wa-rahmah; inna fee zaalika la-Aayaatil liqawmien yatafakkaroon
30:22: Wa-min Aayaatihee khalqus samaawaati wal-aardi wakhtilaafu alsinatikum Wa-alwaanikum; inna fee zaalika la-Aayaatil lil'aalimeen
30:23: Wa-min Aayaatihee manaamukum bil-laili wannahaari wabtighaaa'ukum min fadlih; inna fee zaalika la-Aayaatil liqawmien yasma'oon
30:24: Wa-min Aayaatihee yureekumul barqa khawfanw Wa-tama'anw Wa-yunazzilu minas samaaa'i maaa'an fa-yuhyee bihil arda ba'da mawtihaaa inna fee zaalika la-Aayaatil liqawmien ya'qiloon
30:25: Wa-min Aayaatihee an taqoomas samaaa'u wal-ardu bi-amrih; summa izaa da'aakum da'watam minal ardi izaaa antum takhrujoon
30:26: Wa-lahoo man fis samaawaati wal-ardi kullul lahoo qaanitoon
30:27: Wa-Huwal lazee yabda'ul khalqa summa yu'eeduhoo Wa-huwa ahwanu 'alaih; Wa-lahul masalul la'laa fis samaawaati wal-ard; Wa-Huwal 'Azeezul Hakeem
30:28: Daraba lakum masalam min anfusikum hal lakum mimmaa malakat aymaanukum min shurakaaa'a fee maa razaqnaakum fa-antum feehi sawaaa'un takhaafoonahum kakheefa tikum anfusakum; kazaalika nufassilul Aayaati liqawminy ya'qiloon
30:29: Balit taba'al lazeena zalamooo ahwaaa'ahum bighairi 'ilmin famai yahdee man adallal laahu Wa-maa lahum min naasireen
30:30: Fa-aqim wajhaka liddeeni Haneefaa; fitratal laahil latee fataran naasa 'alaihaa; laa taabdeela likhalqil laah; zaalikad deenul qaiyimu Wa-laakinna aksaran naasi laa ya'lamoon
30:31: Muneebeena ilaihi wattaqoohu Wa-aqeemus Salaata Wa-laa takoonoo minal mushrikeen
30:32: Minal lazeena farraqoo deenahum Wa-kaanoo shiya'an kullu hizbim bimaa ladaihim farihoon
30:33: Wa-izaa massan naasa durrun da'aw Rabbahum muneebeena ilaihi summa izaaa azaqahum minhu rahmatan izaa fareequm minhum bi-Rabbihim yushrikoon
30:34: Li-yakfuroo bimaaa aatainaahum; fatamatta'oo fasawfa ta'lamoon
30:35: Am anzalnaa 'alaihim sultaanan fahuwa yatakallamu bimaa kaanoo bihee yushrikoon
30:36: Wa-izaaa azaqnan naasa rahmatan farihoo bihaa Wa-in tusibhum sayyi'atum bimaa qaddamat aydeehim izaa hum yaqnatoon
30:37: Awalam yaraw annal laaha yabsutur rizqa limaien yashaaa'u Wa-yaqdir; inna fee zaalika la-Aayaatil liqawmien yu'minoon
30:38: Fa-aati zal qurbaa haqqahoo walmiskeena wabnassabeel; zaalika khairul lil lazeena yureedoona Wajhal laahi Wa-ulaaa'ika humul muflihoon
30:39: Wa-maaa aataitum mir ribal li-yarbuwa feee amwaalin naasi falaa yarboo 'indal laahi Wa-maaa aataitum min zaakaatin tureedoona wajhal laahi fa-ulaaa'ika humul mud'ifoon
30:40: Allaahul lazee khalaqa-kum summa razaqakum summa yumeetukum summa yuhyeekum hal min shurakaaa'ikum maien yaf'alu min zaalikum min shai'; Sub-haanahoo Wa-Ta'aalaa 'ammaa yushrikoon
30:41: Zaharal fasaadu fil barri wal-bahri bimaa kasabat aydin naasi li-yuzeeqahum ba'dal lazee 'amiloo la'allahum yarji'oon
30:42: Qul seeroo fil ardi fanzuroo kaifa kaana 'aaqibatul lazeena min qabl; kaana aksaruhum mushrikeen
30:43: Fa-aqim wajhaka lid-deenil qaiyyimi min qabli aien yaatiya Yawmul laa maradda lahoo minal laahi Yawma'izien yassadda'oon
30:44: Man kafara fa'alaihi kufruhoo Wa-man 'amila saalihan fali-anfusihim yamhadoon
30:45: Li-yajziyal lazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaati min fadlih; innahoo laa yuhibbul kaafireen
30:46: Wa-min Aayaatiheee aien yursilar riyaaha mubashshi-raatinw Wa-li-yuzeeqakum mir rahmatihee Wa-litajriyal fulku bi-amrihee Wa-litabtaghoo min fadlihee Wa-la'allakum tashkuroon
30:47: Wa-laqad arsalnaa min qablika Rusulan ilaa qawmihim fajaaa'oohum bil-baiyyinaati fantaqamnaa minal lazeena ajramoo Wa-kaana haqqan 'alainaa nasrul mu'mineen
30:48: Allaahul lazee yursilur riyaaha fatuseeru sahaaban fa-yabsutuhoo fis samaaa'i kaifa yashaaa'u Wa-yaj'aluhoo kisafan fataral wadqa yakhruju min khilaalihee fa-izaaa asaaba bihee mai yashaaa'u min 'ibaadiheee izaa hum yastabshiroon
30:49: Wa-in kaanoo min qabli aien yunazzala 'alaihim min qablihee lamubliseen
30:50: Fanzur ilaaa aasaari rahmatil laahi kaifa yuhyil arda ba'da mawtihaa; inna zaalika lamuhyil mawtaa Wa-Huwa 'alaa kulli shai'in Qadeer
30:51: Wa-la'in arsalnaa reehan fara-awhu musfarral lazalloo mim ba'dihee yakfuroon
30:52: Fa-innaka laa tusmi'ul mawtaa Wa-laa tusmi'us summad du'aaa'a izaa wallaw mudbireen
30:53: Wa-maa anta bihaadil 'umyi 'an dalaalatihim in tusmi'u illaa maien yuminu bi-aayaatinaa fahum muslimoon
30:54: Allahul lazee khalaqa-kum min du'fin summa ja'ala mim ba'di du'fin quwwatan summa ja'ala mim ba'di quwwatin du'fanw Wa-shaibah; yakhluqu maa yashaaa'u Wa-Huwal 'Aleemul Qadeer
30:55: Wa-Yawma taqoomus Saa'atu yuqsimul mujrimoona maa labisoo ghaira saa'ah; kazaalika kaanoo yu'fakoon
30:56: Wa-qaalal lazeena ootul 'ilma wal-eemaana laqad labistum fee kitaabil laahi ilaa yawmil ba'si fahaazaa yawmul ba'si Wa-laakinnakum kuntum laa ta'lamoon
30:57: Fa-Yawma'izil laa yanfa'ul lazeena zalamoo ma'ziratu-hum Wa-laa hum yusta'taboon
30:58: Wa-laqad darabnaa linnaasi fee haazal Quraani min kulli masal; Wa-la'in ji'tahum bi-aayatil la-yaqoolannal lazeena kafaroo in antum illaa mubtiloon
30:59: Kazaalika yatba'ul laahu 'alaa quloobil lazeena laa ya'lamoon
30:60: Fasbir inna wa'dal laahi haqqunw Wa-laa yastakhif-fannakal lazeena laa yooqinoon
31:4: Allazeena yuqeemoonas Salaata Wa-yu'toonaz Zakaata Wa-hum bil-Aakhirati hum yooqinoon
31:5: Ulaaa'ika 'alaa hudam mir Rabbihim Wa-ulaaa'ika humul muflihoon
31:6: Wa-minan naasi maien yashtaree lahuwal hadeesi li-yudilla 'an sabeelil laahi bighairi 'ilminw Wa-yattakhizahaa huzuwaa; ulaaa'ika lahum 'azaabum muheen
31:7: Wa-izaa tutlaa 'alayhi Aayaatunaa wallaa mustakbiran ka-al lam yasma'haa ka-anna feee uzunaihi waqran fabash-shiru bi'azaabin aleem
31:8: Innal lazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaati lahum Janaatun Na'eem
31:9: Khaalideena feeha wa'dal laahi haqqaa; Wa-Huwal 'Azeezul Hakeem
31:10: Khalaqas samaawaati bi-ghairi 'amadin tarawnahaa Wa-alqaa fil ardi rawaasiya an tameeda bikum Wa-bassa feehaa min kulli daaabbah; Wa-anzalnaa minas samaaa'i maaa'an fa-ambatnaa feeha min kulli zawjin kareem
31:11: Haazaa khalqul laahi fa-aroonee maazaa khalaqal lazeena min doonih; baliz zaalimoona fee dalalim Mubeen
31:12: Wa-laqad aatainaa Luqmaanal hikmata anish kur lillaah; Wa-maien yashkur fa-innamaa yashkuru linafsihee Wa-man kafara fa-innal laaha Ghaniyyun Hameed
31:13: Wa-iz qaala luqmaanu libnihee Wa-huwa ya'izuhoo ya-bunaiya laa tushrik billaah; innash shirka lazulmun 'azeem
31:14: Wa-wassainal insaana bi-waalidaihi hamalat hu ummuhoo wahnan 'alaa wahninw Wa-fisaaluhoo fee 'aamaini anishkur lee Wa-liwaalidaika ilaiyal maseer
31:15: Wa-in jaahadaaka 'alaaa an tushrika bee maa laisa laka bihee 'ilmun falaa tuti'humaa Wa-saahib-humaa fid dunyaa ma'roofanw wattabi' sabeela man anaaba ilayy; summa ilaiyya marji'ukum fa-unabbi'ukum bimaa kuntum ta'maloon
31:16: Ya-bunaiya innahaaa in taku misqaala habbatim min khardalin fatakun fee sakhratin aw fis samaawaati aw fil ardi yaati bihal laa; innal laaha lateefun Khabeer
31:17: Yaa bunaiya aqimis-Salaata waamur bilma'roofi wanha 'anil munkari wasbir 'alaa maaa asaabaka inna zaalika min 'azmil umoor
31:18: Wa-laa tusa'-ir khaddaka linnaasi Wa-laa tamshi fil ardi maarahan innal laaha laa yuhibbu kulla mukhtaalin fakhoor
31:19: Waqsid fee mashyika waghdud min sawtik; inna ankaral aswaati lasawtul hameer
31:20: Alam taraw annal laaha sakhkhara lakum maa fis sa-maawaati Wa-maa fil ardi Wa-asbaha 'alaikum ni'amahoo zaahiratanw Wa-baatinah; Wa-minan naasi many yujaadilu fil laahi bighayri 'ilminw Wa-laa hudanw Wa-laa Kitaabim muneer
31:21: Wa-izaa qeela lahumut tabi'oo maaa anzalal laahu qaaloo bal nattabi'u maa wajadnaa 'alaihi aabaaa'anaa; awalaw kaanash Shaitaanu yad'oohum ilaa 'azaabis sa'eer
31:22: Wa-maien yuslim wajha-hooo ilal laahi Wa-huwa muhsinun faqadistamsaka bil'ur watil wusqaa; Wa-ilal laahi 'aaqibatul umoor
31:23: Wa-man kafara falaa yahzunka kufruh; ilainaa marji'uhum fanunabbi'uhum bimaa 'amiloo; innal laaha 'aleemum bizaatis sudoor
31:24: Numatti'uhum qaleelan summa nadtarruhum ilaa 'azaabin ghaleez
31:25: Wa-la'in sa-altahum man khalaqas samaawaati wal-arda la-yaqoolunnal laah; qulil hamdu lillaah; bal aksaruhum laa ya'lamoon
31:26: Lilaahi ma fis samaa-waati wal-ard; innal laaha Huwal Ghaniyyul Hameed
31:27: Wa-law annamaa fil ardi min shajaratin aqlaamunw wal-bahru yamudduhoo mim ba'dihee sab'atu abhurim maa nafidat Kalimaatul laah; innal laaha 'azeezun Hakeem
31:28: Maa khalqukum Wa-laa ba'sukum illaa kanafsinw-waa hidah; innal laaha Samee'um Baseer
31:29: Alam tara annal laaha yoolijul laila fin nahaari Wa-yoolijun nahaara fil laili Wa-sakhkharash shamsa wal-qamara kulluny yajreee ilaaa ajalim musammanw Wa-annal laaha bimaa ta'maloona Khabeer
31:30: Zaalika bi-annal laaha Huwal Haqqu Wa-anna maa yad'oona min doonihil baatilu Wa-annal laaha Huwal 'Aliyyul Kabeer
31:31: Alam tara annal fulka tajree fil bahri bini'matil laahi li-yuriyakum min Aayaatih; inna fee zaalika la-Aayaatil likulli sabbaarin shakoor
31:32: Wa-izaa ghashiyahum mawjun kazzulali da'a-wul laaha mukhliseena lahud deena fa-lammaa najjaahum ilal barri faminhum muqtasid; Wa-maa yajhadu bi-Aayaatinaa illaa kullu khattaarin kafoor
31:33: Yaaa-ayyuhan naasut taqoo Rabbakum wakhshaw Yawmal laa yajzee waalidun 'anw waladihee Wa-laa mawloodun huwa jaazin 'anw waalidihee shai'aa; innaa wa'dal laahi haqqun falaa taghurran-nakumul hayaatud dunyaa Wa-laa yaghur-rannakum billaahil gharoor
31:34: Innal laaha 'indahoo 'ilmus saa'ati Wa-yunazzilul ghaisa Wa-ya'lamu maa fil arhaami Wa-maa tadree nafsum maazaa taksibu ghadaa; Wa-maa tadree nafsum bi-ayyi ardin tamoot; innal laaha 'Aleemun Khabeer
32:2: Tanzeelul Kitaabi laa raiba feehi mir rabbil 'aalameen
32:3: Am yaqooloonaf taraahu bal huwal haqqu mir rabbika litunzira qawma maaa ataahum min nazeerim min qablika la'allahum yahtadoon
32:4: Allaahul lazee khalaqas samaawaati wal-arda Wa-maa bainahumaa fee sittati ayyaamin thummas tawaa 'alal 'arsh; maa lakum min doonihee minw waliyyinw wala shafee'; afalaa tatazakkaroon
32:5: Yudabbirul amra minas samaaa'i ilal ardi thumma ya'ruju ilaihi fee yawmin kaana miqdaaruhooo alfa sanatim mimmaa ta'uddoon
32:7: Allazee ahsana kulla shai-in khalaqa; Wa-bada-a khalqal insaani min teen
32:8: Thumma ja'ala naslahoo min sulaalatim mim maaa'im maheen
32:9: Thumma sawwaahu Wa-nafakha feehi mir roohihih; Wa-ja'ala lakumus sam'a wal-absaara wal-af'idah; qaleelam maa tashkuroon
32:10: Wa-qaalooo 'a-izaa dalalnaa fil ardi 'a-innaa lafee khalqin jadeed; bal hum biliqaaa'i rabbihim kaafiroon
32:11: Qul yatawaffaakum malakul mawtil lazee wukkila bikum Thumma ilaa rabbikum turja'oon
32:12: Wa-law taraaa izil mujrimoona naakisoo ru'oosihim 'inda rabbihim rabbanaaa absarnaa Wa-sami'naa farji'naa na'mal saalihan innaa mooqinoon
32:13: Wa-law shi'naa la-aatainaa kulla nafsin hudaahaa Wa-laakin haqqal qawlu minnee la-amla'anna jahannama minal jinnati wannaasi ajma'een
32:14: Fazooqoo bimaa naseetum liqaaa'a yawminkum haaza innaa naseenaakum Wa-zooqoo 'azaabal khuldi bimaa kuntum ta'maloon
32:15: Innamaa yu'minu bi-aayaatinal lazeena izaa zukkiroo bihaa kharroo sujjadanw Wa-sabbahoo bihamdi rabbihim Wa-hum laa yastakbiroon
32:16: Tatajaafaa junoobuhum 'anil madaaji'i yad'oona rabbahum khawfanw Wa-tama'anw Wa-mimmaa razaqnaahum yunfiqoon
32:17: Falaa ta'lamu nafsum maaa ukhfiya lahum min qurrati a'yunin jazaaa'am bimaa kaanoo ya'maloon
32:18: Afaman kaana mu'minan kaman kaana faasiqaa; laa yasta-woon
32:19: Ammal lazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaati falahum jannaatul ma'waa nuzulam bimaa kaanoo ya'maloon
32:20: Wa-ammal lazeena fasaqoo fama'waahumun Naaru kullamaaa araadooo any yakhrujoo minhaaa u'eedoo feehaa Wa-qeela lahum zooqoo 'azaaaban Naaril lazee kuntum bihee tukazziboon
32:21: Wa-lanuzeeqan-nahum minal 'azaabil ladnaa doonal 'azaabil akbari la'allahum yarji'oon
32:22: Wa-man azlamu mimman zukkira bi-aayaati rabbihee summa a'rada 'anhaa; innaa minal mujrimeena muntaqimoon
32:23: Wa-laqad aatainaa Moosal Kitaaba falaa takun fee miryatim mil liqaaa'ihee Wa-ja'alnaahu hudal li-Baneee Israaa'eel
32:24: Wa-ja'alnaa minhum a'immataien yahdoona bi-amrinaa lammaa sabaroo Wa-kaanoo bi-aayaatinaa yooqinoon
32:25: Inna rabbaka huwa yafsilu bainahum yawmal qiyaamati feemaa kaanoo feehi yakhtalifoon
32:26: Awalam yahdi lahum kam ahlaknaa min qablihim minal qurooni yamshoona fee masaakinihim; inna fee zaalika la-aayaatin afalaa yasma'oon
32:27: Awalam yaraw annaa nasooqul maaa'a ilal ardil juruzi fanukhriju bihee zar'an ta'kulu minhu an'aamuhum Wa-anfusuhum afalaa yubsiroon
32:28: Wa-yaqooloona mataa haazal fath-hu in kuntum saadiqeen
32:29: Qul yawmal fath-hi laa yanfa'ul lazeena kafarooo eemaanuhum Wa-laa hum yunzaroon
33:1: Yaa-aiyuhan Nabiyyut taqil laaha Wa-laa tuti'il kaafireena wal-munaafiqeen; innal laaha kaana 'aleeman Hakeemaa
33:2: Wattabi' maa yoohaaa ilaika mir Rabbik; innal laaha kaana bimaa ta'maloona Khabeera
33:4: Maa ja'alal laahu lirajulim min qalbaini fee jawfih; Wa-maa ja'ala azwaajakumul laaa'ee tuzaahiroona minhunna ummahaatikum; Wa-maa ja'ala ad'iyaaa'akum abnaaa'akum; zaalikum qawlukum bi-afwaa-hikum wallaahu yaqoolul haqqa Wa-Huwa yahdis sabeel
33:5: Ud'oohum li-aabaaa'ihim huwa aqsatu 'indal laah; fa-il lam ta'lamooo aabaaa'ahum fa-ikhwaanukum fid deeni Wa-mawaaleekum; Wa-laisa 'alaikum junaahun feemaaa akhtaatum bihee Wa-laakim maa ta'ammadat quloobukum; Wa-kaanal laahu Ghafoorar Raheemaa
33:6: An-Nabiyyu awlaa bil-mu'mineena min anfusihim Wa-azwaajuhoo ummahatuhum Wa-ulul arhaami ba'duhum awlaa biba'din fee Kitaabil laahi minal mu'meneena wal-Muhaajireena illaaa an taf'alooo ilaaa awliyaaa'ikum ma'roofaa; kaana zaalika fil kitaabi mastooraa
33:7: Wa-iz akhaznaa minan Nabiyyeena meesaaqahum Wa-minka Wa-min Noohinw Wa-Ibraaheema Wa-Moosaa Wa-Eesab ni Maryama Wa-akhaznaa minhum meesaaqan ghaleezaa
33:8: Liyas'alas saadiqeena 'an sidqihim; Wa-a'adda lilkaa-fireena 'azaaban aleemaa
33:9: Yaaa-aiyyuhal lazeena aamanuz kuroo ni'matal laahi 'alaikum iz jaaa'atkum junoodun fa-arsalnaa 'alaihim reehanw Wa-junoodal lam tarawhaa; Wa-kaanal laahu bimaa ta'maloona Baseera
33:10: Iz jaaa'ookum min fawqikum Wa-min asfala minkum Wa-iz zaaghatil absaaru Wa-balaghatil quloobul hanaajira Wa-tazunnoona billaahiz zunoonaa
33:11: Hunaalikab tuliyal mu'minoona Wa-zulziloo zilzaalan shadeedaa
33:12: Wa-iz yaqoolul munaafiqoona wallazeena fee quloobihim maradum maa wa'adanal laahu Wa-Rasooluhooo illaa ghurooraa
33:13: Wa-iz qaalat taaa'ifatum minhum yaaa-ahla Yasriba laa muqaamaa lakum farji'oo; Wa-yastaazinu fareequm minhumun Nabiyya yaqooloona inna buyootanaa 'awrah; Wa-maa hiya bi'awratin iny yureedoona illaa firaaraa
33:14: wa-law dukhilat 'alaihim min aqtaarihaa summa su'ilul fitnata la-aatawhaa Wa-maa talabbasoo bihaaa illaa yaseeraa
33:15: Wa-laqad kaanoo 'aahadul laaha min qablu laa yuwal-loonal adbaar; Wa-kaana 'ahdul laahi mas'oolaa
33:16: Qul laien yanfa'akumul firaaru in farartum minal mawti awil qatli Wa-izal laa tumatta'oona illaa qaleelaa
33:17: Qul man zal lazee ya'simukum minal laahi in araada bikum sooo'an aw araada bikum rahmah; Wa-laa yajidoona lahum min doonil laahi waliyyanw Wa-laa naseeraa
33:18: Qad ya'lamul laahul mu'awwiqeena minkum walqaaa'ileena li-ikhwaanihim halumma ilainaa, Wa-laa yaatoonal baasa illaa qaleelaa
33:19: Ashihhatan 'alaikum faizaa jaaa'al khawfu ra-aytahum yanzuroona ilaika tadooru a'yunuhum kallazee yughshaa 'alaihi minal mawti fa-izaa zahabal khawfu salqookum bi-alsinatin hidaadin ashibbatan 'alal khayr; ulaaa'ika lam yu'minoo fa-ahbatal laahu a'maalahum; Wa-kaana zaalika 'alal laahi yaseeraa
33:20: Yahsaboonal Ahzaaba lam yazhaboo Wa-ien yaatil Ahzaabu yawaddoo law annahum baadoona fil A'raabi yasaloona 'an ambaaa'ikum Wa-law kaanoo feekum maa qaatalooo illaa qaleela
33:21: Laqad kaana lakum fee Rasoolil laahi uswatun hasanatul liman kaana yarjul laaha wal-yawmal Aakhira Wa-azkaral laaha kaseeraa
33:22: Wa-lammaa ra al-mu'minoonal Ahzaaba qaaloo haazaa maa wa'adanal laahu Wa-Rasooluh; Wa-sadaqal laahu Wa-Rasooluh; Wa-maa zaadahum illaaa eemaananw Wa-tasleemaa
33:23: Minal mu'mineena rijaalun sadaqoo maa 'aahadul laaha 'alaihi faminhum man qadaa nahbahoo Wa-minhum mai yantaziru Wa-maa baddaloo tabdeelaa
33:24: Li-yajziyal aahus saadiqeena bisidqihim Wa-yu'azzibal munaafiqeena in shaaa'a aw yatooba 'alaihim; innal laaha kaana Ghafoorar Raheemaa
33:25: Wa-raddal laahul lazeena kafaroo bighaizihim lam yanaaloo khairaa; Wa-kafal laahul mu'mineenal qitaal; Wa-kaanal laahu Qawiyyan 'Azeezaa
33:26: Wa-anzalal lazeena zaaha-roohum min Ahlil Kitaabi min sa-yaaseehim Wa-qazafa fee quloobihimm mur-ru'ba fareeqan taqtuloona Wa-taasiroona fareeqaaa
33:27: Wa-awrasakum ardahum Wa-diyaarahum Wa-amwaalahum Wa-ardal lam tata'oohaa; Wa-kaanal laahu 'alaa kulli shai'in Qadeeraa
33:28: Yaaa-aiyyuhan Nabiyyu qul li-azwaajika in kuntunna turidnal hayaatad dunyaa Wa-zeenatahaa fata'aalaina umatti'kunna Wa-usarrihkunna saraahan jameela
33:29: Wa-in kuntunna turidnal laaha Wa-Rasoolahoo wad-Daaral Aakhirata fa-innal laaha a'adda lil-muhsinaati min-kunna ajjran 'azeemaa
33:30: Yaa-nisaaa'an Nabiyyi maien yaati minkunna bifaa-hishatim mubaiyyinatien yudaa'af lahal 'azaabu di'faini Wa-kaana zaalika 'alal laahi yaseera
33:31: Wa-maien yaqnut minkunna lillaahi Wa-Rasoolihee Wa-ta'mal saalihan nu'tihaaa ajrahaa marratayni Wa-a'tadnaa lahaa rizqan kareema
33:32: Yaa-nisaaa'an Nabiyyi lastunna ka-ahadim minan nisaaa'i init taqaitunna falaa takhda'na bilqawli fa-yatma'al lazee fee qalbihee maradunw Wa-qulna qawlam ma'roofaa
33:33: Wa-qarna fee bu-yoo-tikunna Wa-laa tabarrajna tabarrujal Jaahiliyyatil oolaa Wa-aqimnas Salaata Wa-aaateenaz Zakaata Wa-ati'nal laaha Wa-Rasoolah; innamaa yureedul laahu liyuzhiba 'ankumur rijsa Ahlal Bayti Wa-yutahhirakum tatheeraa
33:34: Wazkurna maa yutlaa fee bu-yootikunna min aayaatil laahi wal-Hikmah; innal laaha kaana lateefan Khabeera
33:35: Innal muslimeena wal-muslimaati wal-mu'mineena wal-mu'minaati walqaaniteena walqaanitaati wassaadiqeena wassaadiqaati wassaabireena wassaabiraati walkhaashi'eena walkhaashi'aati walmutasaddiqeena walmutasaddiqaati wassaaa'imeena wassaaa'imaati walhaafizeena furoojahum walhaafizaati waz-zaakireenal laaha kaseeranw waz-zaakiraati a'addal laahu lahum maghfiratanw Wa-ajran 'azeemaa
33:36: Wa-maa kaana limu'mininw Wa-laa mu'minatin izaa qadal laahu Wa-Rasooluhooo amran aien yakoona lahumul khiyaratu min amrihim; Wa-maien ya'sil laaha Wa-Rasoolahoo faqad dalla dalaalam mubeenaa
33:37: Wa-iz taqoolu lillazeee an'amal laahu 'alaihi Wa-an'amta 'alaihi amsik 'alaika zawjaka wattaqil laaha Wa-tukhfee fee nafsika mal laahu mubdeehi Wa-takhshan naasa wallaahu ahaqqu an takhshaah; falammaa qadaa Zaidum minhaa wataran zawwajnaa-kahaa likay laa yakoona 'alal mu'mineena harajun feee azwaaji ad'iyaaa'ihim izaa qadaw minhunna wataraa; Wa-kaana amrul laahi maf'oolaa
33:38: Maa kaana 'alan nabiyyyi min harajin feemaa faradal laahu lahoo sunnatal laahi fil lazeena khalaw min qabl; Wa-kaana amrul laahi qadaram maqdooraa
33:39: Allazeena yuballighoona Risaalaatil laahi Wa-yakhshaw-nahoo Wa-laa yakkhshawna ahadan illal laah; Wa-kafaa billaahi Haseebaa
33:40: Maa kaana Muhammmadun abaaa ahadim mir rijaalikum Wa-laakir Rasoolal laahi Wa-Khaataman Nabiyyeen; Wa-kaanal laahu bikulli shai'in 'Aleema
33:41: Yaaa-aiyyuhal lazeena aamanuz kurul laaha zikran kaseera
33:43: Huwal lazee yusallee 'alaikum Wa-malaaa'ikatuhoo liyukhrijakum minaz zulumaati ilan noor Wa-kaana bilmu'mineena Raheemaa
33:44: Tahiyyatuhum Yawma yalqawnahoo salaamunw Wa-a'adda lahum ajran kareemaa
33:45: Yaaa-aiyyuhan Nabiyyu innaaa arsalnaaka shaahidanw Wa-mubashshiranw Wa-nazeeraa
33:46: Wa-daa'iyan ilal laahi bi-iznihee Wa-siraajam muneeraa
33:47: Wa-bashshiril mu'mineena bi-annna lahum minal laahi fadlan kabeera
33:48: Wa-laa tuti'il kaafireena walmunaafiqeena Wa-da 'azaahum Wa-tawakkal 'alal laah; Wa-kafaa billaahi Wakeelaa
33:49: Yaaa-aiyyuhal lazeena aamanooo izaa nakahtumul mu'minaati summa tallaqtu-moohunna min qabli an tamas-soohunna famaa lakum 'alaihinna min 'iddatin ta'taddoonahaa famatti'oohunna Wa-sarri-hoohunna saraahan jameelaa
33:50: Yaaa-aiyyuhan Nabiyyu innaaa ahlalnaa laka azwaa-jakal laatee aataiyta ujoora-hunna Wa-maa malakat yameenuka mimmaaa afaaa'al laahu 'alaika Wa-banaati 'ammika Wa-banaati 'ammaatika Wa-banaati khaalika Wa-banaati khaalaa-tikal laatee haajarna ma'aka wamra'-atan mu'minatan inw wahabat nafsahaa lin-Nabiyyi in araadan Nabiyyu aien yastan-kihahaa khaalisatan laka min doonil mu'mineen; qad 'alimnaa maa faradnaa 'alaihim feee azwaajihim Wa-maa malakat aimaanuhum li-kailaa yakoona 'alaika haraj; Wa-kaanal laahu Ghafoorar Raheema
33:51: Turjee man tashaaa'u minhunna Wa-tu'weee ilaika man tashaaa'u Wa-manib ta-ghaita mimman 'azalta falaa junaaha 'alaik; zaalika adnaaa an taqarra a'yunuhunna Wa-laa yahzanna Wa-yardaina bimaa aataitahunna kulluhunn; wal-laahu ya'lamu maa fee quloo-bikum; Wa-kaanal laahu 'Aleeman haleemaa
33:52: Laa yahillu lakan nisaaa'u mim ba'du Wa-laaa an tabaddala bihinna min azwaajinw Wa-law ajabaka husnuhunna illaa maa malakat yameenukk; Wa-kaanal laahu 'alaa kulli shai'ir Raqeeba
33:53: Yaaa-aiyyuhal lazeena aamanoo laa tadkhuloo bu-yootan Nabiyyi ilaaa aien yu'zana lakum ilaa ta'aamin ghaira naazireena inaahu Wa-laakin izaa du'eetum fadkhuloo fa-izaa ta'imtum fantashiroo Wa-laa mustaaniseena lihadees; inna zaalikum kaana yu'zin Nabiyya fa-yastahyee minkum wallaahu laa yastahyee minal haqq; Wa-izaa sa-altumoohunna mataa'an fas'aloohunna minw waraaa'i hijaab; zaalikum atharu liquloobikum Wa-quloobihinn; Wa-maa kaana lakum an tu'zoo Rasoolal laahi Wa-laaa an tankihooo azwaajahoo mim ba'diheee abadaa; inna zaalikum kaana 'indal laahi 'azeema
33:54: In tubdoo shai'an aw tukhfoohu fa-innal laaha kaana bikulli shai'in 'Aleemaa
33:55: Laa junaaha 'alaihinna feee aabaaa'ihinna Wa-laaa abnaaa'ihinna Wa-laaa ikhwaanihinnna Wa-laaa abnaaa'i ikhwaanihinna Wa-laaa abnaaa'i akhawaatihinna Wa-laa nisaaa'i-hinna Wa-laa Maa malakat aimaanuhunn; wattaqeenal laah; innal laaha kaana 'alaa kulli shai'in Shaheedaa
33:56: Innal laaha Wa-malaaa'i-katahoo yusalloona 'alan Nabiyy; yaaa-aiyyuhal lazeena aamanoo salloo 'alaihi Wa-sallimoo tasleemaa
33:57: Innal lazeena yu'zoonal laaha Wa-Rasoolahoo la'anahumul laahu fid dunyaa wal-Aakhirati Wa-a'adda lahum 'azaabam muheenaa
33:58: Wallazeena yu'zoonal mu'mineena almu'manaati bighairi mak tasaboo faqadih tamaloo buhtaananw Wa-ismam mubeenaa
33:59: Yaaa-aiyyuhan Nabiyyu qul li-azwaajika Wa-banaatika Wa-nisaaa'il mu'mineena yudneena 'alaihinna min jalaabee-bihinn; zaalika adnaaa aien yu'rafna falaa yu'zain; Wa-kaanal laahu Ghafoorar Raheemaa
33:60: La'il lam yantahil munaafiqoona wallazeena fee quloobihim maradunw walmur-jifoona fil madeenati lanughri-yannaka bihim summa laa yujaawiroonaka feehaaa illaa qaleela
33:61: Mal'ooneena ainamaa suqifoo ukhizoo Wa-quttiloo taqteelaa
33:62: Sunnatal laahi fil lazeena khalaw min qablu Wa-lan tajida lisunnatil laahi tabdeelaa
33:63: Yas'alukan naasu 'anis Saa'ati qul innamaa 'ilmuhaa 'indal laah; Wa-maa yudreeka la'allas Saa'ata takoonu qareebaa
33:64: Innal laaha la'anal kaafireena Wa-a'adda lahum sa'eeraa
33:65: Khaalideena feehaaa abadaa, laa yajidoona waliyyanw Wa-laa naseeraa
33:66: Yawma tuqallabu wujoohuhum fin Naari yaqooloona yaa-laitanaaa ata'nal laaha Wa-ata'nar Rasoolaa
33:67: Wa-qaaloo Rabbanaaa innaaa ata'naa saadatanaa Wa-kubaraaa'anaa fa-adalloonas sabeelaa
33:68: Rabbanaaa aatihim di'fai-ni minal 'azaabi wal'anhum la-nan kabeera
33:69: yaa-aiyyuhal lazeena aamanoo las takoonoo kalla-zeena aazaw Moosaa fa-barra-ahul laahu mimmmaa qaaloo; Wa-kaana 'indal laahi wajeehaa
33:70: Yaaa-aiyyuhal lazeena aamanut taqul laaha Wa-qooloo qawlan sadeedaa
33:71: Yuslih lakum a'maalakum Wa-yaghfir lakum zunoobakum; Wa-mai yuti'il laaha Wa-Rasoolahoo faqad faaza fawzan 'azeemaa
33:72: Innaa 'aradnal amaanata 'alas samaawaati walardi wal-jibaali fa-abaina aien yahmil-nahaa Wa-ashfaqna minhaa Wa-hamalahal insaanu innahoo kaana zalooman jahoolaa
33:73: Liyu-'azzibal laahul munaafiqeena wal-munaafiqaati walmushrikeena wal-mushrikaati Wa-yatoobal laahu 'alal mu'mineena walmu'minaat; Wa-kaanal laahu Ghafoorar Raheema
34:1: Alhamdu lillaahil lazee lahoo maa fis samaawaati Wa-maa fil ardi Wa-lahul hamdu fil aakhirah; Wa-Huwal Hakeemul Khabeer
34:2: Ya'lamu maa yaliju fil ardi Wa-maa yakhruju minhaa Wa-maa yanzilu minas samaaa'i Wa-maa ya'ruju feehaa; Wa-Huwar Raheemul Ghafoor
34:3: Wa-qaalal lazeena kafaroo laa taateenas Saa'ah; qul balaa Wa-Rabbee lataatiyannakum 'Aalimul Ghaib; laa ya'zubu 'anhu misqaalu zarratin fis samaawaati Wa-laa fil ardi Wa-laaa asgharu min zaalika Wa-laaa akbaru illaa fee kitaabim mubeen
34:4: Liyajziyal lazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaat; ulaaa'ika lahum maghfiratunw Wa-rizqun kareem
34:5: Wallazeena sa'aw feee aayaatinaa mu'aajizeena ulaaa-'ika lahum 'azaabum mir rijzin aleem
34:6: Wa-yaral lazeena ootul 'ilmal lazeee unzila ilaika mir Rabbika huwal haqqa Wa-yahdeee ilaaa siraatil 'Azeezil Hameed
34:7: Wa-qaalal lazeena kafaroo hal nadullukum 'alaa rajuliny yanabbi-'ukum izaa muzziqtum kulla mumazzaqin innakum lafee khalqin jadeed
34:8: Aftaraa 'alal laahi kaziban am bihee jinnah; balil lazeena laa yu'minoona bil-Aakhirati fil'azaabi wad dalaalil ba'eed
34:9: Afalam yaraw ilaa maa baina aydeehim Wa-maa khalfahum minas samaaa'i wal-ard; in nashad nakhsif bihimul arda aw nusqit 'alaihim kisafam minas samaaa'; inna fee zaalika la-Aayatal likulli 'abdim muneeb
34:10: Wa-laqad aatainaa Daawooda minnaa fadlaien yaa-jibaalu awwibee ma'ahoo wattaira Wa-alannaa lahul hadeed
34:11: Ani 'mal saabighaatinw Wa-qaddir fis sardi wa'maloo saalihan innee bimaa ta'maloona Baseer
34:12: Wa-li-Sulaimaanar reeha ghuduwwuhaa shahrunw Wa-ra-waahuhaa shahrunw Wa-asalnaa lahoo 'ainal qitr; Wa-minal jinni maien ya'malu baina yadaihi bi-izni Rabbih; Wa-maien yazigh minhum 'an amrinaa nuziqhu min 'azaabis sa'eer
34:13: Ya'maloona lahoo ma yashaaa'u mim mahaareeba Wa-tamaaseela Wa-jifaanin kaljawaabi Wa-qudoorir raasiyaat; i'maloo aala Daawooda shukraa; Wa-qaleelum min 'ibaadiyash shakoor
34:14: Falammaa qadainaa 'alaihil mawta ma dallahum 'alaa mawtiheee illaa daaabbatul ardi taakulu minsa-atahoo falammaa kharra tabaiyyanatil jinnu al law kaanoo ya'lamoonal ghaiba maa labisoo fil 'azaabil muheen
34:15: Laqad kaana li-Saba-in fee maskanihim Aayatun jannataani 'aien yameeninw Wa-shimaalin kuloo mir rizq Rabbikum washkuroo lah; baldatun taiyyibatunw Wa-Rabbun Ghafoor
34:16: Fa-a'radoo fa-arsalnaa 'alaihim Sailal 'Arimi Wa-baddalnaahum bijannataihim jannataini zawaatai ukulin khamtinw Wa-aslinw Wa-shai'im min sidrin qaleel
34:17: Zaalika jazainaahum bimaa kafaroo Wa-hal nujaazeee illal kafoor
34:18: Wa-ja'alnaa bainahum Wa-bainal qural latee baaraknaa feehaa quran zaahiratanw Wa-qaddamaa feehas sayr; seeroo feehaa la-yaalirya Wa-aiyaaman aamineen
34:19: Faqaaloo Rabbanaa baa'id baina asfaarinaa Wa-zalamooo anfusahum faja'alnaahum ahaadeesa Wa-mazzaq-naahum kulla mumazzaq; inna fee zaalika la-Aayaatil likulli sabbaarin shakoor
34:20: Wa-laqad saddaq 'alaihim Ibleesu zannnabhoo fattaba'oohu illaa fareeqam minal mu'mineen
34:21: Wa-maa kaana lahoo 'alaihim min sultaanin illaa lina'lama maien yu-minu bil-Aakhirati mimman huwa minhaa fee shakk; Wa-Rabbuka 'alaa kulli shai'in Hafeez
34:22: Qulid 'ul lazeena za'amtum min doonil laahi laa yamlikoona misqaala zarratin fis samaawaati Wa-laa fil ardi Wa-maa lahum feehimaa min shirkinw Wa-maa lahoo minhum min zaheer
34:23: Wa-laa tanfa'ush shafaa'atu 'indahooo illaa liman azina lah; hattaaa izaa fuzzi'a 'an quloobihim qaaloo maazaa qaala Rabbukum; qaalul haqq, Wa-Huwal 'Aliyul Kabeer
34:24: Qul maien yarzuqukum minas samaawaati wal-ardi qulil laahu Wa-innaaa aw iyyaakum la'alaa hudan aw fee dalaalim mubeen
34:25: Qul laa tus'aloona 'ammaaa ajramnaa Wa-laa nus'alu 'ammaa ta'maloon
34:26: Qul yajma'u bainanaa Rabbunaa summa yaftahu bainanaa bilhaqq; Wa-Huwal Fattaahul 'Aleem
34:27: Qul arooniyal lazeena alhaqtum bihee shurakaaa'a kallaa; bal Huwal Laahul 'Azeezul Hakeem
34:28: Wa-maaa arsalnaaka illaa kaaffatal linnaasi basheeranw Wa-nazeeranw Wa-laakinna aksaran naasi laa ya'lamoon
34:29: Wa-yaqooloona mataa haazal wa'du in kuntum saadiqeen
34:30: Qul lakum mee'aadu Yawmil laa tasta'khiroona 'anhu saa'atanw Wa-laa tastaqdimoon
34:31: Wa-qaalal lazeena kafaroo lan nu'mina bihaazal Quraani Wa-laa billazee baina yadayh; Wa-law taraaa iziz zaalimoona mawqoofoona 'inda Rabbihim yarji'u ba'duhum ilaa ba'dinil qawla yaqoolul lazeenas tud'ifoo lillazeenas takbaroo law-laaa antum lakunnaa mu'mineen
34:32: Qaalal lazeenas takbaroo lillazeenas tud'ifooo anahnu sadadnaakum 'anil hudaa ba'da iz jaaa'akum bal kuntum mujrimeen
34:33: Wa-qaalal lazeenastud'ifoo lillazeenas takbaroo bal makrul laili wannahaari iz ta'muroonanaaaa an nakfura billaahi Wa-naj'ala lahooo andaadaa; Wa-asarrun nadaamata lammaa ra awul 'azaab; Wa-ja'alnal aghlaala feee a'naaqil lazeena kafaroo; hal yujzawna illaa maa kaanoo ya'maloon
34:34: Wa-maaa arsalnaa' fee qaryatim min nazeerin illaa qaala mutrafooaa innaa bimaaa ursiltum bihee kaafiroon
34:35: Wa-qaaloo nahnu aksaru amwaalanw Wa-awlaadanw Wa-maa nahnu bimu-'azzabeen
34:36: Qul inna Rabbee yabsutur rizqa limaien yashaaa'u Wa-yaqdiru Wa-laakinna aksaran naasi laa ya'lamoon
34:37: Wa-maaa amwaalukum Wa-laaa awlaadukum billatee tuqarribukum 'indanaa zulfaaa illaa man aamana Wa-'amila saalihan fa-ulaaa'ika lahum jazaaa'ud di'fi bimaa 'amiloo Wa-hum fil ghurufaati aaminoon
34:38: Wallazeena yas'awna feee Aayaatinaa mu'aajizeena ulaaa'ika fil 'azaabi muhdaroon
34:39: Qul inna Rabbee yabsutur rizqa limai yashaaa'u min 'ibaadihee Wa-yaqdiru lah; Wa-maaa anfaqtum min shai'in fahuwa yukhlifuhoo Wa-Huwa khairur raaziqeen
34:40: Wa-yawma yahshuruhum jamee'an summa yaqoolu lilmalaaa'ikati a-haaa'ulaaa'i iyyaakum kaanoo ya'budoon
34:41: Qaaloo Subhaanaka Anta waliyyunaa min doonihim bal kaanoo ya'budoonal jinna aksaruhum bihim mu'minoon
34:42: Fal-Yawma laa yamliku ba'dukum liba'din naf'anw Wa-laa darraa; Wa-naqoolu lil-lazeena zalamoo zooqoo 'azaaban Naaril latee kuntum bihaa tukazziboon
34:43: Wa-izaa tutlaa 'alaihim Aayaatunaa baiyinaatin qaaloo maa haazaa illaa rajuluien yureedu aien yasuddakum 'ammaa kaana ya'budu aabaaa'ukum Wa-qaaloo maa haazaaa illaaa ifkum muftaraa; Wa-qaalal lazeena kafaroo lilhaqqi lammaa jaaa'ahum in haazaaa illaa sihrum mubeen
34:44: Wa-maaa aatainaahum min Kutubiny yadrusoonahaa Wa-maaa arsalnaaa ilaihim qablaka min nazeer
34:45: Wa-kazzabal lazeena min qablihim Wa-maa balaghoo mi'shaara maaa aatainaahum fakazzaboo Rusulee; fakaifa kaana nakeer
34:46: Qul innamaaa a'izukum biwaahidatin an taqoomoo lillaahi masnaa Wa-furaadaa summa tatafakkaroo; maa bisaahibikum min jinnah; in huwa illaa nazeerul lakum baina yadai 'azaabin shadeed
34:47: Qul maa sa-altukum min ajrin fahuwa lakum in ajriya illaa 'alal laahi Wa-Huwa 'alaa kullin shai-in Shaheed
34:48: Qul inna Rabbee yaqzifu bilhaqq 'Allaamul Ghuyoob
34:49: Qul jaaa'al haqqu Wa-maa yubdi'ul baatilu Wa-maa yu'eed
34:50: Qul in dalaltu fainnamaaa adillu 'alaa nafsee Wa-inih tadaitu fabimaa yoohee ilaiyya Rabbee; innahoo Samee'un Qareeb
34:51: Wa-law taraaa iz fazi'oo falaa fawta Wa-ukhizoo mim makaanin qareeb
34:52: Wa-qaaloo aamannaa bihee Wa-annaa lahumut tanaawushu min makaanin ba'eed
34:53: Wa-qad kafaroo bihee min qablu Wa-yaqzifoona bilghaibi min makaanin ba'eed
34:54: Wa-heela bainahum Wa-baina maa yashtahoona kamaa fu'ila bi-ashyaa'ihim min qabl; innahum kaanoo fee shakkin mureeb
35:1: Alhamdu lillaahi faatiris samaawaati wal-ardi jaa'ilil malaaa'ikati rusulan uleee ajnihatim masnaa Wa-sulaasa Wa-rubaa'; yazeedu fil khalqi maa yashaaa'; innal laaha 'alaa kulli shai'in Qadeer
35:2: Maa yaftahil laahu linnaaasi mir rahmatin falaa mumsika lahaa Wa-maa yumsik falaa mursila lahoo mim ba'dihi; Wa-Huwal 'Azeezul Hakeem
35:3: Yaaa-ayyuhan naasuzkuroo ni'matal laahi 'alaikum; hal min khaaliqin ghairul laahi yarzuqukum minas samaaa'i wal ard; laaa ilaaha illaa Huwa fa-annaa tu'fakoon
35:4: Wa-ien yukazzibooka faqad kuzzibat Rusulum min qablik; Wa-ilal laahi turja'ul umoor
35:5: Yaaa-ayyuhan naasu inna wa'dal laahi haqqun falaa taghurrannakumul hayaatud dunyaa; Wa-laa yaghurran-nakum billaahil gharoor
35:6: Innash shaitaana lakum 'aduwwun fattakhizoohu 'aduwwaa; innamaa yad'oo hizbahoo liyakoonoo min ashaabis sa'eer
35:7: Allazeena kafaroo lahum 'azaabun shadeed; wallazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaati lahum maghfiratunw Wa-ajrun kabeer
35:8: Afaman zuyyina lahoo sooo'u 'amalihee fara-aahu hasanaa; fa-innal laaha yudillu mai yashaaa'u Wa-yahdee mai yashaaa'u falaa tazhab nafsuka 'alaihim hasaraat; innal laaha 'aleemun bimaa yasna'oon
35:9: Wallaahul lazeee arsalar riyaaha fatuseeru sa-haaban fasuqnaahu ilaa baladim maiyitin fa-ahyaynaa bihil arda ba'da mawtihaa; kazaalikan nushoor
35:10: Man kaana yureedul 'izzata falillaahil 'izzatu jamee'aa; ilaihi yas'adul kalimut taiyibu wal'amalus saalihu yarfa'uh; wallazeena yamkuroonas sayyiaati lahum 'azaabun shadeed; Wa-makru ulaaa'ika huwa yaboor
35:11: Wallaahu khalaqakum min turaabin summa min nutfatin summa ja'alakum azwaajaa; Wa-maa tahmilu min unsaa Wa-laa tada'u illaa bi'ilmih; Wa-maa yu'ammaru mim mu'ammarinw Wa-laa yunqasu min 'umuriheee illaa fee kitaab; inna zaalika 'alal laahi yaseer
35:12: Wa-maa yastawil bahraani haaza 'azbun furaatun saaa'ighun sharaabuhoo Wa-haazaa milhun ujaaj; Wa-min kullin ta'kuloona lahman tariyyanw Wa-tastakhrijoona hilyatan talbasoonahaa Wa-taral fulka feehi mawaakhira litabtaghoo min fadlihee Wa-la'allakum tashkuroon
35:13: Yoolijul laila fin nahaari Wa-yoolijun nahaara fil laili Wa-sakhkharash shamsa wal-qamara kulluien yajree li-ajalim musammaa; zaalikumul laahu Rabbukum lahul mulk; wallazeena tad'oona min doonihee maa yamlikoona min qitmeer
35:14: In tad'oohum laa yasma'oo du'aaa'akum Wa-law sami'oo mas tajaaboo lakum; Wa-Yawmal Qiyaamati Yakfuroona bishirkikum; Wa-laa yunabbi'uka mislu khabeer
35:15: Yaaa-ayyunhan naasu antumul fuqaraaa'u ilal laahi wallaahu Huwal Ghaniyyul Hameed
35:16: Ien yasha' yuzhibkum Wa-ya'ti bikhalqin jadeed
35:18: Wa-laa taziru waaziratun wizra ukhraa; Wa-in tad'u musqalatun ilaa himlihaa laa yuhmal minhu shai'unw Wa-law kaana zaa qurbaa; innamaa tunzirul lazeena yakhshawna Rabbahum bilghaibi Wa-aqaamus Salaah; Wa-man tazakkaa fa-innamaa yatazakkaa linafsih; Wa-ilal laahil maseer
35:22: Wa-maa yastawil ahyaaa'u Wa-lal amwaat; innal laaha yusmi'u maien yashaaa'u Wa-maaa anta bi-musmi'im man fil quboor
35:24: Innaa arsalnaaka bil-haqqi basheeranw Wa-nazeeraa; Wa-im min ummatin illaa khalaa feehaa nazeer
35:25: Wa-ien yukazzibooka faqad kazzabal lazeena min qablihim jaaa'at-hum Rusuluhum bilbaiyyinaati Wa-biz-Zuburi Wa-bil-Kitaabil Muneer
35:26: Summa akhaztul lazeena kafaroo fakaifa kaana nakeer
35:27: Alam tara annal laaha anzala minas samaaa'i maaa'an fa-akhrajnaa bihee samaraatim mukhtalifan alwaanuhaa; Wa-minal jibaali judadum beedunw Wa-humrum mukhtalifun alwaanuhaa Wa-gharaabeebu sood
35:28: Wa-minan naasi wadda-waaabbi wal-an'aami mukhtalifun alwaanuhoo kazalik; innamaa yakhshal laaha min 'ibaadihil 'ulamaaa'; innal laaha 'Azeezun Ghafoor
35:29: Innal lazeena yatloona Kitabbal laahi Wa-aqaamus Salaata Wa-anfaqoo mimmaa razaqnaahum sirranw Wa-'alaa-niyataien yarjoona tijaaratal lan taboor
35:30: Liyuwaffiyahum ujoorahum Wa-yazeedahum min fadlih; innahoo Ghafoorun Shakoor
35:31: Wallazeee awhainaaa ilaika minal Kitaabi huwal haqqu musaddiqal limaa baina yadayh; innal laaha bi'ibaadihee la-khabeerum Baseer
35:32: Summa awrasnal Kitaabal lazeenas tafainaa min 'ibaadinaa faminhum zaalimul linafsihee Wa-minhum muqtasidu, Wa-minhum saabiqum bilkhairaati bi-iznil laah; zaalika huwal fadlul kabeer
35:33: Jannaatu 'adnien yad-khuloonahaa yuhallawna feeha min asaawira min zahabinw Wa-lu'lu'anw Wa-libaa-suhum feehaa hareer
35:34: Wa-qaalul hamdu lillaahil lazeee azhaba 'annal hazan; inna Rabbanaa la-Ghafoorun Shakoor
35:35: Allazeee ahallanaa daaral muqaamati min fadlihee laa yamassunaa feehaa nasabunw Wa-laa yamassunaa feehaa lughoob
35:36: Wallazeena kafaroo lahum naaru Jahannama laa yuqdaa 'alaihim fa-yamootoo Wa-laa yukhaffafu 'anhum min 'azaabihaa; kazaalika najzee kulla kafoor
35:37: Wa-hum yastarikhoona feehaa Rabbanaa akhrijnaa na'mal saalihan ghairal lazee kunnaa na'mal; awa-lamnu 'ammirkum maa yatazak-karu feehi man tazakkara Wa-jaaa'akumun nazeeru fazooqoo famaa lizzaalimeena min naseer
35:38: Innal laaha 'aalimu ghaibis samaawaati wal-ard; innahoo 'aleemum bizaatis sudoor
35:39: Huwal lazee ja'alakum khalaaa'ifa fil ard; faman kafara fa'alaihi kufruhoo; Wa-laa yazeedul kaafireena kufruhum 'inda Rabbihim illaa maqtanw Wa-laa yazeedul kaafireena kufruhum illaa khasaaraa
35:40: Qul ara'aytum shurakaaa'a-kumul lazeena tad'oona min doonil laahi; aroonee maazaa khalaqoo minal ardi am lahum shirkun fis samaawaati am aatainaahum Kitaaban fahum 'alaa baiyyinatim minh; bal ien ya'iduz zaalimoona ba-'duhum ba'dan illaa ghurooraa
35:41: Innal laaha yumsikus samaawaati wal-arda an tazoolaaa; Wa-la'in zaalataaa in amsa-kahumaa min ahadim mim ba'dih; innahoo kaana Haleeman Ghafooraa
35:42: Wa-aqsamoo billaahi jahda aymaanihim la'in jaaa'ahum nazeerul layakoonunna ahdaa min ihdal umami falam-maa jaaa'ahum nazeerum maa zaadahum illaa nufooraa
35:43: Istikbaaran fil ardi Wa-makras sayyi'; Wa-laa yaheequl makrus sayyi'u illaa bi-ahlih; fahal yanzuroona illaa sunnatal awwaleen; falan tajida lisunnatil laahi tabdeelanw Wa-lan tajida lisunnatil laahi tahweela
35:44: Awalam yaseeroo fil ardi fa-yanzuroo kaifa kaana 'aaqibatul lazeena min Qablihim Wa-kaanoo ashadda minhum quwwah; Wa-maa kaanal laahu liyu'jizahoo min shai'in fis samaawaati Wa-laa fil ard; innahoo kaana 'Aleeman Qadeeraa
35:45: Wa-law yu'aakhizul laahun naasa bima kasaboo maa taraka 'alaa zahrihaa min daaabbatinw Wa-laakiny yu'akhkhiruhum ilaaa ajalim musamman fa-izaa jaaa'a ajaluhum fa-innal laaha kaana bi'ibaadihee Baseeraa
36:6: Litunzira qawmam maaa unzira aabaaa'uhum fahum ghaafiloon
36:7: Laqad haqqal qawlu 'alaaa aksarihim fahum laa yu'minoon
36:8: Innaa ja'alnaa feee a'naaqihim aghlaalan fahiya ilal azqaani fahum muqmahoon
36:9: Wa-ja'alnaa mim baini aydeehim saddanw wa-min khalfihim saddan fa-aghshai-naahum fahum laa yubsiroon
36:10: Wa-sawaaa'un 'alaihim 'a-anzartahum am lam tunzirhum laa yu'minoon
36:11: Innamaa tunziru manit taba 'az-Zikra Wa-khashiyar Rahmaana bilghaib, fabashshirhu bimaghfiratinw-wa ajrin kareem
36:12: Innaa Nahnu nuhyil mawtaa Wa-naktubu maa qaddamoo Wa-aasaarahum; Wa-kulla shai'in ahsainaahu feee Imaamim Mubeen
36:13: Wadrib lahum masalan Ashaabal Qaryatih; iz jaaa'ahal mursaloon
36:14: Iz arsalnaaa ilaihimus naini fakazzaboohumaa fa'azzaznaa bisaalisin faqaalooo innaaa ilaikum mursaloon
36:15: Qaaloo maaa antum illaa basharum mislunaa Wa-maaa anzalar Rahmaanu min shai'in in antum illaa takziboon
36:16: Qaaloo Rabbunaa ya'lamu innaaa ilaikum lamursaloon
36:18: Qaaloo innaa tataiyarnaa bikum la'il lam tantahoo lanar-jumannakum Wa-la-yamassan-nakum minnaa 'azaabun aleem
36:19: Qaaloo taaa'irukum ma'akum; a'in zukkirtum; bal antum qawmum musrifoon
36:20: Wa-jaaa'a min aqsal madeenati rajuluien yas'aa qaala yaa-qawmit tabi'ul mursaleen
36:21: Ittabi'oo mal laa yas'alukum ajranw wa-hum muhtadoon
36:22: Wa-maa liya laaa a'budul lazee fataranee Wa-ilaihi turja'oon
36:23: A-attakhizu min dooniheee aalihatan ien yuridnir Rahmaanu bidurril laa tughni 'annee shafaa-'atuhum shai-'anw wa-laa yunqizoon
36:26: Qeelad khulil Jannnah; qaala yaa-laita qawmee ya'lamoon
36:27: Bimaa ghafara lee Rabbee Wa-ja'alanee minal mukrameen
36:28: Wa-maaa anzalnaa 'alaa qawmihee mim ba'dihee min jundim minas samaaa'i Wa-maa kunnaa munzileen
36:29: In kaanat illaa saihatanw waahidatan fa-izaa hum khaamidoon
36:30: Yaa-hasratan 'alal 'ibaaad; maa ya'teehim mir Rasoolin illaa kaanoo bihee yastahzi-'oon
36:31: Alam yaraw kam ahlak-naa qablahum minal qurooni annahum ilaihim laa yarji'oon
36:32: Wa-in kullul lammaa jamee'ul ladainaa muhdaroon
36:33: Wa-Aayatul lahumul ardul maitatu ahyainaahaa Wa-akhrajnaa minhaa habban faminhu ya'kuloon
36:34: Wa-ja'alnaa feehaa jannaatim min nakheelinw Wa-a'naabinw Wa-fajjarnaa feeha minal 'uyoon
36:35: Li-ya'kuloo min samarihee Wa-maa 'amilat-hu aideehim; afalaa yashkuroon
36:36: Subhaanal lazee khalaqal azwaaja kullahaa mimmaa tumbitul ardu Wa-min anfusihim Wa-mimmaa laa ya'lamoon
36:37: Wa-Aayatul lahumul lailu naslakhu minhun nahaara fa-izaa hum muzlimoon
36:38: Wash-shamsu tajree limustaqarril lahaa; zaalika taqdeerul 'Azeezil Aleem
36:39: Walqamara qaddarnaahu manaazila hattaa 'aada kal'ur-joonil qadeem
36:40: Lash shamsu yambaghee lahaaa an tudrikal qamara walal lailu saabiqun nahaar; Wa-kullun fee falaki yasbahoon
36:41: Wa-Aayatul lahum annaa hamalnaa zurriyatahum fil fulkil mashhoon
36:42: Wa-khalaqnaa lahum mim mislihee maa yarkaboon
36:43: Wa-in nashaa nughriqhum falaa sareekha lahum Wa-laa hum yunqazoon
36:44: Illaa rahmatam minnaa Wa-mataa'an ilaa heen
36:45: Wa-izaa qeela lahumut taqoo maa baina aideekum Wa-maa khalfakum la'allakum turhamoon
36:46: Wa-maa ta'teehim min aayatim min Aayaati Rabbihim illaa kaanoo 'anhaa mu'rideen
36:47: Wa-izaa qeela lahum anfiqoo mimmaa razaqakumul laahu qaalal lazeena kafaroo lillazeena aamanooo anut'imu mal law yashaaa'ul laahu at'amahooo in antum illaa fee dalaalim mubeen
36:48: Wa-yaqooloona mataa haazal wa'du in kuntum saadiqeen
36:49: Maa yanzuroona illaa saihatanw waahidatan ta'khuzuhum Wa-hum yakhissimoon
