36:50: Falaa yastatee'oona taw-siyatanw wa-laaa ilaaa ahlihim yarji'oon
36:51: Wa-nufikha fis soori faizaa hum minal ajdaasi ilaa Rabbihim yansiloon
36:52: Qaaloo yaa-wailanaa mam ba'asanaa mim marqadinaa; haaza maa wa'adar Rahmanu Wa-sadaqal mursaloon
36:53: In kaanat illaa saihatanw waahidatan fa-izaa hum jamee'ul ladainaa muhdaroon
36:54: Fal-Yawma laa tuzlamu nafsun shai'anw-wa laa tujzawna illaa maa kuntum ta'maloon
36:55: Inna Ashaabal jannatil Yawma fee shughulin faakihoon
36:56: Hum Wa-azwaajuhum fee zilaalin 'alal araaa'iki muttaki'oon
36:57: Lahum feehaa faakiha-tunw wa-lahum maa yadda'oon
36:60: Alam a'had ilaikum yaa Baneee Aadama al-laa ta'budush Shaitaana innahoo lakum 'aduwwum mubeen
36:62: Wa-laqad adalla minkum jibillan kaseeraa; afalam takoonoo ta'qiloon
36:65: Al-Yawma nakhtimu 'alaaa afwaahihim Wa-tukallimunaaa aideehim Wa-tashhadu arjuluhum bimaa kaanoo yaksiboon
36:66: Wa-law nashaaa'u lata-masna 'alaaa aiyyunihim fasta-baqus siraata fa-annaa yubsiroon
36:67: Wa-law nashaaa'u lamasakhnaahum 'alaa makaanatihim famas tataa'oo mudiyyanw-wa laa yarji'oon
36:68: Wa-man nu-'ammirhu nunakkishu fil khalq; afalaa ya'qiloon
36:69: Wa-maa 'allamnaahush shi'ra Wa-maa yambaghee lah; in huwa illaa zikrunw-wa Qur-aanum mubeen
36:70: Liyunzira man kaana haiyyanw wa-yahiqqal qawlu 'alal kaafireen
36:71: Awalam yaraw annaa khalaqnaa lahum mimmaa 'amilat aideenaaa an'aaman fahum lahaa maalikoon
36:72: Wa-zallalnaahaa lahum faminhaa rakoobuhum Wa-minhaa ya'kuloon
36:73: Wa-lahum feehaa manaa-fi'u Wa-mashaarib; afalaa yashkuroon
36:74: Wattakhazoo min doonil laahi aalihatal la'allahum yunsaroon
36:75: Laa yastatee'oona nasrahum Wa-hum lahum jundum muhdaroon
36:76: Falaa yahzunka qawluhum; innaa na'lamu maa yusirroona Wa-maa yu'linoon
36:77: Awalam yaral insaanu annaa khalaqnaahu min nutfatin fa-izaa huwa khaseemum mubeen
36:78: Wa-daraba lanaa maslanw wa-nasiya khalqahoo qaala maien yuhyil 'izaama Wa-hiya rameem
36:79: Qul yuh-yeehal lazeee ansha-ahaaa awwala marrah; Wa-Huwa bikulli khalqin 'Aleem
36:80: Allazee ja'ala lakum minash shajaril akhdari naaran fa-izaaa antum minhu tooqidoon
36:81: Awa-laisal lazee khalaqas samaawaati wal arda biqaadirin 'alaaa ai-yakhluqa mislahum; balaa Wa-Huwal Khallaaqul 'Aleem
36:82: Innamaa amruhooo izaaa araada shai'an aien yaqoola lahoo kun fa-yakoon
36:83: Fa-Subhaanal lazee biyadihee malakootu kulli shai-inw wa-ilaihi turja'oon
37:5: Rabbus samaawaati wal-ardi Wa-maa bainahumaa Wa-Rabbul mashaariq
37:8: Laa yassamma-'oona ilal mala-'il a'alaa Wa-yuqzafoona min kulli jaanib
37:10: Illaa man khatifal khatfata fa-atba'ahoo shihaabun saaqib
37:11: Fastaftihim ahum ashaddu khalqan am man khalaqnaa; innaa khalaqnaahum min teenil laazib
37:15: Wa-qaalooo in haazaa illaa sihrum mubeen
37:16: A-izaa mitnaa Wa-kunnaa turaabanw Wa-'izaaman 'a-innaa lamab'oosoon
37:19: Fa-innamaa hiya zajra-tunw waahidatun fa-izaa hum yanzuroon
37:21: Haazaa Yawmul Faslil lazee kuntum bihee tukaziboon
37:22: Uhshurul lazeena zalamoo Wa-azwaajahum Wa-maa kaanoo ya'budoon
37:23: Min doonil laahi fahdoohum ilaa siraatil Jaheem
37:30: Wa-maa kaana lanaa 'alaikum min sultaanim bal kuntum qawman taagheen
37:35: Innahum kaanooo izaa qeela lahum laaa ilaaha illal laahu yastakbiroon
37:36: Wa-yaqooloona a'innaa lataarikooo aalihatinaa lishaa'irim majnoon
37:39: Wa-maa tujzawna illaa maa kuntum ta'maloon
37:47: Laa feehaa ghawlunw Wa-laa hum 'anhaa yunzafoon
37:51: Qaala qaaa'ilum minhum innee kaana lee qareen
37:53: A-izaa mitnaa Wa-kunnaa turaabanw Wa-'izaaman 'a-innaa lamadeenoon
37:57: Wa-law-laa ni'matu Rabbee lakuntu minal muhdareen
37:59: Illa mawtatanal oola Wa-maa nahnu bimu'azzabeen
37:62: Azaalika khairun nuzulan am shajaratuz Zaqqoom
37:64: Innahaa shajaratun takhruju feee aslil Jaheem
37:66: Fa-innahum la-aakiloona minhaa famaali'oona minhal butoon
37:67: Summa inna lahum 'alaihaa lashawbam min hameem
37:85: Iz qaala li-abeehi Wa-qawmihee maazaa ta'budoon
37:91: Faraagha ilaaa aalihatihim faqaala alaa taakuloon
37:97: Qaalub noo lahoo bun-yaanan fa-alqoohu fil jaheem
37:99: Wa-qaala innee zaahibun ilaa Rabbee sa-yahdeen
37:102: Falamma balagha ma'a-hus sa'ya qaala yaa-buniya inneee araa fil manaami anneee azbahuka fanzur maazaa taraa; qaala yaaa-abatif 'al maa tu'maru satajidunee in shaaa' allaahu minas saabireen
37:105: Qad saddaqtar ru'yaa; innaa kazaalika najzil muhsineen
37:113: Wa-baaraknaa 'alaihi Wa-'alaaa Ishaaq; Wa-min zurriyya-tihimaa muhsinunw Wa-zaalimul linafsihee mubeen
37:144: Lalabisa fee batniheee ilaa Yawmi yub'asoon
37:147: Wa-arsalnaahu ilaa mi'ati alfin aw yazeedoon
37:150: Am khalaqnal malaaa'i-kata inaasanw Wa-hum shaahidoon
37:158: Wa-ja'aloo bainahoo Wa-bainal jinnati nasabaa; Wa-laqad 'alimatil jinnatu innahum lamuhdaroon
37:164: Wa-maa minnaaa illaa lahoo maqaamun ma'loom
37:177: Fa-izaa nazala bisaahatihim fasaaa'a sabaahul munzareen
38:3: Kam ahlaknaa min qablihim min qarnin fanaadaw Wa-laata heena manaas
38:4: Wa-'ajibooo an jaaa'a-hum munzirum minhum Wa-qaalal kaafiroona haazaa saahirun kazzaab
38:5: Aja'alal aalihata Ilaahanw Waahidan inna haazaa lashai'un 'ujaab
38:6: Wantalaqal mala-u minhum anim shoo wasbiroo 'alaaa aalihatikum innna haazaa lashai-'uien yuraad
38:7: Maa sami'naa bihaazaa fil millatil aakhirati in haazaaa illakh tilaaq
38:8: A-unzila 'alaihiz zikru min baininaa; bal hum fee shakkin min Zikree bal lammaa yazooqoo 'azaab
38:10: Am lahum mulkus samaawaati wal-ardi Wa-maa bainahumaa falyartaqoo fil asbaab
38:11: Jundum maa hunaalika mahzoomum minal Ahzaab
38:12: Kazzabat qablahum qawmu Noohinw Wa-'Aadunw Wa-Fir'awnu zul awtaad
38:13: Wa-Samoodu Wa-qawmu Lootinw Wa-As-haabul 'Aykah; ulaaa'ikal Ahzaab
38:14: In kullun illaa kazzabar Rusula fahaqqa 'iqaab
38:15: Wa-maa yanzuru haaa-ulaaa'i illaa saihatanw waahidatam maa lahaa min fawaaq
38:16: Wa-qaaloo Rabbanaa 'ajjil lanaa qittanaa qabla Yawmil Hisaab
38:17: Isbir 'alaa maa yaqooloona wazkur 'abdanaa Daawooda zal aidi innahooo awwaab
38:18: Innaa sakhkharnal jibaala ma'ahoo yusabbihna bil'ashiyyi wal-ishraaq
38:20: Wa-shadadnaa mulkahoo Wa-aatainaahul Hikmata Wa-faslal khitaab
38:21: Wa-hal ataaka naba'ul khasm; iz tasawwarul mihraab
38:22: Iz dakhaloo 'alaa Daawooda fafazi'a minhum qaaloo laa takhaf khasmaani baghaa ba'dunaa 'alaa ba'din fahkum bainanaaa bilhaqqi Wa-laa tushtit wahdinaaa ilaa Sawaaa'is Siraat
38:23: Inna haazaaa akhee lahoo tis'unw Wa-tis'oona na'jatanw Wa-liya na'jatunw waahidah; faqaala akfilneeha Wa-'azzanee fil khitaab
38:24: Qaala laqad zalamaka bisu-'aali na'jatika ilaa ni'aajih; Wa-inna kaseeran minal khulataaa'i la-yabghee ba'duhum 'alaa ba'din illal lazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaati Wa-qaleelun maa hum; Wa-zanna Daawoodu annamaa fatannaahu fastaghfara Rabbahoo Wa-kharra raaki'anw Wa-anaab
38:25: Faghafarnaa lahoo zaalik; Wa-inna lahoo 'indanaa lazulfaa Wa-husna ma-aab
38:26: Yaa-Daawoodu innaa ja'alnaaka khaleefatan fil ardi fahkum bainan naasi bilhaqqi Wa-laa tattabi'il hawaa fayudillaka 'an sabeelil laah; innal lazeena yadilloona 'an sabeelil laah; lahum 'azaabun shadeedum bimaa nasoo Yawmal Hisaab
38:27: Wa-maa khalaqnas samaaa'a wal-arda Wa-maa bainahumaa baatilaa; zaalika zannul lazeena kafaroo; fa-waylul lil-lazeena kafaroo minan Naar
38:28: Am naj'alul lazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaati kalmufisdeena fil ardi am naj'alul muttaqeena kalfujjaar
38:29: Kitaabun anzalnaahu ilaika mubaarakul liyaddabbarooo Aayaatihee Wa-liyatazakkara ulul albaab
38:30: Wa-wahabnaa li-Daawooda Sulaimaan; ni'mal 'abd; innahoo awwaab
38:32: Faqaala inneee ahbabtu hubbal khairi 'an zikri Rabbee hattaa tawaarat bilhijaab
38:34: Wa-laqad fatannaa Sulaimaana Wa-alqainaa 'alaa kursiyyihee jasadan summa anaab
38:35: Qaala Rabbigh fir lee Wa-hab lee mulkal laa yambaghee li-ahadin min ba'dee innaka Antal Wahhaab
38:36: Fa-sakharnaa lahur reeha tajree bi-amrihee rukhaaa'an haisu asaab
38:39: Haazaa 'ataaa'unaa famnun aw amsik bighairi hisaab
38:41: Wazkur 'abdanaaa Ayyoob; iz naada Rabbahooo annee massaniyash Shaitaanu bi-nusbinw Wa-'azaab
38:42: Urkud bi-rijlika haaza mughtasalun baaridunw Wa-sharaab
38:43: Wa-wahabnaa lahoo ahlahoo Wa-mislahum ma'ahum rahmatan minna Wa-zikraa li-ulil albaab
38:44: Wa-khuz biyadika dighsan fadrib bihee Wa-laa tahnas, innaa wajadnaahu saabiraa; ni'mal 'abd; innahooo awwaab
38:45: Wazkur 'ibaadanaaa Ibraaheema Wa-Is-haaqa Wa-Ya'qooba ulil aydee walabsaar
38:48: Wazkur Ismaa'eela wal Yasa'a Wa-Zal-Kifli Wa-kullun minal akhyaar
38:49: Haazaa zikrun Wa-inna lil-muttaqeena la-husna ma-aab
38:51: Muttaki'eena feehaa yad'oona feehaa bifaakihatin kaseeratinw Wa-sharaab
38:54: Inna haazaa larizqunaa maa lahoo min nafaad
38:59: Haazaa fawjun muqtahimun ma'akum laa marhaban bihim; innahum saalun Naar
38:60: Qaaloo bal antum laa marhaban bikum; antum qaddamtumoohu lanaa fabi'sal qaraar
38:61: Qaaloo Rabbanaa man qaddama lanaa haazaa fa-zidhu 'azaaban di'fan fin Naar
38:62: Wa-qaaloo maa lanaa laa naraa rijaalan kunnaa na'udduhum minal ashraar
38:64: Inna zaalika lahaqqun takhaasumu Ahlin Naar
38:65: Qul innamaaa ana munzirunw Wa-maa min laahin illal laahul Waahidul Qahhaar
38:66: Rabbus samaawaati wal-ardi Wa-maa bainahumal 'Azeezul Ghaffaar
38:69: Maa kaana liya min 'ilmin bil-mala'il a'laaa iz yakhtasimoon
38:70: Ien-yoohaaa ilaiya illaaa anna maaa ana nazeerun mubeen
38:71: Iz qaala Rabbuka lilmalaaa'ikati innee khaaliqun basharan min teen
38:72: Fa-iza sawwaituhoo Wa-nafakhtu feehi mir roohee faqa'oo lahoo saajideen
38:74: Illaaa Iblees; stakbara Wa-kaana minal kaafireen
38:75: Qaala yaaa-Ibleesu maa mana'aka an tasjuda limaa khalaqtu bi-yadaiyya-'a stakbarta am kunta min al-'aaleen
38:76: Qaala ana khairum minhu; khalaqtanee min naarinw Wa-khalaqtahoo min teen
38:79: Qaala Rabbi fa-anzirneee ilaa Yawmi yub'asoon
38:85: La-amla'anna Jahannama minka Wa-mimman tabi'aka minhum ajma'een
38:86: Qul maaa as'alukum 'alaihi min ajrinw Wa-maaa ana minal mutakallifeen
39:2: Innaaa anzalnaaa ilaikal Kitaaba bilhaqqi fa'budil laaha mukhlisal lahud deen
39:3: Alaa lillaahid deenul khaalis; wallazeenat takhazoo min dooniheee awliyaaa'a maa na'buduhum illaa liyuqar-riboonaaa ilal laahi zulfaa; innal laaha yahkumu baina-hum fee maa hum feehi yakhtalifoon; innal laaha laa yahdee man huwa kaazibun kaffaar
39:4: Law araadal laahu aien yattakhiza waladal lastafaa mimmaa yakhluqu maa yashaaa'; Subhaanahoo Huwal laahul Waahidul Qahhaar
39:5: Khalaqas samaawaati wal-arda bilhaqq; yukawwirul laila 'alan nahaari Wa-yukawwirun nahaara 'alaal laili Wa-sakhkharash shamsa walqamara kulluny yajree li-ajalim musammaa; alaa Huwal 'Azeezul Ghaffaar
39:6: Khalaqakum min nafsinw waahidatin summa ja'ala minhaa zawjahaa Wa-anzala lakum minal an'aami samaani-yata azwaaj; yakhlu-qukum fee butooni ummahaatikum khalqam mim ba'di khalqin fee zulumaatin salaas; zaalikumul laahu Rabbukum lahul mulk; laaa ilaaha illaa Huwa fa-annaa tusrafoon
39:7: In takfuroo fa-innal laaha ghaniyyun 'ankum; Wa-laa yardaa li'ibaadihil kufra Wa-in tashkuroo yardahu lakum; Wa-laa taziru waaziratunw wizra ukhraa; summa ilaa Rabikum marji'ukum fa-yunabbi'ukum bimaa kuntum ta'maloon; innahoo 'aleemum bizaatis sudoor
39:8: Wa-izaa massal insaana durrun da'aa Rabbahoo muneeban ilaihi summa izaa khawwalahoo ni'matam minhu nasiya maa kaana yad'ooo ilaihi min qablu Wa-ja'ala lillaahi andaadal liyudilla 'an sabeelih; qul tamatta' bikufrika qaleelan innaka min Ashaabin Naar;
39:9: Amman huwa qaanitun aanaaa'al laili saajidanw Wa-qaaa'imai yahzarul Aakhirata Wa-yarjoo rahmata Rabbih; qul hal yastawil lazeena ya'lamoona wallazeena laa ya'lamoon; innamaa yatazakkaru ulul albaab
39:10: Qul yaa-'ibaadil lazeena aamanut taqoo Rabbakum; lillazeena ahsanoo fee haazihid dunyaa hasanah; Wa-ardul laahi waasi'ah; innamaa yuwaffas saabiroona ajrahum bighayri hisab
39:11: Qul inneee umirtu an a'budal laaha mukhlisal lahud deen
39:13: Qul inneee akhaafu in 'asaitu Rabbee 'azaaba Yawmin 'azeem
39:14: Qulil laaha a'budu mukhlisal lahoo deenee
39:15: Fa'budoo maa shi'tum min doonih; qul innal khaasireenal lazeena khasirooo anfusahum Wa-ahleehim yawmal qiyaamah; alaa zaalika huwal khusraanul mubeen
39:16: Lahum min fawqihim zulalum minan Naari Wa-min tahtihim zulal; zaalika yukhaw-wiful laahu bihee 'ibaadah; yaa-'ibaadi fattaqoon
39:17: Wallazeenaj tanabut Taaghoota aien ya'budoohaa Wa-anaabooo ilal laahi lahumul bushraa; fabashshir 'ibaad
39:18: Allazeena yastami'oonal qawla fayattabi'oona ahsanah; ulaaa'ikal lazeena hadaahumul laahu Wa-ulaaa'ika hum ulul albaab
39:19: Afaman haqqa 'alaihi kalimatul 'azaab; afa-anta tunqizu man fin Naar
39:20: Laakinil lazeenat taqaw Rabbahum lahum ghurafum min fawqihaa ghurafum mabniyyatun tajree min tahtihal anhaar; wa'dal laah; laa yukhliful laahul mee'aad
39:21: Alam tara annal laaha anzala minas samaaa'i maaa'an fasalakahoo yanaabee'a fil ardi summa yukhriju bihee zar'am mukhtalifan alwaanuhoo summa yaheeju fatarahu musfarran summa yaj'aluhoo hutaamaa; inna fee zaalika lazikraa li-ulil albaab
39:22: Afaman sharahal laahu sadrahoo lil-Islaami fahuwa 'alaa noorim mir Rabbih; fa-wailul lilqaasiyati quloobuhum min zikril laah; ulaaa'ika fee dalaalim mubeen
39:23: Allahu nazzala ahsanal hadeesi Kitaabam mutashaa-biham masaaniya taqsha'irru minhu juloodul lazeena yakhshawna Rabbahum summa taleenu julooduhum Wa-quloo-buhum ilaa zikril laah; zaalika hudal laahi yahdee bihee maien yashaaa'; Wa-maien yudlilil laahu famaa lahoo min haad
39:24: Afamaien yattaqee biwaj-hihee sooo'al 'azaabi Yawmal Qiyaamah; Wa-qeela lizzaali-meena zooqoo maa kuntum taksiboon
39:25: Kazzabal lazeena min qablihim fa-ataahumul 'azaabu min haisu laa yash'uroon
39:26: Fa-azaaqahumul laahul khizya fil hayaatid dunyaa Wa-la'azaabul Aakhirati akbar; law kaanoo ya'lamoon
39:27: Wa-laqad darabnaa linnaasi fee haazal Qur-aani min kulli masalil la'allahum yatazakkaroon
39:29: Darabal laahu masalar rajulan feehi shurakaaa'u mutashaakisoona Wa-rajulan salamal lirajulin hal yastawi-yaani masalaa; alhamdu lillaah; bal aksaruhum laa ya'lamoon
39:31: Summa innakum Yawmal Qiyaamati 'inda Rabbikum takhtasimoon
39:32: Faman azlamu mimman kazaba 'alal laahi Wa-kazzaba bissidqi iz jaaa'ah; alaisa fee Jahannama maswal lilkaafireen
39:33: Wallazee jaaa'a bissidqi Wa-saddaqa biheee ulaaa'ika humul muttaqoon
39:34: Lahum maa yashaaa'oona 'inda Rabbihim; zaalika jazaaa'ul muhsineen
39:35: Liyukaffiral laahu 'anhum aswa allazee 'amiloo Wa-yajziyahum ajrahum bi-ahsanil lazee kaano ya'maloon
39:36: Alaisal laahu bikaafin 'abdahoo Wa-yukhawwi-foonaka billazeena min doonih; Wa-maien yudlilil laahu famaa lahoo min haad
39:37: Wa-maien yahdil laahu famaa lahoo min mudil; alai-sal laahu bi'azeezin zin tiqaam
39:38: Wa-la'in sa-altahum man khalaqas samaawaati wal-arda la-yaqoolunal laah; qul afara'aitum maa tad'oona min doonil laahi in araadaniyal laahu bidurrin hal hunna kaashi-faatu durriheee aw araadanee birahmatin hal hunna mumsikaatu rahmatih; qul hasbiyal laahu 'alaihi yatawakkalul mutawakkiloon
39:39: Qul yaa qawmi'maloo 'alaa makaanatikum innee 'aamilun fasawfa ta'lamoon
39:41: Innaa anzalnaa 'alaikal Kitaaba linnaasi bilhaqq; famanih tadaa falinafsihee Wa-man dalla fa-innamaa yadillu 'alaihaa Wa-maaa anta 'alaihim biwakeel
39:42: Allaahu yatawaffal anfusa heena mawtihaa wallatee lam tamut fee manaamihaa fa-yumsikul latee qadaa 'alaihal mawta Wa-yursilul ukhraaa ilaaa ajalim musammaa; inna fee zaalika la-Aayaatil liqawmaien yatafakkarroon
39:43: Amit takhazoo min doonil laahi shufa'aaa'; qul awalaw kaanoo laa yamlikoona shai'aw Wa-laa ya'qiloon
39:44: Qul lillaahish shafaa'atu jamee'aa; lahoo mulkus samaawaati wal-ardi summa ilaihi turja'oon
39:45: Wa-izaa zukiral laahu wahdahush ma-azzat quloobul lazeena laa yu'minoona bil-Aakhirati Wa-izaa zukiral lazeena min dooniheee izaa hum yastabshiroon
39:46: Qulil laahumma faatiras samaawaati wal-ardi 'Aalimal Ghaibi washshahaadati Anta tahkumu baina 'ibaadika fee maa kaanoo feehee yakhtalifoon
39:47: Wa-law anna lillazeena zalamoo maa fil ardi jamee'anw Wa-mislahoo ma'ahoo laftadaw bihee min sooo'il azaabi Yawmal Qiyaamah; Wa-badaa lahum minal laahi maa lam yakkoonoo yahtasiboon
39:48: Wa-badaa lahum saiyiaatu maa kasaboo Wa-haaqa bihim maa kaanoo bihee yastahzi'oon
39:49: Fa-izaa massal insaana durrun da'aanaa summa izaa khawwalnaahu ni'matam minna qaala innamaaa ootee-tuhoo 'alaa 'ilm; bal hiya fitna-tunw Wa-laakinna aksarahum laa ya'lamoon
39:50: Qad qaalahal lazeena min qablihim famaaa aghnaa 'anhum maa kaanoo yaksiboon
39:51: Fa-asaabahum saiyyi-aatu maa kasaboo; wallazeena zalamoo min haaa'ulaaa'i sa-yuseebuhum saiyyi-aatu maa kasaboo Wa-maa hum bimu'jizeen
39:52: Awalam ya'lamooo annal laaha yabsutur rizqa limai yashaaa'u Wa-yaqdir; inna fee zaalika la-Aayaatil liqawmien yu'minoon
39:53: Qul yaa'ibaadiyal lazeena asrafoo 'alaaa anfusihim laa taqnatoo mir rahmatil laah; innal laaha yaghfiruz zunooba jamee'aa; innahoo Huwal Ghafoorur Raheem
39:54: Wa-aneebooo ilaa Rabbikum Wa-aslimoo lahoo min qabli ai yaatiyakumul 'azaabu summa laa tunsaroon
39:55: Wattabi'ooo ahsana maaa unzila ilaikum mir Rabbikum min qabli aien yaatiyakumal 'azaabu baghtatanw Wa-antum laa tash'uroon
39:56: An taqoola nafsuien yaahasrataa 'alaa maa farrattu fee jambil laahi Wa-in kuntu laminas saakhireen
39:57: Aw taqoola law annal laaha hadaanee lakuntu minal muttaqeen
39:58: Aw taqoola heena taral 'azaaba law anna lee karratan fa-akoona minal muhsineen
39:59: Balaa qad jaaa'atka aayaatee fa-kazzabta bihaa Wa-stakbarta Wa-kunta minal kaafireen
39:60: Wa-Yawmal Qiyaamati taral lazeena kazaboo 'alal laahi wujoohuhum muswaddah; alaisa fee Jahannama maswal lilmutakabbireen
39:61: Wa-yunajjil laahul lazee-nat taqaw bimafaazatihim laa yamassuhumus sooo'u Wa-laa hum yahzanoon
39:62: Allaahu khaaliqu kulli shai'inw Wa-Huwa 'alaa kulli shai'inw Wakeel
39:63: Lahoo maqaaleedus sa-maawaati wal-ard; wallazeena kafaroo bi-ayaatil laahi ulaaa'ika humul khaasiroon
39:64: Qul afaghairal laahi taamurooonneee a'budu ayyuhal jaahiloon
39:65: Wa-laqad oohiya ilaika Wa-ilal lazeena min qablika la-in ashrakta la-yahbatanna 'amalu-ka Wa-latakoonanna minal khaasireen
39:66: Balil laahha fa'bud Wa-kum minash shaakireen
39:67: Wa-maa qadarul laaha haqqa qadrihee wal-ardu jamee-'an qabdatuhoo Yawmal Qiyaamati wassamaawaatu matwiyyaatum biyameenih; Subhaanahoo Wa-Ta'aalaa 'amma yushrikoon
39:68: Wa-nufikha fis Soori fasa'iqa man fis samaawaati Wa-man fil ardi illaa man shaa'al lahu summa nufikha feehi ukhraa fa-izaa hum qiyaamuny yanzuroon
39:69: Wa-ashraqatil ardu binoori Rabbihaa Wa-wudi'al Kitaabu Wa-jeee'a bin-nabiyyeena wash-shuhadaaa'i Wa-qudiya bainahum bilhaqqi Wa-hum laa yuzlamoon
39:70: Wa-wuffiyat kullu nafsim maa 'amilat Wa-Huwa a'lamu bimaa yaf'aloon
39:71: Wa-seeqal lazeena kafaroo ilaa jahannama zumaraa hattaaa izaa jaaa'oohaa futihat abwaabuhaa Wa-qaala lahum khazanatuhaaa alam ya'tikum Rusulun minkum yatloona 'alaikum Aayaati Rabbikum Wa-yunziroonakum liqaaa'a Yawmikum haazaa; qaaloo balaa Wa-laakin haqqat kalimatul 'azaabi 'alal kaafireen
39:72: Qeelad khuloo abwaaba jahannama khaalideena feeha fabi'sa maswal mutakabbireen
39:73: Wa-seeqal lazeenat taqaw Rabbahum ilal Jannati zumaraa hattaaa izaa jaaa'oohaa Wa-futihat abwaabuhaa Wa-qaala lahum khazanatuhaa salaamun 'alaikum tibtum fadkhuloohaa khaalideen
39:74: Wa-qaalull hamdulillaahil lazee sadaqanaa wa'dahoo Wa-awrasanal arda natabaw wa-u minal jannati haisu nashaaa'u fani'ma ajrul 'aamileen
39:75: Wa-taral malaaa'ikata haaaffeena min hawlil 'Arshi yusabbihoona bihamdi Rabbihim Wa-qudiya bainahum bilhaqqi Wa-qeelal hamdu lillaahi Rabbil 'aalameen
40:3: Ghaafiriz zambi Wa-qaabilit tawbi shadeedil 'iqaabi zit tawli laaa ilaaha illaa Huwa ilaihil maseer
40:4: Maa yujaadilu feee Aayaatil laahi illal lazeena kafaroo falaa yaghrurka taqallubuhum fil bilaad
40:5: Kazzabat qablahum qawmu Noohinw wal-Ahzaabu min ba'dihim Wa-hammat kullu ummatin bi-Rasoolihim li-ya'khuzoohu Wa-jaadaloo bilbaatili li-yud-hidoo bihil haqqa fa-akhaztuhum fa-kaifa kaana 'iqaab
40:6: Wa-kazaalika haqqat Kalimatu Rabbika 'alal lazeena kafarooo annahum Ashaabun Naar
40:7: Allazeena yahmiloonal 'Arsha Wa-man hawlahoo yusabbihoona bihamdi Rabbihim Wa-yu'minoona bihee Wa-yastaghfiroona lillazeena aamanoo Rabbanaa wasi'ta kulla shai'ir rahmatanw Wa-'ilman faghfir lillazeena taaboo wattaba'oo sabeelaka Wa-qihim 'azaabal Jaheem
40:8: Rabbannaa Wa-adkhilhum Jannaati 'adninil latee wa'attahum Wa-man salaha min aabaaa'ihim Wa-azwaajihim Wa-zurriyyaatihim; innaka Antal 'Azeezul Hakeem
40:9: Wa-qihimus saiyi-aat; Wa-man taqis saiyi-aati Yawma'izin faqad rahimtah; Wa-zaalika huwal fawzul 'azeem
40:10: Innal lazeena kafaroo yunaadawna lamaqtul laahi akbaru mim maqtikum anfusakum iz tud'awna ilal eemaani fatakfuroon
40:11: Qaaloo Rabbanaaa amat tanasnataini Wa-ahyaitanas nataini fa'tarafnaa bizunoo-binaa fahal ilaa khuroojim min sabeel
40:12: Zaalikum bi-annahooo izaa du'iyal laahu wahdahoo kafartum Wa-ien yushrak bihee tu'minoo; falhukmu lillaahil 'Aliyyil Kabeer
40:13: Huwal lazee yureekum Aayaatihee Wa-yunazzilu lakum minas samaaa'i rizqaa; Wa-maa tatazakkaru illaa maien yuneeb
40:14: Fad'ul laaha mukhliseena lahud deena Wa-law karihal kaafiroon
40:15: Rafee'ud darajaati zul 'Arshi yulqir rooha min amrihee 'alaa mai yashaaa'u min 'ibaadihee liyunzira yawmat talaaq
40:16: Yawma hum baarizoona laa yakhfaa 'alal laahi minhum shai; limanil mulkul Yawma lillaahil Waahidil Qahaar
40:17: Al-Yawma tujzaa kullu nafsim bimaa kasabat; laa zulmal Yawm; innal laaha saree'ul hisaab
40:18: Wa-anzirhum yawmal aazifati izil quloobu ladal hanaajiri kaazimeen; maa lizzaalimeena min hameeminw Wa-laa shafee'ien yutaa'
40:19: Ya'lamu khaaa'inatal a'yuni Wa-maa tukhfis sudoor
40:20: Wallaahu yaqdee bilhaqq, wallazeena yad'oona min doonihee laa yaqdoona bishai'; innal laaha Huwas Samee'ul Baseer
40:21: Awalam yaseeroo fil ardi fa-yanzuroo kaifa kaana 'aaqibatul lazeena kaanoo min qablihim; kaanoo hum ashadda minhum quwwatanw Wa-aasaaran fil ardi fa-akhazahumul laahu bizunoobihim Wa-maa kaana lahum minal laahi minw waaq
40:22: Zaalika bi-annahum kaanat taateehim Rusuluhum bilbaiyinaati fakafaroo fa-akhazahumul laah; innahoo qawiyyun shadeedul 'iqaab
40:23: Wa-laqad arsalnaa Moosaa bi-Aayaatinaa Wa-sultaanim mubeen
40:24: Ilaa Fir'awna Wa-Haamaana Wa-Qaaroona faqaaloo saahirun kazzaab
40:25: Falama jaaa'ahum bil-haqqi min 'indinaa qaaluq tulooo abnaaa'al lazeena aamanoo ma'ahoo wastahyoo nisaaa'ahum; Wa-maa kaidul kaafireena illaa fee dalaal
40:26: Wa-qaala Fir'awnu zarooneee aqtul Moosaa walyad'u Rabbahoo inneee akhaafu ai yubaddila deenakum aw aien yuzhira fil ardil fasaad
40:27: Wa-qaala Moosaaaa innee 'uztu bi-Rabbee Wa-Rabbikum min kulli mutakabbiril laayu'minu bi Yawmil Hisaab
40:28: Wa-qaala rajulum mu'minummin Aali Fir'awna yaktumu eemaanahooo ataqtuloona rajulan aien yaqoola Rabbi-yal laahu Wa-qad jaaa'akum bil baiyinaati mir Rabbikum Wa-iny yaku kaaziban fa'alaihi kazibuh Wa-ien yaku saadiqaien yasibkum ba'dul lazee ya'idukum innal laaha laa yahdee man huwa musrifun kazzaab
40:29: Yaa-qawmi lakumul mulkul yawma zaahireena fil ardi famaien yansurunaa mim baasil laahi in jaaa'anaa; qaala Fir'awnu maaa ureekum illaa maaa araa Wa-maaa ahdeekum illaa sabeelar Rashaad
40:30: Wa-qaalal lazee aamana yaa-qawmi inneee akhaafu 'alaikum misla yawmil Ahzaab
40:31: Misla daabi qawmi Noohinw Wa-'aadinw Wa-Samooda wallazeena mim ba'dihim; Wa-mal laahu yureedu zulmal lil'ibaad
40:33: Yawma tuwalloona mud-bireena maa lakum minal laahi min 'aasim; Wa-maien yudlilil laahu famaa lahoo min haad
40:34: Wa-laqad jaaa'akum Yoosufu min qablu bil-baiyyinaati famaa ziltum fee shakkim mimaa jaaa'akum bihee hattaaa izaa halaka qultum laien yab-asal laahu mim ba'dihee Rasoolaa; kazaalika yudillul laahu man huwa Musrifum murtaab
40:35: Allazeena yujaadiloona feee Aaayaatil laahi bighairi sultaanin ataahum kabura maqtan 'indal laahi Wa-'indal lazeena aamanoo; kazaalika yatbahul laahu 'alaa kulli qalbi mutakabbirin jabbaar
40:36: Wa-qaala Fir'awnu yaa Haamaanub-ni lee sarhal la'alleee ablughul asbaab
40:37: Asbaabas samaawaati faattali'a ilaaa ilaahi Moosaa Wa-innee la-azunnuhoo kaazibaa; Wa-kazaalika zuyyina li-Fir'awna sooo'u 'amalihee Wa-sudda 'anis sabeel; Wa-maa kaidu Fir'awna illaa fee tabaab
40:38: Wa-qaalal lazeee aamana yaa-qawmit tabi'ooni ahdikum sabeelar rashaad
40:39: Yaa-qawmi innamaa haazihil hayaatud dunyaa mataa'unw Wa-innal Aakhirata hiya daarul qaraar
40:40: Man 'amila saiyi'atan falaa yujzaaa illaa mislahaa Wa-man 'amila saaliham min zakarin aw unsaa Wa-huwa mu'minun fa-ulaaa'ika yadkhuloonal Jannata yurzaqoona feehaa bighairi hisaab
40:41: Wa-yaa-qawmi maa leee ad'ookum ilan najaati Wa-tad'oonaneee ilan Naar
40:42: Tad'oonanee li-akfura billaahi Wa-ushrika bihee maa laisa lee bihee 'ilmunw Wa-ana ad'ookum ilal 'Azeezil Ghaffaar
40:43: Laa jarama annamaa tad'oonanee ilaihi laisa lahoo da'watun fid dunyaa Wa-laa fil Aakhirati Wa-anna maraddanaaa ilal laahi Wa-annal musrifeena hum Ashaabun Naar
40:44: Fasatazkuroona maaa aqoolu lakum; Wa-ufawwidu amreee ilal laah; innal laaha baseerum bil'ibaad
40:45: Fa-waqaahul laahu saiyyiaati maa makaroo Wa-haaqa bi Aali-Fir'awna sooo'ul 'azaab
40:46: An-Naaru yu'radoona 'alaihaa ghuduwwanw Wa-'ashiyyanw Wa-Yawma taqoomus Saa'aatu adkhilooo Aala Fir'awna ashaddal 'azaab
40:47: Wa-iz yatahaaajjoona fin Naari fa-yaqoolud du'afaaa'u lillazeenas takbarooo innaa kunnaa lakum taba'an fahal antum mughnoona annaa naseebam minan Naar
40:48: Qaalal lazeenas takbarooo innaa kullun feehaaa innal laaha qad hakama baynal 'ibaad
40:49: Wa-qaalal lazeena fin Naari likhazanati Jahannamad 'oo Rabbakum yukhaffif 'annaa yawmam minal 'azaab
40:50: Qaalooo awalam taku taateekum Rusulukum bilbaiyinaati qaaloo balaa' qaaloo fad'oo; Wa-maa du'aaa'ul kaafireena illaa fee dalaal
40:51: Innaa lanansuru Rusulanaa wallazeena aamanoo fil hayaatid dunyaa Wa-Yawma yaqoomul ashhaad
40:52: Yawma laa yanfa'uz zaalimeena ma'ziratuhum Wa-lahumul la'natu Wa-lahum soooud daar
40:53: Wa-laqad aatainaa Moosal hudaa Wa-awrasnaa Baneee Israaa-'eelal Kitaab
40:55: Fasbir inna wa'dal laahi haqqunw wastaghfir lizambika Wa-sabbih bihamdi Rabbika bil'ashiyyi wal-ibkaar
40:56: Innal lazeena yujaadi-loona feee Aayaatil laahi bighairi sultaanin ataahum in fee sudoorihim illaa kibrum maa hum bibaaligheeh; fasta'iz billaahi innahoo Huwas Samee'ul Baseer
40:57: Lakhalqus samaawaati wal-ardi akbaru min khalqin naasi Wa-laakinna aksaran naasi laa ya'lamoon
40:58: Wa-maa yastawil a'maa walbaseeru wallazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaati Wa-lal museee'; qaleelam maa tatazakkaroon
40:59: Innas Saa'ata la-aatiyatul laa raiba feehaa Wa-laakinna aksaran naasi laa yu'minoon
40:60: Wa-qaala Rabbukumud 'ooneee astajib lakum; innal lazeena yastakbiroona an 'ibaadatee sa-yadkhuloona jahannama daakhireen
40:61: Allaahul lazee ja'ala lakumul laila littaskunoo feehi wannahaara mubsiraa; innal laaha lazoo fadlin 'alan naasi Wa-laakinna aksaran naasi laa yashkuroon
40:62: Zaalikumul laahu Rabbukum khaaliqu kulli shai'in; laaa ilaaha illaa Huwa fa-annaa tu'fakoon
40:63: Kazaalika yu'fakul lazeena kaanoo bi-Aayaatil laahi yajhadoon
40:64: Allaahul lazee ja'ala lakumul arda qaraaranw wassa-maaa'a binaaa'anw Wa-sawwarakum fa-ahsana suwarakum Wa-razaqakum minat taiyibaat; zaalikumul laahu Rabbukum fatabaarakal laahu Rabbul 'aalameen
40:65: Huwal Hayyu laaa ilaaha illaa Huwa fad'oohu mukh liseena lahudeen; alhamdu lillaahi Rabbil 'aalameen
40:66: Qul innee nuheetu an a'budal lazeena tad'oona min doonil laahi lammaa jaaa'a-niyal baiyinaatu mir Rabbee Wa-umirtu an uslima li-Rabbil 'aalameen
40:67: Huwal lazee khalaqakum min turaabin summa min nutfatin summa min 'alaqatin summa yukhrijukum tiflan summa litablughooo ashuddakum summa litakoonoo shuyookhaa; Wa-minkum maien yutawaffaa min qablu Wa-litablughooo ajalam musam-manw wa-la'allakum ta'qiloon
40:68: Huwal lazee yuhyee Wa-yumeetu fa-izaa qadaaa amran fa-innamaa yaqoolu lahoo kun fa-yakoon
40:69: Alam tara ilal lazeena yujaadiloona feee Aayaatil laahi annaa yusrafoon
40:70: Allazeena kazzaboo bil-Kitaabi Wa-bimaa arsalnaa bihee Rusulanaa fasawfa ya'lamoon
40:71: Izil aghlaalu feee a'naaqi-him wassalaasilu yushaboon
40:72: Fil hameemi summa fin Naari Yasjaroon
40:73: Summaa qeela lahum ayna maa kuntum tushrikoon
40:74: Min doonil laahi qaaloo dalloo 'annaa bal lam nakun nad'oo min qablu shai'aa; kazaalika yudillul laahul kaafireen
40:75: Zaalikum bimaa kuntum tafrahoona fil ardi bighairil haqqi Wa-bimaa kuntum tamrahoon
40:76: Udkhulooo abwaaba Jahannama khaalideena feehaa fabi'sa maswal mutakabbireen
40:77: Fasbir inna wa'dal laahi haqq; fa-immaa nuriyannak ba'dal lazee na'i-duhum aw natawaffayannaka fa-ilainaa yurja'oon
40:78: Wa-laqad arsalnaa Rusulam min qablika minhum man qasasnaa 'alaika Wa-minhum mal lam naqsus 'alaik; Wa-maa kaana li-Rasoolin any yaatiya bi-Aayatin illaa bi-iznil laah; fa-izaa jaaa'a amrul laahi qudiya bilhaqqi Wa-khasira hunaalikal mubtiloon
40:79: Allaahul lazee ja'ala lakumul an'aama litarkaboo minhaa Wa-minhaa taakuloon
40:80: Wa-lakum feehaa manaafi'u Wa-litablughoo 'alaihaa haajatan fee sudoorikum Wa-'alaihaa Wa-'alal fulki tuhmaloon
40:81: Wa-yureekum Aayaatihee fa-ayya Aayaatil laahi tunkiroon
40:82: Afalam yaseeroo fil ardi fa-yanzuroo kaifa kaana 'aaqibatul lazeena min qablihim; kaanoo aksara minhum Wa-ashadda quwwatanw Wa-aasaaran fil ardi famaaa aghnaa 'anhum maa kaanoo yaksiboon
40:83: Falammaa jaaa'at-hum Rusuluhum bilbaiyinaati farihoo bimaa 'indahum minal 'ilmi Wa-haaqa bihim maa kaanoo bihee yastahzi'oon
40:84: Falammaa ra-aw baasanaa qaalooo aamannaa billaahi wahdahoo Wa-kafarnaa bimaa kunnaa bihee mushrikeen
40:85: Falam yaku tanfa-'uhum eemaanuhum lammaa ra-aw ba'sana sunnatal laahil latee qad khalat fee 'ibaadihee Wa-khasira hunaalikal kaafiroon
41:3: Kitaabun fussilat Aayaatuhoo Qur-aanan 'Arabiyyal liqawmien ya'lamoon
41:4: Basheeranw Wa-nazeeran fa-a'rada aksaruhum fahum laa yasma'oon
41:5: Wa-qaaloo quloobunaa feee akinnatim mimmaa tad'oonaaa ilaihi Wa-feee aazaaninaa waqrunw Wa-mim baininaa Wa-bainika hijaabun fa'mal innanaa 'aamiloon
41:6: Qul innamaaa ana basharum mislukum yoohaaa ilaiya annamaaa ilaahukum Ilaahunw Waahidun fastaqeemooo ilaihi wastaghfirooh; Wa-wailul lil-mushrikeen
41:7: Allazeena laa yu'toonaz Zakaata Wa-hum bil-Aakhirati hum kaafiroon
41:8: Innal lazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaati lahum ajrun ghairu mamnoon
41:9: Qul a'innakum latakfuroona billazee khalaqal arda fee yawmaini Wa-taj'aloona lahooo andaadaa; zaalika Rabbul 'aalameen
41:10: Wa-ja'ala feehaa rawaa-siya min fawqihaa Wa-baaraka feehaa Wa-qaddara feehaaaa aqwaatahaa feee arba'ati ayyaamin sawaaa'al lissaaa'ileen
41:11: Summas tawaaa ilas samaaa'i Wa-hiya dukhaanun faqaala lahaa Wa-lil ardi'tiyaaa taw'an aw karhan qaalataaa atainaa taaa'i'een
41:12: Faqadaahunna sab'a samaawaatin fee yawmaini Wa-awhaa fee kulli samaaa'in amarahaa; Wa-zaiyannassa maaa'ad dunyaa bimasaabeeha Wa-hifzaa; zaalika taqdeerul 'Azeezil 'Aleem
41:13: Fa-in a'radoo faqul anzartukum saa'iqatam misla saa'iqati 'Aadinw Wa-Samood
41:14: Iz jaaa'at-humur Rusulu mim baini aydeehim Wa-min khalfihim allaa ta'budooo illal laaha qaaloo law shaaa'a Rabunaa la-anzala malaaa-'ikatan fa-innaa bimaaa ursiltum bihee kaafiroon
41:15: Fa-ammaa 'Aadun fastak-baroo fil ardi bighairul haqqi Wa-qaaloo man ashaddu minnaa quwwatan awalam yaraw annal laahal lazee khalaqahum Huwa ashaddu minhum quwwatanw Wa-kaanoo bi-Aayaatinaa yajhadoon
41:16: Fa-arsalnaa 'alaihim reehan sarsaran feee ayyaamin nahisaatil linuzeeqahum 'azaabal khizyi fil hayaatid dunyaa Wa-la'azaabul Aakhirati akhzaa Wa-hum laa yunsaroon
41:17: Wa-ammaa Samoodu fahadinaahum fastahabbul 'ama 'alal huda fa-akhazathum saa'iqatul 'azaabil hooni bimaa kaanoo yaksiboon
41:19: Wa-yawma yuhsharu a'daaa'ul laahi ilan Naari fahum yooza'oon
41:20: Hattaaa izaa maa jaaa'oohaa shahida 'alaihim samu'uhum Wa-absaaruhum Wa-julooduhum bimaa kaanoo ya'maloon
41:21: Wa-qaaloo lijuloodihim lima shahittum 'alainaa qaaloo antaqanal laahul lazeee antaqa kulla shai'inw Wa-Huwa khalaqakum awwala marratinw Wa-ilaihi turja'oon
41:22: Wa-maa kuntum tastatiroona aien yashhada 'alaikum sam'ukum Wa-laaa absaarukum Wa-laa juloodukum Wa-laakin zanantum annal laaha laa ya'lamu kaseeram mimmaa ta'maloon
41:23: Wa-zaalikum zannukumul lazee zanantum bi-Rabbikum ardaakum fa-asbahtum minal khaasireen
41:24: Fa-ien yasbiroo fan-naaru maswal lahum Wa-ien yasta'tiboo famaa hum minal mu'tabeen
41:25: Wa-qaiyadnaa lahum quranaaa'a fazaiyyanoo lahum maa baina aideehim Wa-maa khalfahum Wa-haqqa 'alaihimul qawlu feee umamin qad khalat min qablihim minal jinni wal-insi innahum kaanoo khaasireen
41:26: Wa-qaalal lazeena kafaroo laa tasma'oo lihaazal Quraani walghaw feehi la'allakum taghliboon
41:27: Falanuzeeqannal lazeena kafaroo 'azaaban shadeedanw Wa-lanajziyannahum aswal lazee kaanoo ya'maloon
41:28: Zaalika jazaaa'u a'daaa'il laahin Naaru lahum feehaa daarul khuld, jazaaa'am bimaa kaanoo bi-aayaatinaa yajhadoon
41:29: Wa-qaalal lazeena kafaroo Rabbanaaa arinal lazaini adal-laanaa minal jinni wal-insi naj'alhumaa tahta aqdaaminaa liyakoonaa minal asfaleen
41:30: Innal lazeena qaaloo Rabbunal laahu summas taqaamoo tatanazzalu 'alaihimul malaaa-'ikatu allaa takhaafoo Wa-laa tahzanoo Wa-abshiroo bil-Jannnatil latee kuntum too'adoon
41:31: Nahnu awliyaaa'ukum fil hayaatid dunyaa Wa-fil Aakhirati Wa-lakum feehaa maa tashtaheee anfusukum Wa-lakum feehaa ma tadda'oon
41:33: Wa-man ahsanu qawlam mimman da'aaa ilal laahi Wa-'amila saalihanw Wa-qaala innanee minal muslimeen
41:34: Wa-laa tastawil hasanatu Wa-las saiyi'ah; idfa' billatee hiya ahsanu fa'izal lazee bainaka Wa-bainahoo 'adaawatun ka'annahoo waliyun hameem
41:35: Wa-maa yulaqqaahaaa illal lazeena sabaroo Wa-maa yulaqqaahaaa illaa zoo hazzin 'azeem
41:36: Wa-immaa yanzaghannaka minash Shaitaani nazghun fasta'iz billaahi innahoo Huwas Samee'ul 'Aleem
41:37: Wa-min Aayaatihil lailu wannahaaru washshamsu walqamar; laa tasjudoo lishshamsi Wa-laa lilqamari wasjudoo lillaahil lazee khala-qahunna in kuntum iyyaahu ta'budoon
41:38: Fa-inis takbaroo fallazee-na 'inda Rabbika yusabbihoona lahoo billaili wannnahaari Wa-hum laa yas'amoon
41:39: Wa-min Aayaatiheee annaka taral arda khaashi'atan fa-izaaa anzalna 'alaihal maaa'ah tazzat Wa-rabat; innal lazeee ahyaahaa lamuhiyil mawtaa; innahoo 'alaa kulli shai-in Qadeer
41:40: Innal lazeena yulhidoona feee Aayaatina laa yakhfawna 'alainaa' afamai yulqaa fin Naari khayrun am maien yaateee aaminai Yawmal Qiyaamah; i'maloo ma shi'tum innahoo bimaa ta'maloona Baseer
41:41: Inna Lazeena kafaroo biz-Zikri lammaa jaa'ahum Wa-innahoo la-Kitaabun 'Azeez
41:42: Laa yaateehil baatilu mim baini yadaihi Wa-laa min khalfihee tanzeelum min Hakeemin Hameed
41:43: Maa yuqaalu laka illaa maa qad qeela lir-Rusuli min qablik; inna Rabbaka lazoo maghfiratinw Wa-zoo 'iqaabin aleem
41:44: Wa-law ja'alnaahu Qur-aanan A'jamiyyal laqaaloo law-laa fussilat Aayaatuhoo 'a-A'jamiyyunw Wa-'Arabiyy; qul huwa lillazeena aamanoo hudanw Wa-shifaaa'unw wallazeena la yu'minoona feee aazaanihim waqrunw Wa-huwa 'alaihim 'amaa; ulaaa'ika yunaadawna mim maakaanim ba'eed
41:45: Wa-laqad aatainaa Moosal Kitaaba fakhtulifa fee; Wa-lawlaa Kalimatun sabaqat mir Rabbika laqudiya bainahum; Wa-innahum lafee shakkim minhu mureeb
41:46: Man 'amila salihan falinafsihee Wa-man asaaa'a fa'alaihaa; wamaa rabbuka bizallaamil lil-'abeed
41:47: Ilaihi yuraddu 'ilmus Saaa'ah; Wa-maa takhruju min samaraatim min akmaamihaa Wa-maa tahmilu min unsaa Wa-laa tada'u illaa bi'ilmih; Wa-Yawma yunaadeehim aina shurakaaa'ee qaalooo aazannaaka maa minnaa min shaheed
41:48: Wa-dalla 'anhum maa kaanoo yad'oona min qablu Wa-zannoo maa lahum mim mahees
41:49: Laa yas'amul insaanu min du'aaa'il khairi Wa-im massa hush-sharru fa-ya'oosun qanoot
41:50: Wa-la-in azaqnaahu rahmatam minnaa mim ba'di dar-raaa'a massat-hu la-yaqoolanna haazaa lee Wa-maaa azunnus Saa'ata qaaa'imatanw Wa-la'in ruji'tu ilaa Rabbeee inna lee 'indahoo lalhusnaa; falanu-nabbi'annal lazeena kafaroo bimaa 'amiloo Wa-lanuzeeqan-nahum min 'azaabin ghaleez
41:51: Wa-izaaa an'amnaa 'alal insaani a'rada Wa-na-aa bijaani-bihee Wa-izaa massahush sharru fazoo du'aaa'in 'areed
41:52: Qul araaitum in kaana min 'indil laahi summa kafar-tum bihee man adallu mimman huwa fee shiqaqim ba'eed
41:53: Sanureehim Aayaatinaa fil aafaaqi Wa-feee anfusihim hattaa yatabaiyana lahum annahul haqq; awa-lam yakfi bi-Rabbika annahoo 'alaa kulli shai-in Shaheed
41:54: Alaaa innahum fee miryatim mil liqaaa'i Rabbihim; alaaa innahoo bikulli shai'im muheet
42:3: Kazaalika yooheee ilaika Wa-ilal lazeena min qablikal laahul 'Azeezul Hakeem
42:4: Lahoo maa fis samaa-waati Wa-maa fil ardi Wa-Huwal 'Aliyul 'Azeem
42:5: Takaadus samaawaatu yatafattarna min fawqihinn; walmalaaa'ikatu yusabbihoona bihamdi Rabbihim Wa-yastaghfiroona liman fil ard; alaaa innal laaha huwal Ghafoorur Raheem
42:6: Wallazeenat takhazoo min dooniheee awliyaaa'al laahu hafeezun 'alaihim Wa-maaa anta 'alaihim biwakeel
42:7: Wa-kazaalika awhainaaa ilaika Qur-aanan 'Arabiyyal litunzira Ummal Quraa Wa-man hawlahaa Wa-tunzira Yawmal Jam'i laa raiba feeh; fareequn fil jannati Wa-fareequn fis sa'eer
42:8: Wa-law shaaa'al laahu laja'alahum ummatanw waahi-datanw walaakien yudkhilu maien yashaaa'u fee rahmatih; waz-zaalimoona maa lahum minw waliyyinw Wa-laa naseer
42:9: Amit takhazoo min dooniheee awliyaaa'a fallaahu Huwal Waliyyu Wa-Huwa yuhyil mawtaa Wa-Huwa 'alaa kulli shai'in Qadeer
42:10: Wa-makh talaftum feehi min shai'in fahukmuhooo ilal laah; zaalikumul laahu Rabbee 'alaihi tawakkaltu Wa-ilaihi uneeb
42:11: Faatirus samaawaati wal-ard; ja'ala lakum min anfusikum azwaajanw Wa-minal an'aami azwaajai yazra'ukum feeh; laisa kamislihee shai'unw Wa-Huwas Samee'ul Baseer
42:12: Lahoo maqaaleedus samaawaati wal-ardi yabsutur rizqa limaien yashaaa'u Wa-yaqdir; innahoo bikulli shai'in 'Aleem
42:13: Shara'a lakum minad deeni maa wassaa bihee Noohanw wallazeee awhainaaa ilaika Wa-maa wassainaa biheee Ibraaheema Wa-Moosa Wa-'Eesaaa an aqeemud deena Wa-laa tatafarraqoo feeh; kabura 'alal mushrikeena maa tad'oohum ilaih; Allaahu yajtabee ilaihi mai yashaaa'u Wa-yahdeee ilaihi mai yuneeb
42:14: Wa-maa tafarraqooo illaa mim ba'di maa jaaa'ahumul 'ilmu baghyam bainahum; Wa-law-laa Kalimatun sabaqat mir Rabbika ilaaa ajalim musammal laqudiya bainahum; Wa-innal lazeena oorisul Kitaaba mim ba'dihim lafee shakkim minhu mureeb
42:15: Falizaalika fad'u wastaqim kamaaa umirta Wa-laa tattabi' ahwaaa'ahum Wa-qul aamantu bimaaa anzalal laahu min Kitaab, Wa-umirtu li-a'dila bainakum Allaahu Rabbunaa Wa-Rabbukum lanaaa a'maa-lunaa Wa-lakum a'maalukum laa hujjata bainanaa Wa-baina-kumul laahu yajma'u bainanaa Wa-ilaihil maseer
42:16: Wallazeena yuhaaajjoona fil laahi mim ba'di mas tujeeba lahoo hujjatuhum daahidatun 'inda Rabbihim Wa-'alaihim ghadabunw Wa-lahum 'azaabun shadeed
42:17: Allahul lazeee anzalal Kitaaba bilhaqqi wal-Meezaan; Wa-ma yudreeka la'allas Saa'ata qareeb
42:18: Yasta'jilu bihal lazeena laa yu'minoona bihaa wallazeena aamanoo mushfiqoona minhaa Wa-ya'lamoona annahal haqq; alaaa innal lazeena yumaaroona fis Saa'ati lafee dalaalin ba'eed
42:19: Allahu lateefum bi'ibaadihee yarzuqu maien yashaaa'u Wa-Huwal Qawiyyul 'Azeez
42:20: Man kaana yureedu harsal Aakhirati nazid lahoo fee harsihee Wa-man kaana yureedu harsad dunyaa nu'tihee minhaa Wa-maa lahoo fil Aakhirati min naseeb
42:21: Am lahum shurakaaa'u shara'oo lahum minad deeni maa lam ya'zan bihil laah; Wa-law-laa kalimatul fasli laqudiya bainahum; Wa-innaz zaalimeena lahum 'azaabun aleem
42:22: Taraz zaalimeena mushfiqeena mimmaa kasaboo Wa-huwa waaqi'um bihim; wallazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaati fee rawdaatil jannaati lahum maa yashaaa'oona 'inda Rabbihim; zaalika huwal fadlul kabeer
42:23: Zaalikal lazee yubash-shirul laahu 'ibaadahul lazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaat; qul laaa as'alukum 'alaihi ajran illal mawaddata fil qurbaa; Wa-mai yaqtarif hasanatan nazid lahoo feehaa husnaa; innal laaha Ghafoorun Shakoor
42:24: Am yaqooloonaf tara 'alal laahi kaziban fa-ien yasha' illaahu yakhtim 'alaa qalbik; Wa-yamhul laahul baatila Wa-yuhiqqul haqqa bi-Kalimaatih; innahoo 'Aleemun bizaatis sudoor
42:25: Wa-Huwal lazee yaqbalut tawbata 'an 'ibaadihee Wa-ya'foo 'anis saiyiaati Wa-ya'lamu maa taf'aloon
42:26: Wa-yastajeebul lazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilu saalihaati Wa-yazeeduhum min fadlih; wal-kaafiroona lahum 'azaabun shadeed
42:27: Wa-law basatal laahur rizqa li'ibaadihee labaghaw fil ardi Wa-laakiny yunazzilu biqadarim maa yashaaa'; innahoo bi'ibaadihee Khabeerun Baseer
42:28: Wa-Huwal lazee yunazzilul ghaisa min ba'di maa qanatoo Wa-yanshuru rahmatah; Wa-Huwal Waliyyul Hameed
42:29: Wa-min Aayaatihee khalqus samaawaati wal-ardi Wa-maa bassa feehimaa min daaabbah; Wa-Huwa 'alaa jam'ihim izaa yashaaa'u Qadeer
42:30: Wa-maaa asaabakum min museebatin fabimaa kasabat aydeekum Wa-ya'foo 'an kaseer
42:31: Wa-maaa antum bimu'jizeena fil ardi Wa-maa lakum min doonil laahi minw Wa-liyyinw Wa-laa naseer
42:32: Wa-min Aayaatihil ja waarifil bahri kal-a'lam
42:33: Iny yashaaa yuskinir reeha fa-yazlalna rawaakida 'alaa zahrihi; inna fee zaalika la-Aayaatil likulli sabbaarin shakoor
42:34: Aw yoobiqhunna bimaa kasaboo Wa-ya'fu 'an kaseer
42:35: Wa-ya'lamal lazeena yujaadiloona feee Aayaatinaa maa lahum min mahees
42:36: Famaa ooteetum min shai'in famataa'ul hayaatid dunyaa Wa-maa 'indal laahi khairunw Wa-abqaa lillazeena aamanoo Wa-'alaa Rabbihim yatawakkaloon
42:37: Wallazeena yajtaniboona kabaaa'iral ismi wal-fawaahisha Wa-izaa maa ghadiboo hum yaghfiroon
42:38: Wallazeenas tajaaboo li-Rabbihim Wa-aqaamus Salaata Wa-amruhum shooraa bainahum Wa-mimmaa razaqnaahum yunfiqoon
42:39: Wallazeena izaa asaabahumul baghyu hum yantasiroon
42:40: Wa-jazaaa'u saiyi'atin saiyi'atum misluha faman 'afaa Wa-aslaha fa-ajruhoo 'alal laah; innahoo laa yuhibbuz zaalimeen
42:41: Wa-lamanin tasara ba'da zulmihee fa-ulaaa'ika maa 'alaihim min sabeel
42:42: Innamas sabeelu 'alal lazeena yazlimoonan naasa Wa-yabghoona fil ardi bighairil haqq; ulaaa'ika lahum 'azaabun aleem
42:43: Wa-laman sabara Wa-ghafara inna zaalika lamin 'azmil umoor
42:44: Wa-maien yudli lillaahu famaa lahoo minw waliyyin min ba'dih; Wa-taraz zaalimeena lammaa ra-awul 'azaaba yaqooloona hal ilaa maraddin min sabeel
42:45: Wa-taraahum yu'radoona 'alaihaa khaashi'eena minaz zulli yanzuroona min tarfin khaifiyy; Wa-qaalal lazeena aamanooo innal khaasireenal lazeena khasirooo anfusahum Wa-ahleehim Yawmal Qiyaamah; alaaa innaz zaalimeena fee 'azaabin muqeem
42:46: Wa-maa kaana lahum min awliyaaa'a yansuroonahum min doonil laah; Wa-mai yudlilil laahu famaa lahoo min sabeel
42:47: Istajeeboo li-Rabbikum min qabli aien yaatiya Yawmul laa maradda lahoo min Allah; maa lakum min malja'-ien yawma'izinw Wa-maa lakum min nakeer
42:48: Fa-in a'radoo famaaa arsalnaaka 'alaihim hafeezan in 'alaika illal balaagh; Wa-innaaa izaaa azaqnal insaana minnaa rahmatan fariha bihaa Wa-in tusibhum saiyi'atun bimaa qaddamat aydeehim fa-innal insaana kafoor
42:49: Lillaahi mulkus samaawaati wal-ard; yakhluqu maa yashaaa'; yahabu limai yashaaa'u inaasanw Wa-yahabu limai yashaaa'uz zukoor
42:50: Aw yuzawwijuhum zukraananw Wa-inaasanw Wa-yaj'alu mai yashaaa'u 'aqeemaa; innahoo 'Aleemun Qadeer
42:51: Wa-maa kaana libasharin aien yukallimahul laahu illaa wahyan aw minw waraaa'i hijaabin aw yursila Rasoolan fa-yoohiya bi-iznihee maa yashaaa'; innahoo 'Aliyyun Hakeem
42:52: Wa-kazaalika awhainaaa ilaika roohan min amrinaa; maa kunta tadree mal Kitaabu Wa-lal eemaanu Wa-laakin ja'alnaahu nooran nahdee bihee man nashaaa'u min 'ibaadinaa; Wa-innaka latahdeee ilaaa Saraatin Mustaqeem
42:53: Siraatil laahil lazee lahoo maa fis samaawaati Wa-maa fil ard; alaaa ilal laahi taseerul umoor
43:4: Wa-innahoo feee Ummil Kitaabi Ladainaa la'aliyyun hakeem
43:5: Afa-nadribu 'ankumuz Zikra safhan an kuntum qawman musrifeen
43:6: Wa-kam arsalnaa min Nabiyyin fil awwaleen
43:7: Wa-maa ya'teehim min Nabiyyin illaa kaanoo bihee yastahzi'oon
43:8: Fa-ahlaknaaa ashadda minhum batshanw Wa-madaa masalul awwaleen
43:9: Wa-la'in sa-altahum man khalaqas samaawaati wal-arda la-yaqoolunna khalaqa-hunnal 'Azeezul 'Aleem
43:10: Allazee ja'ala lakumul arda mahdanw Wa-ja'ala lakum feehaa subulan la'allakum tahtadoon
43:11: Wallazee nazzala minas samaaa'i maaa'an biqadarin fa-ansharnaa bihee baldatan maitaa' kazaalika tukhrajoon
43:12: Wallazee khalaqal azwaaja kullahaa Wa-ja'ala lakum minal fulki wal-an'aami maa tarkaboon
43:13: Litastawoo 'alaa zuhoorihee summa tazkuroo ni'mata Rabbikum izas tawaitum 'alaihi Wa-taqooloo Subhaanal lazee sakhkhara lana haaza Wa-maa kunnaa lahoo muqrineen
43:15: Wa-ja'aloo lahoo min 'ibaadihee juz'aa; innal insaana la-kafoorun mubeen
43:16: Amit takhaza mimmaa yakhluqu banaatinw Wa-asfaakum bilbaneen
43:17: Wa-izaa bushshira ahaduhum bimaa daraba lir-Rahmaani masalan zalla wajhuhoo muswaddanw Wa-huwa kazeem
43:18: Awa-maien yunashsha'u fil hilyati Wa-huwa fil khisaami ghairu mubeen
43:19: Wa-ja'alul malaaa'ikatal lazeena hum 'ibaadur Rahmaani inaasaa; 'a-shahidoo khalqahum; satuktabu shahaadatuhum Wa-yus'aloon
43:20: Wa-qaaloo law shaaa'ar Rahmaanu maa 'abadnaahum; maa lahum bizaalika min 'ilmin in hum illaa yakhrusoon
43:21: Am aatainaahum Kitaaban min qablihee fahum bihee mustamsikoon
43:22: Bal qaalooo innaa wajadnaaa aabaaa'anaa 'alaaa ummatinw Wa-innaa 'alaaa aasaarihim muhtadoon
43:23: Wa-kazaalika maaa arsalnaa min qablika fee qaryatim min nazeerin illaa qaala mutrafoohaaa innaa wajadnaaa aabaaa'anaa 'alaaa ummatinw Wa-innaa 'alaaa aasaarihim muqtadoon
43:24: Qaala awa-law ji'tukum bi-ahdaa mimmaa wajatdtum 'alaihi aabaaa'akum qaalooo innaa bimaaa ursiltum bihee kaafiroon
43:25: Fantaqamnaa minhum fanzur kaifa kaana 'aaqibatul mukazzibeen
43:26: Wa-iz qaala Ibraaheemu li-abeehi Wa-qawmiheee innanee baraaa'un mimmaa ta'budoon
43:28: Wa-ja'alahaa kalimatan baaqiyatan fee 'aqibihee la-'allahum yarji'oon
43:29: Bal matta'tu haaa'ulaaa'i Wa-aabaaa'ahum hattaa jaaa'a-humul haqqu Wa-Rasoolun mubeen
43:30: Wa-lammaa jaaa'ahumul haqqu qaaloo haazaa sihrunw Wa-innaa bihee kaafiroon
43:31: Wa-qaaloo law-laa nuzzila haazal Quraanu 'alaa rajulin minal qaryataini 'azeem
43:32: A-hum yaqsimoona rahmata Rabbik; Nahnu qasamnaa bainahum ma'eeshatahum fil hayaatid dunyaa Wa-rafa'naa ba'dahum fawqa ba'din darajaatin li-yattakhiza ba'duhum ba'dan sukhriyyaa; Wa-rahmatu Rabbika khairun mimmaa yajma'oon
43:33: Wa-law-laaa aien yakoonan naasu ummatanw waahidatan laja'alnaa limaien yakfuru bir-Rahmaani li-buyootihim suqufan min fiddatinw Wa-ma'aarija 'alaihaa yazharoon
43:35: Wa-zukhrufaa; Wa-in kullu zaalika lammaa mataa'ul hayaatid dunyaa; wal-aakhiratu 'inda Rabbika lilmuttaqeen
43:36: Wa-maien ya'shu 'an zikrir Rahmaani nuqaiyid lahoo Shaitaanan fahuwa lahoo qareen
43:37: Wa-innahum la-yasuddoo-nahum 'anis sabeeli Wa-yahsaboona annahum muhtadoon
43:38: Hattaaa izaa jaaa'anaa qaala yaa-laita bainee Wa-bainaka bu'dal mashriqaini fabi'sal qareen
43:39: Wa-lai yanfa'akumul Yawma iz zalamtum annakum fil 'azaabi mushtarikoon
43:40: Afa-anta tusmi'us summa aw tahdil 'umya Wa-man kaana fee dalaalin mubeen
43:41: Fa-immaa nazhabanna bika fa-innaa minhum muntaqimoon
43:42: Aw nuriyannakal lazee wa'adnaahum fa-innaa 'alaihim muqtadiroon
43:43: Fastamsik billazeee oohiya ilaika innaka 'alaa Siraatin Mustaqeem
43:44: Wa-innahoo la-zikrun laka Wa-liqawmika Wa-sawfa tus'aloon
43:45: Was'al man arsalnaa min qablika mir Rusulinaaa 'a-ja'alnaa min doonir Rahmaani aalihatany yu'badoon
43:46: Wa-laqad arsalnaa Moosaa bi-aayaatinaaa ilaa Fir'awna Wa-mala'ihee faqaala innee Rasoolu Rabbil 'aalameen
43:47: Falamma jaaa'ahum bi-aayaatinaaa izaa hum minhaa yadhakoon
43:48: Wa-maa nureehim min aayatin illaa hiya akbaru min ukhtihaa Wa-akhaznaahum bil'azaabi la'allahum yarji'oon
43:49: Wa-qaaloo yaaa ayyuhas saahirud'u lanaa Rabbaka bimaa 'ahida 'indaka innanaa lamuhtadoon
43:51: Wa-naadaa Fir'awnu fee qawmihee qaala yaa-qawmi alaisa lee mulku Misra Wa-haazihil anhaaru tajree min tahtee afalaa tubsiroon
43:52: Am ana khairun min haazal lazee huwa maheenunw Wa-laa yakaadu yubeen
43:53: Falaw-laa ulqiya 'alaihi aswiratun min zahabin aw jaaa'a ma'ahul malaaa'ikatu muqtarineen
43:54: Fastakhaffa qawmahoo fa-ataa'ooh; innahum kaanoo qawman faasiqeen
43:55: Falammaaa aasafoonan taqamnaa minhum fa-aghraqnaahum ajma'een
43:57: Wa-lammaa duribab nu Maryama masalan izaa qawmuka minhu yasiddoon
43:58: Wa-qaalooo 'a-aalihatunaa khairun am hoo; maa daraboohu laka illaa jadalaa; bal hum qawmun khasimoon
43:59: In huwa illaa 'abdun an'amnaa 'alaihi Wa-ja'alnaahu masalan li-Baneee Israaa'eel
43:60: Wa-law nashaaa'u laja'alnaa minkum malaaa'ikatan fil ardi yakhlufoon
43:61: Wa-innahoo la-'ilmun lis-Saa'ati fa-laa tamtarunna bihaa wattabi'oon; haazaa Siraatun Mustaqeem
43:62: Wa-laa yasuddan-nakumush Shaitaanu innahoo lakum 'aduwwun mubeen
43:63: Wa-lammaa jaaa'a 'Eesaa bilbaiyinaati qaala qad ji'tukum bil-Hikmati Wa-li-ubaiyyina lakum ba'dal lazee takhtalifoona feehi fattaqul laaha Wa-atee'oon
43:64: Innal laaha Huwa Rabbee Wa-Rabbukum fa'budooh; haaza Siraatum Mustaqeem
43:65: Fakhtalafal ahzaabu min bainihim fa-wailun lil-lazeena zalamoo min 'azaabi Yawmin aleem
43:66: Hal yanzuroona illas Saa'ata an ta'tiyahum baghtatanw Wa-hum laa yash'uroon
43:67: Al-akhillaaa'u Yawma'izin ba'duhum liba'din 'aduwwun illal muttaqeen
43:68: Yaa-'ibaadi laa khawfun 'alaikumul Yawma Wa-laaa antum tahzanoon
43:71: Yutaafu 'alaihim bi-sihafin min zahabinw Wa-akwaab, Wa-feehaa maa tashtaheehil anfusu Wa-talazzul a'yunu Wa-antum feehaa khaalidoon
43:72: Wa-tilkal jannatul lateee ooristumoohaa bimaa kuntum ta'maloon
43:73: Lakum feehaa faakihatun kaseeratun minhaa ta'kuloon
43:76: Wa-maa zalamnaahum Wa-laakin kaanoo humuz zaalimeen
43:77: Wa-naadaw yaa-Maaliku liyaqdi 'alainaa Rabbuka qaala innakum maakithoon
43:78: Laqad ji'naakum bilhaqqi Wa-laakinna aksarakum lil-haqqi kaarihoon
43:80: Am yahsaboona annaa laa nasma'u sirrahum Wa-najwaahum; balaa Wa-Rusulunaa ladaihim yaktuboon
43:81: Qul in kaana lir-Rahmaani walad; fa-ana awwalul 'aabideen
43:82: Subhaana Rabbis samaawaati wal-ardi Rabbil Arshi 'ammaa yasifoon
43:83: Fazarhum yakhoodoo Wa-yal'aboo hattaa yulaaqoo Yawmahumul lazee yoo'adoon
43:84: Wa-Huwal lazee fis samaaa'i ilaahunw Wa-fil ardi ilaah; Wa-Huwal Hakeemul 'Aleem
43:85: Wa-tabaarakal lazee lahoo mulkus samaawaati wal-ardi Wa-maa bainahumaa Wa-'indahoo 'ilmus Saa'ati Wa-ilaihi turja'oon
43:86: Wa-laa yamlikul lazeena yad'oona min doonihish shafaa'ata illaa man shahida bilhaqqi Wa-hum ya'lamoon
43:87: Wa-la'in sa-altahum man khalaqahum la-yaqoolun nallaahu fa-annaa yu'fakoon
43:88: Wa-qeelihee yaa-Rabbi inna haaa'ulaaa'i qawmul laa yu'minoon
44:3: Innaaa anzalnaahu fee lailatim mubaarakah; innaa kunnaa munzireen
44:6: Rahmatam mir rabbik; innahoo Huwas Samee'ul 'Aleem
44:7: Rabbis samaawaati wal-ardi Wa-maa bainahumaa; in kuntum mooqineen
44:8: Laaa ilaaha illaa Huwa yuhyee Wa-yumeetu Rabbukum Wa-Rabbu aabaaa'ikumul awwaleen
44:10: Fartaqib Yawma ta'tis samaaa'u bi-dukhaanin mubeen
44:13: Annaa lahumuz zikraa Wa-qad jaaa'ahum Rasoolum mubeen
44:16: Yawma nabtishul batsha-tal kubraa innaa muntaqimoon
44:17: Wa-laqad fatannaa qablahum qawma Fir'awna Wa-jaaa'ahum Rasoolun kareem
44:18: An addooo ilaiya 'ibaadal laahi innee lakum Rasoolun ameen
44:19: Wa-al laa ta'loo 'alal laahi innee aateekum bisultaanim mubeen
44:22: Fada'aa rabbahooo anna haaa'ulaaa'i qawmum mujrimoon
44:24: Watrukil bahra rahwan innahum jundum mughraqoon
44:29: Famaa bakat 'alaihimus samaaa'u wal-ardu Wa-maa kaanoo munzareen
44:30: Wa-laqad najjainaa Baneee Israaa'eela minal 'azaabil muheen
44:31: Min Fir'awn; innahoo kaana 'aaliyam minal musrifeen
44:33: Wa-aatainaahum minal aayaati maa feehi balaaa'um mubeen
44:35: In hiya illaa mawtatunal oolaa Wa-maa nahnu bimun-shareen
44:37: Ahum khayrun am qawmu Tubba'inw wallazeena min qablihim; ahlaknaahum innahum kaanoo mujrimeen
44:38: Wa-maa khalaqnas samaawaati wal-arda Wa-maa baina-humaa laa'ibeen
44:39: Maa khalaqnaahumaaa illaa bilhaqqi Wa-laakinna aksarahum laa ya'lamoon
44:41: Yawma laa yughnee mawlan 'am mawlan shai'anw Wa-laa hum yunsaroon
44:42: Illaa mar rahimal laah' innahoo huwal 'azeezur raheem
44:48: Summa subboo fawqa ra'sihee min 'azaabil hameem
44:50: Inna haazaa maa kuntum bihee tamtaroon
44:56: Laa yazooqoona feehal mawtaa illal mawtatal oolaa Wa-waqaahum 'azaabal jaheem
44:57: Fadlam mir rabbik; zaalika huwal fawzul 'azeem
45:3: Innaa fis samaawaati wal-ardi la-Aayaatil lilmu'mineen
45:4: Wa-fee khalaqikum Wa-maa yabussu min daaabbatin Aayaatul liqawmien yooqinoon
45:5: Wakhtilaafil laili wannahaari Wa-maaa anzalal laahu minas samaaa'i mir rizqin fa-ahyaa bihil arda ba'da mawtihaa Wa-tasreefir riyaahi Aayaatul liqawminy ya'qiloon
45:6: Tilka Aayatul laahi natloohaa 'alaika bil-haqq, fabiayyi hadeesim ba'dal laahi Wa-Aayaatihee yu'minoon
45:8: Yasma'u Aayaatil laahi tutlaa 'alaihi summa yusirru mustakbiran ka-al lam yasma'haa fabashshirhu bi'azaabin aleem
45:9: Wa-izaa 'alima min Aayaatinaa shai'-'anit takhazahaa huzuwaa; ulaaa'ika lahum 'azaabum muheen
45:10: Minw waraaa'ihim Jahannamu Wa-laa yughnee 'anhum maa kasaboo shai'anw Wa-laa mat takhazoo min doonil laahi awliyaaa; Wa-lahum 'azaabun 'azeem
45:11: Haazaa hudaa; wal-lazeena kafaroo bi-aayaati Rabbihim lahum 'azaabum mir rijzin 'aleem
45:12: Allaahul lazee sahkhara lakumul bahra litajriyal fulku feehi bi-amrihee Wa-litabtaghoo min fadlihee Wa-la'allakum tashkuroon
45:13: Wa-sakhkhara lakum maa fis samaawaati Wa-maa fil ardi jamee'am minhu; inna fee zaalika la-Aayaatil liqawmien yatafakkaroon
45:14: Qul lillazeena aamanoo yaghfiroo lillazeena laa yarjoona ayyaamal laahi liyajziya qawmam bimaa kaanoo yaksiboon
45:15: Maa 'amila saalihan falinafsihee Wa-man asaaa'a fa'alaihaa summa ilaa Rabbikum turja'oon
45:16: Wa-laqad aatainaa Baneee Israaa'eelal Kitaaba walhukma wan Nubuwwata Wa-razaqnaahum minat taiyibaati Wa-faddalnaahum;alal 'aalameen
45:17: Wa-aatainaahum baiyinaatim minal amri famakh talafooo illaa mim ba'di maa jaaa'ahumul 'ilmu baghyam bainahum; inna Rabbaka yaqdee bainahum Yawmal Qiyaamati feemaa kaanoo feehi yakhtalifoon
45:18: Summa ja'alnaaka 'alaa sharee'atim minal amri fattabi'haa Wa-laa tattabi' ahwaaa' al-lazeena laa ya'lamoon
45:19: Innahum laien yughnoo 'anka minal laahi shai'aa; Wa-innaz zaalimeena ba'duhum awliyaaa'u ba'dinw wallaahu waliyyul muttaqeen
45:20: Haazaa basaaa'iru linnaasi Wa-hudanw Wa-rahmatul liqawmien yooqinoon
45:21: Am hasibal lazeenaj tarahus saiyyiaati an naj'alahum kallazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilu saalihaati sawaaa'am mahyaahum Wa-mamaatuhum; saaa'a maa yahkumoon
45:22: Wa-khalaqal laahus samaawaati wal-arda bilhaqqi Wa-litujzaa kullu nafsim bimaa kasabat Wa-hum laa yuzlamoon
45:23: Afara'ayta manit takhaza ilaahahoo hawaahu Wa-adal-lahul laahu 'alaa 'ilminw Wa-khatama 'alaa sam'ihee Wa-qalbihee Wa-ja'ala 'alaa basarihee ghishaawatan famaien yahdeehi mim ba'dil laah; afalaa tazakkaroon
45:24: Wa-qaaloo maa hiya illaa hayaatunad dunyaa namootu Wa-nahyaa Wa-maa yuhlikunaaa illad dahr; Wa-maa lahum bizaalika min 'ilmin in hum illaa yazunnoon
45:25: Wa-izaa tutlaa 'alaihim aayaatuna baiyinaatim maa kaana hujjatahum illaaa an qaalu'too bi aabaaa'inaaa in kuntum saadiqeen
45:26: Qulil laahu yuhyeekum summa yumeetukum summa yajma'ukum ilaa Yawmil Qiyaamati laa raiba feehi Wa-laakinna aksaran naasi laa ya'lamoon
45:27: Wa-lillaahi mulkus samaawaati wal-ard; Wa-Yawma taqoomus Saa'atu Yawma-'izien yakhsarul mubtiloon
45:28: Wa-taraa kulla ummatin jaasiyah; kullu ummatin tud'aaa ilaa kitaabihaa al-Yawma tujzawna maa kuntum ta'maloon
45:29: Haazaa kitaabunaa yantiqu 'alaikum bilhaqq; innaa kunnaa nastansikhu maa kuntum ta'maloon
45:30: Fa-ammal lazeena aamaanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaati fayudkhiluhum Rabbuhum fee rahmatih; zaalika huwal fawzul mubeen
45:31: Wa-ammal lazeena kafarooo afalam takun Aayaatee tutlaa 'alaikum fastakbartum Wa-kuntum qawmam mujrimeen
45:32: Wa-izaa qeela inna wa'dallaahi haqqunw was Saa'atu laa raiba feehaa qultum maa nadree mas Saa'atu in nazunnu illaa zannanw Wa-maa nahnu bimustaiqineen
45:33: Wa-badaa lahum saiyyiaatu maa 'amiloo Wa-haaqa bihim maa kaanoo bihee yastahzi'oon
45:34: Wa-qeelal yawma nansaakum kamaa naseetum liqaaa'a yawmikum haazaa Wa-maawaakumun Naaru Wa-maa lakum min naasireen
45:35: Zaalikum bi-annakumut takhaztum aayaatil laahi huzuwanw Wa-gharratkumul hayaatud dunyaa; fal yawma laa yukhrajoona minhaa Wa-laahum yusta'taboon
45:36: Falillaahil hamdu Rabbis samaawaati Wa-Rabbil ardi Rabbil 'aalameen
45:37: Wa-lahul kibriyaaa'u fis samaawaati wal-ardi Wa-Huwal 'Azeezul Hakeem
46:3: Maa khalaqnas samaawaati wal-arda Wa-maa bainahumaaa illaa bilhaqqi Wa-ajalim musammaa; wallazeena kafaroo 'ammaaa unziroo mu'ridoon
46:4: Qul ara'aytum maa tad'oona min doonil laahi aroonee maazaa khalaqoo minal ardi am lahum shirkun fis samaawaati eetoonee bi-kitaabim min qabli haazaaa aw asaaratim min 'ilmin in kuntum saadiqeen
46:5: Wa-man adallu mimmaien yad'oo min doonil laahi mal laa yastajeebu lahooo ilaa Yawmil Qiyaamati Wa-hum 'an du'aaa'ihim ghaafiloon
46:6: Wa-izaa hushiran naasu kaanoo lahum a'daaa'anw Wa-kaanoo bi'ibaadatihim kaafireen
46:7: Wa-izaa tutlaa 'alaihim Aayaatunaa baiyinaatin qaalal lazeena kafaroo lilhaqqi lammaa jaaa'ahum haazaa sihrum mubeen
46:8: Am yaqooloonaf taraahu qul inif taraituhoo falaa tamlikoona lee minal laahi shai'an Huwa a'lamu bimaa tufeedoona feehi kafaa bihee shaheedam bainee Wa-bainakum Wa-Huwal Ghafoorur Raheem
46:9: Qul maa kuntu bid'am minal Rusuli Wa-maaa adreee ma yuf'alu bee Wa-laa bikum in attabi'u illaa maa yoohaaa ilaiya Wa-maaa ana illaa nazeerum mubeen
46:10: Qul ara'aytum in kaana min 'indil laahi Wa-kafartum bihee Wa-shahida shaahidum mim Banee Israaa'eela 'alaa mislihee fa-aamana wastak-bartum innal laaha laa yahdil qawmaz zaalimeen
46:11: Wa-qaalal lazeena kafaroo lillazeena aamanoo law kaana khairam maa sabaqoonaaa ilyh; Wa-iz lam yahtadoo bihee fasa-yaqooloona haazaaa ifkun qadeem
46:12: Wa-min qablihee kitaabu Moosaaa imaamanw wa-rahmah; Wa-haazaa Kitaabum musad-diqul lisaanan 'Arabiyyal liyunziral lazeena zalamoo Wa-bushraa lilmuhsineen
46:13: Innal lazeena qaaloo Rabbunal laahu summas taqaamoo falaa khawfun 'alaihim Wa-laa hum yahzanoon
46:14: Ulaaa'ika Ashabul Jannati khaalideena feehaa jazaaa'am bimaa kaano ya'maloon
46:15: Wa-wassainal insaana biwaalidaihi ihsaana; hamalat-hu ummuhoo kurhanwn wa-wada'at-hu kurhanw Wa-hamluhoo Wa-fisaaluhoo salaasoona shahraa; hattaaa izaa balagha ashuddahoo Wa-balagha arba'eena sanatan qaala Rabbi awzi'-neee an ashkura ni'matakal lateee an'amta 'alaiyya Wa-'alaa waalidaiya Wa-an a'mala saalihan tardaahu Wa-aslih lee fee zurriyyatee; innee tubtu ilaika Wa-innee minal muslimeen
46:16: Ulaaa'ikal lazeena nata-qabbalu 'anhum ahsana maa 'amiloo Wa-natajaawazu 'an saiyiaatihim feee Ashaabil jannati Wa'das sidqil lazee kaanoo yoo'adoon
46:17: Wallazee qaala liwaali-daihi uffil lakumaaa ata'idanineee an ukhraja Wa-qad khalatil quroonu min qablee Wa-humaa yastagheesaanil laaha wailaka aamin inna wa'dal laahi haqq, fa-yaqoolu maa haazaaa illaaa asaateerul awwaleen
46:18: Ulaaa'ikal lazeena haqqa 'alaihimul qawlu feee umamin qad khalat min qablihim minal jinni wal-insi innahum kaanoo khaasireen
46:19: Wa-likullin darajaatum mimmaa 'amiloo Wa-liyuwaf-fiyahum a'maalahum Wa-hum laa yuzlamoon
46:20: Wa-Yawma yu'radul lazeena kafaroo 'alan Naari azhabtum taiyibaatikum fee hayaatikumud dunyaa wastam-ta'tum bihaa fal-Yawma tujzawna 'azaabal hooni bimaa kuntum tastakbiroona fil ardi bighairil haqqi Wa-bimaa kuntum tafsuqoon
46:21: Wazkur akhaa 'Aad, iz anzara qawmahoo bil-Ahqaafi Wa-qad khalatin nuzuru mim baini yadaihi Wa-min khalfiheee allaa ta'budooo illal laaha inneee akhaafu 'alaikum 'azaaba Yawmin 'azeem
46:22: Qaaloo aji'tanaa li-taa-fikanaa 'an aalihatinaa fa'tinaa bimaa ta'idunaaa in kunta minas saadiqeen
46:23: Qaala innamal 'ilmu indal laahi Wa-uballighukum maaa ursiltu bihee Wa-laakinneee araakum qawman tajhaloon
46:24: Falammaa ra awhu 'aaridam mustaqbila awdiyatihim qaaloo haazaa 'aaridum mumtirunaa; bal huwa masta'jaltum bihee reehun feehaa 'azaabun aleem
46:25: Tudammiru kulla shai'im bi-amri Rabbihaa fa-asbahoo laa yuraaa illaa masaakinuhum; kazaalika najzil qawmal mujrimeen
46:26: Wa-laqad makkannaahum feemaaa im makkannaakum feehi waj'alnaa lahum sam'anw Wa-absaaranw Wa-af'idatan famaaa aghnaa 'anhum samu'uhum Wa-laaa absaaruhum Wa-laaa af'idatuhum min shai'in iz kaanoo yajhadoona bi-Aayaatil laahi Wa-haaqa bihim maa kaanoo bihee yastahzi'oon
46:27: Wa-laqad ahlaknaa ma hawlakum minal quraa Wa-sarrafnal Aayaati la'allahum yarji'oon
46:28: Falaw-laa nasarahumul lazeenat takhazoo min doonil laahi qurbaanan aalihatam bal dalloo 'anhum' Wa-zaalika ifkuhum Wa-maa kaanoo yaftaroon
46:29: Wa-iz sarafinaaa ilaika nafaram minal jinni yastami'oonal Quraana falammaa hadaroohu qaalooo ansitoo falammaa qudiya wallaw ilaa qawmihim munzireen
46:30: Qaaloo yaa-qawmanaaa innaa sami'naa Kitaaban unzila mim ba'di Moosa musaddiqal limaa baina yadihi yahdeee ilal haqqi Wa-ilaa Tareeqim Mustaqeem
46:31: Yaa-qawmanaaa ajeeboo daa'iyal laahi Wa-aaminoo bihee yaghfir lakum min zunoobikum Wa-yujirkum min 'azaabin aleem
46:32: Wa-mal laa yujib daa'iyal laahi falaisa bimu'jizin fil ardi Wa-laisa lahoo min dooniheee awliyaaa'; ulaaa-ika fee dalaalim mubeen
46:33: Awalam yaraw annal laahal lazee khalaqas samaawaati wal-larda Wa-lam ya'ya bikhal qihinna biqaadirin 'alaaa aiyuhyiyal mawtaa; balaaa innahoo 'alaa kulli shai'in Qadeer
46:34: Wa-Yawma yu'radul lazeena kafaroo 'alan naari alaisa haaza bil-haqq; qaaloo balaa Wa-Rabbinaa; qaala fazooqul 'azaaba bimaa kuntum takfuroon
46:35: Fasbir kamaa sabara ulul 'azmi minar Rusuli Wa-laa tasta'jil lahum; ka-annahum Yawma yarawna maa yoo'adoona lam yalbasooo illaa saa'atam min nahaar; balaagh; fahal yuhlaku illal qawmul faasiqoon
47:1: Allazeena kafaroo Wa-saddoo 'an sabeelil laahi adalla a'maalahum
47:2: Wallazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaati Wa-aamanoo bimaa nuzzila 'alaa Muhammadinw-wa huwal haqqu mir Rabbihim kaffara 'anhum saiyiaatihim Wa-aslaha baalahum
47:3: Zaalika bi-annal lazeena kafarut taba'ul baatila Wa-annal lazeena aamanut taba'ul haqqa mir Rabbihim; kazaalika yadribul laahu linnaasi amsaalahum
47:4: Fa-izaa laqeetumul lazeena kafaroo fadarbar riqaabi, hattaaa izaa askhan-tumoohum fashuddul wasaaqa, fa-immaa mannnam ba'du Wa-immaa fidaaa'an hattaa tada'al harbu awzaarahaa; zaalika Wa-law yashaaa'ul laahu lantasara minhum Wa-laakin li-yabluwa ba'dakum bi-ba'd; wallazeena qutiloo fee sabeelil laahi falaien yudilla a'maalahum
47:7: Yaaa-ayyuhal lazeena aamanooo in tansurul laaha yansurkum Wa-yusabbit aqdaamakum
47:8: Wallazeena kafaroo fata'-sal lahum Wa-adalla a'maalahum
47:9: Zaalika bi-annahum karihoo maaa anzal allaahu fa-ahbata a'maalahum
47:10: Afalam yaseeroo fil ardi fayanzuroo kaifa kaana 'aaqibatul lazeena min qablihim; dammaral laahu 'alaihim Wa-lilkaafireena amsaaluhaa
47:11: Zaalika bi-annal laaha mawlal lazeena aamanoo Wa-annal kaafireena laa mawlaa lahum
47:12: Innal-laaha yudkhilul lazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaati Jannaatin tajree min tahtihal anhaaru wallazeena kafaroo yatamatta'oona Wa-ya'kuloona kamaa ta'kulul an'aamu wan Naaru maswan lahum
47:13: Wa-ka-ayyim min qaryatin hiya ashaddu quwwatam min qaryatikal lateee akhrajatka ahlaknaahum falaa naasira lahum
47:14: Afaman kaana 'alaa baiyinatim mir Rabbihee kaman zuyyina lahoo sooo'u 'amalihee wattaba'ooo ahwaaa'ahum
47:15: Masalul jannatil latee wu'idal muttaqoona feehaaa anhaarum min maaa'in ghayri aasininw Wa-anhaarum mil labanil lam yataghaiyar ta'muhoo Wa-anhaarum min khamril lazzatin li-shaaribeena Wa-anhaarum min 'asalim musaffanw Wa-lahum feeha min kullis samaraati Wa-maghfiratum mir Rabbihim kaman huwa khaalidun fin naari Wa-suqoo maaa'an hameeman faqatta'a am'aaa'ahum
47:16: Wa-minhum maien yastami'u ilaika hattaaa izaa kharajoo min 'indika qaaloo lil-lazeena ootul 'ilma maazaa qaala aanifaa; ulaaa'ikal lazeena taba'al laahu 'alaa quloobihim wattaba'ooo ahwaaa'ahum
47:17: Wallazeenah tadaw zaadahum hudanw Wa-aataahum taqwaahum
47:18: Fahal yanzuroona illas Saa'ata an ta'tiyahum baghtatan faqad jaaa'a ashraatuhaa; fa-annaa lahum izaa jaaa'at-hum zikraahum
47:19: Fa'lam annahoo laaa ilaaha illal laahu wastaghfir lizambika Wa-lilmu'mineena walmu'minaat; wallaahu ya'lamu mutaqallabakum Wa-maswaakum
47:20: Wa-yaqoolul lazeena aamanoo law-laa nuzzilat Sooratun fa-izaaa unzilat Sooratum Muhkamatunw Wa-zukira feehal qitaalu ra-aytal lazeena fee quloobihim maraduien yanzuroona ilaika nazaral maghshiyyi 'alaihi minal mawti fa'awlaa lahum
47:21: Taa'atunw Wa-qawlum ma'roof; fa-izaa 'azamal amru falaw sadaqul laaha lakaana khairal lahum
47:22: Fahal 'asaitum in tawallaitum an tufsidoo fil ardi Wa-tuqatti'ooo arhaamakum
47:23: Ulaaa'ikal lazeena la'anahumul laahu fa-asammahum Wa-a'maaa absaarahum
47:24: Afalaa yatadabbaroonal Qur-aana am 'alaa quloobin aqfaaluhaa
47:25: Innal lazeenar taddoo 'alaaa adbaarihim min ba'di maa tabaiyana lahumul hudash Shaitaanu sawwala lahum Wa-amlaa lahum
47:26: Zaalika bi-annahum qaaloo lillazeena karihoo maa nazzalal laahu sanutee'ukum fee ba'dil amri wallaahu ya'lamu israarahum
47:27: Fakaifa izaa tawaffat-humul malaaa'ikatu yadriboona wujoohahum Wa-adbaa-rahum
47:28: Zaalika bi-annahumut taba'oo maaa askhatal laaha Wa-karihoo ridwaanahoo fa-ahbata a'maalahum
47:29: Am hasibal lazeena fee quloobihim maradun al laien yukhrijal laahu adghaanahum
47:30: Wa-law nashaaa'u la-arainaakahum fala-'araftahum bi-seemaahum; Wa-lata'rifan-nahum fee lahnil qawl; wallaahu ya'lamu a'maalakum
47:31: Wa-lanabluwannakum hattaa na'lamal mujaahideena minkum wassaabireena Wa-nabluwa akhbaarakum
47:32: Innal lazeena kafaroo Wa-saddoo 'an sabeelil laahi Wa-shaaaqqur Rasoola min ba'di maa tabaiyana lahumul hudaa laien yadurrul laaha shai'anw Wa-sa-yuhbitu a'maalahum
47:33: Yaaa-ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo atee'ul laaha Wa-atee'ur Rasoola Wa-laa tubtilooo a'maalakum
47:34: Innal lazeena kafaroo Wa-saddoo 'an sabeelil laahi summa maatoo Wa-hum kuffaarun falaien yaghfiral laahu lahum
47:35: Falaa tahinoo Wa-tad'ooo ilas salmi Wa-antumul a'lawna wallaahu ma'akum Wa-lany yatirakum a'maalakum
47:36: Innamal hayaatud dunyaa la'ibunw Wa-lahw; Wa-in tu'minoo Wa-tattaqoo yu'tikum ujoorakum Wa-laa yas'alkum amwaalakum
47:37: Ien yas'alkumoohaa fa-yuhfikum tabkhaloo Wa-yukhrij adghaanakum
47:38: Haaa antum haaa'ulaaa'i tud'awna litunfiqoo fee sabeelillaahi faminkum many yabkhalu Wa-many yabkhal fa-innamaa yabkhalu 'an nafsih; wallaahu Ghaniyyu Wa-antumul fuqaraaa'; Wa-in tatawallaw yastabdil qawman ghairakum summa laa yakoonooo amsaalakum
48:2: Liyaghfira lakal laahu maa taqaddama min zanbika Wa-maa ta-akhkhara Wa-yutimma ni'matahoo 'alaika Wa-yahdiyaka siraatan mustaqeema
48:4: Huwal lazeee anzalas sakeenata fee quloobil mu'mineena liyazdaadooo eemaanamma'a eemaanihim; Wa-lillaahi junoodus samawaati wal ard; Wa-kaanal laahu 'Aleeman Hakeemaa
48:5: Liyudkhilal mu'mineena walmu'minaati jannaatin tajree min tahtihal anhaaru khaalideena feehaa Wa-yukaffira 'anhum saiyyi-aatihim; Wa-kaana zaalika 'indal laahi fawzan 'azeemaa
48:6: Wa-yu'azzibal munaafiqeena walmunaafiqaati wal-mushrikeena walmushrikaatiz zaaanneena billaahi zannas saw'; 'alaihim daaa'iratus saw'i Wa-ghadibal laahu 'alaihim Wa-la'anahum Wa-a'adda lahum jahannama Wa-saaa-at maseeraa
48:7: Wa-lillaahi junoodus samaawaati wal-ard; Wa-kaanal laahu 'azeezan hakeema
48:9: Litu-minoo billaahi Wa-Rasoolihee Wa-tu'azziroohu watuwaqqiroohu watusabbi-hoohu bukratanw Wa-aseelaa
48:10: Innal lazeena yubaayi'oonaka innamaa yubaayi'oonal laaha yadul laahi fawqa aydeehim; faman nakasa fainnamaa yankusu 'alaa nafsihee Wa-man awfaa bimaa 'aahada 'alaihullaaha fasa yu'teehi ajran 'azeemaa
48:11: Sa-yaqoolu lakal mukhal-lafoona minal A'raabi shaighalatnaaa amwaalunaa Wa-ahloonaa fastaghfir lanaa; yaqooloona bi-alsinatihim maa laisa fee quloobihim; qul famaien yamliku lakum minal laahi shai'an in araada bikum darran aw araada bikum naf'aa; bal kaanal laahu bimaa ta'maloona Khabeeraa
48:12: Bal zanantum al laien yanqalibar Rasoolu walmu'minoona ilaaa ahleehim abadanw Wa-zuyyina zaalika fee quloobikum Wa-zanantum zannnas saw'i Wa-kuntum qawmam booraa
48:13: Wa-mal lam yu'mim billaahi Wa-Rasoolihee fainnaaa a'tadnaa lilkaafireena sa'eeraa
48:14: Wa-lillaahii mulkus samaawaati wal-ard; yaghfiru limaien yashaaa'u Wa-yu'azzibu maien yashaaa'; Wa-kaanal laahu Ghafoorar Raheemaa
48:15: Sa-yaqoolul mukhalla-foona izan talaqtum ilaa maghaanima litaakhuzoohaa zaroonaa nattabi'kum yureedoona any yubaddiloo Kalaamallaah; qul lan tattabi'oonaa kazaalikum qaalal laahu min qablu fasa yaqooloona bal tahsudoonanna; bal kaanoo laa yafqahoona illaa qaleela
48:16: Qul lilmukhallafeena minal A'raabi satud'awna ilaa qawmin ulee baasin shadeedin tuqaati-loonahum aw yuslimoona fa-in tutee'oo yu'tikumul laahu ajran hasananw Wa-in tatawallaw kamaa tawallaitum min qablu yu'azzibkum 'azaaban aleemaa
48:17: Laisa 'alal a'maa harajunw Wa-laa 'alal a'raji harajunw Wa-laa 'alal mareedi haraj' Wa-maien yutil'il laaha Wa-Rasoolahoo yudkhilhu jannaatin tajree min tahtihal anhaaru Wa-maien yatawalla yu'azzibhu 'azaaban aleemaa
48:18: Laqad radiyal laahu 'anil mu'mineena iz yubaayi-'oonaka tahtash shajarati fa'alima maa fee quloobihim fa-anzalas sakeenata 'alaihim Wa-asaa-bahum fat-han qareebaa
48:19: Wa-maghaanima kaseera-taien yaakhuzoonahaa; Wa-kaanal laahu 'Azeezan Hakeemaa
48:20: Wa'adakumul laahu ma-ghaanima kaseeratan taakhuzoo-nahaa fa'ajjala lakum haazihee Wa-kaffa aydiyan naasi 'ankum Wa-litakoona aayatal lilmu'mineena Wa-yahdiyakum siraatam mustaqeema
48:21: Wa-ukhraa lam taqdiroo 'alaihaa qad ahaatal laahu bihaa; Wa-kaanal laahu 'alaa kulli shai'in qadeera
48:22: Wa-law qaatalakumul lazeena kafaroo la-wallawul adbaara summa laa yajidoona waliyanw-wa laa naseeraa
48:23: Sunnatal laahil latee qad khalat min qablu Wa-lan tajida lisunnatil laahi tabdeelaa
48:24: Wa-Huwal lazee kaffa aydiyahum 'ankum Wa-aydiyakum 'anhum bibatni Makkata mim ba'di an azfarakum 'alaihim; Wa-kaanal laahu bimaa ta'maloona Baseera
48:25: Humul lazeena kafaroo Wa-saddookum 'anil-Masjidil-Haraami walhadya ma'koofan any yablugha mahillah; Wa-law laa rijaalum mu'minoona Wa-nisaaa'um mu'minaatul lam ta'lamoohum an tata'oohum fatuseebakum minhum ma'arratum bighairi 'ilmin liyud khilal laahu fee rahmatihee many yashaaa'; law tazayyaloo la'azzabnal lazeena kafaroo minhum 'azaaban aleema
48:26: Iz ja'alal lazeena kafaroo fee quloobihimul hamiyyata hamiyyatal jaahiliyyati fa-anzalal laahu sakeenatahoo 'alaa Rasoolihee Wa-'alal mu-mineena Wa-alzamahum kalimatat taqwaa Wa-kaanooo ahaqqa bihaa Wa-ahlahaa; Wa-kaanal laahu bikulli shai'in Aleema
48:27: Laqad sadaqal laahu Rasoolahur ru'yaa bilhaqq, latadkhulunnal Masjidal Haraama in shaaa'al laahu aamineena muhalliqeena ru'oosakum Wa-muqassireena laa takhaafoona fa'alima maa lam ta'lamoo faja'ala min dooni zaalika fathan qareebaa
48:28: Huwal lazeee arsala Rasoolahoo bilhudaa Wa-deenil haqqi liyuzhirahoo 'alad deeni kullih; Wa-kafaa billaahi Shaheeda
48:29: Muhammadur Rasoolul laah; wallazeena ma'ahooo ashiddaaa'u 'alal kuffaaari ruhamaaa'u bainahum taraahum rukka'an sujjadaien yabtaghoona fadlam minal laahi Wa-ridwaanan seemaahum fee wujoohihim min asaris sujood; zaalika masaluhum fit tawraah; Wa-masaluhum fil Injeeli kazar'in akhraja shat-'ahoo fa-'aazarahoo fastaghlaza fastawaa 'alaa sooqihee yu'jibuz zurraa'a liyagheeza bihimul kuffaar; wa'adal laahul lazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaati minhum maghfiratanw Wa-ajran 'azeemaa
49:1: Yaa-ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo la tuqaddimoo baina yada-yil laahi Wa-Rasoolihee wattaqul laah; innal laaha samee'un 'Aleem
49:2: Yaa-ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo laa tarfa'ooo aswaatakum fawqa sawtin Nabiyyi Wa-laa tajharoo lahoo bilqawli kajahri ba'dikum liba-'din an tahbata a-'maalukum Wa-antum laa tash'uroon
49:3: Innal lazeena yaghud-doona aswaatahum 'inda Rasoolil laahi ulaaa'ikal lazeenam tah-anal laahu quloobahum littaqwaa; lahum maghfiratunw waajrun 'azeem
49:4: Innal lazeena yunaadoo-naka minw waraaa'il hujuraati aksaruhum laa ya'qiloon
49:5: Wa-law annahum sabaroo hatta takhruja ilaihim lakaana khairal lahum; wallaahu Ghafoorur Raheem
49:6: Yaaa-ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo in jaaa'akum faasqum binaba-in fatabaiyanooo an tuseeboo qawmam bijahalatin fatusbihoo 'alaa maa fa'altum naadimeen
49:7: Wa'lamooo anna feekum Rasoolal laah; law yutee'ukum fee kaseerim minal amrila 'anittum Wa-laakinnal laaha habbaba ilaikumul eemaana Wa-zaiyanahoo fee quloobikum Wa-karraha ilaikumul kufra walfusooqa wal'isyaan; ulaaaika humur raashidoon
49:8: Fadlam minal laahi Wa-ni'mah; wallaahu 'Aleemun Hakeem
49:9: Wa-in taaa'ifataani minal mu'mineena naqtataloo fa-aslihoo bainahumaa; fa-im baghat ihdaahumaa 'alal ukhraa faqaatilul latee tabghee hattaa tafeee'a ilaaa amril laah; fa-in faaa'at fa-aslihoo bainahumaa bil'adli Wa-aqsitoo, innal laaha yuhibbul muqsiteen
49:10: Innamal mu'minoona ikhwatun fa-aslihoo baina akhawaykum wattaqul laaha la'allakum turhamoon
49:11: Yaaa-ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo laa yaskhar qawmum min qawmin 'asaaa aien yakoonoo khairam minhum Wa-laa nisaaa'um min nisaaa'in 'Asaaa ay yakunna khairam minhunna Wa-laa talmizooo anfusakum Wa-laa tanaabazoo bil alqaab; bi'sal ismul fusooqu ba'dal eemaan; Wa-mal-lam yatub fa-ulaaa'ika humuz zaalimoon
49:12: Yaaa-ayyuhal lazeena aamanuj taniboo kaseeram minaz zanni inna ba'daz zanni ismunw Wa-laa tajassasoo Wa-la yaghtab ba'dukum ba'daa; a-yuhibbu ahadukum aien yaakula lahma akheehi maitan fakarih-tumooh; wattaqul laa; innal laaha tawwaabur Raheem
49:13: Yaaa-ayyuhan naasu innaa khalaqnaakum min zakarinw Wa-unsaa Wa-ja'alnaakum shu'oobanw Wa-qabaaa'ila lita'aarafoo inna akramakum 'indal laahi atqaakum innal laaha 'Aleemun khabeer
49:14: Qaalatil-A 'raabu aamannaa qul lam tu'minoo Wa-laakin qoolooo aslamnaa Wa-lamma yadkhulil eemaanu fee quloobikum Wa-in tutee'ul laaha Wa-Rasoolahoo laa yalitkum min a'maalikum shai'aa; innal laaha Ghafoorur Raheem
49:15: Innamal muu'minoonal lazeena aamanoo billaahi Wa-Rasoolihee summa lam yartaaboo Wa-jaahadoo biamwaalihim Wa-anfusihim fee sabeelil laah; ulaaaika humus saadiqoon
49:16: Qul atu'allimoonal laaha bideenikum wallaahu ya'lamu maa fis samaawaati Wa-maa fil ard; wallaahu bikulli shai'in 'Aleem
49:17: Yamunnoona 'alaika an aslamoo qul laa tamunnoo 'alaiya Islaamakum balil laahu yamunnu 'alaikum an hadaakum lil-eemaani in kuntum saadiqeen
49:18: Innal laaha ya'lamu ghaibas samaawaati wal-ard; wallaahu baseerum bimaa ta'maloon
50:2: Bal 'ajibooo an jaa'ahum munzirum minhum faqaalal kaafiroona haazaa shai'un 'ajeeb
50:3: A-izaa mitnaa Wa-kunnaa turaaban zaalika raj'um ba'eed
50:4: Qad 'alimnaa maa tanqu-sul ardu minhum Wa-'indanaa Kitaabun Hafeez
50:5: Bal kazzaboo bilhaqqi lammaa jaaa'ahum fahum feee amrim mareej
50:6: Afalam yanzurooo ilas samaaa'i fawqahum kaifa banainaahaa Wa-zaiyannaahaa Wa-maa lahaa min furooj
50:7: Wal-arda madadnaahaa Wa-alqainaa feehaa rawaasiya Wa-ambatnaa feehaa min kulli zawjim baheej
50:9: Wa-nazzalnaa minas samaaa'i maaa'am mubaarakan fa-ambatnaa bihee jannaatinw Wa-habbal haseed
50:11: Rizqal lil'ibaad, Wa-ahyainaa bihee baldatam maitaa; kazaalikal khurooj
50:12: Kazzabat qablahum qawmu Noohinw Wa-Ashaabur Rassi Wa-Samood
50:14: Wa-Ashaabul Aykati Wa-qawmu Tubba'; kullun kazzabar Rusula fahaqqa wa'eed
50:15: Afa'a-yeenaa bilkhalqil awwal; bal hum fee labsim min khalqin jadeed
50:16: Wa-laqad khalaqnal insaana Wa-na'lamu maa tuwaswisu bihee nafsuhoo Wa-Nahnu aqrabu ilaihi min hablil wareed
50:17: Iz yatalaqqal mutalaqqi-yaani 'anil yameeni Wa-'anish shimaali qa'eed
50:18: Maa yalfizu min qawlin illaa ladaihi raqeebun 'ateed
50:19: Wa-jaaa'at sakratul mawti bilhaqq; zaalika maa kunta minhu taheed
50:20: Wa-nufikha fis Soor; zaalika yawmul wa'eed
50:21: Wa-jaaa'at kullu nafsim ma'ahaa saaa'iqunw Wa-shaheed
50:22: Laqad kunta fee ghaf-latim min haazaa fakashafnaa 'anka ghitaaa'aka fabasarukal yawma hadeed
50:26: Allazee ja'ala ma'al laahi ilaahan aakhara fa-alqiyaahu fil 'azaabish shadeed
50:27: Qaala qareenuhoo Rabbanaa maaa atghaituhoo Wa-laakin kaana fee dalaalin ba'eed
50:28: Qaala laa takhtasimoo ladaayya Wa-qad qaddamtu ilaikum bilwa'eed
50:29: Maa yubaddalul qawlu ladaiya Wa-maaa ana bizal-laamil lil'abeed
50:30: Yawma naqoolu li'jahannama halim talaati Wa-taqoolu hal mim mazeed
50:32: Haaza maa too'adoona likulli awwaabin hafeez
50:33: Man khashiyar Rahmaana bilghaibi Wa-jaaa'a biqalbim muneeb
50:35: Lahum maa yashaaa'oona feehaa Wa-ladainaa mazeed
50:36: Wa-kam ahlaknaa qablahum min qarnin hum ashaddu minhum batshan fanaqqaboo fil bilaad, hal mim mahees
50:37: Inna fee zaalika lazikraa liman kaana lahoo qalbun aw alqas sam'a Wa-huwa shaheed
50:38: Wa-laqad khalaqnas samaawaati wal-arda Wa-maa bainahumaa fee sittati ayyaamin Wa-maa massanaa mil lughoob
50:39: Fasbir 'alaa maa yaqooloona Wa-sabbih bihamdi Rabbika qabla tuloo'ish shamsi Wa-qablal ghuroob
50:41: Wastami' yawma yunaa-dil munaadi mim makaanin qareeb
50:42: Yawma yasmaoonas sai-hata bilhaqq zaalika yawmul khurooj
50:43: Innaa Nahnu nuhyee Wa-numeetu Wa-ilainal maseer
50:44: Yawma tashaqqaqul ardu 'anhum siraa'aa; zaalika hashrun 'alainaa yaseer
50:45: Nahnu a'lamu bimaa yaqooloona Wa-maaa anta 'alaihim bijabbaarin fazakkir bil-quraani maien yakhaafu wa'eed
51:14: Zooqoo fitnatakum haa-zal lazee kuntum bihee tas-ta'jiloon
51:16: Aakhizeena maaa aataahum Rabbuhum; innahum kaanoo qabla zaalika muhsineen
51:17: kaanoo qaleelam minal laili maa yahja'oon
51:23: Fawa-Rabbis samaaa'i wal-ardi innahoo lahaqqum misla maa annakum tantiqoon
51:24: Hal ataaka hadeesu daifi Ibraaheemal mukrameen
51:25: Iz dakhaloo 'alaihi faqaaloo salaaman qaala salaamun qawmum munkaroon
51:26: Faraagha ilaaa ahlihee fajaaa'a bi'ijlin sameen
51:28: Fa-awjasa minhum khee-fatan qaaloo laa takhaf Wa-bashsharoohu bighulaamin 'aleem
51:29: Fa-aqbalatim ra-atuhoo fee sarratin fasakkat wajhahaa Wa-qaalat 'ajoozun 'aqeem
51:30: Qaaloo kazaaliki qaala Rabbuki innahoo huwal hakeemul 'aleem
51:32: Qaalooo innaaa ursilnaaa ilaa qawmim mujrimeen
51:35: Fa-akhrajnaa man kaana feehaa minal mu'mineen
51:36: Famaa wajadnaa feehaa ghaira baitim minal muslimeen
51:37: Wa-taraknaa feehaaa aayatal lillazeena yakhaafoonal 'azaabal aleem
51:38: Wa-fee Moosaaa iz arsalnaahu ilaa Fir'awna bisultaa-nim mubeen
51:39: Fatawalla biruknihee Wa-qaala saahirun aw majnoon
51:40: Fa-akhaznaahu Wa-junoo-dahoo fanabaznaahum fil yammi Wa-huwa muleem
51:42: Maa tazaru min shai'in atat 'alaihi illaa ja'alat-hu karrameem
51:43: Wa-fee Samooda iz qeela lahum tamatta''oo hattaa heen
51:44: Fa'ataw 'an amri Rabbihim fa-akhazal-humus saa'iqatu Wa-hum yanzuroon
51:45: Famas tataa'oo min qiyaaminw Wa-maa kaanoo muntasireen
51:46: Wa-qawma Noohim min qablu innahum kaano qawman faasiqeen
51:49: Wa-min kulli shai'in khalaqnaa zawjaini la'allakum tazakkaroon
51:50: Fafirrooo ilal laahi innee lakum minhu nazeerum mubeen
51:51: Wa-laa taj'aloo ma'al laahi ilaahan aakhara innee lakum minhu nazeerum mubeen
51:52: Kazaalika maaa atal lazeena min qablihim mir Rasoolin illaa qaaloo saahirun aw majnoon
51:53: Atawaasaw bih; bal hum qawmun taaghoon
51:56: Wa-maa khalaqtul jinna wal-insa illaa liya'budoon
51:57: Maaa ureedu minhum mir rizqinw Wa-maaa ureedu aien yut'imoon
51:58: Innal laaha Huwar Razzaaqu Zul Quwwatil Mateen
51:59: Fa-inna lillazeena zalamoo zanoobam misla zanoobi ashaabihim falaa yasta'jiloon
51:60: Fawailul lillazeena kafaroo mien yawmihimul lazee yoo'adoon
52:13: Yawma yuda'-'oona ilaa naari jahannama da'-'aa
52:14: Haazihin naarul latee kuntum bihaa tukazziboon
52:15: Afasihrun haazaaaa am antum laa tubsiroon
52:16: Islawhaa fasbirooo aw laa tasbiroo sawaaa'un 'alaikum innamaa tujzawna maa kuntum ta'maloon
52:18: Faakiheena bimaaa aataahum rabbuhum Wa-waqaahum rabbuhum 'azaabal jaheem
52:19: Kuloo washraboo haneee-'am bimaa kuntum ta'maloon
52:21: Wallazeena aamanoo wattaba'at-hum zurriyyatuhum bieemaanin alhaqnaa bihim zurriyyatahum Wa-maaa alatnaahum min 'amalihim min shai'; kullum ri'im bimaa kasaba raheen
52:23: Yatanaaza'oona feehaa kaasal laa laghwun feehaa Wa-laa taaseem
