52:24: Wa-yatoofu 'alaihim ghilmaanul lahum ka-annahum lu'lu'um maknoon
52:26: Qaalooo innaa kunnaa qablu feee ahlinaa mushfiqeen
52:28: Innaa kunnaa min qablu nad'oohu innahoo huwal barrur raheem
52:29: Fazakkir famaaa anta bini'mati rabbika bikaahininw Wa-laa majnoon
52:30: Am yaqooloona shaa'irun natarabbasu bihee raibal manoon
52:31: Qul tarabbasoo fa-innee ma'akum minal mutarabbiseen
52:32: Am taamuruhum ahlaamuhum bihaazaaa am hum qawmun taaghoon
52:33: Am yaqooloona taqawwalah; bal laa yu'minoon
52:34: Falyaatoo bihadeesim misliheee in kaanoo saadiqeen
52:35: Am khuliqoo min ghairi shai'in am humul khaaliqoon
52:36: Am khalaqus samaawaati wal-ard; bal laa yooqinoon
52:37: Am 'indahum khazaaa'inu rabbika am humul musaitiroon
52:38: Am lahum sullamuien yastami'oona feehi falyaati mustami'uhum bisultaanim mubeen
52:40: Am tas'aluhum ajran fahum mim maghramim musqaloon
52:42: Am yureedoona kaidan fallazeena kafaroo humul makeedoon
52:43: Am lahum ilaahun ghairul laa; subhaanal laahi 'ammaa yushrikoon
52:44: Wa-ien yaraw kisfam minas samaaa'i saaqitaien yaqooloo sahaabum markoom
52:45: Fazarhum hatta yulaaqoo yawmahumul lazee feehi yus'aqoon
52:46: Yawma laa yughnee 'anhum kaidumhum shai'anw Wa-laa hum yunsaroon
52:47: Wa-inna lillazeena zalamoo 'azaaban doona zalika Wa-laakinna aksarahum laa ya'lamoon
52:48: Wasbir lihukmi rabbika fa-innaka bi-a'yuninaa Wa-sabbih bihamdi rabbika heena taqoom
53:18: Laqad ra-aa min aayaati Rabbihil kubraaa
53:23: In hiya illaaa asmaaa'un sammaitumoohaaa antum Wa-aabaaa'ukum maaa anzalal laahu bihaa min sultaan; ien yattabi'oona illaz zanna Wa-maa tahwal anfusu Wa-laqad jaaa'ahum mir Rabbihimul hudaa
53:26: Wa-kam mim malakin fis samaawaati laa tughnee shafaa'atuhum shai'an illaa mim ba'di aien yaazanal laahu limaien yashaaa'u Wa-yardaa
53:27: innal lazeena laa yu'minoona bil-aakhirati la-yusammoonal malaaa'ikata tasmiyatal unsaa
53:28: Wa-maa lahum bihee min 'ilmin ien yattabi'oona illaz zanna Wa-innaz zanna laa yughnee minal haqqi shai'aa
53:29: Fa-a'rid 'am man tawallaa 'an zikrinaa Wa-lam yurid illal hayaatad dunyaa
53:30: Zalika mablaghuhum minal 'ilm; inna rabbaka huwa a'lamu biman dalla 'an sabee-lihee Wa-huwa a'lamu bimanih tadaa
53:31: Wa-lillaahi maa fis samaawaati Wa-maa fil ardi liyajziyal lazeena asaaa'oo bimaa 'amiloo Wa-yajziyal lazeena ahsanoo bilhusnaa
53:32: Allazeena yajtaniboona kabaaa'iral ismi walfawaa-hisha illal lamam; inna rabbaka waasi'ul maghfirah; huwa a'lamu bikum iz ansha-akum minal ardi Wa-iz antum ajinnatun fee butooni umma-haatikum falaa tuzakkooo anfusakum huwa a'lamu bimanit taqaa
53:36: Am lam yunabbaa bimaa fee suhuhfi Moosa
53:39: Wa-al laisa lil-insaani illaa maa sa'aa
53:52: Wa-qawma Noohim min qablu innahum kaanoo hum azlama Wa-atghaa
53:58: Laisa lahaa min doonil laahi kaashifah
54:2: Wa-ien yaraw aayataien yu'ridoo Wa-yaqooloo sihrun mustamirr
54:3: Wa-kazzaboo wattaba'ooo ahwaaa'ahum; Wa-kullu amrin mustaqirr
54:4: Wa-laqad jaaa'ahum minal anbaaa'i maa feehi muzdajar
54:6: Fatawalla 'anhum; yawma yad'ud daa'i ilaa shai-'in nukur
54:7: Khushsha'an absaaruhum yakhrujoona minal ajdaasi ka-annahum jaraadum muntashir
54:8: Muhti'eena ilad daa'i yaqoolul kaafiroona haazaa yawmun 'asir
54:9: Kazzabat qablahum qawmu Noohin fakazzaboo 'abdanaa Wa-qaaloo majnoonunw wazdujir
54:12: Wa-fajjarnal arda 'uyoonan faltaqal maaa'u 'alaaa amrin qad qudir
54:14: Tajree bi-a'yuninaa jazaaa'an liman kaana kufir
54:15: Wa-laqat taraknaahaa aayatan fahal min muddakir
54:17: Wa-laqad yassarnal Qur'aana liz-zikri fahal min muddakir
54:19: Innaa arsalnaa 'alaihim reehan sarsaran fee Yawmi nahsin mustamirr
54:20: Tanzi'un naasa ka-annahum a'jaazu nakhlin munqa'ir
54:22: Wa-laqad yassarnal Qur'aana liz-zikri fahal min muddakir
54:24: Faqaalooo a'-basharan minnaa waahidan nattabi'uhooo innaa izal lafee dalaalinw Wa-su'ur
54:25: A-ulqiyaz zikru 'alaihi min baininaa bal huwa kazzaabun ashir
54:27: Innaa mursilun naaqati fitnatan lahum fartaqibhum wastabir
54:28: Wa-nabbi'hum annal maaa'a qismatun bainahum kullu shirbin muhtadar
54:31: Innaaa arsalnaa 'alaihim saihatanw waahidatan fakaanoo kahasheemil muhtazir
54:32: Wa-laqad yassarnal Qur'aana liz-zikri fahal min muddakir
54:34: Innaa arsalnaa 'alaihim haasiban illaaa aala Lootin najjainaahum bisahar
54:35: Ni'matan min 'indinaa; kazaalika najzee man shakar
54:37: Wa-laqad raawadoohu 'an daifeehee fatamasnaaa a'yunahum fazooqoo 'azaabee Wa-nuzur
54:40: Wa-laqad yassarnal Qur'aana liz-zikri fahal min muddakir
54:42: Kazzaboo bi-Aayaatinaa kullihaa fa-akhaznaahum akhza 'azeezim muqtadir
54:43: A-kuffaarukum khairun min ulaaa'ikum am lakum baraaa'atun fiz Zubur
54:46: Balis Saa'atu maw'iduhum was-Saa'atu adhaa Wa-amarr
54:48: Yawma yus-haboona fin Naari 'alaa wujoohihim zooqoo massa saqar
54:50: Wa-maaa amrunaaa illaa waahidatun ka-lamhin bil-basar
54:51: Wa-laqad ahlaknaaa ashyaa'akum fahal min muddakir
55:9: Wa-aqeemul wazna bilqisti Wa-laa tukhsirul meezaan
55:15: Wa-khalaqal jaaan mim maarijim min naar
55:24: Wa-lahul jawaaril mun-sha'aatu fil bahri kal-a'laam
55:27: Wa-yabqaa wajhu rabbika zul jalaali wal-ikraam
55:29: Yas'aluhoo man fis samaawaati walard; kulla yawmin huwa fee shaan
55:33: Yaa-ma'sharal jinni wal-insi inis tata'tum an tanfuzoo min aqtaaris samaawaati wal-ardi fanfuzoo; laa tanfuzoona illaa bisultaan
55:35: Yursalu 'alaikumaa shuwaazum min naarinw-wa nuhaasun falaa tantasiraan
55:37: Fa-izan shaqqatis samaaa'u fakaanat wardatan kaddihaan
55:39: Fa-yawma'izil laa yus'alu 'an zambiheee insunw Wa-laa jaann
55:41: Yu'raful mujrimoona biseemaahum fa'yu'khazu binna-waasi wal-aqdaam
55:43: Haazihee jahannamul latee yukazzibu bihal mujrimoon
55:54: Muttaki'eena 'alaa furushim bataaa'inuhaa min istabraq; wajanal jannataini daan
55:56: Feehinna qaasiratut tarfi lam yatmishunna insun qablahum Wa-laa jaaann
55:74: Lam yatmis-hunna insun qablahum Wa-laa jaaann
55:78: Tabaarak asmu Rabbika Zil Jalaali wal-Ikraam
56:25: Laa yasma'oona feehaa laghwanw Wa-laa taaseemaa
56:47: Wa-kaanoo yaqooloona a'izaa mitnaa Wa-kunnaa turaabanw Wa-izaaman 'ainnaa lamab'oosoon
56:60: Nahnu qaddarnaa baina-kumul mawta Wa-maa nahnu bimasbooqeen
56:61: Alaaa an nubaddila amsaalakum Wa-nunshi'akum fee maa laa ta'lamoon
56:65: Law nashaaa'u laja'al-naahu hutaaman fazaltum tafakkahoon
56:69: A-antum anzaltumoohu minal muzni am nahnul munziloon
56:70: Law nashaaa'u ja'alnaahu ujaajan falaw-laa tashkuroon
56:72: A-antum anshaatum shajaratahaaa am nahnul munshi'oon
56:85: Wa-nahnu aqrabu ilaihi minkum Wa-laakil laa tubsiroon
56:90: Wa-ammaaa in kaana min as-haabil yameen
56:92: Wa-ammaaa in kaana minal mukazzibeenad daaalleen
57:1: Sabbaha lillaahi maa fis samaawaati wal-ardi Wa-Huwal 'Azeezul Hakeem
57:2: Lahoo mulkus samaawaati wal-ardi yuhyee Wa-yumeetu Wa-Huwa 'alaa kulli shai'in Qadeer
57:3: Huwal Awwalu wal'Aakhiru waz-Zaahiru wal-Baatinu Wa-huwa bikulli shai'in Aleem
57:4: Huwal lazee khalaqas samaawaati wal arda fee sittati ayyaamin summas tawaa 'alal 'Arsh; ya'lamu maa yaliju filardi Wa-maa yakhruju minhaa Wa-maa yanzilu minas samaaa'i Wa-maa ya'ruju feeha Wa-Huwa ma'akum ayna maa kuntum; wallaahu bimaa ta'maloona Baseer
57:5: Lahoo mulkus samaawaati wal-ard; Wa-ilal laahi turja'ul umoor
57:6: Yoolijul laila fin nahaari Wa-yoolijun nahaara fil lail; Wa-Huwa 'Aleemum bizaatis sudoor
57:7: Aaaminoo billaahi Wa-Rasoolihee Wa-anfiqoo mimmaa ja'alakum mustakh-lafeena feehi fallazeena aamanoo minkum Wa-anfaqoo lahum ajrun kabeer
57:8: Wa-maa lakum laa tu'minoona billaahi war-Rasoolu yad'ookum li-tu'minoo bi-Rabbikum Wa-qad akhaza meesaaqakum in kuntum mu'mineen
57:9: Huwal lazee yunazzilu 'alaa 'abdiheee Aayaatim baiyinaatil liyukhrijakum minaz zulumaati ilan noor; Wa-innal laaha bikum la-Ra'oofur Raheem
57:10: Wa-maa lakum allaa tunfiqoo fee sabeelil laahi Wa-lillaahi meeraasus samaawaati wal-ard; laa yastawee minkum man anfaqa min qablil fat-hi Wa-qaatal; ulaaa'ika a'zamu darajatam minal lazeena anfaqoo min ba'du Wa-qaataloo; Wa-kullanw wa'ad allaahul husnaa; wallaahu bimaa ta'maloona Khabeer
57:11: Man zal lazee yuqridul laaha qardan hasanan fa-yudaa'ifahoo lahoo Wa-lahooo ajrun kareem
57:12: Yawma taral mu'mineena walmu'minaati yas'aa nooruhum baina aydeehim Wa-bi-aymaanihim bushraakumul yawma jannaatun tajree min tahtihal anhaaru khaalideena feeha; zaalika huwal fawzul 'azeem
57:13: Yawma yaqoolul munaafiqoona walmunaafiqaatu lil-lazeena aamanun zuroonaa naqtabis min noorikum qeela irji'oo waraaa'akum faltamisoo nooran faduriba bainahum bisooril lahoo baabun, baatinuhoo feehir rahmatu Wa-zaahiruhoo min qibalihi 'azaab
57:14: Yunaadoonahum alam nakum ma'akum qaaloo balaa Wa-laakinnakum fatantum anfusakum Wa-tarabbastum wartabtum Wa-gharratkumul amaaniyyu hatta jaaa'a amrul laahi Wa-gharrakum billaahil gharoor
57:15: Fal-Yawma laa yu'khazu minkum fidyatunw Wa-laa minal lazeena kafaroo; ma'waakumun Naaru hiya maw-laakum Wa-bi'sal maseer
57:16: Alam ya'ni lil-lazeena aamanooo an takhsha'a quloobuhum lizikril laahi Wa-maa nazala minal haqqi Wa-laa yakoonoo kallazeena ootul Kitaaba min qablu fataala 'alaihimul amadu faqasat quloobuhum Wa-kaseerum minhum faasiqoon
57:17: I'lamooo annal laaha yuhyil arda ba'da mawtihaa; qad baiyannaa lakumul Aayaati la'allakum ta'qiloon
57:18: Innal mussaddiqeena wal-mussaddiqaati Wa-aqradul laaha qardan hassanaien yudaa'afu lahum Wa-lahum ajrun kareem
57:19: Wallazeena aamanoo billaahi Wa-Rusuliheee ulaaa'ika humus siddeeqoon; wash-shuhadaaa'u 'inda Rabbihim lahum ajruhum Wa-nooruhum; wallazeena kafaroo Wa-kazzaboo bi-aayaatinaaa ulaaa'ika As-haabul jaheem
57:20: I'lamooo annamal hayaa-tud dunyaa la'ibunw Wa-lahwunw Wa-zeenatunw Wa-tafaakhurum bainakum Wa-takaasurun fil amwaali wal-awlaad, kamasali ghaisin a'jabal kuffaara nabaatuhoo summa yaheeju fataraahu musfaaran summa yakoonu hutaamaa; Wa-fil aakhirati 'azaabun shadeedunw Wa-magh-firatum minal laahi Wa-ridwaan; Wa-mal haiyaa-tud dun-yaaa illaa mataa'ul ghuroor
57:21: Saabiqooo ilaa maghfiratim mir Rabbikum Wa-jannatin 'arduhaa ka-'ardis samaaa'i wal-ardi u'iddat lillazeena aamanoo billaahi Wa-Rusulih; zaalika fadlul laahi yu'teehi maien yashaaa'; wal-laahu zul fadlil 'azeem
57:22: Maaa asaaba min museebatin fil ardi Wa-laa feee anfusikum illaa fee kitaabim min qabli an nabra-ahaa; innaa zaalika 'alal laahi yaseer
57:23: Likailaa ta'saw 'alaa maa faatakum Wa-laa tafrahoo bimaaa aataakum; wallaahu laa yuhibbu kulla mukhtaalin fakhoor
57:24: Allazeeena yabkhaloona Wa-yaamuroonan naasa bil-bukhl; Wa-maien yatawalla fa-innal laaha Huwal Ghaniyyul Hameed
57:25: Laqad arsalnaa Rusulanaa bilbaiyinaati Wa-anzalnaa ma'ahumul Kitaaba wal-Meezaana liyaqooman naasu bilqist, Wa-anzalnal hadeeda feehi baasun shadeedunw Wa-manaafi'u linnaasi Wa-liya'lamal laahu many yansuruhoo Wa-Rusulahoo bilghaib; innal laaha Qawiyyun 'Azeez
57:26: Wa-laqad arsalnaa Noohanw Wa-Ibraaheema Wa-ja'alnaa fee zurriyyatihiman nubuwwata wal-Kitaaba faminhum muhtad; Wa-kaseerum minhum faasiqoon
57:27: Summa qaffainaa 'alaa aasaarihim bi-Rusulinaa Wa-qaffainaa bi-'Eesab ni Maryama Wa-aatainaahul Injeela Wa-ja'alnaa fee quloobil lazeenat taba'oohu ra'fatanw Wa-rahmatanw rahbaaniyyatan ibtada'ooha maa katabnaahaa 'alaihim illab tighaaa'a ridwaanil laahi famaa ra'awhaa haqqa ri'aayatihaa; fa-aatainal lazeena aamanoo minhum ajrahum; Wa-kaseerum minhum faasiqoon
57:28: Yaaa-ayyuhal lazeena aamaanut taqul laaha Wa-aaminoo bi-Rasoolihee yu'tikum kiflaini mir rahmatihee Wa-yaj'al lakum nooran tamshoona bihee Wa-yaghfir lakum; wallaahu Ghafoorur Raheem
57:29: Li'alla ya'lama Ahlul kitaabi allaa yaqdiroona 'alaa shai'in min fadlil laahi Wa-annal fadla bi-Yadil laahi yu'teehi maien yashaaa'; wallaahu Zul fadilil 'azeem
58:1: Qad sami'al laahu qawlal latee tujaadiluka fee zawjihaa Wa-tashtakeee ilal laahi wallaahu yasma'u tahaawurakumaa; innal laaha samee'um baseer
58:2: Allazeena yuzaahiroona minkum min nisaaa'ihim maa hunnaa ummahaatihim in ummahaatuhum illal laaa'ee waladnahum; Wa-innaahum la-yaqooloona munkaram minal qawli Wa-zooraa; Wa-innal laaha la'afuwwun ghafoor
58:3: Wallazeena yuzaahiroona min nisaaa'ihim summa ya'oodoona limaa qaaloo fatahreeru raqabatim min qabli aien yatamaaassaa; zaalikum too'azoona bih; wallaahu bimaa ta'maloona khabeer
58:4: Famal lam yajid fa-siyaamu shahraini mutataabi'ayni min qabli aien yatamaaassaa famal lam yastati' fa-it'aamu sitteena miskeena; zaalika litu'minoo billaahi Wa-rasoolih'wa tilka hudoodul laah; Wa-lilkaafireena 'azaabun aleem
58:5: Innal lazeena yuhaaaddoonal laaha Wa-Rasoolahoo kubitoo kamaa kubital lazeena min qablihim; Wa-qad anzalnaaa aayaatim baiyinaat; Wa-lilkaa-fireena 'azaabum muheen
58:6: Yawma yab'asuhumul laahu jamee'an fayunabbi'uhum bimaa 'amiloo; ahsaahul laahu Wa-nasooh; wallaahu 'alaa kulli shai'in shaheed
58:7: Alam tara annal laaha ya'lamu maa fis samaawaati Wa-maa fil ardi maa yakoonu min najwaa salaasatin illaa Huwa raabi'uhum Wa-laa khamsatin illaa huwa saadisuhum Wa-laaa adnaa min zaalika Wa-laaa aksara illaa huwa ma'ahum ayna, maa kaanoo summa yunabbi'uhum bimaa 'amiloo yawmal qiyaamah; innal laaha bikulli shai'in aleem
58:8: Alam tara ilal lazeena nuhoo 'anin najwaa summa ya'oodoona limaa nuhoo 'anhu Wa-yatanaajawna bil-ismi wal'udwaani Wa-ma'siyatir rasooli Wa-izaa jaaa'ooka haiyawka bimaa lam yuhai-yika bihil laahu Wa-yaqooloona fee anfusihim law-laa yu'azzibunal laahu bimaa naqool; hasbuhum jahannnamu yaslawnahaa fabi'sal maseer
58:9: Yaaa-ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo izaa tanaajaytum falaa tatanaajaw bil-ismi wal-'udwaani Wa-ma'siyatir rasooli Wa-tanaajaw bil-birri wattaqwaa wattaqul laahal lazeee ilaihi tuhsharoon
58:10: Innaman najwaa minash shaitaani liyahzunal lazeena aamanoo Wa-laisa bidaaarrihim shai'an illaa bi-iznil laah; Wa-'alal laahi falyatawakkalil mu'minoon
58:11: Yaaa-ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo izaa qeela lakum tafassahoo fil majaalisi fafsahoo yafsahil laahu lakum Wa-izaa qeelan shuzoo fanshuzoo yarfa'il laahul lazeena aamanoo minkum wallazeena ootul 'ilma darajaat; wallaahu bimaa ta'maloona khabeer
58:12: Yaaa-ayyuhal lazeena aamanooo izaa naajitumur Rasoola faqaddimoo baina yadai najwaakum sadaqah; zaalika khairul lakum Wa-athar; fa-il lam tajidoo fa-innal laaha ghafoorur Raheem
58:13: A-ashfaqtum an tuqaddimoo baina yadai najwaakum sadaqaat; fa-iz lam taf'aloo Wa-taabal laahu 'alaikum fa-aqeemus Salaata Wa-aatuz Zakaata Wa-atee'ul laaha Wa-rasoolah; wallaahu khabeerum bimaa ta'maloon
58:14: Alam tara ilal lazeena tawallaw qawman ghadibal laahu 'alaihim maa hum minkum Wa-laa minhum Wa-yahlifoona 'alal kazibi Wa-hum ya'lamoon
58:15: A'addal laahu lahum 'azaaban shadeedan innahum saaa'a maa kaanoo ya'maloon
58:16: Ittakhazooo aymaanahum junnatan fasaddoo 'an sabeelil laahi falahum 'azaabum muheen
58:17: Lan tughniya 'anhum amwaaluhum Wa-laaa awladuhum minal laahi shai'aa; ulaaa-'ika As-haabun Naari hum feehaa khaalidoon
58:18: Yawma yab'asuhumul laahu jamee'an fa-yahlifoona lahoo kamaa yahlifoona lakum Wa-yahsaboona annahum 'alaa shai'; alaaa innahum humul kaaziboon
58:19: Istahwaza 'alaihimush shaitaanu fa-ansaahum zikral laah; ulaaa'ika hizbush shaitaaan; alaaa innaa hizbash shaitaani humul khaasiroon
58:20: Innal lazeena yuhaaaddoonal laaha Wa-Rasoolahooo ulaaa'ika fil azalleen
58:21: Katabal laahu la-aghlibanna ana Wa-Rusulee; innal laaha qawiyyun 'Azeez
58:22: Laa tajidu qawmaien yu'minoona billaahi wal-yawmil aakhiri yuwaaaddoona man haaaddal laaha Wa-Rasoolahoo Wa-law kaanooo aabaaa'ahum aw abnaaa'ahum aw ikhwaa-nahum aw 'asheeratahum; ulaaa'ika kataba fee quloobihi-mul eemaana Wa-ayyadahum biroohim minhu Wa-yudkhilu-hum jannatin tajree min tahtihal anhaaru khaalideena feehaa; radiyal laahu 'anhum Wa-radoo 'anhu; ulaaa-'ika hizbul laah; alaaa inna hizbal laahi humul muflihoon
59:1: Sabbaha lillaahi maa fis samaawaati Wa-maa fil ardi Wa-Huwal 'Azeezul Hakeem
59:2: Huwal lazeee akharajal lazeena kafaroo min ahlil kitaabi min diyaarihim li-awwalil Hashr; maa zanantum aien yakhrujoo Wa-zannooo annahum maa-ni'atuhum husoonuhum minal laahi faataahumul laahu min haisu lam yahtasiboo Wa-qazafa fee quloobihimur ru'ba yukhriboona bu-yootahum bi-aydeehim Wa-aydil mu'mineena fa'tabiroo yaaa-ulil absaar
59:3: Wa-law-laaa an katabal laahu 'alaihimul jalaaa'a la'azzabahum fid dunyaa Wa-lahum fil Aakhirati 'azaabun Naar
59:4: Zaalika bi-annahum shaaqqul laaha Wa-Rasoolahoo Wa-maien yushaaaqqil laaha fa-innal laaha shadeedul 'iqaab
59:5: Maa qata'tum mil leenatin aw taraktumoohaa qaaa'imatan'alaaa usoolihaa fabi iznil laahi Wa-liyukhziyal faasiqeen
59:6: Wa-maaa afaaa'al laahu 'alaaa Rasoolihee minhum famaaa awjaftum 'alaihi min khailiinw Wa-laa rikaabinw Wa-laakinnal laaha yusallitu Rusulahoo 'alaa maien yashaaa'; wallaahu 'alaa kulli shai'in Qadeer
59:7: Maaa afaaa'al laahu 'alaa Rasoolihee min ahlil quraa falillaahi Wa-lir-Rasooli Wa-lizil qurbaa wal-yataamaa walmasaakeeni wabnis sabeeli kai laa yakoona doolatam bainal aghniyaaa'i minkum; Wa-maaa aataakumur Rasoolu fakhuzoohu Wa-maa nahaakum 'anhu fantahoo; wattaqul laah(a) innal laaha shadeedul 'iqaab
59:8: Lilfuqaraaa'il Muhaaji-reenal lazeena ukhrijoo min diyaarihim Wa-amwaalihim yabtaghoona fadlam minal laahi Wa-ridwaananw Wa-yansuroonal laaha Wa-Rasoolah; ulaaa'ika humus saadiqoon
59:9: Wallazeena tabawwa'ud daara wal-eemaana min qablihim yuhibboona man haajara ilaihim Wa-laa yajidoona fee sudoorihim haajatam mimmaa ootoo Wa-yu'siroona 'alaa anfusihim Wa-law kaana bihim khasaasah; Wa-maien yooqa shuhha nafsihee fa-ulaaa'ika humul muflihoon
59:10: Wallazeena jaaa'oo min ba'dihim yaqooloona Rabbanagh fir lanaa Wa-li-ikhwaani-nal lazeena sabqoonaa bil-eemaani Wa-laa taj'al fee quloobinaa ghillalil lazeena aamanoo rabbannaaa innaka Ra'oofur Raheem
59:11: Alam tara ilal lazeena naafaqoo yaqooloona li-ikhwaanihimul lazeena kafaroo min ahlil kitaabi la'in ukhrijtum lanakhrujanna ma'akum Wa-laa nutee'u feekum ahadan abadanw wa-in qootiltum lanansuran-nakum wallaahu yashhadu innahum lakaaziboon
59:12: La'in ukhrijoo laa yakhrujoona ma'ahum Wa-la'in qootiloo laa yansuroonahum Wa-la'in nasaroohum la-yuwallunnal adbaara summa laa yunsaroon
59:13: La-antum ashaddu rahbatan fee sudoorihim minal laah; zaalika bi-annahum qawmul laa yafqahoon
59:14: Laa yuqaatiloonakum jamee'an illaa fee quram muhas-sanatin aw minw waraaa'i judur; baasuhum bainahum shadeed; tahsabuhum jamee'anw-wa quloobuhum shatta; zaalika biannahum qawmul laa ya'qiloon
59:15: Kamasalil lazeena min qablihim qareeban zaaqoo wabaala amrihim Wa-lahum 'azaabun aleem
59:16: Kamasalish shaitaani izqaala lil insaanik fur falammaa kafara qaala innee bareee'um minka inneee akhaaful laaha rabbal 'aalameen
59:17: Fakaana 'aaqibatahumaaa annahumaa fin naari khaalidaini feehaa; Wa-zaalika jazaaa'uz zaalimeen
59:18: Yaaa ayyuhal lazeena aamanut taqul-laaha; waltanzur nafsum maa qaddamat lighadiw wattaqual laah; innal laaha khabeerum bimaa ta'maloon
59:19: Wa-laa takoonoo kallazeena nasul laaha fa-ansaahum anfusahum; ulaaa'ika humul faasiqoon
59:20: Laa yastaweee as-haabun naari Wa-ashaabul jannah; as-haabul jannati humul faaa'izoon
59:21: Law anzalnaa haazal quraana 'alaa jabilil lara-aytahoo khaashi'am muta-saddi'am min khashiyatil laah; Wa-tilkal amsaalu nadribuhaa linnaasi la'allahum yatafakkaroon
59:22: Huwal laahul lazee laaa Ilaaha illaa Huwa 'Aalimul Ghaibi wash-shahaada; Huwar Rahmaanur Raheem
59:23: Huwal laahul lazee laaa Ilaaha illaa Huwal Malikul Quddoosus Salaamul Muminul Muhaiminul 'aAzeezul Jabbaarul Mutakabbir; Subhaanal laahi 'Ammaa yushrikoon
59:24: Huwal Laahul Khaaliqul Baari-'ul Musawwir; lahul Asmaaa'ul Husnaa; yusabbihu lahoo maa fis samaawaati wal-ardi Wa-Huwal 'Azeezul Hakeem
60:1: Yaa-ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo laa tattakhizoo 'aduwwee Wa-'aduwaakum awliyaaa'a tulqoona ilaihim bilmawaddati Wa-qad kafaroo bima jaaa'akum minal haqq, yukhrijoonar Rasoola Wa-iyyaakum an tu'minoo billaahi rabbikum in kuntum kharajtum jihaadan fee sabeelee wabtighaaa'a mardaatee; tusirroona ilaihim bilma-waddati Wa-ana a'alamu bimaaa akhfaitum Wa-maaa a'lantum; Wa-many yaf'alhu minkum faqad dalla sawaaa'as sabeel
60:2: Ien yasqafookum yakoonoo lakum a'daaa'anw Wa-yabsutooo ilaikum aydiyahum Wa-alsinatahum bissooo'i Wa-waddoo law takfuroon
60:3: Lan tanfa'akum arhaamukum Wa-laaa awlaadukum; yawmal qiyaamati yafsilu bainakum; wallaahu bimaa ta'maloon baseer
60:4: Qad kaanat lakum uswatun hasanatun feee Ibraaheema wallazeena ma'ahoo iz qaaloo liqawmihim innaa bura-'aaa'u minkum Wa-mimmaa ta'budoona min doonil laahi kafarnaa bikum Wa-badaa bainanaa Wa-bainakumul 'adaawatu wal-baghdaaa'u abadan hattaa tu'minoo billaahi wahdahooo illaa qawla Ibraheema li-abeehi la-astaghfiranna laka Wa-maaa amliku laka minal laahi min shai; rabbanaa 'alaika tawakkalnaa Wa-ilaika anabnaa Wa-ilaikal maseer
60:5: Rabbana laa taj'alnaa fitnatal lillazeena kafaroo waghfir lanaa rabbanaa innaka antal azeezul hakeem
60:6: Laqad kaana lakum feehim uswatunhasanatul liman kaana yarjul laaha wal yawmal aakhir; Wa-many yatawalla fa-innal laaha huwal ghaniyyul hameed
60:7: Asal laahu any yaj'ala bainakum Wa-bainal lazeena 'aadaitum minhum mawaddah; wallahu qadeer; wallahu ghafoorur raheem
60:8: Laa yanhaakumul laahu 'anil lazeena lam yuqaatilookum fid deeni Wa-lam yukhrijookum min diyaarikum an tabarroohum Wa-tuqsitooo ilaihim; innal laaha yuhibbul muqsiteen
60:9: Innamaa yanhaakumul laahu 'anil lazeena qaatalookum fid deeni Wa-akhrajookum min diyaarikum Wa-zaaharoo 'alaa ikhraajikum an tawallawhum; Wa-many yatawallahum fa-ulaaa'ika humuz zaalimoon
60:10: Yaaa-ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo izaa jaaa'akumul mu'minaatu muhaajiraatin famtahinoo-hunn; Allaahu a'lamu bi-eemaani-hinn; fa-in 'alimtumoo-hunna mu'minaatin falaa tarji'oo-hunna ilal kuffaar; laa hunna hillul lahum Wa-laa hum yahilloona lahunna Wa-aatoohum maa anfaqoo Wa-laa junaaha 'alaikum an tankihoohunna izaaa aataitumoohunna ujoorahunn; Wa-laa tumsikoo bi-'isamil kawaafir; was'aloo maaa anfaqtum walyas'aloo maaa anfaqoo; zaalikum hukmul laahi yahkumu bainakum; wallaahu 'aleemun hakeem
60:11: Wa-in faatakum shai'un min azwaajikum ilal kuffaari fa-'aaqabtum fa-aatul lazeena zahabat azwaajuhum misla maaa anfaqoo; wattaqul laahal lazeee antum bihee mu'minoon
60:12: Yaaa-ayyuhan nabbiyyu izaa jaaa'akal mu'minaatu yubaayigh'naka 'alaaa al laa yushrikna billaahi shai-'anw Wa-laa yasriqna Wa-laa yazneena Wa-laa yaqtulna awlaadahunna Wa-laa ya'teena bibuhtaanien yaftaree-nahoo baina aydeehinna Wa-arjulihinna Wa-laa ya'seenaka fee ma'roofin fa-baayigh'-hunna wastaghfir lahunnalla hunn allaah; innallaaha ghafoorur raheem
60:13: Yaaa-ayyuhal lazeena amanoo laa tatawallaw qawman ghadibal laahu 'alaihim qad ya'isoo minal aakhirati kamaa ya'isal kuffaaru min as-haabil quboor
61:1: Sabbaha lillaahi maa fis amaawaati Wa-maa fil ardi Wa-huwal 'Azeezul Hakeem
61:2: Yaa-ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo lima taqooloona maa laa taf'aloon
61:3: Kabura maqtan 'indal laahi an taqooloo maa laa taf'aloon
61:4: Innal laaha yuhibbul lazeena yuqaatiloona fee sabeelihee saffan ka-annahum bunyaanum marsoos
61:5: Wa-iz qaala Moosa liqawmihee yaa-qawmi lima tu'zoonanee Wa-qat ta'lamoona annee Rasoolul laahi ilaikum falammaa zaaghooo azaaghal laahu quloobahum; wallaahu laa yahdil qawmal faasiqeen
61:6: Wa-iz qaala 'Eesab nu Maryama yaa-Banee Israaa'eela innee Rasoolul laahi ilaikum musaddiqal limaa baina yadayya minat Tawraati Wa-mubashshiram bi-Rasooliny yaatee mim ba'dis muhooo Ahmad; falammaa jaaa'ahum bil-baiyinaati qaaloo haazaa sihrum mubeen
61:7: Wa-man azlamu mimma-nif taraa 'alal laahil kaziba Wa-huwa yad'aaa ilal Islaam; wallaahu laa yahdil qawmaz zaalimeen
61:8: Yureedoona liyutfi'oo nooral laahi bi-afwaahihim wallaahu mutimmu noorihee Wa-law karihal kaafiroon
61:9: Huwal lazee arsala Rasoolahoo bilhudaa Wa-deenil haqqi liyuzhirahoo 'alad deeni kullihee Wa-law karihal mushrikoon
61:10: Yaaa-ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo hal adullukum 'alaa tijaaratin tunjeekum min 'azaabin aleem
61:11: Tu'minoona billaahi Wa-Rasoolihee Wa-tujaahidoona fee sabeelil laahi bi-amwaalikum Wa-anfusikum; zaalikum khairul lakum in kuntum ta'lamoon
61:12: Yaghfir lakum zunoobakum Wa-yudkhilkum Jannaatin tajree min tahtihal anhaaru Wa-masaakina taiyibatan fee Jannaati 'Adn; zaalikal fawzul 'Azeem
61:13: Wa-ukhraa tuhibboonahaa nasrum minal laahi Wa-fat-hun qareeb; Wa-bashshiril mu-'mineen
61:14: Yaaa-ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo koonooo ansaaral laahi kamaa qaala 'Eesab nu Maryama lil-Hawaariyyeena man ansaareee ilal laah; qaalal Hawaariyyoona nahnu ansaa-rul laahi fa-aamanat taaa'ifatum mim Bannee Israaa'eela Wa-kafarat taaa'ifatun fa-ayyadnal lazeena aamanoo 'alaa 'aduwwihim fa-asbahoo zaahireen
62:1: Yusabbihu lilaahi maa fis samaawaati Wa-maa fil ardil Malikil Quddoosil 'Azeezil Hakeem
62:2: Huwal lazee ba'asa fil ummiyyeena Rasoolam min-hum yatloo 'alaihim aayaatihee Wa-yuzakkeehim Wa-yu'allimuhumul Kitaaba wal-Hikmata Wa-in kaanoo min qablu lafee dalaalim mubeen
62:3: Wa-aakhareena minhum lammaa yalhaqoo bihim Wa-huwal 'azeezul hakeem
62:4: Zaalika fadlul laahi yu'teehi many yashaaa; wallaahu zul fadlil 'azeem
62:5: Masalul lazeena hum-milut tawraata summa lam yahmiloonhaa kamasalil himaari yah-milu asfaaraa; bi'sa masalul qawmil lazeena kaazzaboo bi-aayaatil laah; wallaahu laa yahdil qawmaz zaalimeen
62:6: Qul yaaa-ayyuhal lazeena haadoo in za'amtum annakum awliyaaa'u lilaahi min doonin naasi fatamannawul mawta in kuntum saadiqeen
62:7: Wa-laa yatamannaw-nahooo abadam bimaa qaddamat aydeehim; wallaahu 'aleemum biz-zaalimeen
62:8: Qul innal mawtal lazee tafirroona minhu fa-innahoo mulaaqeekum summa turaddoona ilaa 'Aalimil Ghaibi wash-shahaadati fa-yunabbi'ukum bimaa kuntum ta'maloon
62:9: Yaaa-ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo izaa noodiya lis-Salaati miny yawmil Jumu'ati fas'aw ilaa zikril laahi Wa-zarul bai'; zaalikum khayrul lakum in kuntum ta'lamoon
62:10: Fa-izaa qudiyatis Salaatu fantashiroo fil ardi wabtaghoo min fadlil laahi wazkurul laaha kaseeral la'allakum tuflihoon
62:11: Wa-izaa ra'aw tijaaratan aw lahwanin faddooo ilaihaa Wa-tarakooka qaaa'imaa; qul maa 'indal laahi khairum minal lahwi Wa-minat tijaarah; wallaahu khayrur raaziqeen
63:1: Izaa jaaa'akal munaafiqoona qaaloo nashhadu innaka la-rasoolul laah; wallaahu ya'lamu innaka la-rasooluhoo wallaahu yashhadu innal munaafiqeena lakaaziboon
63:2: Ittakhazoo aymaanahum junnatan fasaddoo 'an sabeelil laah; innahum saaa'a maa kaanoo ya'maloon
63:3: Zaalika bi-annahum aamanoo summa kafaroo fatubi'a 'alaa quloobihim fahum laa yafqahoon
63:4: Wa-izaa ra-aytahum tu'jibuka ajsaamuhum Wa-iny yaqooloo tasma' liqawlihim kaannahum khushubum musannadah; yahsaboona kulla saihatin 'alaihim; humul 'aduwwu fahzarhum; qaatalahumul laahu annaa yu'fakoon
63:5: Wa-izaa qeela lahum ta'aalaw yastaghfir lakum rasoolul laahi lawwaw ru'oo-sahum Wa-ra-aytahum yasuddoona Wa-hum mustakbiroon
63:6: Sawaaa'un 'alaihim as-taghfarta lahum am lam tastaghfir lahum lany yaghfiral laahu lahum; innal laaha laa yahdil qawmal faasiqeen
63:7: Humul lazeena yaqooloona laa tunfiqoo 'alaa man inda Rasoolil laahi hatta yanfaddoo; Wa-lillaahi khazaaa'inus samaawaati wal-ardi Wa-laakinnal munaafiqeena la yafqahoon
63:8: Yaqooloona la'ir raja'naaa ilal madeenati la-yukhrijanal a'azzu minhal azall; Wa-lillaahil 'izzatu Wa-li-Rasoolihee Wa-lilmu'mineena Wa-laakinnal munaafiqeena laa ya'lamoon
63:9: Yaaa-ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo la tulhikum amwaalukum Wa-laa awlaadukum 'anzik ril laah; Wa-mai yaf'al zaalika fa-ulaaa'ika humul khaasiroon
63:10: Wa-anifqoo mim maa razaqnaakum min qabli any ya'tiya ahadakumul mawtu fa-yaqoola rabbi law-laaa akhkhartaneee ilaaa ajalin qareebin fa-assaddaqa Wa-akum minas saaliheen
63:11: Wa-lany yu-'akhkhiral laahu nafsan izaa jaaa'a ajaluhaa; wallaahu khabeerum bimaa ta'maloon
64:1: Yusabbihu lillaahi maa fis samaawaati Wa-maa fil ardi lahul mulku Wa-lahul hamd, Wa-Huwa 'alaa kulli shai'in Qadeer
64:2: Huwal lazee khalaqakum faminkum kaafirunw Wa-min-kum mu'min; wallaahu bimaa ta'maloona Baseer
64:3: Khalaqas samaawaati wal-arda bilhaqqi Wa-sawwarakum fa-ahsana suwarakum Wa-ilaihil maseer
64:4: Ya'lamu maa fis samaawaati wal-ardi Wa-ya'lamu maa tusirroona Wa-maa tu'linoon; wallaahu 'Aleemum bizaatis sudoor
64:5: Alam ya'tikum naba'ul lazeena kafaroo min qablu fazaaqoo wabaala amrihim Wa-lahum 'azaabun aleem
64:6: Zaalika bi-annahoo kaanat ta'teehim Rusuluhum bilbaiyinaati faqaaloo a-basharuny yahdoonanaa fakafaroo Wa-tawallaw; wastaghnal laah; wallaahu ghaniyyun hameed
64:7: Za'amal lazeena kafarooo al lany yub'asoo; qul balaa Wa-rabbee latub'asunna summa latunabba'unna bimaa 'amiltum; Wa-zaalika 'alal laahi yaseer
64:8: Fa-aaminoo billaahi Wa-rasoolihee wannooril lazeee anzalnaa; wallaahu bima ta'maloona khabeer
64:9: Yawma yajma'ukum li-yawmil jam'i zaalika yawmut taghaabun; Wa-many yumim billaahi Wa-ya'mal saalihany yukaffir 'anhu sayyi-aatihee Wa-yudkhilhu jannaatin tajree min tahtihal anhaaru khaalideena feehaaa abadaa; zaalikal fawzul 'azeem
64:10: Wallazeena kafaroo Wa-kazzaboo bi-aayaaatinaaa ulaaa'ika ashaabun naari khaalideena feehaa Wa-bi'sal maseer
64:11: Maaa asaaba mim musee-batin illaa bi-iznil laah; Wa-many yu'mim billaahi yahdi qalbah; wallaahu bikulli shai'in Aleem
64:12: Wa-atee'ul laaha Wa-atee'ur Rasool; fa-in tawallaitum fa-innamaa 'alaa Rasoolinal balaaghul mubeen
64:13: Allaahu laaa ilaaha illaa Hoo; Wa-'alal laahi falyata-wakkalil mu'minoon
64:14: Yaaa-ayyuhal lazeena aamanooo inna min azwaaji-kum Wa-awlaadikum 'aduwwal lakum fahzaroohum; Wa-in ta'foo Wa-tasfahoo Wa-taghfiroo fa-innal laaha ghafoorur Raheem
64:15: Innamaa amwaalukum Wa-awlaadukum fitnah; wallaahu 'indahooo ajrun 'azeem
64:16: Fattaqul laaha mas tata'tum wasma'oo Wa-atee'oo Wa-anfiqoo khairal li-anfusikum; Wa-many yooqa shuh-ha nafsihee fa-ulaaa'ika humul muflihoon
64:17: In tuqridul laaha qardan hasanany yudaaifhu lakum Wa-yaghfir lakum; wallaahu Shakoorun Haleem
65:1: Yaaa-ayyuhan nabiyyu izaa tallaqtummun nisaaa'a fatalliqoohunna li'iddatihinna Wa-ahsul iddata wattaqul laaha rabbakum; laa tukhri-joohunna mim bu-yootihinna Wa-laa yakhrujna illaaa any ya'teema bifaahishatim mubaiyinah; Wa-tilka hudoodul laah; Wa-many yata'adda hudoodal laahi faqad zalama nafsah; laa tadree la'allal laaha yuhdisu ba'da zaalika amraa
65:2: Fa-izaa balaghna ajalahunna fa-amsikoohunna bima'roofin aw faariqoohunna bima'roofinw Wa-ashhidoo zawai 'adlim minkum Wa-aqeemush shahaadata lillaah; zaalikum yoo'azu bihee man kaana yu'minu billaahi wal-yawmil aakhir; Wa-many yattaqil laaha yaj'al lahoo makhrajaa
65:3: Wa-yarzuqhu min haisu laa yahtasib; Wa-many yatawakkal 'alal laahi fahuwa husbuh; innal laaha baalighu amrih; qad ja'alal laahu likulli shai'in qadraa
65:4: Wallaaa'ee ya'isna minal maheedi min nisaaa'ikum inir tabtum fa'iddatuhunna salaasatu ashhurinw wallaaa'ee lam yahidn; Wa-ulaatul ahmaali ajaluhunna any yada'na hamlahun; Wa-many yattaqil laaha yaj'al lahoo min amrihee yusraa
65:5: Zaalika amrul laahi anzalahoo ilaikum; Wa-many yattaqil laaha yukaffir 'anhu saiyi-aatihee Wa-yu'zim lahoo ajraa
65:6: Askinoohunna min haisu sakantum minw wujdikum Wa-laa tudaaarroohunna litudaiyiqoo 'alaihinn; Wa-in kunna ulaati hamlin fa-anfiqoo 'alaihinna hattaa yada'na hamlahunn; fain arda'na lakum fa-aatoo-hunna ujoorahunn; wa'tamiroo bainakum bima'roofinw Wa-in ta'aasartum fasaturdi'u lahooo ukhraa
65:7: Liyunfiq zoo sa'atim min sa'atih; Wa-man qudira 'alaihi rizquhoo falyunfiq mimmaaa aataahul laah; laa yukalliful laahu nafsan illaa maaa aataahaa; sa-yaj'alul laahu ba'da 'usriny yusraa
65:8: Wa-ka-ayyim min qaryatin 'atat 'an amri Rabbihaa Wa-Rusulihee fahaasabnaahaa hisaaban shadeedanw Wa-'azzabnaahaa 'azaaban nukraa
65:9: Fazaaqat wabbala amrihaa Wa-kaana 'aaqibatu amrihaa khusraa
65:10: A'addal laahu lahum 'azaaban shadeedan fattaqul laaha yaaa-ulil albaab, allazeena aammanoo; qad anzalal laahu ilaikum zikraa
65:11: Rasoolany yatloo 'alaikum aayaatil laahi mubaiyinaatil liyukhrijal lazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaati minaz zulumaati ilan noor; Wa-many yu'min billaahi Wa-ya'mal saalihany yudkhilhu jannaatin tajree min tahtihal anhaaru khaalideena feehaa abadaa qad ahsanal laahu lahoo rizqaa
65:12: Allaahul lazee khalaq Sab'a Samaawaatinw Wa-minal ardi mislahunna yatanazzalul amru bainahunna lita'lamooo annal laaha 'alaa kulli shai'in Qadeerunw Wa-annal laaha qad ahaata bikulli shai'in 'ilmaa
66:1: Yaaa-ayyuhan nabiyyu lima tuharrimu maaa ahallal laahu laka tabtaghee mardaata azwaajik; wallaahu ghafoorur raheem
66:2: Qad faradal laahu lakum tahillata aymaanikum; wallaahu mawlaakum Wa-huwal 'aleemul hakeem
66:3: Wa-iz asarran nabiyyu ilaa ba'di azwaajihee hadeesan falammaa nabba-at bihee Wa-azharahul laahu 'alaihi 'arrafa ba'dahoo Wa-a'rada 'am ba'din falammaa nabba-ahaa bihee qaalat man amba-aka haaza qaala nabba-aniyal 'aleemul khabeer
66:4: In tatoobaaa ilal laahi faqad saghat quloobukumaa Wa-in tazaaharaa 'alaihi fa-innal laaha huwa mawlaahu Wa-jibreelu Wa-saalihul mu'mineen; wal-malaaa'ikatu ba'da zaalika zaheer
66:5: Asaa rabbuhooo in tallaqakunna any yubdilahooo azwaajan khairam minkunna muslimaatim mu'minaatin qaanitaatin taaa'ibaatin 'aabidaatin saaa'ihaatin saiyibaatinw Wa-abkaaraa
66:6: Yaaa-ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo qooo anfusakum Wa-ahleekum naaranw waqoodu-han naasu wal-hijaaratu 'alaihaa malaaa'ikatun ghilaazun shidaadul laa ya'soonal laaha maa amarahum Wa-yaf'aloona maa yu'maroon
66:7: Yaaa-ayyuhal lazeena kafaroo la ta'tazirul yawma innamaa tujzawna maa kuntum ta'maloon
66:8: Yaaa-ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo toobooo ilal laahi tawbatan nasoohan 'asaa rabbukum any yukaffira 'ankum sayyi-aatikum Wa-yudkhilakum jannaatin tajree min tahtihal anhaaru yawma laa yukhzil laahun nabiyya wallazeena aamanoo ma'ahoo nooruhum yas'aa baina aydeehim Wa-bi-aymaanihim yaqooloona rabbanaaa atmim lanaa nooranaa waghfir lana innaka 'alaa kulli shai'in qadeer
66:9: Yaaa-ayyuhan nabiyyu jaahidil kuffaara walmunaa-fiqeena waghluz 'alaihim; Wa-ma'waahum jahannamu Wa-bi'sal maseer
66:10: Darabal laahu masalal lillazeena kafarum ra-ata Noohinw wamra-ata Loot, kaanataa tahta 'abdaini min 'ibaadinaa saalihaini fakhaanataahumaa falam yughniyaa 'anhumaa minal laahi shai-anw wa-qeelad khulan naara ma'ad Daakhileen
66:11: Wa-darabal laahu masalal lil-lezeena aamanum ra-ata Fir'awn; iz qaalat rab-bib ni lee 'indaka baitan fil jannati Wa-najjinee min Fir'awna Wa-'amalihee Wa-najjinee minal qawmiz zaalimeen
66:12: Wa-Maryamab nata 'Imraanal lateee ahsanat farjahaa fanafakhnaa feehee mir roohinaa Wa-saddaqat bi-kalimaati Rabhihaa Wa-Kutubihee wakaanati minal qaaniteen
67:1: Tabaarakal lazee biyadihil mulku Wa-huwa 'alaa kulli shai-in qadeer
67:2: Allazee khalaqal mawta walhayaata liyabluwakum ayyukum ahsanu 'amalaa; Wa-huwal 'azeezul ghafoor
67:3: Allazee khalaqa sab'a samaawaatin tibaaqaa maa taraa fee khalqir rahmaani min tafaawut farji'il basara hal taraa min futoor
67:4: Summar ji'il basara karrataini yanqalib ilaikal basaru khaasi'anw Wa-huwa haseer
67:5: Wa-laqad zaiyannas samaaa'ad dunyaa bimasaa-beeha Wa-ja'alnaahaa rujoomal lish-shayaateeni Wa-a'tadnaa lahum 'azaabas sa'eer
67:6: Wa-lillazeena kafaroo bi-rabbihim 'azaabu jahannama Wa-bi'sal maseer
67:7: Izaaa ulqoo feehaa sami'oo lahaa shaheeqanw Wa-hiya tafoor
67:8: Takaadu tamayyazu minal ghaizz kullamaaa ulqiya feehaa fawjun sa-alahum khazanatuhaaa alam ya'tikum nazeer
67:9: Qaaloo balaa qad jaaa'anaa nazeerun fakazzabnaa Wa-qulnaa maa nazzalal laahu min shai-in in antum illaa fee dalaalin kabeer
67:10: Wa-qaaloo law kunnaa nasma'u aw na'qilu maa kunnaa feee as-haabis sa'eer
67:12: Innal lazeena yakhshawna rabbahum bilghaibi lahum maghfiratunw Wa-ajrun kabeer
67:13: Wa-asirroo qawlakum awij haroo bih; innahoo 'aleemum bizaatis sudoor
67:14: Alaa ya'lamu man khalaqa Wa-huwal lateeful khabeer
67:15: Huwal lazee ja'ala lakumul arda zaloolan famshoo fee manaakibihaa Wa-kuloo mir rizqih; Wa-ilaihin nushoor
67:16: A-amintum man fis samaaa'i ai yakhsifa bi-kumul arda fa-izaa hiya tamoor
67:17: Am amintum man fis samaaa'i ai yursila 'alaikum haasiba fasata'lamoona kaifa nazeer
67:18: Wa-laqad kazzabal lazeena min qablihim fakaifa kaana nakeer
67:19: Awalam yaraw ilat tairi fawqahum saaaffaatinw Wa-yaqbidn; maa yumsikuhunna illaar rahmaan; innahoo bikulli shai-im baseer
67:20: Amman haazal lazee huwa jundul lakum yansurukum min doonir rahmaan; inil kaafiroona illaa fee ghuroor
67:21: Amman haazal lazee yarzuqukum in amsaka rizqah; bal lajjoo fee 'utuwwinw Wa-nufoor
67:22: Afamai yamshee mukibban 'alaa wajhihee ahdaaa ammany yamshee sawiyyan 'alaa siratim mustaqeem
67:23: Qul huwal lazee ansha-akum Wa-ja'ala lakumus sam'a wal-absaara wal-af'idata qaleelam maa tashkuroon
67:24: Qul huwal lazee zara-akum fil ardi Wa-ilaihi tuhsharoon
67:25: Wa-yaqooloona mataa haazal wa'du in kuntum saadiqeen
67:26: Qul innamal 'ilmu 'indal laahi Wa-innamaaa ana nazeerum mubeen
67:27: Falaammaa ra-awhu zulfatan seee'at wujoohul lazeena kafaroo Wa-qeela haazal lazee kuntum bihee tadda'oon
67:28: Qul ara'aytum in ahlaka-niyal laahu Wa-mam ma'iya aw rahimanaa famai yujeerul kaafireena min 'azaabin aleem
67:29: Qul huwar rahmaanu aamannaa bihee Wa-'alaihi tawakkalnaa fasata'lamoona man huwa fee dalaalim mubeen
67:30: Qul ara'aytum in asbaha maaa'ukum ghawran famai ya'teekum bimaaa'im ma'een
68:7: Innaa Rabbaka Huwa a'lamu biman dalla 'an sabeelihee Wa-Huwa a'lamu bilmuhtadeen
68:15: Izaa tutlaa 'alaihi aayaatunaa qaala asaateerul awwaleen
68:17: Innaa balawnaahum kamaa balawnaaa As-haabal jannati iz 'aqsamoo la-yasri-munnahaa musbiheen
68:19: Fataafa 'alaihaa taaa'i-fum mir rabbika Wa-hum naaa'imoon
68:22: Anigh doo 'alaa harsikum in kuntum saarimeen
68:28: Qaala awsatuhum alam aqul lakum law-laa tusabbihoon
68:29: Qaaloo subhaana rabbinaaa innaa kunnaa zaalimeen
68:32: Asaa rabbunaaa any yubdilanaa khairam minhaaa innaaa ilaa rabbinaa raaghiboon
68:33: Kazaalikal azaab, Wa-la'azaabul aakhirati akbar; law kaanoo ya'lamoon
68:39: Am lakum aymaanun 'alainaa baalighatun ilaa yawmil qiyaamati inna lakum lamaa tahkumoon
68:41: Am lahum shurakaaa'u fal-ya'too bishurakaaa-'ihim in kaanoo saadiqeen
68:42: Yawma yukshafu 'am saaqinw Wa-yud'awna ilas sujoodi falaa yastatee'oon
68:43: Khaashi'atan absaaruhum tarhaquhum zillatunw Wa-qad kaanoo yud'awna ilas sujoodi Wa-hum saalimoon
68:44: Fazarnee Wa-many yukazzibu bihaazal hadeesi sanastad-rijuhum min haisu laa ya'lamoon
68:46: Am tas'aluhum ajran fahum min maghramin musqaloon
68:48: Fasbir lihukmi rabbika Wa-laa takun kasaahibil hoot; iz naadaa Wa-huwa makzoom
68:49: Law-laaa an tadaara-kahoo ni'matum mir rabbihee lanubiza bil'araaa'i Wa-huwa mazmoom
68:51: Wa-iny yakaadul lazeena kafaroo la-yuzliqoonaka biabsaarihim lammaa sami'uz Zikra Wa-yaqooloona innahoo lamajnoon
69:7: Sakkhara-haa 'alaihim sab'a la-yaalinw Wa-samaaniyata ayyaamin husooman fataral qawma feehaa sar'aa ka-annahum a'jaazu nakhlin khaawiyah
69:9: Wa-jaaa'a Firawnu Wa-man qablahoo wal-mu'tafikaatu bil-khaati'ah
69:10: Fa'asaw Rasoola Rabbihim fa-akhazahum akhzatar raabiyah
69:11: Innaa lammaa taghal maaa'u hamalnaakum fil jaariyah
69:12: Li-naj'alahaa lakum tazki-ratanw-wa ta'iyahaa uzununw waa'iyah
69:13: Fa-izaa nufikha fis soori nafkhatunw waahidah
69:14: Wa-humilatil ardu wal-jibaalu fadukkataa dakkatanw waahidah
69:17: Wal-malaku 'alaaa arjaaa'ihaa; Wa-yahmilu 'Arsha Rabbika fawqahum yawma'izin samaaniyah
69:18: Yawma'izin tu'radoona laa takhfaa min-kum khaafiyah
69:19: Fa-ammaa man ootiya kitaabahoo biyameenihee fa-yaqoolu haaa'umuq ra'oo kitaabiyah
69:24: Kuloo washraboo haneee'am bimaaa aslaftum fil ayyaamil khaliyah
69:25: Wa-ammaa man ootiya kitaabahoo bishimaalihee fa-yaqoolu yaalaitanee lam oota kitaaabiyah
69:32: Summa fee silsilatin zar'uhaa sab'oona ziraa'an faslukooh
69:41: Wa-maa huwa biqawli shaa'ir; qaleelan maa tu'minoon
69:42: Wa-laa biqawli kaahin; qaleelan maa tazakkaroon
70:4: Ta'rujul malaaa'ikatu war-Roohu ilaihi fee yawmin kaana miqdaaruhoo khamseena alfa sanah
70:11: Yubassaroonahum; ya-waddul mujrimu law yaftadee min 'azaabi yawma'izim bibaneeh
70:14: Wa-man fil ardi jamee'an summa yunjeeh
70:30: Illaa 'alaaa azwaajihim aw maa malakat aymaanuhum fa-innahum ghairu maloomeen
70:31: Famanib taghaa waraaa'a zaalika fa-ulaaa'ika humul 'aadoon
70:38: Ayatma'u kullum ri'im minhum any yudkhala jannata Na'eem
70:40: Falaaa uqsimu bi-Rabbil mashaariqi wal-maghaaribi innaa laqaadiroon
70:41: Alaaa an nubaddila khairan minhum Wa-maa nahnu bi-masbooqeen
70:42: Fazarhum yakhoodoo Wa-yal'aboo hattaa yulaaqoo yawma-humul lazee yoo'adoon
70:43: Yawma yakhrujoona minal ajdaasi siraa'an ka-anna-hum ilaa nusubiny yoofidoon
70:44: Khaashi'atan absaaruhum tarhaquhum zillah; zaalikal yawmul lazee kaanoo yoo'adoon
71:1: Innaaa arsalnaa Noohan ilaa qawmihee an anzir qawmaka min qabli any yaatiyahum 'azaabun aleem
71:2: Qaala yaa-qawmi innee lakum nazeerum mubeen
71:4: Yaghfir lakum min zunoobikum Wa-yu'akhkhirkum ilaaa ajalim musammaa; innaa ajalal laahi izaa jaaa'a laa yu'akhkhar; law kuntum ta'lamoon
71:5: Qaala rabbi innee da'awtu qawmee lailanw Wa-naharaa
71:7: Wa-inee kullamaa da'awtuhum litaghfira lahum ja'alooo asaabi'ahum fee aazaanihim wastaghshaw siyaabahum Wa-asarroo wastakbarus tikbaaraa
71:9: Summaa inneee a'lantu lahum Wa-asrartu lahum israaraa
71:10: Faqultus taghfiroo Rabakum innahoo kaana Ghaffaaraa
71:12: Wa-yumdidkum bi-am-waalinw Wa-baneena Wa-yaj'al lakum Jannaatinw Wa-yaj'al lakum anhaaraa
71:13: Maa lakum laa tarjoona lillaahi waqaaraa
71:15: Alam taraw kaifa khalaqal laahu sab'a samaawaatin tibaaqaa
71:16: Wa-ja'alal qamara feehinna nooranw Wa-ja'alash shamsa siraajaa
71:21: Qaala Noohur Rabbi innahum 'asawnee wattaba'oo mal lam yazid-hu maaluhoo Wa-waladuhooo illaa khasaara
71:23: Wa-qaaloo laa tazarunna aalihatakum Wa-laa tazarunna Waddanw Wa-laa Suwaa'anw Wa-laa Yaghoosa Wa-Ya'ooqa Wa-Nasraa
71:24: Wa-qad adalloo kasee-ranw Wa-laa tazidiz zaalimeena illaa dalaalaa
71:25: Mimmaa khateee'-aatihim ughriqoo fa-udkhiloo Naaran falam yajidoo lahum min doonil laahi ansaaraa
71:26: Wa-qaala Noohur Rabbi laa tazar 'alal ardi minal kaafireena daiyaaraa
71:27: Innaka in tazarhum yudil-loo 'ibaadaka Wa-laa yalidooo illaa faajiran kaffaaraa
71:28: Rabbigh fir lee Wa-liwaa-lidaiya Wa-liman dakhala baitiya mu'minanw Wa-lil-mu'mineena wal-mu'minaati Wa-laa tazidiz zaalimeena illaa tabaaraa
72:1: Qul oohiya ilaiya annna hustama'a nafarum minal jinni faqaalooo innaa sami'naa quraanan ajaba
72:2: Yahdeee ilar rushdi fa-aamannaa bihee Wa-lan nushrika bi-rabbinaaa 'ahada
72:3: Wa-annahoo Ta'aalaa jaddu Rabbinaa maat takhaza saahibatanw Wa-laa walada
72:4: Wa-annahoo kaana yaqoolu safeehunaa 'al allahi shatata
72:5: Wa-annaa zanannaaa al lan taqoolal insu wal-jinnu 'al allahi kaziba
72:6: Wa-annahoo kaana rijaalun minal insi ya'oozoona bi-rijaalin minal jinni fa-zaadoohum rahaqa
72:7: Wa-annahum zannoo kamaa zanantum al lany yab'asal laahu 'ahada
72:8: Wa-annaa lamasnas samaaa'a fa-wajadnaahaa muli'at harasan shadeedanw Wa-shuhuba
72:9: Wa-annaa kunnaa naq'udu minhaa maqaa'ida lis'sam'i famany yastami'il 'aana yajid lahoo shihaabar rasada
72:10: Wa-annaa laa nadreee asharrun ureeda biman fil ardi 'am 'araada bihim rabbuhum rashada
72:11: Wa-annaa minnas saalihoona Wa-minnaa doona zaalika kunnaa taraaa'iqa qidada
72:12: Wa-annaa zanan-naaa al lan nu'jizal laaha fil ardi Wa-lan nu'jizahoo haraba
72:13: Wa-annaa lammaa sami'nal hudaaa aamannaa bihee famany yu'min bi-rabbihee falaa yakhaafu bakhsanw Wa-laa rahaqa
72:14: Wa-annaa minnal muslimoona Wa-minnal qaasitoona faman aslama fa-ulaaa'ika taharraw rashada
72:16: Wa-alla-wis taqaamoo 'alat tareeqati la-asqaynaahum maa'an ghadaqa
72:17: Linaftinahum feeh; Wa-many yu'rid 'an zikri rabbihee yasluk-hu 'azaaban sa'ada
72:18: Wa-annal masaajida lil-laahi falaa tad'oo ma'al laahi 'ahada
72:19: Wa-annahoo lammaa qaama 'abdul laahi yad'oohu kaadoo yakoonoona 'alaihi libada
72:20: Qul innamaaa ad'oo rabbee Wa-laaa ushriku biheee 'ahada
72:21: Qul innee laaa amliku lakum darranw Wa-laa rashada
72:22: Qul innee lany yujeeranee minal laahi 'ahadunw, Wa-lan ajida min doonihee multahada
72:23: Illaa balaagham minal laahi Wa-risaalaatih; Wa-many ya'sil laaha Wa-rasoolahoo fa-inna lahoo naara jahannama khaalideena feehaaa 'abada
72:24: Hattaaa izaa ra-aw maa yoo'adoona fasaya'lamoona man ad'afu naasiranw Wa-aqallu 'adada
72:25: Qul in adreee a-qareebum maa too'adoona am yaj'alu lahoo rabbeee 'amada
72:26: Aalimul ghaibi falaa yuzhiru alaa ghaibiheee 'ahada
72:27: Illaa manir tadaa mir rasoolin fa-innahoo yasluku min baini yadaihi Wa-min khalfihee rasada
72:28: Liya'lama an qad ablaghoo risaalaati rabbihim Wa-ahaata bi-maa ladaihim Wa-ahsaa kulla shai'in 'adada
73:6: Inn naashi'atal laili hiya ashadddu wat-anw Wa-aqwamu qeelaa
73:7: Inna laka fin nahaari sabhan taweelaa
73:8: Wazkuris ma rabbika Wa-tabattal ilaihi tabteelaa
73:9: Rabbul mashriqi wal-maghriibi laaa ilaaha illaa Huwa fattakhizhu wakeelaa
73:10: Wasbir 'alaa maa yaqoo-loona wahjurhum hajran jameelaa
73:11: Wa-zarnee walmukaz-zibeena ulin na'mati Wa-mahhilhum qaleelaa
73:14: Yawma tarjuful ardu waljibaalu Wa-kaanatil jibaalu kaseebam maheelaa
73:15: Innaa arsalnaaa ilaikum rasoolan shaahidan 'aleykum kamaaa arsalnaaa ilaa Fir'awna rasoolaa
73:16: Fa'asaa Fir'awnur Rasoola fa-akhaznaahu akhzanw wabeelaa
73:17: Fakaifa tattaqoona in kafartum yawmany yaj'alul wildaana sheeba
73:18: Assamaaa'u munfatirum bih; kaana wa'duhoo maf'oola
73:19: Inna haazihee tazkiratun fa-man shaaa'at takhaza ilaa Rabbihee sabeelaa
73:20: Inna Rabbaka ya'lamu annaka taqoomu adnaa min sulusa-yil laili Wa-nisfahoo Wa-sulusahoo Wa-taaa'ifatum minal lazeena ma'ak; wal-laahu yuqaddirul laila wanna-haar; 'alima al lan tuhsoohu fataaba 'alaikum faqra'oo maa tayassara minal quraan; 'alima an sa-yakoonu minkum mardaa Wa-aakharoona yadriboona fil ardi yabtaghoona min fadlil laahi Wa-aakharoona yuqaatiloona fee sabeelil laahi faqra'oo ma tayassara minhu Wa-aqeemus salaata Wa-aatuz zakaata Wa-aqridul laaha qardan hasanaa; Wa-maa tuqadimoo li-anfusikum min khairin tajidoohu 'indal laahi huwa khayranw Wa-a'zama ajraa; wastaghfirul laahaa innal laaha ghafoorur raheem.
74:24: Faqaala in haazaaa illaa sihruny yu'sar
74:31: Wa-maa ja'alnaaa As-haaban naari illaa malaaa-'ikatanw Wa-maa ja'alnaa 'iddatahum illaa fitnatal lillazeena kafaroo liyastaiqinal lazeena ootul kitaaba Wa-yazdaadal lazeena aamanooo eemaananw Wa-laa yartaabal lazeena ootul kitaaba walmu'minoona Wa-liyaqoolal lazeena fee quloo-bihim maradunw walkaafiroona maazaaa araadal laahu bihaazaa masalaa; kazaalika yudillul laahu mai yashaaa'u Wa-yahdee mai yashaaa'; Wa-maa ya'lamu junooda rabbika illaa hoo; Wa-maa hiya illaa zikraa lil-bashar
74:37: Liman shaaa'a minkum any yataqaddama aw yata-akhkhar
74:52: Bal yureedu kullum ri'im minhum any yu'taa suhufam munashsharah
74:56: Wa-maa yazkuroona illaaa any yashaaa'al laah; Huwa ahlut taqwaa Wa-ahlul maghfirah
75:13: Yunabba-'ul insaanu yawma-'izim bimaa qaddama Wa-akhkhar
75:16: Laa tuharrik bihee lisaa-naka lita'jala bih
75:37: Alam yaku nutfatam mim maniyyiny yumnaa
75:40: Alaisa zaalika biqaadirin 'alaaa any yuhyiyal mawtaa
76:1: Hal ataa 'alal insaani heenum minad dahri lam yakun shai'am mazkooraa
76:2: Innaa khalaqnal insaana min nutfatin amshaajin nabta-leehi faja'alnaahu samee'am baseeraa
76:3: Innaa hadainaahus sabeela immaa shaakiranw Wa-immaa kafoora
76:4: Innaaa a'tadnaa lilkaa-fireena salaasila Wa-aghlaalanw Wa-sa'eeraa
76:5: Innal abraara yashra-boona min kaasin kaana mizaa-juhaa kaafooraa
76:6: Aynany yashrabu bihaa 'ibaadul laahi yufajjiroonahaa tafjeeraa
76:7: Yoofoona binnazri Wa-yakhaafoona yawman kaana sharruhoo mustateeraa
76:8: Wa-yut'imoonat ta'aama 'alaa hubbihee miskeenanw Wa-yateemanw Wa-aseeraa
76:9: Innaamaa nut'imukum li-wajhil laahi laa nureedu minkum jazaaa'anw Wa-laa shukooraa
76:10: Innaa nakhaafu mir Rabbinna Yawman 'aboosan qamtareeraa
76:11: Fa-waqaahumul laahu sharra zaalikal yawmi Wa-laqqaahum nadratanw Wa-surooraa
76:13: Muttaki'eena feeha 'alal araaa-'iki laa yarawna feehaa shamsanw Wa-laa zamhareeraa
76:15: Wa-yutaafu 'alaihim bi-aaniyatim min fiddatinw Wa-akwaabin kaanat qawaareeraa
76:17: Wa-yuskawna feehaa kaasan kaana mizaajuhaa zanjabeelaa
76:19: Wa-yatoofu 'alaihim wildaanum mukhalladoona izaa ra-aytahum hasibtahum lu'lu-'am mansoora
76:20: Wa-izaa ra-ayta samma ra-ayta na'eemanw Wa-mulkan kabeera
76:21: Aaliyahum siyaabu sundusin khudrunw Wa-istabraq, Wa-hullooo asaawira min fiddatinw Wa-saqaahum Rabbuhum sharaaban tahooraa
76:22: Innaa haazaa kaana lakum jazz-'anw Wa-kaana sa'yukum mashkooraa
76:24: Fasbir lihukmi Rabbika Wa-laa tuti' minhum aasiman aw kafooraa
76:26: Wa-minal laili fasjud lahoo Wa-sabbihhu lailan taweelaa
76:27: Inna haaa'ulaa'i yuhibboona 'aajilata Wa-yazaroona waraaa'ahum yawman saqeelaa
76:28: Nahnu khalaqnaahum Wa-shadadnaaa asrahum Wa-izaa shi'naa baddalnaaa amsaala-hum tabdeelaa
76:29: Inna haazihee tazkiratun fa-man shaaa'at takhaza ilaa rabbihee sabeela
76:30: Wa-maa tashaaa'oona illaa any yashaaa'al laah; innal laahaa kaana 'Aleeman Hakeema
76:31: Yudkhilu mai yashaaa'u fee rahmatih; wazzaalimeena a'adda lahum 'azaaban aleemaa
77:27: Wa-ja'alnaa feehaa rawaasiya shaamikhaatinw Wa-asqainaakum maaa'an furaataa
77:29: Intaliqooo ilaa maa kuntum bihee tukazziboon
77:30: Intaliqooo ilaa zillin zee salaasi shu'ab
77:31: Laa zaleelinw Wa-laa yughnee minal lahab
77:43: Kuloo washraboo haneee-'am bimaa kuntum ta'maloon
77:48: Wa-izaa qeela lahumur ka'oo laa yarka'oon
78:18: Yauma yun-fakhu fis soori fataa-toona afwaaja
78:24: Laa ya-zooqoona feeha bar-daw walaa sharaaba
78:35: Laa yasma'oona fiha lagh-waw walaa kizzaba
78:37: Rabbis samaa-waati wal-ardi Wa-maa baina-humar rahmaani laa yam-likoona minhu khitaaba
78:38: Yauma yaqoo-mur roohu wal-malaa-ikatu saf-fal laa yatakallamoona ill-laa man azina lahur rahmaanu Wa-qaala sawaaba
78:39: Zaalikal yaumul haqqu faman shaa-at ta-khaaza ill-laa rabbihi ma-aaba
78:40: In-naa anzar-naakum azaaban qareebaiy yauma yan-zurul marr-u maa qaddamat yadaahu Wa-ya-qoolul kaafiru yaa-lai-tanee kuntu turaaba
79:16: Iz nadaahu rabbuhu bil-waadil muqad-dasi tuwa
79:18: Faqul hal laka ilaa an tazakka
79:26: Inna fee zaalika la'ibratal limaiy yaksha
79:27: A-antum a-shaddu khalqan amis samaa-u banaaha
79:40: Wa-ammaa man khaafa maqaama Rabbihee Wa-nahan nafsa 'anil hawaa
79:46: Ka-annahum Yawma yarawnahaa lam yalbasooo illaa 'ashiyyatan aw duhaahaa
80:37: Likul limri-im minhum yawmaa-izin shaa-nuy yughneeh
81:29: Wa-maa tashaaa'oona illaaa ai yashaaa-'al laahu Rabbul 'Aalameen
82:6: Yaaa-ayyuhal insaaanu maa gharraka bi-Rabbikal kareem
82:8: Feee ayye sooratim maa shaaa'a rakkabak
82:18: Summa maaa adraaka maa Yawmud Deen
82:19: Yawma laa tamliku nafsul linafsin shai'anw walamru yawma'izil lillaah
83:7: Kallaaa inna kitaabal fujjaari lafee Sijjeen
83:12: Wa-maa yukazzibu biheee illaa kullu mu'tadin aseem
83:13: Izaa tutlaa 'alaihi aayaatunaa qaala asaateerul awwaleen
83:14: Kallaa bal raana 'alaa quloobihim maa kaanoo yaksiboon
83:17: Summa yuqaalu haazal lazee kuntum bihee tukazziboon
83:18: Kallaaa inna kitaabal abraari lafee'il liyyeen
83:26: Khitaamuhoo misk; Wa-fee zaalika falyatanaafasil Mutanaafisoon
83:29: Innal lazeena ajramoo kaanoo minal lazeena aamanoo yadhakoon
83:31: Wa-izan qalabooo ilaaa ahlihimun qalaboo fakiheen
83:32: Wa-izaa ra-awhum qaalooo inna haaa'ulaaa'i ladaaal-loon
83:34: Fal-yawmal lazeena aamanoo minal kuffaari yadhakoon
83:36: Hal suwwibal kuffaaru maa kaanoo yaf'aloon
84:6: Yaaa-ayyuhal insaanu innaka kaadihun ilaa Rabbika kad-han famulaaqeeh
84:10: Wa-ammaa man ootiya kitaabahoo waraaa'a zahrih
84:15: Balaaa inna Rabbahoo kaana bihee baseeraa
84:25: Illal lazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaati lahum ajrun ghairu mamnoon
85:8: Wa-maa naqamoo minhum illaaa ai yu'minoo billaahil 'azeezil Hameed
85:9: Allazee lahoo mulkus samaawaati wal-ard; wallaahu 'alaa kulli shai-'in Shaheed
85:10: Innal lazeena fatanul mu'mineena wal-mu'minaati summa lam yatooboo falahum 'azaabu Jahannama Wa-lahum 'azaabul hareeq
85:11: Innal lazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaati lahum Jannaatun tajree min tahtihal anhaar; zaalikal fawzul kabeer
86:10: Famaa lahoo min quwwatinw Wa-laa naasir
87:7: Illaa maa shaaa'al laah; innahoo ya'lamul jahra Wa-maa yakhfaa
87:13: Summa laa yamootu feehaa Wa-laa yahyaa
88:6: Laisa lahum ta'aamun illaa min daree'
88:7: Laa yusminu Wa-laa yughnee min joo'
88:17: Afalaa yanzuroona ilal ibili kaifa khuliqat
89:5: Hal fee zaalika qasamul lizee hijr
89:6: Alam tara kaifa fa'ala rabbuka bi'aad
89:8: Allatee lam yukhlaq misluhaa fil bilaad
89:15: Fa-ammal insaanu izaa mab talaahu Rabbuhoo fa-akramahoo Wa-na'-'amahoo fa-yaqoolu Rabbeee akraman
89:16: Wa-ammaaa izaa mab talaahu faqadara 'alaihi rizqahoo fa-yaqoolu Rabbeee ahaanan
89:21: Kallaaa izaaa dukkatil ardu dakkan dakka
89:23: Wa-jeee'a yawma'izim bi-jahannnam; Yawma-'iziny yatazakkarul insaanu Wa-annaa lahuz zikraa
90:14: Aw it'aamun fee yawmin zee masghabah
90:17: Summa kaana minal lazeena aamanoo Wa-tawaasaw bissabri Wa-tawaasaw bilmarhamah
90:19: Wallazeena kafaroo bi-aayaatinaa hum as-haabul Mash'amah
91:13: Faqaala lahum Rasoolul laahi naaqatal laahi Wa-suqiyaahaa
91:14: Fakazzaboohu fa'aqaroohaa fadamdama 'alaihim Rabbuhum bizambihim fasaw-waahaa
95:4: Laqad khalaqnal insaana fee ahsani taqweem
95:6: Ill-lal lazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaati; falahum ajrun ghairu mamnoon
96:15: Kalla la-il lam yantahi la-nasfa'am bin-nasiyah
97:3: Lailatul qadri khairum min alfee shahr
97:4: Tanaz-zalul malaa-ikatu war-roohu feeha bi-izni rab-bihim min kulli amr
98:1: Lam ya-kunil lazeena kafaru min ahlil kitaabi wal-mushri-keena mun-fak-keena hattaa ta-tiya-humul bayyinah
98:2: Rasoolum minal laahi yatlu suhufam mutahharah
98:4: Wa-maa tafarraqal lazeena ootul kitaaba il-la mim b'adi ma jaa-at-humul baiyyinah
98:5: Wa-maa umiroo il-la liy'abu-dul laaha mukhliseena lahud deena huna-faa-a Wa-yuqeemus salaata Wa-yu-tuz zakaata; Wa-zaalika deenul qaiyimah
98:6: Innal lazeena kafaru min ahlil kitaabi wal-mushri-keena fee nari jahan-nama khaali-deena feeha; ulaa-ika hum shar-rul ba-reeyah
98:7: Innal lazeena aamanu Wa-'amilus saalihaati ula-ika hum khairul bareey-yah
98:8: Jazaa-uhum inda rabbihim jan-naatu 'adnin tajree min tahtihal an-haaru khalideena feeha abada; radiy yallaahu 'anhum Wa-ra-du 'an zaalika liman khashiya rabbah
99:6: Yawma-iziny yas-durun naasu ash-tatal liyuraw a'maalahum
99:7: Famaiy ya'mal mithqala zarratin khai-raiy yarah
99:8: Wa-maiy y'amal mithqala zarratin sharraiy yarah
100:9: Afala ya'lamu iza b'uthira ma fil quboor
103:3: Illal lazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaati Wa-tawaasaw bilhaqq; Wa-tawaasaw bissabr
105:1: Alam tara kaifa fa'ala rabbuka bi-ashaabil feel
106:4: Allazeee at'amahum min joo'inw wa-aamanahum min khawf
110:2: Wa-ra-aitan naasa yadkhuloona fee deenil laahi afwajaa
110:3: Fasabbih bihamdi rabbika wastaghfirh, innahoo kaana tawwaaba
